title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
From Ground Up to Dream Home: Meet Dominique, Your Big Island Real Estate Guide
Welcome to my corner of paradise! I'm Dominique, and my path to real estate may be a little different than you'd expect. Growing up, my family always seemed to be renovating our home, and weekends were spent exploring open houses - I was practically born with a paintbrush in one hand and a floor plan in the other!
This passion for home design led me to the Big Island of Hawaii, where I truly learned the art of building from the ground up. With my family, I constructed a luxury home, getting my hands dirty in every stage of the process. This immersive experience taught me more than just carpentry; it instilled a deep understanding of what makes a house a home.
But I didn't stop there. My love for art and design took me further, leading me to earn a B.A. in Art History. This broadened my perspective, allowing me to appreciate the rich tapestry of styles and influences that shape our spaces.
Today, I combine my artistic eye, construction knowledge, and global perspective to help you create your own earthly paradise here on the Big Island. Whether you're searching for a cozy cottage or a sprawling estate, I'm here to guide you through the process with expertise and personalized care.
And because building community is just as important as building homes, I'm deeply involved in the Big Island life. When I'm not helping clients achieve their real estate dreams, you might find me whipping up delicious treats at Doughmo's Cookies - the perfect way to celebrate new beginnings!
Ready to make your Big Island dream a reality? Let's connect and explore the possibilities together!

title: Real Estate Broker
description:
Aloha Everyone,
I have lived and sold Real Estate on the Big Island of Hawaii since 2001. Prior to moving here, I was in the Semiconductor industry for 25 years. I am a data driven person and feel information is the key to complete any successful transaction. I believe in honest answers and have never been a smoke-blower or fluff person. I believe in the Big Island as a place to come to heal and live a longer, healthy life and I enjoy telling new clients about what makes this island so special.
My wife and I opened our own real estate and property management office in 2004 and sold it in 2019 so the wife could retire. I was the principle broker for the office and now have changed offices to Better Homes and Garden - Island Lifestyle.
I strive to be the type of realtor I would want working for me.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Raised between Hilo and Waimea, Nalani's connection to and knowledge of the Big Island goes beyond just Real Estate. After going away to college and obtaining a degree in Business from the University of Southern California, Nalani returned home with a deeper sense of appreciation for the Big Island.
Reared by parents who have 60+ years of combined experience in Construction, Nalani has an inborn knack for discerning great real estate; her experience working for a General Contractor who caters to high-end clients around the island helped Nalani further develop and hone in on those talents. Nalani's comprehensive college courses prepared her for the everyday communications, negotiations and strategies involved in the world of Real Estate, and her experience promoting luxury properties from around the world on social media makes her a trusted source for attracting international attention to her clients’ luxury homes.
What truly sets Nalani apart is not only the deep understanding of what makes a property unique and valuable, but also her unwavering determination to know her market as well as the back of her hand. Her passion for showcasing the aspects that make every piece of real estate "a true gem" makes her a force to reckon with in the industry.
Outside of Real Estate, Nalani moonlights as a Host on Big Island Television. She is also passionate about being an active part of the community through supporting local nonprofits, entrepreneurs, and affordable housing efforts. Off duty, Nalani loves traveling. She has a deep love for exploring unfamiliar places while meeting new people, enjoying the local fare, and learning about the history & culture of the places she visits. And when she isn't working or traveling, Nalani is probably going "holoholo" around the island, spending time with loved ones, working out at the gym, wining & dining, cheering on the Kansas City Chiefs, watching UFC, reading, catching a movie at the cinema, hiking, singing & dancing to Big Band music, shopping at Costco, or enjoying a game night in.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Jonathan T. Correa was born and raised in Hawaii. He was brought up with a real estate & construction background and is genuinely passionate about Big Island real estate. Jonathan thrives on helping others make the most of their buying and selling opportunities in this tropical setting. If you are thinking of buying or selling real estate on the Big Island - whether it's a primary residence, vacation home or investment property; Jonathan T. Correa is the professional who captures the true spirit of Aloha in his service. Give him a call today, you will not be disappointed.

title: Real Estate Broker
description: I moved to the Big Island from Washington State in 2002. I flew for the airlines for many years and my love for aviation drew me to Mokulele Airlines when I arrived here. I assisted with operations for several years. I got my real estate license in 2007 and my brokers license a few years after that. I specialize in the gold coast resort area and private homes and lots up through Kohala Ranch. I service as far South as Ocean View, North to Kapaau, East to Laupahoehoe, to include Waimea and Waikoloa Village. I have extensive experience guiding Sellers in preparing their home for sale to receive top dollar. I get great pleasure educating Buyers on the different areas of the island. It really helps to learn their taste and what they are looking for so I can be their "boots on the ground" when new properties come available. I go the extra mile to help Buyers & Sellers realize their real estate dreams before, during and after the sale. My office has the best exposure on the island for Seller's at Mauna Lani Shops. We are in every issue of Homes & Land and advertise on all the major sites including 102 portals in 60 Countries.

title: Real Estate Broker
description:
For over 11 years, Hank Correa III has specialized in finding his clients that special piece of paradise that they need and desire. Hank III guides you through the entire process, seamlessly, to ensure smooth sailing ... from Oceanfront to Farms & Ranches, from Residential to Rentals to Commercial & Investments, all within and around the areas of Hilo, Puna, and Hamakua on the 'Big Island' of Hawaii. He prides himself on his reputation for high customer satisfaction/real estate expertise and at age 25 was one of the youngest real estate agents to become a Real Estate Broker on the Island of Hawaii.

As a Certified Residential Specialist, the CRS Realtor® is one of the top 3% of real estate agents in the U.S. With more experience and training than the average Realtor®, the CRS community is dedicated to improving the real estate industry for home-buyers and sellers everywhere.

Hank Correa III and his team will continue to offer their traditional one-on-one service. In this specialized market, they cover the entire Big Island of Hawaii real estate market, specializing in the communities such as Hilo, Puna, and Hamakua Coast area.


Reputation, experience, knowledge, contacts, honesty, integrity, and results are the cornerstones upon which our brokerage will continue to grow and develop. We have the knowledge and the tools to get the job done.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Mary has worked in real estate for more than 17 years.


Following a successful career as owner and manager of an independent computer company, she drew from her extensive network and entrepreneurial experience and began investing in real estate in 2003. A decade later, she earned her real estate license in California, and in 2019 she moved to Hawaii Island and now practices real estate in the Aloha State.


Mary prioritizes providing outstanding customer service, and doing so with the utmost care and professionalism. Confident, honest, diligent, and efficient, she is a strong negotiator and a loyal champion of her clients' needs. A frequent visitor to the islands for two decades, Mary fell in love with Hawaii, the diversity of the people, and even the many different beaches: black sand, green sand, and many shades of white.
The beauty of Hawail's gorgeous scenery and waterfalls are second only to that of the A loha spirit.


In addition to her business, Mary enjoys exercising in the great outdoors, spending time with her dogs, and volunteering for the Special Olympics. Mary finally realized her dream of living in Hawaii, and she can help you achieve yours as well!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
LesLee Delaney has enjoyed a multi-faceted career in the real estate business covering a span of over 30 years. She began her career in residential single family lending and succeeded in building a branch network that financed over $4 Billion annually. Her outstanding ability to communicate with homebuyers, homeowners and financial partners was pivotal to her success. LesLee is a problem solver and enjoys working with both buyers and sellers to achieve their dreams.
LesLee's extensive experience in finance, home design, building, and negotiation uniquely positions her to provide a superior level of service to her clients. Her dedication to preparation and accurate research has resulted in smoother and more timely closings for her buyers and sellers. She has received glowing testimonials from her clients referencing her tremendous dedication to customer satisfaction. LesLee has promoted a courteous, professional relationship with her colleagues in the industry which has enhanced the ability to facilitate her transactions.
One of LesLee's favorite reviews by a client closed with "And we made a friend for life". This defines a philosophical attitude that sets her apart from other agents. LesLee has always appreciated the trust that her clients have placed in her and is honored by all the repeat business and referrals that she continues to receive.
Building strong relationships with local service providers and development of a referral network has made both the home sale and purchase process simpler and less stressful for LesLee's clients. LesLee has coordinated sub contractors, pool maintenance, landscapers, housekeepers, carpet cleaners, and many more in her effort to make the real estate transaction seamless for her buyers and sellers.
LesLee is actively involved in the community and donates her time generously to honor Hawaiian culture. She is active in hula and enjoys golf, cooking, family, and her golden retriever Parker.
Mahalo for getting to know LesLee. We'll close this introduction with another review from one of LesLee's clients......"When you're looking to choose the best agent On The Big Island of Hawaii, you need look no further."

title: Real Estate Broker
description: Renée H. Kraft named one of Hawaii State's very best Realtors by Honolulu Magazine exemplifies exceptional and extraordinary service with every one of her clients. Born and raised on the Island of Oahu and licensed in the State of Hawaii in 1992 she has the experience and tenacity to market effectively, strong negotiating skills, and focusing her attention to every detailed step for her Sellers and representing her Buyers from locating exceptional properties to closing smooth transactions.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I have been in the real estate business for over 25 years specializing in housing sales, development, renovation, finance and market assessment. As a REALTOR® at Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Island Lifestyle, I have generated over $16.6 million in sales, representing both buyers and sellers. I specialize in the Mauna Kea, Mauna Lani and Waikoloa resort communities along the Kohala coast; however, I have also assisted clients in Waimea, Kona and Waikoloa Village. As a resident of the Mauna Kea resort, I not only sell the resort lifestyle, I live it. Contact me to discuss your real estate investment needs.

title: Real Estate Broker
description:
Eileen is a luxury property agent, Broker and Owner of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Island Lifestyle on the Big Island of Hawaii. Mostly, Eileen caters to Kona and the Kohala Coast. Eileen’s clientele is remarkedly composed of 90% returning clients and referrals, a clear testament to her exceptional ability to foster strong connections and instill unwavering trust. Her expertise lies in the realm of resort properties, and she proudly asserts that "Resort Living is in my DNA."

With an extensive career spanning over four decades in the real estate industry, Eileen's track record is marked by her instrumental role in representing Builder/Developers across six novel projects on the illustrious Kohala Coast. This wealth of experience underscores her adeptness in navigating the intricacies of property development and sales within these upscale communities.

Eileen's accolades include her esteemed position in the Hall of Fame for Hawaii's Top 100 Realtors, a recognition that mirrors her dedication and outstanding performance. Her personal real estate transactions alone exceed a remarkable $452 Million on the Big Island of Hawaii, reinforcing her profound impact on the local property market.

In essence, Eileen's presence resonates strongly within the domains of Kona, the Kohala Coast, and beyond. Her ability to nurture enduring relationships and cultivate trust among her clients is paralleled by her deep-rooted affinity for the resort lifestyle, making her an unparalleled authority in this niche. With an extensive portfolio that spans decades and includes pivotal partnerships with Builder/Developers, Eileen's role in shaping the real estate landscape remains unparalleled.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Ross K. Mitsutani: Your Guide to Big Island Dreams
Aloha! I'm Ross K. Mitsutani, a passionate REALTOR® specializing in helping buyers and sellers find their dream homes on the Big Island of Hawai'i. With a unique background and unwavering dedication, I'm ready to make your real estate journey seamless and successful.
From Fairways to Foundations:
For 16 years, I honed my skills as a Golf Professional at prestigious courses like Mauna Kea Resort, Ke'olu at Hualalai, and Nanea Golf Club. My passion for guiding others translated perfectly into real estate, where I now help clients unlock their ideal island lifestyle.
Building Expertise, Brick by Brick:
Beyond golf, I dove headfirst into home construction alongside my fellow REALTOR® and partner, Dominique Civitano. We tackled renovations of both 1,000 sq ft and 1,800 sq ft homes, learning every facet of construction – from the ground up. This hands-on experience gave me an invaluable understanding of building quality and potential.
Committed to Excellence:
I'm a proud member of the National Association of REALTORS® (NAR), Hawaii Association of REALTORS® (HAR), and West Hawaii Association of REALTORS® (WHAR). Additionally, I'm e-PRO® certified and hold the NAR Green Designation, demonstrating my commitment to technology, sustainability, and ethical practices.
Your Trusted Island Partner:
My passion for exceeding expectations combined with my deep local knowledge and meticulous attention to detail ensures you get the best possible outcome. Whether you're searching for your dream home, navigating a sale, or exploring investment opportunities, I'm here to guide you every step of the way.
Ready to connect?
Let's chat about your real estate goals and how I can turn them into reality.

title: Real Estate Broker
description: Aloha! I've been working in Real Estate in Hawaii for over 15 years. I've lived on all of the main Hawaiian islands starting with Maui in 1983. I loved it all and am very happy to be based in South Kohala now. I really enjoy getting to know my Clients and finding them their dream home or dream vacation home - or to spotlight the most exciting details of their properties for sale. I've built a home from the ground up as an Owner Builder and worked for many years managing high end vacation rentals. This background combined with my extremely detail-oriented nature allows me to help my Buyers deeply understand their purchases and to help my Sellers maximize their potential. My first career was in Hollywood in Film and Television and I find a sense of the excitement of the entertainment industry working in real estate in Hawaii. The gorgeous locations and theatrical weather here provide the best kind of drama. Working in real estate, at its best, is helping friends make their dreams come true - and it doesn't get much better than that!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Aloha!
My name is Emily Oberg, I am so excited to meet you!

I was born and raised on the Big Island of Hawai'i and moved to Oregon in 2014 to attend Pacific University, where I graduated with my BA in Psychology and minor in Journalism. I lived in Oregon for eight years and started my real estate business in December of 2020.
After my first year in Oregon Real Estate, I was awarded Rookie of the Year with my brokerage. I am now active in both Hawai'i and Oregon, and am ready to build my business between the two states.
I am excited to have the opportunity to serve the people of my two home states. I cannot wait to build new relationships and help the people of my community reach their real estate and life goals.
Let's find your dream home together!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
“Hawai’i Island’s beauty is unsurpassed, not only in the climate and the natural resources found within the land and sea but also in the sacred culture and sense of community throughout the islands. Native Hawaiian real estate agent, Brandy Shibuya was born and raised in a small rural town on the southern most tip of the United States and describes her home as “being the most pristine untouched sacred land, holding the most powerful ancient Hawaiian history.” Brandy served as an Hawaii island ambassador in 2012 where she held two titles Miss Kona Coffee 2011-2012 and Miss Aloha Hawaii 2012 competing for the Miss Hawaii America scholarship pageant. I’m hopes to represent her love for her people and Hawaii.
Her platform focuses on quality time strengthening children, youths and communities of which her year of service intel communication engagement working besides the Mayor, collaboration of impactful events, conducted hula performances, public speaking and hosted various campaigns. Brandy’s family founded an educational program called Hana lau lima Lahui ‘O Ka’u. The objective of this program is to educate the people about Ka’u and Hawaii understand Native Hawaiian culture and learn how to become more self-sufficient.
As a native Hawaiian, her family is well-versed in Hawai‘i’s family core values, connection with aloha a'ina and the people. Brandy believes in cultivating a deeper understanding of her clients and focuses on building long lasting relationships. Better homes and gardens real estate island lifestyle fosters long lasting relationships and embody all the values that exude true partnership and a shared vision. Do better, be better, and live better with BHGRE Island Lifestyle.
Before entering the field of real estate, Brandy was a top performer in sales production and her manager at the time mentioned that she should look into getting her real estate license. She believed that Brandy possessed character traits that were sincere and that she would be able to help others learn more about the authentic Hawai'i island lifestyle.
With the knowledge that Brandy has, she is grateful to be in the position to serve her clients with honor and grace.

title: Real Estate Broker
description: Real Estate has been a part of Jacob’s life since the beginning. Jacob grew up in California with his mother who owned a successful real estate office. Jacob was always there, either doing data entry or making flyers for new listings. Hawaii has also been a part of his life from early on. Jacob finally made it his permanent home in 1995. He became a licensed real estate agent in the state of Hawaii in 1998. He worked in high-end resort developments such as the Uplands at Mauna Kea, Pauoa Beach at Mauna Lani and Wai’ula’ula at Mauna Kea. In 2004, he acquired his broker’s license. Jacob specializes in upscale resort properties where high levels of customer service is the standard. Jacob is also a Dive Master and he excels in every ocean sport imaginable.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Keilah’s easy-going, friendly attitude and aloha spirit as a local girl here in Hilo, is what sets her apart from others. She does everything in her power to go above and beyond for her clients, works hard, fast, and efficient to get the job done to the best of her abilities! Whether its purchasing or selling a home or property, she is committed to ensuring that you are given the best real estate opportunities and high level of customer service through each transaction, and will be sure to meet, as well as exceed all of your expectations! She looks forward to meeting and serving new clients. Contact her today!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Ma’ata Tukuafu, originally from the North Shore of O’ahu, has lived on Hawai’i Island since 1998. Having grown up in Hawai’i, Tonga and the mainland US, she has extensive knowledge of diverse cultures and diplomatic relations.


Prior to entering real estate, she ran several entrepreneurial businesses and has worked as a paralegal, interior design assistant and bookkeeper. Her wide range of work experience serves her well in the world of real estate.


As a freelance writer for over 20 years now, Ma’ata has clear communication and writing skills. She has consistently proven to her clients that she is dedicated to ensuring successful and win-win transactions. A listing agent as well as a strong buyer’s agent, Ma’ata is attentive and always available for her clients.


Ma’ata considers learning a lifelong journey and pursues new skills whenever she can. She has participated in many community programs, sponsored events, volunteered and has an overall joy for life. Her interests include various arts, travel, enjoying the island life and sharing the Hawaiian lifestyle with others.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Scott is consistently recognized as one of Hawaii's top producing agents. With over 20 years of experience, he provides a significant advantage to the buying and selling process. From investment strategies to renovations, his extensive network ensures that you have the resources you need and service you deserve.
He is a long-time resident with strong local ties and a vast knowledge of the neighborhoods. Well-respected among his peers, he is known for his easy-going personality, attention to detail, and fierce commitment to his clients.
Scott has helped hundreds of families reach their real estate goals in the most successful and stress-free way possible. Let them show you how. Call Scott or meet the team at their Kailua, Kahala, Kakaako, or Kapolei office.
Services Include

Oahu-wide Sales of Residential & Investment Properties. Coordinating Repair/Renovation. Relocation Assistance. Military and Veteran Sales. Investment Strategies and 1031 Exchanges.

Education
Attended primary schools in the United States, Korea, and Germany. Graduated from the University of Colorado with a Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering and Computer Engineering

Experience
Veteran, U.S. Army.
Over 25 Years of independent sales experience. Managed the building and remodeling of numerous properties since 2000. Residential and investment property sales since 2005.

Awards and Recognition
Top 100 Realtors on Oahu, 16 Years (Honolulu Board of Realtors) Top Realtors/Top Performers in Hawaii, 13 Years (Hawaii Business Magazine) Voted Best in Real Estate, 10 Years (Honolulu Magazine) National Award Recipient, 18 Years (National Realtor Company Awards) Voted Hawaii's Best Real Estate Firm, 13 Years (Honolulu-Star Advertiser) Voted Best of Honolulu Real Estate Firm, 11 Years (Honolulu Magazine) Voted Best Real Estate Firm, 5 Years (KITV4 Island Television) Voted Hawaii's Choice in Real Estate, 2 Years (Hawaii Home + Remodeling Magazine)

title: REALTOR®
description:
I was born and raised on the North Shore of Oahu where I still live with my wife Caitlin, and son Asher. After graduating from Kahuku High and Intermediate, I attended Leeward Community college and Chaminade University. I worked in the customer service industry and sales for most of my adult life. I’ve owned my own retail business and have worked as a guest service and activity sales supervisor at Turtle Bay Resort for many years. Being a local boy and a life-long surfer, I care deeply for the people and preservation of the land and ocean of Hawaii.


Better Home and Garden Real Estate Advantage Realty can provide centuries of knowledge, a professional marketing team, photographers, in-house legal aid, and an amazing transaction coordinating team to guide you through the entire escrow process. Being a part of the most productive brokerage on Oahu, my customer service and sales background, and care for the island, I am proudly able and ready to serve those looking for a Better Home and Garden Real Estate experience here on the island of Oahu. Hawaii has more to offer then just gorgeous beaches and breathtaking mountain ranges. Let me help you find your piece of this pacific island paradise.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Wendy brings her "Client First" approach to everything she does. In the top BHGRE agents nationwide since joining the brokerage in 2016, keeping the best interest of her client’s top priority. A real estate professional with a BA in Economics from the University of Hawaii, Wendy takes a genuine interest in her clients’ goals with a commonsense approach to everything she does. Born & raised in Honolulu, Wendy understands the importance of investing in real estate, purchasing her first property more than 30 years ago. Whether you are looking for a home or investment, she is here to partner with you to reach your goals. Wendy obtained her Brokers License in 2023 & is committed to keeping up to date, educated & skilled to better serve & negotiate on behalf of her clients.
Orchestrating every step of the transaction with diligence & attention to detail; from contracts, negotiations, home inspections, appraisals, listing prep, pre-listing renovations, staging, photographs, showings, signing and everything in between, all on behalf of her clients. She knows and appreciates the nuances of each neighborhood on Oahu and understands the importance of finding the right neighborhood & community when looking at properties. Wendy brings together industry experts and resources to help you make the most informed and educated real estate decision that is right for you.
"It’s not just a property, it’s someone’s home, an investment, their future.”
Wendy makes herself readily available and responsive to her clients; timing in real estate can mean the difference in selling or finding the right property. She will be there to help you reach your goals on your timeline.
“Whenever the time is right for you, I’ll be here.”
Personal Life:
Married to Architect Carl Akai & proud Mom to son, Carson, Wendy is an avid animal lover, keeping fit playing tennis, pickleball, yoga & keeping up with rescue dogs Dug & Dwight.

title: REALTOR®
description:
As a Hawaii born local, I feel fortunate to have discovered, through the peers and mentors who guided me towards a passion in real estate, a unique way of aligning my past 20 years of service management in luxury retail and event planning and design and focuses on my clients and their needs with a long-term perspective, helping clients with real estate issues or questions wherever and whenever they arise. Moreover, I view myself not just as a real estate associate but as an adviser, helping clients not only to buy or sell but to strategize toward long-term wealth building with real estate. My philosophy is applied to my own household where I manage and guide the needs of my parents and siblings and is thereby reflected in my clientele who I model this philosophy for.
When I am not running around town, you’ll find me dedicated to community work in the re-pavement project for Koko Head as the volunteer, coordinating the ongoing restoration with members and community. Im an avid surfer, paddler and a novice tennis player to balance my schedule.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Kim Wong Balisacan was born & raised in Honolulu and has been a realtor since 2004. She is married with two adult children and a small Boston Terrier. She enjoys traveling, hiking, & open markets. She has been a part of over 381 transactions amounting to approximately $196 million and would love to be your next realtor.

title: REALTOR®
description: Hello! I'm Joyce Ariyoshi and I'm proud to serve the Honolulu area as a member of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty. As part of the Better Homes and GardensÂ® Real Estate brand I will provide you with an excellent experience before, during and after your home buying and selling journey. With innovative technology, a unique set of tools and a household brand tied to my name, I am uniquely equipped to serve you with what you need most. And, by combining a "client first" philosophy, great listening skills, deep local knowledge, marketing savvy and business professionalism I can help you sell your home or find a new home that perfectly matches your lifestyle.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Born & raised in Honolulu, Joanne started in the customer service industry while in high school & fell in love with helping others. She joined the food & beverage industry at 18 & never left. Joanne waited tables, bartended & assisted in scheduling & training. She continues to work part-time in the food & beverage industry, devoting 1 day a week there. Joanne also worked with HPD as a police radio dispatcher & then left to work in the office admin department. She later moved to the payroll & pre-audit section in the Finance division. After two decades of being a part of HPD, she felt it was time to follow her dream of pursuing a real estate career.
Joanne has deep roots in Oahu, living in various parts of the island–Honolulu,Makiki, Manoa, Makakilo, Lanikai, Ewa Beach, Hawaii Kai & our 9th island, Las Vegas. Joanne has always been intrigued by the island’s various hiking trails, beaches, & historical sites. She also enjoys finding different restaurants to try. Joanne is married to her supportive husband Tony and has two children, two grandsons, & 5 stepchildren. She loves caring for her two dogs, her bird named Pablo, & multiple fish. In her spare time, you can find her spending time with family, traveling, cooking, baking, hiking, home decorating, & doing various crafts.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Education:
University of Hawaii at Manoa, Bachelor of Science in the Department of Apparel Product Design and Merchandising

Experience:
Sandal Tree-Shoe and Accessory Buyer 2005-2007 Pioneer Promotions - Marketing Director and Wholesale Manager 2004-2005

title: REALTOR®
description: Aloha and thank you for the opportunity to discuss your real estate needs! I understand that real estate is one of the largest financial decisions for a family and I am committed to providing the highest level of customer service. My goal is to provide you with the best information available, advise you thorough all phases of the home buying and/or selling process on Oahu, HI, and fight on your behalf. Business based on trust - With my background as Manager at Ernst & Young (EY), I have a very different approach to real estate, which sets me apart from other agents. At EY, I was only successful based on my ability to deliver the highest quality service and develop long-lasting relationships based on trust and commitment. I appreciate the chance to work with you to develop a similar relationship. A long term approach - I take the time to understand my client's long term personal goals and work with them to align their real estate goals. I focus on educating my clients about the Oahu market, neighborhoods, etc. to allow them to make the best decision for themselves and their families. Strategic negotiations - I set myself apart with my negotiation skills. I never negotiate from a weak position and work with my clients to develop the best negotiation strategy to fit their personal goals. I use data to support my position, such as comparable sale, number of offers, and days on market. Additionally, as a former consultant/auditor, I'm am often able to gather information from the other party to help my clients make the best decisions. Honolulu Magazine 2015 Best in Real Estate - The top professionals on this list are chosen based on customer service and satisfaction from real clients. Winner of the 2014 Aloha 'Aina REALTOR® Awards Program - Judges reviewed and evaluated more than 1,100 client nominations in order to select the winners. These winners are REALTORS® who have gone above and beyond in service to their clients and who maintain the highest ethical standards. Thank you again for the consideration. Please give me the opportunity to discuss how I can help you achieve your real estate needs. I go above and beyond for my clients and am fully committed to providing Service you can Trust! Mahalo, Brett

title: REALTOR®
description:
Hokule’a is from the small island of Guam and is proud of her mixed Hawaiian heritage. Having been stationed with her family overseas growing up, Hokule’a has had the pleasure of attending many schools and mastering the art of moving frequently. She has resided in Hawaii for over 20 years, and prior to getting into real estate she enjoyed a long career in the medical field working in the operating room, assisting surgeons during surgical procedures. Hokule’a has always been passionate about helping others, and finds it extremely rewarding to be a part of her clients’ home ownership journey.
Real estate in Hawaii is a unique market and it was important for Hokule’a to align herself with a company that shares the same core values as she does. She is proud and thankful to be a part of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty, a company built on holding itself to the highest standards of honesty, integrity, and a “client first” attitude. Better Homes & Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty has been recognized as one of the top real estate companies in the State of Hawaii by local publications such as Honolulu Star-Advertiser, Hawaii Business Magazine, and Honolulu Magazine. Along with their highly skilled and strong administrative support team, Hokule’a will always operate in her client’s best interest and ensure they receive the highest level of customer experience.
Allow Hokule’a to help you navigate this beautiful island and find the perfect Hawaii home. If you are interested and not quite sure how to get started on the homeownership process or if you have any questions, please feel free to contact her directly at (808) 747-0024.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Aloha! I’m Tracy Bean, and I am a full service real estate agent, specializing in the preparation, sale and purchase of residential properties in O’ahu. For the past five years, I have worked with one the premier real estate teams on the island, representing both Buyers and Sellers in their real estate needs, I am committed to providing you the highest level of service with the integrity and responsiveness that you deserve. I hope for the privilege to represent you!

title: REALTOR®
description: Dianne is very passionate about what she does and it is displayed through her loyalty, honesty and integrity towards her clients. She enjoys working with military members and families and builds a trusting relationship that continues beyond the closing of the transaction. When you work with Dianne, you have a friend, trusted advisor and exceptional realtor on your side who will exceed all your expectations!

title: REALTOR®
description:
Born and raised in New York City with additional roots in Hawaii, Renato brings an unparalleled, coast-to-coast level of experience and knowledge to his clients in both regions. Renato earned a Bachelor of Business Administration from Fordham University in Bronx, New York. He brings New York sophistication, speed, and relentless service to Hawaii while bringing a bit of "aloha" to New York.
Renato's first experience within the real estate industry was as a Real Estate Analyst for Goldman Sachs, one of the foremost global investment management firms in New York. There, he learned to effectively analyze, predict, and spot trends within the real estate market. After a better part of a decade, he took a hiatus to spearhead a wildly-popular coffee and wine bar, where he sharpened his marketing and client service skills. His mantra to drive success at the coffee bar was to "anticipate what the client needs before they even realize they need it."

Renato is fluent in English, Italian and Tagalog. In his free time, Renato enjoys swimming, diving, tennis and pickleball.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Nationally recognized as one of the top performing agents nationwide in the BHGRE brand, Principal Broker, Joe Castaneda is based out of the Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty West office in Kapolei but serves Oahu clients island-wide. With over 10 years of combined real estate and mortgage experience Joe possesses a unique real estate perspective and is consistently a top performing real estate agent on Oahu.
Joe graduated with his BBA from the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii at Manoa, double majoring in International Business and Finance. After being in real estate for a year, the opportunity arose for him to use his finance degree and he transitioned into the mortgage industry to become a mortgage loan originator with Island Pacific Homeloans, a joint venture of Central Pacific Bank.
In 2015 he was voted "Best in Real Estate: Mortgage" by Honolulu Magazine as well as voted as one of "Hawaii's BEST mortgage loan officers" by the Honolulu Star Advertiser. After two years in the mortgage industry, he transitioned back into real estate. He now brings his finance, mortgage, and real estate knowledge to help guide his clients through the real estate transaction. In 2016 Joe was part of a Top 100 Real Estate Team in Hawaii and now leads a successful team of his own while also being Principal Broker of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty in Kapolei on the West side of Oahu.
Most recently in 2021 Joe and his team were awarded the Emerald Elite Award which puts them in the top tier of Better Homes and Gardens agents nationwide. Joe was also named a 2022 Top Performer by the Hawaii Business Magazine and featured in Honolulu Real Producers Magazine.

title: REALTOR®
description: Born and raised in East Honolulu, current Kuliouou resident Punahou, c/o 2000 Sonoma State University - BA International Economics Extensive retail sales and food service industry experience 10 years administrative support staff at BHGRE Advantage Realty Board of Directors at Mary, Star of the Sea School & Kalani Youth Football Association Working with Sean since 2020

title: REALTOR®
description: Aloha, I am a dedicated real estate professional who will listen to, advise, and guide my clients on towards their real estate goals. I understand that real estate is a business based on client relationships, trust and confidence, which I work hard to build and maintain. I brings years of experience in the financial services industry in product management, marketing and strategy roles. I have also developed a keen ability to effectively listen to and understand clients' needs through years of conducting consumer research studies. Having worked in New York, Boston, San Francisco and Taipei, I have cultivated a business acumen that will allow me to effectively work with a broad range of clients based domestically and abroad. From gaining market exposure for properties to be sold, to uncovering hidden gems for properties to be purchased, I will research, negotiate and successfully close deals for my clients. I look forward to having the opportunity to work with you.

title: REALTOR®
description: Nani was born and raised on Oahu. Having grown up in Aiea, and a graduate of Kamehameha Schools Kapalama, Nani spent many Sundays going to open houses with her parents. She loved the feeling of new possibilities in a new home and is excited and grateful that this passion has transferred to her next professional career. Nani was an All-American and All -Conference Player of the Year for the University of Hawaii Wahine Basketball team and continued to excel and grow playing basketball professionally in Is rael, Switzerland, Greece and also made the WNBA's Los Angeles Sparks' reserve team. Following her playing days, Nani formed D.ONE Basketball Inc., a non-profit organization helping youth through basketball. Nani wanted to become a real estate professional because she wanted to continue to be of service to her homeland and to her community. She truly enjoys helping people find the right property that makes them happy to come home to everyday. Helping her clients become comfortable during their real estate transactions is extremely important to her. She understands the importance of education and keeping current with the latest guidelines and trends. By utilizing her athletic, business and community experience, she is enthusiastic about assisting her clients with all their real estate needs. Buying, selling or investing in real estate can be complicated and intimidating, but it doesn't have to be. All you need is the right realtor - a seasoned professional with the experience and local knowledge to explain the process step-by-step. As an agent with Prudential Advantage Realty, Nani is backed by their state-of-the art technology and vast network of state-wide resources. Every real estate transaction is unique. No two clients, properties or situations are the same. Nani listens to your individual criteria and concerns. Honesty and integrity are engrained in her being and she will offer you the best solution possible to fit all your real estate needs.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Tania joins BHGRE with an extensive and diverse background in customer service and teaching as well as working as an entrepreneur. She grew up in East Oahu and received her B.S. degree from the University of Hawaii in fashion merchandising with a minor in communications. She helped open the guest services department of Park Lane Ala Moana condominiums and was then promoted to Owner Services Coordinator at Park Lane. Her strong work ethic, planning and communication skills allowed her to provide the highest level of service to her luxury condominium owners.
She has worked in property management for the Locations branch of Kathy Muller, a local talent agency. She honed her communication and organizational skills as the Fashion Production Instructor at Honolulu Community College for 5 years. She sold and taught modeling, acting and self-improvement classes to adults, teenagers and children as the Director of Education for Kathy Muller. She is also a Beauty Stylist, owning her own bridal hair and make-up business with a certificate from Westmore Academy of Cosmetic Arts in Los Angeles, CA.
Other Work Experience
Substitute Teaching Certificate – 1 yr/5 yr certificate (never substitute taught)
Advertising Assistant- Bates Lee Witter
Sales Associate- Alion & Chanel

title: REALTOR®
description:
My name is Desmond Cura, but most know me as Dez. I am married to Tinamarie Kepo'o Cura, and we have two wonderful sons. I was born and raised on Guam, but Hawaii is home now as I have been living here since 2010.
On June 25, 2002, I began my enlistment in the U.S. Coast Guard, and have proudly served for the past 20 years, having achieved the rank of Chief Petty Officer. During my time in the Coast Guard, I have served in several enlisted leadership positions, which has helped me understand the value of clear and concise communication, the ability to problem-solve, and most importantly to look out for others. I am confident in my ability to transfer these skills over to my new career as Real Estate Associate to ensure that I will better serve you as my client as I seek to gain your trust. It is my belief that this would create a solid foundation to do business together and form new friendships and know that I will always treat you with respect and honor the time you afford me.
Outside of my career I enjoy spending time with my wife and two sons outdoors. Which include beach trips, mountain biking, motocross, golf, and hiking just to name a few. As a family we also take pride in giving back to our community by volunteering our time with our church by participating in community clean-ups and distributing food to low-income communities.
I look forward to working with you as we experience the 808 Good Life!
Military Awards
Coast Guard Commendation Medal (4)
Coast Guard Achievement Medal (2)
Coast Guard Good Conduct Medal (6)
Armed Forces Service Medal (2)
Humanitarian Service Medal (2)
Global War on Terrorism Expeditionary Medal
Global War on Terrorism Medal
Coast Guard Letter of Commendation (2)
Coast Guard Meritorious Team Commendation (6)
Coast Guard Sea Service
Coast Guard Special Operations Service
Coast Guard Presidential Unit Citation
(Hurricane Katrina/Rita Support)

title: REALTOR®
description: Born in Chicago and raised in California since she was 7 years old. Leslie graduated from Humboldt State University in Northern California with a Bachelor of Arts in Theatre and Film. Leslie is a seasoned TV Executive Producer/Showrunner with over 25 years of storytelling experience who has transitioned from the fast-paced world of unscripted TV to the dynamic realm of Oahu Real estate. Leslie’s commitment to excellence and passion for serving others has led her to pursue her passion for real estate.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Born and raised in Orange County California, Sal’s ability to speak both English and Spanish fluently has enabled him to begin his sales career 27 years ago selling 3M industrial products in five cities for six years. The experience he gained with customer service, product knowledge, marketing, and excellent communication skills allowed him to continue his growth in the sales industry and opened doors to new opportunities when he relocated to Oahu in 2001.

In 2001, Sal began his career in fine jewelry and watch sales. With nearly 20 years of sales experience in Hawaii, his connections and work relationships have demonstrated time and time again that Sal has a very reliable and trustworthy reputation with clients and jewelry manufacturers located both locally and nationally. His outstanding work ethic and commitment to his customers' needs have always been a top priority of his.

Sal prides himself on the relationships he has built with his clients that have developed over the years into great friendships. Sal is dependable, honest and even a jokester at times. When you meet Sal you will instantly find yourself at ease with his easygoing personality however he is always very professional and treats everyone with the utmost respect.

Sal enjoys cycling, hiking, golfing and has a passion for running. He has completed three marathons and various competitive obstacle races.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Reyn Halford was born in Honolulu, and has a deep love for the people, culture, and lifestyle of Hawai’i. He has the heart of a local boy, with an international reach. He graduated from Mid-Pacific Institute, then received his Bachelor of Arts at Westmont College in Santa Barbara, CA. He launched his career abroad as an English teacher with the Japan Exchange Teaching (JET) Program, then returned to Hawai’i to foster more connections with his Japanese language skills. He is a flight attendant with Hawaiian Airlines, a perfect fit for this local boy with an international heart.
Reyn has a natural enthusiasm and energy, which he brings into his Real Estate business. Whether buying or selling a home, he will be there for each step along the way. His authentic connection to people, honesty, and communication skills make him the successful agent that people love to work with.
ハルフォード・レンはホノルル市で生まれました。彼は、ハワイの文化やライフスタイルを愛しています。地元を大切にする心を持ち、また国際的な絆があります。彼はハワイのミッド・パシフィック・インスティテュート卒業、サンタ・バーバラのウェストモント大学を卒業しました。その後、 JET プログラムで国際キャリアをスタートし、日本の愛媛県で英語教師として働きました。ハワイに戻ってから、日本での経験を生かして更に国際交流を培ってきました。彼はハワイアン航空の客室乗務員であり、国際的な彼にとってこの仕事は、まさに天職です。
レンは持ち前の情熱とエネルギーを不動産の仕事に活かしています。家の購入または売却を希望される方に、彼は親身になって寄り添います。不動産屋として成功している理由は、彼の正直で誠実な人柄、コミュニケーション能力、そして人との良い関係作りの才能です。

title: REALTOR®
description: Lifelong Hawaii Resident Raised in Kailua, Oahu Working with Sean since 2014 Graduate of the University of Hawaii, Shidler College of Business - Masters of Business Administration Bachelor of Business Administration 8+ years of experience as a paralegal specializing in Real Estate Law before joining the team Worked in Nonprofit Management

title: REALTOR®
description:
Melissa, a native of Honolulu and longtime resident of Salt Lake on the stunning island of O’ahu, brings a wealth of international experience and top-notch customer service skills to her real estate career. A proud graduate of St. Andrew’s Priory and the University of Hawai’i at Manoa, Melissa's diverse background spans over a decade of management roles with renowned brands such as Abercrombie & Fitch Co., Kate Spade & Co., and ASICS America, as well as the local retailer Fighting Eel.
Her career has taken her across the globe, with significant stints in Hong Kong and Southern California. In Hong Kong, she honed her skills in a dynamic international market, while in Southern California, she managed recruiting, training, and sales operations for new stores. These experiences have sharpened her ability to connect with people, enhance her customer service expertise, and refine her sales techniques.
Now with Better Homes & Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty, Melissa leverages her extensive management background and global perspective to help clients navigate the Hawai’i real estate market. Whether you're searching for your dream home, a second property, or an investment opportunity, Melissa is dedicated to providing exceptional service and making your real estate journey in Hawai’i seamless and rewarding.
Outside of her professional life, Melissa enjoys exploring the great outdoors, whether hiking, spending time at the beach, or walking long distances with friends. She also loves cooking and baking, adding a personal touch to her vibrant lifestyle.

title: REALTOR®
description: Jeff Char is a full-time residential real estate agent who is passionate about helping his clients and strives for excellence in all that he does. Jeff is a native to Oahu, born and raised in Honolulu and graduate of Kamehameha Schools. Jeff has a background in sales and management, and holds a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration from Loyola Marymount University in Los Angeles, California. During his free time, Jeff enjoys surfing, paddling outrigger canoe, and spending it with friends and family.

title: REALTOR®
description:
I am an experienced, licensed, Real Estate Agent in Hawaii with a demonstrated history of working in the real estate industry with Better Homes & Gardens Advantage Realty since 2016. I earned my BS in Finance from Michigan State University and a MS in Design Strategy & Innovation from Brunel University. Through my past work experiences as Financial Analyst and Market Insight Manger , and coming from an artistic family background, I am able to leverage both my logical and design-ful skills to proactively address my Clients' specific priorities, and to help my Clients to make logical and savvy Real Estate decisions. Born and raised in South Korea (Seoul), I am perfectly fluent both in Korean and English which allows me to connect overseas buyers/ sellers with the Hawaii real estate market.

Previously, I worked as Executive Sales Agent on Team Kiriu
· Named #1 Agent on Oahu by Hawaii Business Magazine (2018)
· Voted Hawaii's Best Realtor by Honolulu Star-Advertiser Readers (2018)
· #1 Agent Broker/Owner Team in the Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate's nationwide agent network (2018, 2017, 2016 & 2015)
Please feel free to contact me at 808-253-8477 regarding your real estate needs!

title: REALTOR®
description:
Education:
Graduate of University of Hawaii, Manoa Campus, College of Education
Experience:
Real Estate Experience in buying, improving and reselling residential properties Experienced in property rental management Represented buyers with foreclosure and pre-foreclosure transactions, assisting them through the auction process Buyer and Divisional Merchandiser for Nordstrom, leading sales in ladies’ shoe department to top in the nation Buyer of shoes, handbags and accessories for a local wholesale company
Accomplishments:
2011 - Leading Edge Society Award Winner 2010 - Leading Edge Society Award Winner Ranked in the Top 200 of agents in Hawaii in 2008 Ranked in the Top 300 of agents in Hawaii in 2007 Recognized with Diamond Level Award with Realty Executives in 2006
Interests and Affiliations:
Charter Member of New Hope Diamond Head Founding Member of Hope Chapel Makiki Recreational surfer

title: REALTOR®
description:
Kristen was born and raised in Kailua, O’ahu and has been fortunate to grow up with this beautiful island home as her playground. With a great sense of pride and responsibility, she is truly passionate about her local community, the people that call Hawai’i home and the rich culture that makes Hawai’i unlike any other place in the world.


Upon graduating from Kamehameha High School with academic honors, Kristen went on to double major in Business Marketing and Communications at the University of Hawai’i, Manoa where she earned her bachelor’s degree. Having worked for several well-respected marketing and public relations companies over the last 10 years, she truly became interested in real estate when she bought her first home in 2016. Excited and a little nervous, the experience of being a first-time homeowner lit a spark in her that drove her to pursue a career in real estate.


Kristen is a self-motivated, organized, problem solver who genuinely enjoys learning, connecting with people and helping individuals realize their dreams of home ownership in Hawai’i. Her natural enthusiasm, superior customer service and knowledge of Hawai’i continually fuel her passion for real estate.
Buying, selling, investing or simply wanting to learn more about real estate and your options can feel like a daunting task. As your realtor, allow Kristen to ensure your needs are heard. With each transaction comes unique opportunities as well as obstacles that she will help you navigate step by step. Leading with integrity, she is motivated to help her clients find the best solutions for their real estate needs.


Kristen currently resides in Kailua with her husband, young daughter and Great Dane puppy. Outside of the office you can find her paddling at Lanikai Beach, hiking, spending time with her family and friends or trying a new recipe in the kitchen. She loves good food, celebrating the end of a great day with a cocktail and getting outdoors whenever possible.
Connect with Kristen today with any real estate questions you may have!

title: REALTOR®
description: Trisha joined Team Kiriu as a Listing Specialist to assist our clients who are getting ready to sell their home. Before joining the Team, Trisha was an Account Supervisor at MVNP, as well as the Director of Store Planning and Visual Merchandising for the Sullivan Family of Companies. Trisha now focuses on coordinating vendors to prepare our Clients' homes for sale, supervising the work at each property and making sure that our Sellers’ homes are market ready. Her substantial experience in marketing and project management will benefit you greatly in your listing process.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Taryn Fowler (RA) was born in Honolulu, Hawaii, but raised in Austin, Texas. After graduating from the University of Texas at Austin she moved back to Hawaii to be closer to family. Taryn is married with one son, and they reside on the Windward side of Oahu. Taryn is an avid surfer and water woman, and her work schedule usually revolves around the surf forecast. Taryn and her family fortunately get to travel often for work and play to destinations like Tahiti, France, Philippines, and San Francisco just to name a few. Taryn also enjoys yoga, hiking, tennis, and is a huge foodie.
Taryn has always had a passionate relationship with real estate and bought her first house when she was 26. Shortly after, she obtained her Hawaii real estate license in 2007. Taryn learned at a very young age that one way to financial freedom and wealth is through owning real estate. Taryn’s personal experiences with her own properties allow her to better serve her clients through their real estate endeavors.
Taryn loves to market her listings with one of a kind staging to help set apart the property from others and get the best possible price and exposure. For Taryn’s buyer clients, she has a patient style and never rushes a client to buy something they only like, they must love it! Taryn has a wide range of real estate knowledge from condominiums in Kakaako, single family homes on the Windward side, and even investment properties on the north shore of Oahu.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Carlee was born and raised in Honolulu, HI, and attended ʻIolani School. She stayed on island to attend the University of Hawaii at Manoa. During her time at UHM, she was a Rainbow Warrior Dance Team member and received a B.A. in Marketing and International Business with a minor in Japanese. She then continued her education with UH Manoa and received an M.S. in Marketing Management. During this time, she also worked as a Sales and Marketing Specialist for Destination Marketing Hawaii. Carlee joined Team Kiriu in 2021 as a Digital Marketing Specialist. She assists the team with our online marketing initiatives in line with the overall team strategy and goals and helps connect your property to the perfect buyer.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Born and raised on the North Shore of Oahu, Trish enjoys the benefits of living with her husband and two children on her home island with its unparalleled beaches, weather, culture, and aloha spirit. As an agent, she believes in empowering, educating, and helping her clients to make the best possible decision for their real estate goals.
With over three decades running a successful business and developing client relationships, Trish understands the value of commitment, collaboration, and entrepreneurial spirit. As the owner of TK Services, she focused on high end residential and vacation properties with concierge services, maintenance, and housekeeping. She is always enthusiastic about open communication, enabling her to give you a specialized experience. Trish is committed to putting her clients first, whether a first-time home buyer, an experienced investor, or a luxury estate client.
Trish’s priority is YOU. Working with Trish, you will:
· Have your goals understood and met
· Receive maximum focus, effort, and commitment
· Be treated with the utmost care, obtaining unparalleled high-quality service

Trish is passionate about living and working in Hawaii and will be your advocate in the exciting world of real estate in our tropical paradise. Trish and BHGRE Advantage Realty sincerely care about clients and working as a team to provide the best service. We invite you to call Tricia to answer any of your Real Estate needs.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Gwen’s professional background as an investigator and inspector may sound like a strange resume for a real estate agent, but years of experience conducting interviews, being a good critical listener, negotiating and working with diverse cultures brings it all together. Her experience working for the Department of Defense has allowed her to experience first-hand the challenges faced by military members and their families. She understands the culture and knows that sometimes much is asked with little time to prepare. Gwen is ready and able to assist you with your real estate challenges and provide you with the very best in customer service with “Aloha.”
Gwen first moved to Hawaii in 1997 and quickly fell in love with the islands and the ocean playground. She and her husband share their home with three rescue cats and one very spoiled parrot. They have an active lifestyle and enjoy scuba diving, SUPing, hiking, biking, and traveling.

title: Real Estate Broker
description:
Meet Myron Kiriu
• Born & raised in Lodi, California
• Attended college at the University of California, Berkeley. Graduated with honors acquiring a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration with a double emphasis in Accounting & Finance
• Following graduation, Myron worked for two years in San Francisco with the CPA firm of Coopers and Lybrand (now known as Pricewaterhouse Coopers)
• Moved to Hawaii in 1984 and worked with the CPA firm KPMG Peat Marwick until 1987
• Myron's financial experience combined with a strong work ethic and ideas have resulted in superior results for his clients. His prior experience with 1031 tax deferred exchanges is an additional benefit to those who work with him
A Licensed Professional
• CEO and Owner of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty, formerly Prudential Advantage Realty
• President and Owner of Prudential Advantage Realty, established in 2004
• Licensed Realtor with the Honolulu Board of Realtors®
• Member of the National Association of Realtors ® , the Hawaii Association of Realtors ® and the Multiple Listing Service
• Practiced in both Hawaii and California as a licensed CPA
• Former member of the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants, the Hawaii Society of CPAs, & the California Society of CPAs
• Acted as a Board Member and Treasurer of a local credit union
• Became a Partner with Prudential Locations after just two years

title: REALTOR®
description: Aloha! I have the best job in the world on the beautiful Island of Oahu. Oahu has been home to my family since 1998 where I raised my family and started my real estate career in 2005. Prior to joining the company as a full time associate I worked as the financial manager for Urology Associates,LLC, Since then I have helped numerous buyers and sellers achieve their unique real estate goals & dreams. Living in Germany, Japan, and Korea as a daughter of a Korean Consul has provided me with a multicultural experienc e which has given me a powerful edge within the melting pot of Hawaii. Born in Korea and educated in the US I was able to retain my proficiency in Korean. As an investor as well as a homeowner I can advise you on the many facets of the Hawaii real estate market. Hawaii is a unique market that operates outside of the general trends & forecasts. I am thankful to my clients who have graciously described me as "hardworking", "going above and beyond" and having "integrity". My family has embraced Oahu as our home where my husband is a well established physician & surgeon at Pali Momi and Queens Medical Center. You will often find us on the water surfing and paddling with our two daughters. We also love to travel and ski but nothing tops returning home to paradise!

title: REALTOR®
description:
With over 25 years of customer service, sales and management experience in Hawaii, Sheryl Kochi utilizes this unique skill set to assist clients with their home sale or purchase and meet their individual real estate goals. Born and raised on Oahu, Sheryl uses her invaluable knowledge of our island communities to provide exemplary real estate services and solutions for her clients.
Sheryl is an integral part of the top producing and award-winning Adams Group and serves as both a Buyers & Sellers Specialist, assisting clients with their specific real estate needs. She thoroughly enjoys being out in the field and being hands-on with projects. She excels at multi-tasking which is a vital characteristic in searching for that perfect home or prepping a home for sale.

title: REALTOR®
description:
A Windward Oahu resident, Grace graduated from Castle High School and continued her education at the University of Hawaii Kapiolani & Leeward campuses where she majored in Sales & Marketing. Fluent in Japanese, she has traveled the world and possesses years of sales, marketing and customer service experience in the local travel and hospitality market.


Grace has been a licensed Realtor in Hawaii since 1991 with local real estate experience and has been a national and local award-winning agent at Locations (formerly Prudential Locations) before transitioning to our growing company. She has held her real estate license since 1990 and Brokers license since 1994, and is a Certified Residential Specialist (CRS), Senior Real Estate Specialist (SRES), and has served on the Honolulu Board of Realtors, Professional Standards Committee and Grievance Committee since 2001.
For Grace, Real Estate is not just a job, but a true lifestyle. Her goal is not to be a sales person, but to be your friend, consultant and advisor in real estate. We invite you to contact Grace whenever you need answers to your real estate questions.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Christine’s passion for real estate began at an early age as her grandparents owned a real estate brokerage firm on the mainland. Attending the University of Hawaii, she obtained a business degree with an emphasis in real estate, as well her real estate license. During college, she worked at a variety of real estate related offices - an appraisal firm, mortgage department of a local bank, and PMI.
After a short stint as a commercial loan officer, she transitioned to becoming an appraiser. She went on to attain her certification as a Certified Residential Appraiser, the highest level for a residential appraiser with the expertise to appraise complex properties. She worked in the appraisal industry for over 30 years, but also handled real estate sales. It is her opinion that the two go hand-in-hand, and by doing both, it makes one stronger in each of the respective fields.
Christine grew up in Kaneohe and attended Castle High School. Her love of Kaneohe is the reason she and her family reside there today, close to her parents and mother-in-law. Family and faith are the pillars of her life.
Always enamored with traveling, Christine was blessed to be able to travel the world through entertaining. Promoting Hawaii with the Hawaii Visitors Bureau, or performing as part of the Maile Aloha Singers, created many wonderful memories. Her love of travel was instilled in her as a young child as her family, before Christine was the age of five, lived in New York, Indonesia and the Philippines before settling in Kaneohe.
Prior to becoming an empty-nester, Christine was very involved in her son’s school while he was growing up. Now with him off to college, she devotes her time to real estate sales. She is passionate about sales, and is committed to fulfilling her clients’ needs in obtaining their dream homes with her wealth of knowledge and professionalism.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Colin is a Broker-In-Charge and has dedicated over 16 years to learning the ins & outs of the real estate market and finance world. He is recognized as one of the Top 100 Real Estate Agents in Hawaii by Most Transactions and also ranked in the Top 1% of all realtors nationwide with Better Homes & Gardens Real Estate. In addition to his real estate expertise, Colin's strong financial & CPA background ensures that his clients are well informed by the end of any transaction. His success lies in his integrity and personal dedication to his clientele along with his commitment to providing the highest level of service. Colin prides himself in helping buyers and sellers, at any price point, achieve their real estate goals.

AWARDS & RECOGNITION

description: Education: Portland State University, With honors - Health Education/Health and Fitness Promotion Experience: 2007-Today-Realtor Associate - Prudential Advantage Realty: Top 10% of agents in 2010 on Oahu. 2010 top 9% of Prudential Agents nationwide. 2010 Prudential Leading Edge National award recipient. 2005-2007- Realtor Associate CBPP- consistently awarded the Top Quality Award and Top Block Survey for outstanding service and client satisfaction. title: REALTOR®
description: Born and raised in Chicago, Illinois, Daniel B. Lee studied and received his bachelors of science in business management from Northern Illinois University. Pursuing an interest in diamonds and gemstones, Daniel became an accredited gemologist from Gemological Institute of America (GIA). With an exhaustive background in high-end luxury, Daniel became an expert of his clients’ preferences, tailoring every item to perfectly match his client’s desire. Holding a firm belief that relationships are the most essential aspect of any business, Daniel invested in his clients, earning their trust and confidence. Recognized by his company as a valuable asset, Daniel and his wife moved out to Oahu, making him one of the youngest general managers to open a Rolex boutique in the United States. Ingrained with strong work ethics, integrity, and a positive attitude, Daniel has brought over all of his experience and knowledge to the world of real estate. With a desire to share his knowledge with all of his clients, ranging from first time homebuyers, sellers, and seasoned investors, Daniel will always make himself available to his clients to ensure all their needs are met.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
My background is a perfect match for the dynamic industry of Real Estate. Organized with high attention to detail, I credit my success to my integrity and strong ethical leadership. I am committed to servicing your individual needs, and with my amazing support team and the latest technology, you can feel confident that you will be working with a local professional with in-depth Hawaii real estate market knowledge.
Resort and Second Home Property Specialist (RSPS)
• Uniquely qualified to assist you with investment and retirement properties or with selling or purchasing a second home in a resort, recreational and/or vacation destination
• Understanding of tax treatment for second homes and investment or vacation properties
Seniors Real Estate Specialist (SRES)
• In depth knowledge and expertise to meet the needs of home buyers and sellers age 50+ through major financial and lifestyle transitions, including relocating, refinancing residential or investment properties or selling the family home
E-Pro Specialist
• Utilize the most advanced real estate technologies and strategies to provide exceptional service
• Extensive knowledge of today’s most innovative digital marketing techniques
Awards, Membership and Affiliations

Community Service

If you are selling or buying property and are looking for an experienced and successful agent to help you through the process, please contact me so I may assist you with your needs and allow me to provide you with the very best real estate experience. Visit my website at www.KarenHawaiiHomes.com for the latest market and neighborhood trends and more information.

title: REALTOR®
description:
George & Chikako Lobley


12 years of real estate sales experience Hawaii Kai resident since 2002 and specializes in residential real estate in East Oahu, Waikiki and Kakaako 25 years of experience in Japanese investment banking in Tokyo, Japan (15 years of research & equity sales and 10 years of Japanese equity investment management and advise) Graduated University of Hawaii at Manoa with BA in Economics and Japan focused MBA at JAIMS Trilingual: Proficiency in order of English / Japanese / Korean Member and VP of Abe Lee Toastmasters, Urasenke foundation of Hawaii, Member of Chartered financial institute, and Member of Honolulu Board of Realtors Chikako raised in Osaka, Japan and lived in Hawaii since 2002 and George raised in Honolulu and lived in Tokyo for 25 years, both can bring unmatched client needs and services when bridging East and West




ジョージ ロブリー ・ ロブリー 千香子 プロフィール

日英バイリンガルのハワイ州公認不動産取引士。 １２年間の経験と実績 ハワイカイ在住。 オアフ島東部 ワイキキ カカアコ エリア 専門 東京で２５年間、投資銀行、投資顧問会社 で日本株の投資マネジャーとして働く ハワイ大学 マノア校 経済学部、経営修士号取得。 日英韓 のトライリンガル トーストマスタークラブ会員、ハワイ裏千家会員、 Member of Chartered financial institute, ハワイ不動産協会会員 ロブリー千香子は、大阪 出身で、リーガロイヤルホテルに６年間勤務。年に家族でハワイに移住。 ホノルル出身の ジョージは 東京在住経験２５年。 アジア 特に日本からのお客様のニーズを敏速に読み取り、 “ おもてなし ” 精神をモットーに お客様第一に 不動産売買、購入後の生活全般のお手伝いをさせて頂きます。
不動産投資、住宅購入、バケーションホーム、リロケーション、初めてハワイの不動産を購入される方を専門にしております。 無料相談 承ります。 お気軽に日本語でお問い合わせください。
