title: REALTOR®
description:
With over 25 years in the surf industry and direct sales, Noel brings a unique perspective and solid work ethic to his clients.
Proud to call Mililani home, Noel specializes in the area and has roots in the community. As part of the Better Homes and Gardens Advantage Realty North Shore,

Noel is backed by an entire team of skilled support staff that provide services including escrow tracking, listing coordination, in-house photography and customized marketing plans.

title: REALTOR®
description: Mary joined Team Kiriu in 2010 with over 18 years of experience as an administrator with other real estate companies. Mary's role with Team Kiriu is to prepare contracts, prepare listing presentations along with the related comparative market analysis, and ensure that all members of the team are properly integrated with each other. Mary's past experience is additional insurance that your transaction is handled with the utmost professional care.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Aloha! I was born and raised on Oahu and have spent my whole life adventuring all around the island. I grew up in Pearl City and Kailua and graduated from 'Iolani School. After completing my Bachelor's Degree in Environmental Studies from the University of Colorado at Boulder and working as an Environmental Consultant, there was a strong draw to come back to my loved ones and the islands.
While I am still passionate about the environment, the desire to have a more personal and face-to-face role made real estate a natural transition for me. My past jobs in the restaurant industry and environmental consulting, both focused on how customer service for each person is important. I learned the importance of delivering excellent service, and it is something that I always strive to do. There is so much importance in always putting the client first no matter what, and I will fight for what is best for you.
As part of my transition into a new industry, I'm happy to be a part of Team Aka. We are ranked in the Top 3% of teams in the BHGRE network nationwide; however, we are most proud of our client service awards including Honolulu Magazine Best in Real Estate, Hawaii Business Magazine Top Producers, and the Winner of the Aloha 'Āina Award.
I have so much love for this island and my home, and I can't wait to be able to help you feel the same way that I do.

title: REALTOR®
description:
David M. Liu was born and raised on the North Shore of O’ahu. The eldest in a family of six children, being raised in a big family taught David early on how to care for and nurture those around him. David is regarded as a leader in his field, possessing over 20 years of sales and marketing experience in the surf & action sports world, servicing the South Pacific region (Hawaiian Islands and Guam).
A market-savvy professional whose clients’ satisfaction and best interests are paramount, David’s desire to serve his clients’ particular needs coupled with his market expertise, construction knowledge and superior negotiating skills are what set him apart from the rest. For over a decade, David has been one of the top producers in the United States as the face for various multi-million dollar brands such as Rusty, Nixon, DC Shoes, Arnette and other notable action sports companies. Although his career is important to him, the love for his family is his main priority. David has traveled abroad with his family to numerous countries (Thailand, Canada, Japan, and New Zealand to name a few). His hobbies include spending time with friends, surfing, golf and working out.
David’s expertise lies in the keen knowledge of various communities within the Hawaiian Islands and those that reside within it. David is not only a real estate agent, he is a real estate investor who has skin in the game and takes pride in knowing the ins and outs of real estate investing. He was taught at a young age that buying real estate is your best investment, which he took to heart and started investing 20 years ago.
Whether buying or selling, David M. Liu will provide you the special attention one expects of a dedicated, top-producing real estate professional.
David’s clients consistently praise him for his honesty and integrity. His exceptional work ethics, coupled with the highest-value-goal setting objectives and most importantly, his unwavering loyalty.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Suzuna Maudlin was born and raised in Kanagawa, Japan.

Suzuna earned her degree in hospitality and tourism from Kapiolani Community College, where she gained valuable skills in customer service and communication. Her education, combined with her years of living in the Honolulu area, make her a trusted expert on the local community. She also has experience working at Louis Vuitton Waikiki as a sales representative, where she honed her sales abilities and provided top-notch service to clients.

In her free time, Suzuna enjoys surfing in town and exploring all that Hawaii has to offer. Her knowledge of the local community and her love of the islands make her an ideal partner for clients looking to buy or sell a home in Hawaii. With a strong work ethic and a friendly demeanour, Suzuna is committed to providing her clients with personalised attention and exceptional service. Contact her today to learn more about how she can help you achieve your real estate goals.

都 涼奈（ミヤコ スズナ）

神奈川県の鵠沼海岸という町で生まれ育ち、ハワイのカピオラニ・コミュニティ・カレッジでホスピタリティ・ツーリズムの学位を卒業しました。学生生活や長年のホノルルでの暮らしによる経験から、地元のレストラン・お仕事・学校・病院・どんなカラーが地域ごとにあるのか。など生活に必要なお話をしながら物件をご紹介できればと思っています。

お休みの日はハワイの魅力の一つでもあるサーフィンを楽しんでいます。地元の方から学ぶハワイへの愛情は、とっても温かいもので私も大切にしている心絵の大きな一つです。そんな素敵なハワイで暮らす大きなステップをお手伝いできたらと思います。

title: REALTOR®
description: Samantha was raised in Honolulu, HI and went to Punahou School. She briefly left Oahu to attend UCLA where she pole vaulted and got her B.A. in History. She then enrolled in an online master’s program at USC Gould School of Law where she received a M.A. in Studies of Law and a Business Law Graduate Certificate. During this time she was also working as the Administrative Associate for Waiea in Kakaako. In 2021 Samantha joined Team Kiriu as a Buyer’s Specialist and assists our clients with finding and purchasing their homes. Her competitive mindset and ability to connect with people is an integral part of helping our clients feel comfortable and confident as they find their future home or real estate investment.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Aloha, my name is Daniel Lee Kim. I was born and raised in Asuncion, Paraguay (South America), but I am of Korean descent and speak Spanish and Korean. When I was 13 years old my family moved to the United States and grew up in Alhambra, California (Los Angeles). My wife and I moved to Oahu, Hawaii in 2018 and fell in love with the diverse culture, kindness of the people, and its natural beauty and plan on making this island our permanent home.
In high school I played water polo, volleyball, and basketball. However, nowadays I enjoy golfing, surfing, and fishing. Upon graduating from high school, I attended Embry Riddle Aeronautical University, located in Daytona Beach, Florida where I earned my bachelor’s in Aeronautical Science and earned my multi-engine and single-engine commercial pilot’s license.
Post college, wanting to challenge myself both mentally and physically, I decided to join the United States Marine Corps. During my 11 years of honorable service, I had the pleasure of mentoring and leading hundreds of Marines while also having the opportunity to fly tactical aircraft and Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs). Additionally, I served as an Air Traffic Control Officer. Throughout my Marine Corps career, my wife and I moved a total of 7 times from coast to coast and to Hawaii (as our last duty station). We have personally purchased properties utilizing the VA loan program in Virginia and Texas, and a condo in Hawaii with conventional financing with the end goal of turning them into investment properties and plan to continue to grow our real estate portfolio. I’m a strong believer of building wealth through real estate.
I joined Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate (BHGRE) Advantage Realty in 2022 because of their core values of putting clients first while harnessing a family-oriented team to better serve clients. The driving force of my decision to pursue real estate was because of my unpleasant first-time home buying experience. In turn, my goal is to ensure every client has the best and smoothest experience throughout the entire process while providing a uniquely tailored service to each one of them. I live by the saying “once you stop learning, you start dying” by Albert Einstein, which drives me to add value as a real estate expert to not only facilitate the current process of buying or selling but to continue to add value through education that my clients will benefit from years down the road.
During my time as a Marine Officer, I have truly harnessed the core values of the Unites States Marine Corps (honor, courage, and commitment) and saw, firsthand, the huge impact of living with such values. My diverse background is an asset for my clients when it comes to navigating such a multi-cultural environment, especially in Hawaii. I am looking forward to serving you with the upmost integrity and respect; tenaciously represent you and provide you recommendations (both popular and unpopular opinions) to ensure the best result; and to be fully devoted to you as my client.
More about Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty:

Affiliated with an international brand name for worldwide recognition (Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate) BHGRE Advantage Realty has 5 locations across Oahu and Maui Hawaii's best real estate firm the past 11 years by Honolulu Star Advertiser (2010-2020) Best Honolulu real estate firm for 8 years by Honolulu Magazine (2012-2013, 2014-2020) In-house professional photographer, escrow transaction team supporting every step of the process, marketing team with up-to-date trends, targeting a wide audience; and technology to support and reach global clients

title: REALTOR®
description:
Born and raised in Honolulu, Chelsea Andres Lee attended Maryknoll High School and received her Finance degree from the University of Hawaii at Manoa, Shidler College of Business. After pursuing a career as a financial advisor in the securities industry, she followed her love of real estate and investing to Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty.
Chelsea works alongside her brother, Colin Lee, who is recognized as a Top 50 Real Estate Agent on Oahu, and Top 1% of all agents at Better Homes and Gardens nationwide. She is also a Senior Real Estate Specialist (SRES) who combines her financial expertise and extensive customer service skills to provide an exceptional level of service and business acumen to their clients. When she is not servicing their clients, she enjoys weight training and spending time with her family and dogs.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
As one of the founders and C.O.O. of Commercial Data Systems for over 26 years, Guy brings a unique combination of management, operational and financial experience to his clients. Established in Hawaii with four employees in 1986, Commercial Data Systems grew to over 90 employees with annual revenues of nearly $90 million. Additionally he has sat on the boards of several non-profit organizations.

Originally from Connecticut, he received his Bachelor of Music degree from the Manhattan School of Music before moving to Hawaii. An active member of Hawaii’s musical community and avid supporter of the arts, Guy most recently performed at a Fourth of July concert at the Waikiki Shell, and was a soloist in the Friends and Nabors Christmas show for several seasons at Hawaii Theater. He has had leading roles in several productions at Diamond Head Theatre and Manoa Valley Theatre, and currently sings in the choir at St. Andrew’s Cathedral.

title: Associate Real Estate Broker
description: Realtor Associate Licensed since 2007 Realtor Licensed since 2014 Locations LLC - 2007 - 2014 BHGRE Advantage Realty - 2014 to Present

title: REALTOR®
description:
ALOHA!
Thank you for visiting my profile page!
Growing up in beautiful Manoa Valley, I attended Mid-Pacific Institute where my excellent work ethic and passion for sports and fine arts grew. Among the various sports I played, I excelled as a placekicker for the Pac-5 football team having earned All-State and All-ILH honors. I later went on to play for the Occidental College football team receiving All-SCIAC Honors. At Occidental College, I received a bachelor of Fine Arts and Art History degree with an emphasis in sculpture and art installation.
Prior to becoming a Realtor Associate with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty, I taught English at various private and public schools in Beijing, China. My experience teaching not only involved helping students to learn a new language, but it also allowed me to be their resource to enrich and cultivate their lives. While living abroad and traveling extensively throughout China and South East Asia, I immersed myself in the local communities and cultures. For me, everyday living abroad was an adventure that brought constant change which displayed my adaptability and resourcefulness.

As a Realtor Associate with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty, I look forward to implementing my exemplary customer service and uncompromising work ethic towards helping you with any of your real estate needs. My client-first approach stems from treating each and every client as if I were helping my own family. My goal is to ensure that I can provide each of my clients with maximum value and exceptional service. With my local real estate knowledge, attention to detail and integrity, I will assist you for every step of your real estate journey. Please consider me as your resource for any real estate questions and services, whether you're curious about Hawaii's housing market, a first-time home buyer, a VA, a motivated seller, a savvy investor, or you want to know more about home ownership.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Born and raised in the Philippines, Margo grew up in a family business started by her grandmother. Margo initially moved to Oahu to attend Kapiolani Community College’s culinary and hotel program and later transferred to the University of Las Vegas Nevada (UNLV) to continue her education in Hotel and Restaurant Management. After meeting her husband at UNLV and earning her Bachelor’s degree, they moved back to Oahu’s North Shore where he grew up.


With over 12 years of local real estate experience, Margo is an incredibly responsive Realtor who combines her diverse professional experience with a true commitment to her clients. This is evident by her dedication, passion and in-depth knowledge of the local market, providing much more than the required services. Margo is a person of high ethical and moral standards, which is reflected in her work. She is a master at negotiating and works tirelessly with her valued clients putting them at ease and exceeding their expectations.


Another distinct advantage of working with Margo is that her father-in-law and husband are homebuilders. Munden Design & Build has been in business for over 40 years since 1977. They build and sell beautiful homes which gives Margo a significant advantage in home design and construction knowledge. She is able to assess the true value of a home and get her clients the best deal when buying or selling.


Margo and her husband are proud to call Waialua home on Oahu’s North Shore, and are committed to the close-knit community where they are raising four sons. In her spare time, she enjoys taking her boys to the beach, hiking, stand up paddling and golfing. This expert multi-tasker mother is also the team mom for the basketball club of her 2 older sons. Fluent in Tagalog and Visayan, Margo is committed to providing her clients with trusted, knowledgeable service in all of their real estate transactions.
