description: San Francisco/Bay Area Native Hawaii Resident since 2004 Working with Sean since 2012 Graduate of UC Berkeley - 2002 - B.S. American Studies, Emphasis in Education in America Graduate of University of San Francisco -2004 - M. A. Education with Art Emphasis Private Homeschool Tutor, Grades K-9 from 2005-2009 HIDOE Teacher Grades K-5 from 2010-2012

title: REALTOR®
description:
Maki Nakajo was born in Ibaraki, Japan and moved to Hawaii in 2016. Before moving to Hawaii, she worked as an accountant for more than 10 years at a large Japanese IT company in Tokyo. After moving to Hawaii, she started an online store connecting people to small local businesses and using these connections to sell curated packages. Prior to join Better Homes, she worked at a boutique real estate company as the section leader of the vacation home property management division. Her passion shifted to helping people buy or sell their homes.
Maki is bilingual in English and Japanese. She has a strong sense of responsibility, is a very organized person and a good listener. She wants to understand what’s important to you. Her number one goal as a sales agent is to simplify the whole buying or selling process by keeping you informed and being responsive.
Today, her free time is spent with her family – at her children’s activities and sporting events or going to the beach. She also likes reading. ナカジョウ 牧子(ナカジョウ マキコ) 茨城県出身。青山学院大学経営学部卒業。 2016年にハワイ出身の夫と息子と共にハワイへ移住。 ハワイ移住前は、富士通株式会社にて経理を１０年以上経験。東京・神奈川・兵庫県にてパソコンビジネス、携帯電話ビジネスなどの経理業務、損益分析業務に携わる。 ハワイへ移住後は、日本とハワイをつなげる仕事をしたいとの思いから、厳選されたハワイのローカルビジネスの商品を組み合わせてパッケージに入れて販売するオンラインビジネスを立ち上げる。その後、日本人を多く顧客に持つ不動産会社に勤務し、別荘管理部門の主任として物件管理に携わる。管理業務の中で、オーナー達の不動産売却・購入のニーズを聞くにつれて、次第に不動産売買の仕事に惹かれ、不動産セールスエージェントとなる。 英語・日本語バイリンガル。お客様の購入・売却プロセスお手伝いで一番大切にしていることは、正確な情報をわかりやすく提供し、お待たせしないこと。不動産という大きな買い物につきものの不安感を取り除き、安心して取引を完了できるよう、常にお客様の気持ちに寄り添うことをモットーにする。 二児の母。趣味は読書、家族や友人と一緒にビーチや公園、たまにサーフィンに行くこと。

title: REALTOR®
description: Joanna Nakama was born in Saitama, Japan, and raised on the East Side of Oahu. She is a graduate of Oregon State University and has over a decade of work experience in the service industry. Joanna prides herself on hard work, dedication to excellence, and a high standard for professionalism. That, paired with her experience working with one of the top real estate agents in Hawaii, allows her to provide her clients with top-tier service. While working on the team, she assisted Buyers with purchasing their dream homes and Sellers with marketing properties to reach their highest earning potential. Joanna will gladly assist you in achieving any of your real estate goals and meet you where you are, whatever your needs.

title: REALTOR®
description: Born and raised in Hawaii, Erika graduated from Maryknoll School and continued her education at the University of Hawaii at Manoa, where she earned her bachelor’s degree in Marketing and International Business. Shortly afterwards, she joined Team Kiriu in 2021 as an Escrow Specialist, and has transitioned into the position of a Buyers Specialist where she assists our clients with finding and purchasing their dream homes. Her strong communication and problem-solving skills, along with being fluent in both English and Vietnamese, helps bring a fresh perspective in the buying process.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Education:
University of Hawaii at Manoa, 1989 to 1993 - Graduated with a Bachelor's of Business Administration in Accounting California State University at Northridge, 1991 to 1992 Experience:
State & Local Tax Manager with KPMG LLP (formerly known as KPMG Peat Marwick LLP), 1994 to 2001 - Certified Public Accountant Proven Results Ensure Quality Service
Platinum 2015 (Awarded to top 3% of Better Homes & Gardens Real Estate agents nationally) Emerald Elite 2014 (Awarded to top 1.5% of Better Homes & Gardens Real Estate agents nationally) Chairman's Circle Gold, 2013, 2005 (Awarded to the top 3% of Prudential agents nationally) President's Circle, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012 Ranked in the "Top 100" of Oahu's real estate agents in 2009 & 2014 Residential Specialist since 2001 Managing Buyers and Sellers real estate needs by meeting expectations efficiently and in a professional manner. Certified Public Accountant - April 1998 Realtor Associate - July 2001 Past Board Member of the Junior Achievement of Hawaii Past Member of the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants Past Member of Hawaii Society of Certified Public Accountants Member of National Association of Realtors Member of Hawaii Association of Realtors
Personal Interests
Yoga Hiking Traveling to new destinations

title: REALTOR®
description: Grace was born in Singapore, lived in Malaysia and finished her education in Singapore on a scholarship. She started working at BHGRE Advantage Realty as an Administrative Assistant. Then in 2018 Grace first joined Team Kiriu as a Client Relations Specialist and has moved on to her current role as an Escrow Specialist for the team. Grace speaks English, Cantonese, Mandarin and Malay and provides a most important service to our clients by keeping track of the escrow process. Grace is there to help our clients watch for critical timelines, following up on escrow items and getting information that our clients need to make informed decisions on their home sale or purchase.

title: REALTOR®
description: Slayde was born and raised in Oahu and moved to Maui where he graduated high school from Seabury Hall. While working as a Social Media Director for a real estate brokerage, Slayde earned a Bachelor of Administration in finance from the University of Hawaii at Manoa, Shidler College of Business. After graduating from college, Slayde worked as a Marketing Specialist for Atlas Insurance Agency where he was responsible for corporate marketing, advertising, public relations, and social media, and most recently worked as a Global Luxury Certified Buyer’s Specialist for a real estate team on Maui. He is excited to utilize his knowledge of real estate as a Buyers specialist to help you find your dream property.

title: REALTOR®
description:
A local girl, Shari Ogata was born and raised in various neighborhoods on Oahu from the sugar cane fields on Crozier Drive in Waialua to the slopes of lower Manoa. She is a Mililani High School graduate and spent many of her formative years in and around Wahiawa with her paternal grandparents and extended family. Shari currently resides in Kahala with her husband, Eric, an electrical and mechanical engineer and her son, a high school junior at Mid Pacific.
Shari earned her Bachelor of Business Administration in Accounting and Finance from the University of Washington in Seattle, Washington, as well as a Juris Doctorate in Law from the William S. Richardson School of Law at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. After the CPA exam, Shari started her professional career at Deloitte & Touche, an international CPA firm, working in the Tax Divisions in both Seattle, Washington and Honolulu, Hawaii. After graduating from law school and passing the bar, Shari gained invaluable legal experience working in various private, public, and not-for-profit firms, eventually starting her own law practice helping those less fortunate than herself.
Shari’s passion for real estate started early. At a young age, she learned from her parents and grandparents about the power of land ownership in Hawaii. Starting over 25 years ago with her first purchase of a condominium near Punahou School, Shari has slowly and steadily built and managed her own portfolio of residential real estate as a buyer, seller, and lessor. Shari has also been investing, building, renovating, managing, and leasing commercial real estate for the last 23 years as an owner and officer for a large local corporation.
Shari’s experience in accounting, law, and real estate prepared Shari for leadership positions as an owner and officer of a large multi-million-dollar company, first as the Chief Financial Officer, then as the President and Chief Executive Officer of Pioneer Contracting Company/dba Pioneer Ace Hardware. At Pioneer, Shari managed a staff of over 140 employees in multiple states in a multi-faceted business with three separate divisions: a construction company operating primarily on military bases in Oahu, Hawaii; multi-chain, multi-state Ace Hardware stores; and a commercial property division that owns, develops, and leases multiple properties and shopping centers on Oahu and on the mainland. Under her guidance, Pioneer thrived with double digit increases in both top line sales and bottom-line profits, even through the Great Recession. Shari recently sold her ownership interest in the company, which has allowed her to concentrate all her efforts on her passion for real estate.
With her wealth of real estate, accounting, legal, and business experience, Shari is uniquely prepared and qualified to handle all aspects of her clients’ real estate transactions. Her accounting background provides the financial discipline and attention to detail necessary to scrutinize your transaction from every angle, while her legal background is invaluable in risk analysis and negotiation of the best possible price and terms. Her experience as a business owner/operator provides her with a big picture perspective to determine whether a real estate transaction makes sense for a client’s given situation.
Real estate has always been Shari’s passion. It is her goal to provide her clients of all experience levels, from first-time buyers to experienced real estate investors, with the highest level of professional excellence. Shari attributes her success to her deep faith, her supportive husband and son, her dedication to excellent customer service, and her commitment to and passion for helping others in whatever capacity she can.

title: Real Estate Broker
description:
Mei Pang is a distinguished real estate professional serving buyers and sellers since 2002. Over the years, Mei assisted local, national, and international clients with their real estate transactions. As part of the Better Homes & Gardens Advantage team, one of Hawaii's finest real estate firms, Mei has many resources available including technical research and information systems, legal advice and support.
Having lived in Shanghai and Oahu for many years, Mei brings an international perspective to her real estate approach. Mei speaks and writes fluently in Chinese (Mandarin and Shanghai Dialects) and English and understands Asian and Western thoughts, cultures, negotiations, and business processes.
WORK EXPERIENCE

Her training in MBA, and years of experience in Business and Real Estate have earned numerous distinctions in her quality of service to her clients. Her cultural sensitivity to Eastern and Western cultures gives an added advantage in meeting the needs of her clients locally and internationally.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Asako was born and raised in Chiba City, Japan. At age 15, she traveled abroad to pursue tennis and her English studies here in the US. After living in Florida for a year, Asako moved to Nanaimo, Canada, and graduated from Wellington Secondary School. Her college career brought her to Hawaii where she majored in Travel Industry Management at Hawaii Pacific University, thus sparking her passion for the hospitality industry.
Since then, she has worked in such affluent hotels as the Hyatt Regency Waikiki, Kahala Hotel, as well as Aulani a Disney Resort & Spa.
After being immersed in the hotel industry for 14 years, she found that her true passion was in helping people. She decided that she wanted to try her hand at something different and pursue a career in helping people, outside of hotels.

Asako believes that being a real estate agent will allow her to help clients in a more long-term and lasting way, and in turn build lifetime relationships. As a daily goal, she pushes herself to strive for excellence.

In her free time, she enjoys playing tennis and spending time with her family. She loves watching her two sons play soccer and baseball. They spend a lot of time hiking, sightseeing, venturing around the island and enjoying the beach.

title: REALTOR®
description:
A life-long resident of Oahu, Michael is intimately familiar with all neighborhoods and areas on this beautiful island. Growing up in Honolulu spending the majority of his youth at Waikiki Yacht Club, where he excelled in sailboat racing . This afforded him the opportunity to travel the United States and Canada at national and international championships with an eye towards competing in the Olympics.
Graduating from Mid- Pacific Institute and attending the University of Hawaii at Manoa makes him a true kamaaina. He later moved to the North Shore to pursue his passion for surfing and the country lifestyle. For over 20 years he has owned and operated his own surfboard manufacturing business, specializing in fiberglass construction and contracting with some of the world’s most prestigious surfing labels. Simultaneously, he worked at Turtle Bay Resort for 10 years. Starting as a banquet server and leaving as a manager.
Seeing the needs in his community prompted him to become involved with and later oversee the Community Foodbank in Haleiwa . This has given him the ability to empathize with those in our islands who are without a home. It has become his desire to help everyone, regardless of financial position, to become a homeowner. He also volunteers as board chairman of the National Hemophilia Foundation Hawaii Chapter, which was precipitated by the birth of his oldest son who is affected by the bleeding disorder. Advocacy, education and fundraising are areas that he oversees for this organization.
Currently residing and organic farming in Pupukea with his wife Ashley, raising two sons with a third on the way. Michael loves interacting with people and will use the utmost in resource and expertise in finding your dream home and in listing your property.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Born and raised on the Windward side of Oahu, Stacy has the market knowledge and experience to provide her clients with the best possible service. She is a professional who works with passion and the integrity needed to ensure the best interest of her Buyers and Sellers at all times. Stacy’s diligence and level of care are direct results that lead to her successful closings. It’s through these qualities that allow for a memorable real estate experience and client satisfaction.
“Her greatest reward is helping her clients to achieve and realize their dream of homeownership”
Past Work Experience:
· Realtor Associate w/Keller Williams Honolulu (Feb 2012 – Jan 2016)
· Realtor Associate w/Hawaii Realty Professionals/Valcore (Oct 2007 – Feb 2012)
· Realtor Associate w/Prudential Locations (Sept 2006 – Oct 2007)
· Sales & Service Operational Manager w/First Hawaiian Bank (Oct 1986 – October 2005)
Certifications:
· Short Sale & Foreclosure Resource Certification

title: REALTOR®
description:
Ryan Kawailani Ozawa is a native Hawaiian journalist and digital storyteller who has worked in real estate technology for more than 15 years and earned his real estate license in 2014. He is an entrepreneur and lifelong communications professional with over 30 years of experience combining marketing and public relations with emerging technologies.

He is deeply involved in covering and supporting Hawaii’s innovation ecosystem. He has founded startups and a nonprofit foundation dedicated to strengthening opportunities for Hawaii youth through education and workforce development. The remote work revolution has brought many people to the islands—whether returning home or choosing a new one—and Ryan is committed to helping his clients build a home, community, and future in Hawaii.

Born and raised in Hawaii, his mother’s family hails from Kapa‘au in North Kohala on Hawaii Island, and he is a third-generation Japanese American whose grandfather built some of the first Buddhist temples in Hawaii and whose father was born in an internment camp during World War II. A graduate of Mililani High School and holding a journalism degree from the University of Hawaii at Manoa, he is a proud father of three.

title: REALTOR®
description: Born and raised in Hawaii growing up on both the Big Island and Oahu it pays to have a real estate agent who knows the islands and its neighborhoods. Graduated from Saint Francis an all girls High school in Manoa, Tahiti has worked for Northwest Airlines and traveled the world. Seeing so many countries and different places. It made her appreciate the true beauty of Hawaii. You don't realize how lucky you are to live here in Hawaii until you move away. Living in Japan and all over the U.S including Las Ve gas, Memphis, and Seattle she came home to Hawaii to raise her two boys. Tahiti became a real estate agent in February 2011. She has found a way to integrate her international perspective on the world with an in-depth understanding of the local marketplace. Understanding the importance of this competitive market, keeping current on trends and keeping her clients informed every step of the way during a transaction is a top priority. Tahiti is experienced in working with both buyers and sellers and can walk you through the entire process always having your best interest in mind. Tahiti is known for her easy-going, friendly attitude, her cooperative aloha spirit, and her client first attitude.. But when her clients' interests are at stake, her intense loyalty, tenacity, negotiating skills, and "out of the box" problem solving abilities come to the forefront. The high level of customer service that is given during all of her transactions will meet and exceed your expectations. Buying or selling a home can be stressful as well as exciting, so she lets her clients know that they can count on her to be at their side through the entire process. Knowing how much she enjoys helping people embark on new stages of their lives, she never stops loving the opportunity to be there for a client's successful and satisfying sale or their first day in their dream home! I look forward to helping you achieve your real estate goals!

title: REALTOR®
description:
With the perfect blend of determination and kindness, Alison is well-prepared to confidently guide her client's through their real estate journey. She has extensive education in psychology, which gives her the unique ability to nurture and be responsive to her client's needs. Driven by her desire to excel, she completed her bachelor's degree at a university in Manhattan, graduating summa cum laude, while also receiving a research fellowship to further carry out her studies. Her level of perfection and excellence along with her passion to help others sets her up as a stellar real estate agent.
Alison's love for her family and her home in Hawai'i keeps her motivated. She has an inherent power to succeed and to elevate the lives of everyone around her. Begin your next real estate venture with Alison and she will be your greatest advocate.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Aloha and thank you for your consideration of my Real Estate services. I was born in Thailand and grew up in Hawaii. The joy of travel is one of my favorite things to do as well as exploring new eateries all over the island. I enjoy hiking, having jog/walks with Bailey, my golden retriever furry baby. I graduated from U.H. Manoa with a B.A in Speech. I have been a Financial Planner for over 20+ years and have had the opportunity to work with and create valued friendships with individuals, families and local small businesses as well. Purchasing real estate is a huge financial decision that I've had the pleasure to provide guidance for my clients, along with balancing their overall Financial portfolio needs. Having bought, renovated and sold my own properties, lead me to pursue my passion and explore my creative side in designing and interior decorating both big and small spaces. I feel very fortunate to be part of the Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty. We, as a team, have got your back to assist you with finding your dream home.
I'd like to share with you one of my favorite analogies, titled "Marathon Baby." One of my bucket list items was to run the Honolulu Marathon. In 2015, I ran the Honolulu Marathon and was fortunate enough to complete it in good health. My analogy is that: you trained for 9 months running longer and longer distances over time, such that one tends to be pregnant for 9 months. While running the marathon, as I like to describe it, it's more like being in labor, however long it takes for you to complete the marathon. Once you have crossed that finish line, you have earned your Finisher's medal (you have your precious marathon baby). How does this relate to Real Estate? We are with you from start to finish, in finding your dream home or selling it. With a winning mindset and determination, we will finish strong and in good health.

title: REALTOR®
description: Joining Team Kiriu in 2012, Sherrie came to us with a unique and diversified background. She has a Bachelor of Science degree in Geology & Geophysics with a concentration in engineering geology and hydrogeology and, in addition, has earned her Juris Doctorate degree. Prior to joining Team Kiriu, Sherrie spent 5 years as a Project Geologist and 10 years as a licensed attorney. Aside from helping Myron and Ambur manage the team, Sherrie assists in overseeing each transaction as it advances through the escrow process and ensures that every transaction is handled with the highest level of competency and professionalism.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Scoop is no stranger to moving. He grew up a military kid constantly moving all over the U.S. as well as overseas. After graduating from the University of Tennessee where he studied Sports Management & Business while playing Rugby, he moved to Hawaii to pursue his Master’s in Kinesiology at UH Manoa. Simultaneously, he worked in the UH Athletics Department as a Strength & Conditioning Graduate Assistant. Upon graduating, he began teaching yoga in 2012, and his teachings have enabled him to travel internationally to Asia, Europe and South America.
The transition to real estate was very natural for Scoop. Repeatedly moving for the first 25 years of his life, Scoop understands the emotions of leaving a home you love and the uncertainty of relocating to somewhere new. His experience of being an entrepreneurial yoga teacher has taught him creativite marketing, strong negotiation skills and how to nimbly and effectively adapt in a constantly shifting market. His #1 focus is to create a smooth, enjoyable experience for his clients, while helping them find that perfect place that feels like home.

Scoop’s love for the ocean and personal connection has led him to volunteer with various organizations on Oahu including Access Surf, Maouli Ola and Big Brother/Big Sisters, where he is an active member since 2007 and remains close to his Little by teaching him about real estate investing and finance.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Introducing Kayla - Your Reliable Partner for Your Real Estate Journey!
As a second-generation realtor, Real Estate to Kayla is not just selling properties; it's continuing a legacy of passion, dedication, and unrivaled expertise in the ever-changing market. With early exposure to the industry, she has a deep appreciation for the art of finding the perfect home for every individual or family.
Kayla's clients' satisfaction is her top priority. With a personalized and attentive approach, she listens carefully to her clients, utilizing her strong network, market knowledge, and unwavering integrity to be a reliable partner and resource throughout the entire real estate journey.
In her career Kayla has earned the Silver Award from her outstanding sales contribution to her company, Better Homes & Gardens Advantage Realty, positioning her in the top 20% of agents nationwide.
Personal Life:
Member of Rotary Club of Hawaii Kai Avid surfer & free-diver East Honolulu Resident Talk to Kayla today to see how she can help you get started on achieving your real estate goals.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Stacy is pursuing her passion for real estate after a long career in television news. As a newscaster for KGMB and Hawaii News Now, She earned a reputation for integrity, fairness, hard work, persistance and compassion. After leaving news, Stacy started her own company, Media Communications, where she specialized in public relations, writing and producing video projects. She’s now pursuing her passion for helping people in real estate and bringing her extensive knowledge of the islands and communication skills to her job as a realtor, making sure clients find the home that’s right for them or the best buyers. As a Kama’aina who grew up on Oahu, Stacy loves living in Hawaii and is deeply committed to helping residents become home owners.
EDUCATION:
University of Hawaii, Bachelor of Science in Broadcast Journalism
EXPERIENCE:
2014-2016 Owner, Media Communications.
2010-2016 Freelance writer, producer and public relations specialist
Clients include: PBS Hawaii, Hawaii Tourism Authority, Honu You Hawaiian Spa, Hawaii Autism Foundation, RKT Media, Dr. Wynn Okuda, CBS News, ABC News, NBC News, Fox News.
1990-2010: Reporter/Anchor for CBS Affiliate KGMB, Hawaii News Now

title: REALTOR®
description:
EDUCATION Chaminade University Honolulu, HI Master of Science in Criminal Justice Administration Homeland Security Leadership Development Gonzaga University Spokane, WA Bachelor of Business Administration, Accounting Major EXPERIENCE Civilian experience: United States Senate Military Community Affairs Representative (Honolulu, Hawai‘i) Morris & Company, LLC (Honolulu, Hawai‘i) KMPG (Honolulu, Hawai‘i and Los Angeles, California) Military experience: Special Operations Command Pacific (Camp Smith, Hawai‘i) Joint Intelligence Operations Command (Makalapa, Hawai‘i) Combined Joint Task Force Horn of Africa (Djibouti City, Djibouti) Joint Interagency Task Force West (Camp Smith, Hawai‘i) Seal Delivery Vehicle Team – One (Pearl City, Hawai‘i) MILITARY AWARDS Joint Service Achievement Medal recipient 2007-2009, 2011 Navy Achievement Medal recipient 2006
PROFESSIONAL & COMMUNITY INVOLVEMENT Gonzaga University Hawai‘i Alumni Chapter- President Chamber of Commerce of Hawai‘i-Member Historic Hawai‘i Foundation-Member Bishop Museum-Member National Association of Realtors-Member Hawaii Association of Realtors-Member

title: REALTOR®
description:
A retired Honolulu Fire captain, Kenny Tenn has a lifetime of experience serving the public with integrity. He is genuinely honored when clients trust him with their real estate needs.


Kenny works alongside his wife, Wendy Tenn, manager of the Better Homes and Garden Real Estate Office in Kailua. Together, their combined expertise helps clients obtain their goals, which could be finding a dream home or obtaining top dollar for an investment property.



Kenny’s unique knowledge in home safety procedures, fire prevention, and building and fire codes after a 26-year career with the fire department give him invaluable experience in navigating the real estate market. He often works with buyers to transform distressed properties into dream homes.


Born and raised on Oahu, Kenny attended Kailua High School before graduating from University of Hawaii at Moana with a degree in Physical Education. In his spare time, he enjoys golfing, baseball, basketball, and traveling with his family. He resides in Kailua with Wendy and their two sons.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
A strong work ethic rooted in local values is what makes Wendy Tenn (RA) successful.


Wendy is passionate about her clients’ goals and dreams, and works as hard for them as she would her own ohana, whether it’s a first-time buyer purchasing their first apartment or a seasoned veteran looking for an investment property. She considers her clients part of her extended ohana, and is known as one of the friendliest, kindest, and hardest working people in Hawaii.


Wendy’s real estate career began at a small firm in 2003. She perfected her craft and joined Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty, then known as Prudential Advantage, in 2010.

Now, she manages the Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate (BHGRE) Kailua Office and has achieved National Award Gold Level status, recognizing the top 3% of BHGRE agents nationwide. She has been nominated each year for HONOLULU Magazine’s "Best of Honolulu” Real Estate category, and was nominated by the Honolulu Star-Advertiser for "Hawaii’s Best 2020” in Real Estate.


Wendy leads Team Tenn, supported by her husband Kenny Tenn, a realtor and retired fire captain, and Jennifer Robinson, a skilled client relations specialist. Together, they help clients navigate every detail of the home buying and listing process.


In her free time, Wendy enjoys playing and coaching soccer, where she channels her competitive energy. She often volunteers as Team Mom at the sporting events of her two teenage sons.


Born and raised on Oahu, Wendy is a proud graduate of Kamehameha Schools. She resides in Kailua with Kenny, their two boys, and a chocolate Labrador retriever named Roscoe.

title: REALTOR®
description: Melyssa began her real estate career in 2003 where she worked both in sales and in the property management aspect of the business. When she began working for BH&GRE Advantage Realty in 2014 she focused her business on sales and joined forces with the top producing team of Scott and Lisa Adams. Melyssa is now able to give her clients the benefits and added value of working with a highly skilled and experienced team of agents. Melyssa truly believes in the core values of Passion, Authenticity, Innovation, Growth and Excellence which she carries with her throughout every transaction. The trust she has built and her sincere committment to give honest and diligent service has given her the opportunity to build strong and lasting relationships with both her clients and her peers. Spending most of her childhood years in San Francisco, Melyssa moved to Hawaii in 1984. She spent 16 years living in East Oahu and now resides in Mililani. Being a Hawaii resident for over 30 years, Melyssa enjoys living in a family oriented neighborhood. She is active in her community and volunteers at the local schools where both her sons have attended. In her spare time, you will often find Melyssa at the beach or on the sports field with her family.

title: REALTOR®
description: Married to Lisa for 20 yrs, 3 children: 17, 15, 10 Member - Christ Centered Community Church (C4) Volunteer Youth Sports Coach over 12 years

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Sean and his top-producing team take great pride in putting the needs of his clients first while providing the very best service possible. Born and raised on Oahu, Sean utilizes his extensive knowledge of local neighborhoods, strong negotiation skills, dedicated team and technical expertise to help his clients reach their real estate goals. Whether you are buying or selling, Sean and his team will do everything they can to make the real estate process a smooth and stress-free experience, and more importantly get you results.
AWARDS AND ACCOLADES

2021 Ranked in the Top 100 of all Oahu Real Estate Agents 2021 Top 3% of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Agents Nationwide 2018, Top 100 Realtors in Hawaii & Most Transactions, Hawaii Business Magazine 2013-2021 voted “Best in Real Estate” by Honolulu Magazine Readers 2014-2021 BHGRE Award Winner 2021, 2020, 2018, 2016, 2015, 2014 & 2013 Aloha Aina Award Nominee 2018, 2017 & 2015 Top 100 Realtors, Hawaii Business Magazine Senior Real Estate Specialist (SRES)
EDUCATION AND BACKGROUND
Born and raised in East Honolulu, current Hawaii Kai resident Son of Iolani (1995) All State Football (1993 & 1994) & Baseball (1995) Honolulu Advertiser Male High School Athlete of the Year (1995) Graduate of University of Hawaii (2002) 4 time Division I Baseball Letter Award Winner (1997-2000) 2 time All-WAC Second Team Outfielder (1999 & 2000) Masters of Science in Counseling Psychology (MSCP) from Chaminade University (2006) Board of Directors & Head Coach, Hawaii Kai Baseball

title: REALTOR®
description: Aloha! I am a fourth generation kama'aina with many years of business, sales and marketing experience. I grew up in Makiki and received my BA in Business from the University of Washington and my MBA from the University of Southern California. After college I moved overseas to Taiwan where I was a headhunter for a large multinational management consulting firm. In Hawaii I ran a retail organization for several years where I trained every team member on how to provide excellent customer service. More recent ly as a consultant, I directed e-marketing and promotions for small, local companies. Along with my husband, Francis, we will make sure your home is well represented or that your search for your next one is successful. We have the experience and skills.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Will Tanaka is a real estate professional, attorney and Hawaii property investor of 15 years who brings invaluable expertise and unique perspective to his clients’ real estate experience. He knows firsthand the stress and emotional tolls, but ultimately, the joy and excitement that purchasing or selling a home can bring, and prides himself in providing only first-class service to his clients. This includes collaborating with best-in-class service partners and working with the most-trusted vendors. His core belief is that communication is key and he is trusted for being upfron t when it comes to weighing the pros and cons, guiding clients with expertise through tough decisions and representing their best interests by walking them through the real estate and escrow process every step of the way.
“I’ve had the privilege of wearing a few different hats throughout my career, from President to general counsel for some of Hawaii’s leading real estate service firms. I’ve tackled and resolved every imaginable situation that could make, delay or break a real estate transaction. Now, I’m in a position that finally allows me to bring all of my expertise to the table to genuinely help people—one at a time—to have freedom and opportunity in their lives through real estate. And nothing has made me happier.”

Will admits that empowering others is a personal passion that developed when he was just 6-years old. Born in Tokyo, Japan, he distinctly remembers the financial sacrifices and struggles his parents endured when they gave up everything they had to move their family to Gardena, California.
“My parents never owned a home. They hopped from one job to another to support us. They sacrificed their comfortable life in Japan so that my siblings and I could have the opportunities they never did—to pursue our passions.”
Will majored in English at UCLA before attending William S. Richardson School of Law at the University of Hawaii, where he received his Juris Doctor degree. It was his passion for law early in his career that landed him at Goodsill Anderson Quinn & Stifel , one of Hawaii’s largest and premier law firms, where he spent nearly 5 years as a litigation attorney. His segue into real estate came when he took on the role of Vice President and General Counsel for Fidelity National Title & Escrow of Hawaii , a Fortune 500 company and the nation’s largest real estate service/title insurance company. It was there that his natural instinct for business and leadership also thrived. So much so that in 2016, Will was asked to join First Hawaii Title Corporation , a longstanding and highly-respected Hawaii escrow and title company, as President.
“I was tasked to create sustainable growth and open new markets for the company. Aside from the obvious business measures, this also meant establishing a new, authentically happy growth culture. My vision was to become known as the best customer-service company. And that starts with the employees. I’m proud to have left that legacy.”
With his inherent passion for empowering others, combined with his business acumen and legal prowess, Will has often been described as “the ultimate real estate trifecta.” He is a fierce, but fair negotiator , a creative problem solver , and is always thinking two-steps ahead to ensure a smooth transaction and give peace of mind to his clients.
Will’s primary focus is on residential homes and investment properties on the island of Oahu. He also specializes in:
• 1031 exchanges
• Trust property and probate/estate transactions
• Divorce Sales
• REO Transactions, Short Sales, Foreclosure Auctions
Teaming with Better Homes & Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty, whose clients-always-first mindset, innovative marketing strategies and immense network is a perfect match for his commitment to superior customer service. Will and his team of leading real estate experts continually raise the standard in Hawaii's residential real estate industry.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Real estate has always piqued Stephanie’s interest from a young age having witnessed her parents along with several mentors invest, not only to find their dream home, but also to build generational wealth to pass onto their loved ones.


Stephanie was born and raised in Los Angeles and graduated from the University of Southern California with a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration and Marketing. She went on to work in the event planning industry for 9 years, which eventually brought her to Hawaii to assist with the opening of a Hawaii franchise office, where she played an integral role in the success of both the sales and daily operations, earning 2 internationally recognized awards within the first 3 years. Stephanie then began as a Business Development Manager at ProService Hawaii where she consulted with local business owners and executives on opportunities to improve efficiencies, expertise and cost savings for employment benefits, earning her the Rookie of the Year award.

Being here in Hawaii, Stephanie has become reacquainted with the deeper connection and responsibility we have to the land and what it means to be stewards of the land...to care for and respect the Earth in such a way that it gives back and provides for each and every one of us.


Stephanie’s goal as a Realtor is to go above and beyond to share what knowledge she has about wellness and sustainability so that we can maintain the beauty of Hawaii for generations to come and continue to thrive together as a community.


Stephanie is also a certified Yoga instructor and resides in Kakaako with her partner, Scoop. In her free time, she enjoys yoga, hiking, surfing and pottery.

title: REALTOR®
description: Hello! I'm Tehane and I'm proud to serve the Honolulu area as a member of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty. I enjoy people. Everything that is important in life is about people and relationships. You need a trusted professional who is accessible, a good listener, keeps you informed, and works well with others while protecting and promoting your interests. I love business. Every real estate venture is a business transaction. You need a skilled advocate who overcomes obstacles while guiding you toward a successful sale or purchase. I believe in doing the job right. Every real estate transaction has its own important issues. You need a knowledgeable agent who will communicate effectively with experts in various fields to address any questions or concerns that may arise. As part of the Better Homes and GardensÂ® Real Estate brand I will provide you with an excellent experience before, during and after your home buying and selling journey. With innovative technology, a unique set of tools and a household brand tied to my name, I am uniquely equipped to serve you with what you need most. And, by combining a "client first" philosophy, great listening skills, deep local knowledge, marketing savvy and business professionalism I can help you sell your home or find a new home tha t perfectly matches your lifestyle.

title: REALTOR®
description:
大阪出身。神戸松蔭女子学院を卒業後、朝日放送株式会社勤務。 学生時代の夢のひとつであった海外生活を実現するため、 2000 年ハワイに移住し、ウエディング関係の仕事に従事。カスタマーサービスが好きであるということ、またたくさんの人に出会い、人のお役に立てる仕事に従事したいと考え、 2011 年ハワイ州公認不動産取引士の資格を取得する。
お客様と長くお付き合いをさせて頂くことをとても大切に思い、いかなる場合もお客様のお気持ちを大切に、お客様のニーズを読み取り、お客様第一に、迅速かつ誠意をもって、不動産売買のお手伝いをさせて頂く。
アラモアナ・カカアコ・ワイキキ・カハラ・ハワイカイエリアの売買を得意とし、数々のラグジュアリー物件のご売却・ご購入のお手伝いをさせて頂く。
居住用住宅、不動産投資、セカンドホーム（別荘）、リロケーション等、オアフ島で不動産のご購入をご検討中の方は、お気軽に日本語でお問い合わせ下さい。心を込めてお手伝いさせて頂きます。
Originally from Japan, Sachiko Yanagihara was born and raised in Osaka, Japan. She worked at the Asahi Broadcasting Corporation in administration after graduating from Kobe Shoin Women’s College.

As a student, Sachiko dreamed about moving to the United States to study English. She wanted to broaden her network and meet new people. She realized this dream by making Hawaii her home, over 20 years ago in 2000.
Sachiko served as a wedding coordinator, office manager and accountant for international wedding companies here on Oahu. She reflected on her life and career aspirations and knew that she was passionate about serving both international and local clientele and building lifelong relationships. Sachiko finds immense fulfillment in serving and taking care of her clients’ needs and strives to exceed their expectations.
Sachiko, is a highly skilled real estate broker and she began her professional career in residential real estate in 2011 with the mission of supporting people in realizing their own dreams come true in homeownership and real estate investing.
Sachiko is meticulous with every detail and focusses on building long-term relationships with the clients she serves. She’s committed to a "client first" approach to real estate. Clients say Sachiko is diligent, trustworthy, responsive, and patient. Sachiko pledges to provide you with world class service throughout the home-buying and home-selling process, even after the transaction is complete. Her recent transactions include multiple luxury listings in Ala Moana, Kakaako, Waikiki, Kahala, Makiki, and Hawaii Kai area . She’s represented many buyers on their purchases in Ala Moana, Waikiki, and Kakaako area.
If you are thinking about selling or purchasing a property on Oahu, please contact Sachiko. Simply put, her client’s satisfaction is her satisfaction.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Stanley Yu is a dedicated, hardworking, and detail-oriented real estate agent who actively seeks to provide honest and trustworthy business partnerships. Born and raised in Honolulu and a graduate of Moanalua High School, he grew up with hardworking parents that made education a top priority for him and his sister. Humbled and grateful, he returned to the islands upon graduation from Oregon State University with a Bachelor’s degree in Chemistry to help support his parents and to live up to their expectations as a morally upright individual just like how his parents are.
Stanley has held a number of positions in the pharmaceutical industry with Longs Drugs (CVS), Good Health Pharmacy, and Straub Medical Center. He has also worked as an environmental health specialist and a member of the Radiological Response Team for the State Department of Health. With an extensive background working in jobs requiring much attention to detail along with highly sensitive information, he is very focused and detail-oriented when handling real estate transactions.
Stanley lives in Kaneohe with his wife, who was born and raised in Hong Kong, and son and speaks fluent Cantonese. With his wife, they also operate HypnoVivi, a Hypnotherapy clinic in Downtown, Honolulu. During his free time, he enjoys traveling, participating in various running events such as the Honolulu Marathon, Hapalua Half Marathon, and Great Aloha Run, and playing various sports such as basketball and tennis.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Born and raised in Hawaii and connected to California, Jessica continues to channel her heart, knowledge of Oahu's unique market, and consultative experience to provide a personalized and comprehensive client-first approach to real estate. Integrity, initiative, success, connection, collaboration and Aloha are among her key professional and personal values.

In addition to real estate, Jessica's professional experience has included consulting for private, non-profit, and Fortune 500 organizations, as well as leadership positions in Media, Marketing, Development and Hospitality. As a graduate of the University of Southern California's Entrepreneurship Program, she is passionate about helping her clients achieve their home-buying and real estate investment goals.

Jessica gives back to the community by serving as the Chair-Elect for the Chamber of Commerce Hawaii's YP Program and a Member of the Advantage Kokua Scholarship Committee. In her free time, she enjoys teaching and practicing yoga at Yoga Room Hawaii and CorePower Yoga (Ward and Kahala), traveling, enjoying live music and playing at the beach with her dog, Kaimana.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Francis was born in Ghent, Belgium and is one of 7 siblings. At age 11 he moved to Ohio with his family so that his father, a Belgian Air Force officer, could help negotiate the purchase of fighter planes on behalf of the Belgian Air Force. He eventually found his way to Hawaii in 1993 and has been here ever since. Francis has over 14 years of real estate experience as a sales agent and a real estate market research analyst. He earned his Broker's license in 2008 which afforded him an even deeper knowledge of the real estate industry. He is currently one of the company's Brokers-in-Charge which means that he is responsible for ensuring contracts are accurate, complete and that they protect the interests of our company's clients.
Before his real estate career his work experience revolved around providing excellent customer service. He continues this ethic in his current career where not only is he a tough negotiator on behalf of his clients, but he executes all necessary steps to ensure a successful transaction. He is his clients' premier advocate.

title: REALTOR®
description:
Nicole Velasco has lived in Hawaii for over 40 years and successfully blends her extensive customer service and medical experience with her detailed knowledge of Oahu neighborhoods to fully assist her clients.
A graduate of St. Francis High School, Nicole obtained a Bachelor of Science Degree in Nursing/Dental Hygiene at the University of Hawaii at Manoa and had a 20+ year career as a dental hygienist in Mililani prior to embarking on her real estate career.
She has always been a real estate investment advocate and is passionate about helping others achieve their real estate goals. Nicole’s core values of hard work, integrity, and outstanding customer service are at the forefront as she assists her clients in the home buying/selling process.
An active member of the Mililani community for over 20 years, Nicole relocated to Kaneohe a few years ago and has immersed herself in her new Windward neighborhood. She is a proud mother of three children and enjoys doting on her two grandchildren. In her free time when not helping clients, Nicole enjoys traveling, spending time with her family, and hitting the beach.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Aloha, my name is Traci Marie Bean . Growing up in Lahaina and a graduate of Lahainaluna High school I set my sites on college and enrolled at Monterey Peninsula college in California as an Interior Design major. After two years of school I came home to Maui and received my Cosmetician license. I soon became a consultant and created several medical spas in the area. With my son and daughter now in college ( John A Burns School of Medicine and Santa Clara University) I have shifted into real estate full time. My 20+ years in the service industry have taught me the value and importance of trust in both personal and professional relationships. I truly enjoy my career in real estate because I have the chance to help my clients reach their goals in real estate. I jumped at the chance to join Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty, Valley Isle, because of its brand strength both locally and nationally, as well as the tools, support and guidance that allow me to provide exceptional customer service. I am very committed to my craft and will stand with my clients throughout the process. There are five words you can count on from Traci Marie Bean, integrity, commitment, perseverance, passion and fun.
Mahalo, Traci

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
About Sammi
A real estate professional on the beautiful island of Maui, Hawaii. Sammi Dragon is known for integrity, aloha spirit, and sincerity in all her dealings. She has first and foremost strived to be someone in whom her clientele and colleagues can put their trust and faith. She uses her 30 years of customer service skills to tirelessly advocate for her clients. When working with buyers and sellers, Sammi is assertive and effective without being pushy. A resident of Maui for over 40 years, Sammi offers a seasoned knowledge of the island and an intimate understanding of what makes each distinct town so special. Above all, Sammi values relationships over transactions, and provides the same level of unmatched service to all her clients.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
With her family lineage in Hawai'i's history and being 2nd generation in real estate, Maui has always been home for Elena. There's a 'kuleana' or responsibility that comes with living on Maui. It's sharing and discovering the culture, the island beat and neighborhood nuances, the weather, the historical sites of precious Maui and its island people.


Elena helps any client reach their real estate goals with placing priority on providing her clients with honest and fair representation. She takes the time to really understand their wants and needs while also educating them on the current market conditions so that a solid, well-informed decision can be reached. Elena specializes in residential and new developments and enjoys helping First Time Home Buyers, second home market , families downsizing/relocating or the seasoned investor.

Elena makes time to enjoy the beautiful sandy beaches, hiking trails, family events, martial arts, lei making and spending quality time with family and friends.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Aloha! My name is Nikki Rae Hutaff. I was born and raised in Hawai'i and I live on Maui with my husband, kids, dog and our mini potbelly pigs. My background includes accounting, office management & business consulting. I served in various Hawai'i counties as a first responder for 15 years. I highly value sustainability in our community, cultural education and believe in our kuleana to respect and take care of our island home. I'm passionate about guiding clients step by step to ensure a successful outcome. If you've ever thought about Buying or Selling, I'd love to talk story with you and hear about your real estate goals.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Lauren is a licensed Realtor Associate with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Advantage Realty Valley Isle. Lauren was born and raised in Hawaii, and has lived on the island of Maui since 1979 though her legacy in Hawaii began in the 1800's! Lauren is well-regarded in the industry for her attention to detail, professionalism, commitment to personal service, intimate and extensive local knowledge of Maui's diverse areas and microclimates. Representing both Buyers and Sellers island wide, from small condos to luxury properties, you can feel secure knowing your transaction is in the hands of a true professional who will be with you every step of the way, ensuring a smooth stress-free experience. Ever available and highly communicative, Lauren has a true affinity for the real estate profession and values highly the relationships she creates with her clients. Winner of 2021 Platinum Award representing the top 6% of agents nationwide Better Homes and Gardens nationally. One of Lauren 's recent clients made this comment: " Lauren was my realtor for the purchase and then eventual sale of my last house on Maui. Always professional and hard working, she does what it takes to get the deals done while ever available at the end of the phone/email to sort out questions and concerns. If she does not already know the answers, she finds them quickly. She goes the extra miles with foresight, is trustworthy, well connected and honest. I highly recommend Lauren for any real estate transactions. She is a star." ~NB, Haiku, Maui

title: Real Estate Broker
description:
Aloha, I'm Erin Clapper. I was raised on Maui, am a graduate of Maui High School & went on to graduate from the University of Hawaii at Manoa with degrees in Hawaiian Language & Fashion Design & Merchandising . In 2008, I became a full time licensed agent, joined one of the top real estate teams on Oahu for 5 years & went on to be an independent agent. I transitioned back to Maui in 2015 and am now the Principal Broker of our Maui Office . My strong connection to the local community is what inspired my tagline - "Helping Island Families Come Home". My creative eye, excellent team work mentality, knowledge of the real estate market & practices and a natural spirit of aloha make everyone comfortable and immediately feel like family. Please feel free to contact me at 808-330-8338 to begin this exciting process!
Mahalo nui, Erin
Helping Island Families Come Home

title: Real Estate Broker
description: A Maui resident for over 35 years, I enjoy spending time with my family & friends, traveling, reading, and participating in community events. As a mother of three children, I find pleasure in their many accomplishments and encourage them to be the best they can be. I seek opportunities to further my knowledge by attending professional training programs, reading, and staying current with the real estate market. Being able to work in an industry that assists individuals and families obtain their dreams of owning real estate is very rewarding to me. Trying to anticipate my client's needs, educating them through the process of buying or selling real estate, and creating lasting relationships are very important to me.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Aloha, I’m Jonathan Irvine. I am so fortunate to have been born and raised in these beautiful islands. A graduate from Kekaulike High School on the slopes of Haleakala, as well a graduate from the University of Hawaii at Hilo. As a husband and a father of three, it makes me proud to be serving my island community.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Aloha, my name is LoreLee N. Robello, I'm born and raised in the State of Hawaii and Maui Island has been my home for 29 years. Real Estate Sales is something natural to me, connecting with a clients needs, searching for their property and reaching their goals, is my priority. Living and working on Maui Island allows me to share with you personal knowledge of Maui's lifestyle. Looking forward to the opportunity to guide you.

title: Real Estate Broker
description:
Aloha.
My name is Amy Sword. I am a Real Estate Broker here on the beautiful Island of Maui.
I have been in real estate since 2014 and have experience in several aspects of real estate. I have had the pleasure of helping my clients purchase their first homes, forever homes, investment properties and second homes. I’ve helped buyers and sellers in equal capacities and understand the importance of knowing both sides of the transaction to effectively negotiate for my client. I also have years of experience leading a property management division which allows me to provide education on owning and renting property here on Maui.
I have lived all over the Island from Makawao(upcountry) to Kihei (southside) and most recently, Kahana on the westside. If you are new to Maui or have lived here all your life, I am the realtor with the insights and experience to help you find the right place for your Maui lifestyle.
When you are ready to buy or sell a home on Maui, call me. I am ready to go to work for you.
Experience includes:
*New Construction Listing Agent
*Broker in Charge- Director of Property Management with Hawaii Residential rent rolls of over 7 million per year.
*Rookie of the Year sales Award in Oregon and Hawaii

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Judy hails from Alberta, Canada where she had successful careers in both the medical and real estate fields. Judy has lived in South Maui for the last 10 years after transitioning from snow to sunshine to be closer to her kids and grand kids.
Through her 15 year medical career, her high standards for client care follow through to Real Estate. Her extensive experience in Real Estate helps her serve her clients with high market knowledge, great negotiation skills & excellent communication. Her passion for helping clients reach their goals motivates her 'ohana focused service!

Responsiveness is one of my greatest attributes to my clients when servicing you and helping you meet your goals.

I look forward to 'Driving the Maui Market with you' and meeting your Real Estate goals & needs."

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Licensed in early 2023, Lara’s knowledge, experience and love for real estate began when she first embarked on her own journey as a buyer on the island of Kauai in 2020. After going through the process a couple of times - first with her own residential property, and then with an investment property, she was hooked!
With 15 years on the island following a very global, multi-cultural upbringing, Lara has been her own property manager for 3 rental units so has learned and continues to learn hands on what it takes to buy, sell, manage and maintain properties and tenants on Kauai.
This personal experience coupled with keen intuitive insight and the unusual gift of being able to get along with absolutely EVERYBODY makes Lara more than just your average real estate agent. She is a friend and ally that can and will walk beside you through your process.
“It brings me so much joy to help others see their real estate dreams fulfilled the way mine was.”
In Lara’s free time you will find her out in Kauai’s stunning nature, dancing the hula with her hula halau, practicing yoga, cuddling with her pets and/or cheering on her teenage son at his basketball games.
“I’m so honored to be a part of Rainbow Island Properties and can’t wait to be a contribution toward your goals.”

JF

title: Real Estate Broker
description:
I've lived in the New London/Lake Sunapee area since 1972, and, along with my husband, Bill (who died in 1998 of cancer), raised our two sons, plus several generations of sheep, pigs, and Labrador retrievers on our 1779 farm just outside of town.
Outside of running my business and raising a family over the last 45 years, I have also volunteered on countless local and statewide boards including the Society for the Protection of New Hampshire Forests; the Ausbon Sargent Land Preservation Trust Board (Chairman for 2 years) and Lands Committee; the Pleasant Lake Protective Association, Lake Sunapee Protective Association (Board, 2004; and on its Land Protection Committee); the New London Historical Society, the Lake Sunapee Area Chamber of Commerce, The WFK Ice House Foundation Board (The Ice House Museum) as Secretary/Treasurer; the Citizens' Advisory Council, Town of New London), the President's Advisory Council of Colby-Sawyer College, and the Colby-Sawyer College Community Forum; and, most recently, the Board of Trustees of Kearsarge Council on Aging.
For fun, the thing I love most is to spend time with my grown-up family (both sons live in town)-and especially my three grandchildren, but I also enjoy trying to keep up with my substantial perennial gardens, dubbing around the "farm", reading, attending local events, getting outside in the winter and summer, but especially spending time during the summer boating and beaching with family and friends at our special spot on Pleasant Lake.
But I also have always had fun in my chosen career. I began my commitment to real estate in 1983, with Country Houses, a well-respected local firm, which had been purchased from the original owner by a close friend. In 1987, I moved on to start my own company with a partner and one secretary. Six years later, we affiliated with Coldwell Banker to bring the benefit of an international brand with an excellent reputation to our clients. For about 20 years, that proved to have been a good decision. During most of that time, I was the sole owner of the company (Milestone Real Estate, Inc.), and by 2016 had built it to its current number of 7 energetic sales associates/brokers and 3/4 support personnel.
2016 brought some very exciting changes. That fall , “The Best Team in Town” became even better…through the acquisition of the marketing rights to a Better Homes & Gardens Real Estate franchise for New London and the Greater Lake Sunapee Region through a strategic partnership with Better Homes and Gardens/The Masiello Group. With a 33+ office network, The Masiello Group is the largest real estate company north of Boston.

For more than 90 years Better Homes and Gardens® has been the most trusted source of inspiration for all things related to the home. BHG Real Estate carries the brand across all aspects of our daily lives and creates instant positive recognition. We feel that BHGRE’s reputation and national exposure and The Masiello Group’s strength in northern New England create a perfect combination with our local experience and expertise. Having

title: New London, NH
description:
Judy and her family moved to Sunapee from the Lakes Region of New Hampshire in 2005.
She became a member of our team in 2006, replacing our previous Office Manager of 18 years. Judy has held a real estate license since 1985, and has managed two other real estate offices in the Lakes Region. She continues to ensure that daily operations run smoothly and efficiently.

title: Real Estate Broker
description:
Originally licensed in California in 1989 Joyce brings years of experience selling residential homes, condos, and land - working with both buyers and sellers. Born in Cleveland, Ohio and moving with her family to Washington D.C., Grosse Pointe Woods, MI, and then Beverly Hills, CA she began working as a beauty consultant and sales representative where she honed her skills in service and negotiation. Her career in real estate began from an appreciation of wonderful properties and beautiful homes. With an aptitude for personal interaction and born with diligence, commitment, and attention to detail, she can understand a property's unique merits along with the characteristics of our different communities. She thrives in the process of buying and selling and is great at what she does. She's been a top producer on Kauai with over 100M in sales in the last five years. She is a mother of two, Joshua and Luke. Joshua was born severely handicapped, passing gracefully at the age of eighteen after bringing much joy and love into their lives. To her great joy, Luke and wife Michelle has gifted Joy and her husband Scott with 2 beautiful granddaughters, Mai and Aria. Mornings may find Joy practicing yoga, walking a beautiful Kauai trail or neighborhood, or having a walk and swim in the ocean. AWARDS: Tom Ferry "America's Best" Real Estate Professionals 2021, Corcoran Affiliate PRESIDENTS Award 2021, Top Performers in Real Estate 2022 Hawaii Business Magazine
For a peak into the lineage she follows in Real Estate Investing and Hospitality, click here to dive into the background of her grandfather Alonzo Gordon Wright I.
See Joyce's Testimonials and Sales History

title: New London, NH
description:
Born and raised in Massachusetts, Donna has been fortunate enough to live in a number of different states. After graduating from UMass with a degree in Forestry, she moved to California and worked for the US Forest Service for nine years. She and her husband, both skiers, relocated to a ski resort in southern NH, then to western Maine at Sunday River, and then lived up in the mountains of southern Utah at 10,000 ft. at a ski resort town called Brian Head. In 2000, they moved to New London and have happily lived here ever since.
Donna has been a full-time licensed REALTOR® since 1994, starting in Utah and continuing on in the New London area. Whether buying or selling, her years of experience will help you avoid the common pitfalls of real estate and make your transaction a success. Visit her website, www.DonnaForest.com, to see her helpful tips, get community reports, and even see what other folks say about her.

title: New London, NH
description:
Jane grew up around the Lake Sunapee area and has lived in New London with her family since 1987. She has a great knowledge of the area, both from raising her family here and working in her family’s home design and construction company.
She is a full time professional REALTOR® dedicated to representing both buyers and sellers. Jane happily networks with other local real estate brokers and agents, so her customers and clients can count on getting a complete picture of the available area real estate. Because of her experience with her family's building business, Jane has been able to be particularly helpful to buyers who are interested in new construction.

title: New London, NH
description:
Joan Wallen is our Rental Manager extraordinaire! No stranger to the New London/Lake Sunapee area, Joan has held her real estate license since 1982.
After teaching at Colby-Sawyer College, she was a part of the management staff at King Ridge Ski Area for many years before going on to other endeavors in the ski industry and in public relations. She currently devotes herself full time to meeting her customers’ and clients’ needs. Joan will be delighted to assist you, whether you are looking for a rental or hoping to rent your home or cottage.

title: Cypress, TX
description: Alane has lived in the Greater Houston area for over 30 years, giving her the market knowledge and expertise clients deserve when buying or selling a home. After growing up in West University, Alane attended Texas A&M for 9 years earning PhD in psychology. Her job as a psychologist for CyFair ISD allowed Alane to work in many Houston neighborhoods and build relationships across a diverse network. Her confident approach to challenges and goal-oriented strategies can be attributed to her unwavering work ethic paired with her educational background. After going through the homebuilding experience, her desire for helping people coupled with a passion for the business led her to a career in real estate. Alane seeks to give a world class service to her clients, keeping them informed throughout the process. She loves getting to know her clients on a personal level and works tirelessly to find them the perfect home. Honest, approachable and practical, Alane brings a reputation for diligence and persistence to BHGRE Gary Greene.

title: Cypress, TX
description: I love helping people realize their dream. Having grown up in the service industry, I thrive on developing relationships and practicing excellent communication (starting with listening). My greatest strengths are family, follow up, and negotiations. Let's apply my 20 years in Cypress and NW Houston in finding great homes for our clients.

title: Cypress, TX
description:
Victoria Black is an enthusiastic and dedicated Realtor with a true commitment to helping you with the sale, purchase, or lease of your home. Exceptional customer service is of paramount importance, so Victoria treats every client with the highest level of respect, integrity, and commitment whether she is finding the ideal home for a new buyer or helping a seller achieve their goals in record time. Having recently joined the Cypress office of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Gary Greene, Victoria offers a patient and knowledgeable buying and selling experience and enjoys giving her clients an insider’s view of local neighborhoods to help them make well-informed decisions.
Clients receive Victoria’s full dedication to meeting the challenges of her responsibilities, from inception of a ﬁrst meeting to closing the transaction. The same quality of attention never waivers. It is given to ﬁrst-time home buyers, “moving up” buyers, buyers for new and period homes, as well as new and seasoned investors.
With her down-to-earth attitude and straight-forward style of doing business, Victoria’s ongoing goals are to connect the right sellers and buyers to maximize the experience for whichever party she is representing. Selling or buying a home can be stressful, but Victoria wants to make your real estate experience an exciting and joyous one with superior customer service.
Contact Victoria for friendly and informed representation of the purchase and/or sale of your home.

description: I have lived overseas so I understand "big moves". I can empathize with buyer's and seller's in regards to moving to the "unknown". I will try to make it an adventure for you and lessen the stress!

title: Cypress, TX
description:
I am a retired military professional that has served over 25 years in the United States Army. During my military career, I have traveled to numerous countries around the world, experienced different cultures, and had the pleasure of working with some of the most amazing people imaginable.
Although I am no longer in uniform, I have been presented the golden opportunity to serve the public in a different capacity as a licensed Realtor. What I bring from the military to the real estate industry is honesty, trust, professionalism, knowledge and unparalleled selfless service. Regardless if you are buying, selling or leasing, I am dedicated to providing you with the highest level of service to meet your specific real estate needs.

title: Cypress, TX
description:
I am excited to announce to my clients, friends and neighbors that I have joined BHGRE Gary Greene. As the previous Broker/Owner of BAY TREE REALTY, LLC, my goal will continue to be providing exemplary service while guiding you through the real estate process, whether you are buying or selling your home.
My background includes significant contract negotiations in the technology industry. This has given me a solid understanding of negotiation strategies - something very useful in real estate.
I have a Bachelor's degree from the University of Houston and am fluent in Spanish. I have helped many clients who prefer a Spanish-speaking agent.
Houston has been my home for 30 years, during which time I have lived and traveled extensively in Latin America, Europe and Australia. My family is very active in civic and church activities because it’s our way of strengthening our community and helping others.
Selling and buying a home can be an emotional and stressful time so establishing trust is critical. Ensuring open communication and consistent follow-up will help my clients understand the process and guarantee satisfaction in the property buying or selling experience. Member HAR, TAR and NAR, and past member of the International Real Estate Federation (FIABCI-USA).

title: Cypress, TX
description:
Kristy Allen is an enthusiastic and dedicated Realtor with a true commitment to helping you with the sale, purchase, or lease of your home. Exceptional customer service is of paramount importance, so Kristy treats every client with the highest level of respect, integrity, and commitment whether she is finding the ideal home for a new buyer or helping a seller achieve their goals in record time. Having recently joined the Cypress office of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Gary Greene, Kristy offers a patient and knowledgeable buying and selling experience and enjoys giving her clients an insider’s view of local neighborhoods to help them make well-informed decisions.

Clients receive Kristy’s full dedication to meeting the challenges of her responsibilities, from inception of a ﬁrst meeting to closing the transaction. The same quality of attention never waivers. It is given to ﬁrst-time home buyers, “moving up” buyers, buyers for new and period homes, as well as new and seasoned investors.

With her down-to-earth attitude and straight-forward style of doing business, Kristy’s ongoing goals are to connect the right sellers and buyers to maximize the experience for whichever party she is representing. Selling or buying a home can be stressful, but Kristy wants to make your real estate experience an exciting and joyous one with superior customer service.


Contact Kristy for friendly and informed representation of the purchase and/or sale of your home.

title: Cypress, TX
description:

My oldest son Chase, a lovely daughter that she holds in her heart forever, Jordan and the youngest daughter named Hope. I am very active in the community where I am the co-founder and president of the MBJ (My Baby Jordan) Foundation for SIDS a Cypress based 501c3 non-profit organization focusing on creating awareness and research for sudden infant death syndrome. title: Cypress, TX
description:
Jessica Fetzer, a licensed Realtor since 2014, brings a wealth of expertise and a passion for real estate to her clients. A native Texan originally from Austin, Jessica has called Houston home since 2011. Her specialization lies in working with first-time homebuyers, guiding them through the intricacies of the home-buying process, and making sound financial decisions. Additionally, she thrives in assisting international clients and ex-pats, making their transitions seamless and stress-free.
Known for her attention to detail, Jessica stands out with her ability to keep clients on track. As a former top producer and luxury international affiliate, she brings a unique perspective to the real estate landscape. Prior to real estate, Jessica managed projects for a cosmetics company. Her international experience in this role allowed her to understand and connect with people from diverse backgrounds.
Jessica’s choice to enter real estate stems from her deep appreciation for architecture and design. With a BBA and MBA, she values continuous learning and never giving up. Her dedication extends beyond her professional life; she is actively involved in volunteering, including supporting a local dog rescue, and contributing to the community as a precinct chair.
Jessica’s commitment to her clients, coupled with her strong family values and diverse experiences, makes her a standout professional in the real estate industry.

description:
I'm a Broker Associate at BHGRE Gary Greene and have been a licensed REALTOR® in Texas since 2011. I love every minute of this career. My experience and expertise have given me a clear understanding of home buyers' and sellers' mindsets and a thorough understanding of the regional marketplace, which is a powerful advantage for my clients.
I specialize in the Northwest Houston communities of Cypress, Katy, Tomball, Spring, and surrounding areas. Having experience in the title side of the business, as a new home sales counselor, and as a Staging Professional, I'm uniquely positioned to give you the best buying and/or selling experience and guidance.
From our first meeting to contract to closing-- whether you're building new, buying a resale, or selling your home, I promise to wow you with a seamless process! Whether buying or selling, remember "List with Lab" for all your real estate needs. Contact me today! Text me at 713-256-8941.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: After joining my father's business, Roupas Group in which we purchase and renovate homes and provide hard money loans in 2011, I decided to bring my assets from 20+ years in customer service, banking and retail management to real estate. title: Fairfax, VA
description: Jay and Anna have been licensed REALTOR® professionals since 2002 and long-time residents of the Washington DC Metropolitan area. Jay & Anna have extensive knowledge and focus on the following areas Arlington, Alexandria, Fairfax, Loudoun and Prince William Counties in Virginia and Montgomery County Maryland. Anna brings leadership and client relationship skills through her previous management position with visitor services at the Library of Congress for over 20 years. Jay brings a high level of accuracy in real estate contracts, supported by 30+ years of experience owning and operating an accounting and mortgage brokerage firm in Bethesda. His education is in accounting and finance. While a majority of our business is repeat and referral-based, we also specialize in Government and Corporate Relocation and Property Management. Your smooth real estate transaction is our top priority. We work closely together to ensure you achieve a smooth and satisfying buying and/or selling experience. We love meeting new clients, and we’re always happy to help with all of your real estate needs!
