title: Cypress, TX
description:
Mrs. Meinke is there to guide sellers every step of the way, from staging listings, to hosting open houses, to closing. She also provides access to industry leading marketing, including advertising on a variety of television channels, print publications, and thousands of websites.

Mrs. Meinke represents those searching for a new home by helping them research neighborhoods, keep abreast of new listings, schedule inspections and prepare for closings. Above all, she is an ally and guide for all her clients, every step of the way.


Before joining Gary Greene, Mrs. Meinke was a part-time assistant for a local Real Estate Broker for the last 6 years and worked as a substitute teacher and tutor in CFISD for 11 years prior. Patient, attentive, and a professional who emphasizes integrity, she enjoys building meaningful relationships and looks forward to helping clients find their dream home or list their home when the time for a change has come. Mrs. Meinke graduated from Texas A&M University with her Bachelor’s in Business Administration degree in Accounting and promptly moved to Houston where she has been since then with her husband Richard. She regularly volunteers at church, her children’s schools, and various Bible study groups in her free time.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
LALITHA MANI , Esq.
Lalitha Mani is a professional real estate agent who has a background in both the social sciences and law and brings to real estate her facilitative style along with her natural talent for engaging client s and winning their trust. She is licensed in Northern Virginia. Lalitha is also a certified coach and holds the credential of Professional Certified Coach (PCC) from the International Coaching Federation. As a real estate agent , Lalitha has worked with a variety of clients from different geographic and cultural backgrounds and as a coach, she helps clients make the right real estate choices, be they whether to rent or own, upsize or downsize, and assists them in moving forward with their real estate decisions. She has a natural interest in people and understands the social and cultural context in which behavior takes place. She brings this unique background in the way she help s real estate clients, putting them at ease and eliciting their participation.
Lalitha has a Master’s degree in Sociology from the University of Pennsylvania and has a JD from Case Western Reserve University, Cleveland, Ohio. She is a member of the DC Bar. Lalitha has two children who are both physicians and she currently lives in Vienna with her husband Dev, who is a retired scientist from the National Academy of Sciences.

title: Cypress, TX
description: Clint Nabors has made his name synonymous with success, becoming "Rookie of the Year" his first year in real estate, "Super Real Estate Agent" for three years running, as chosen by the Homebuyer's Guide of Greater Houston, and a consistent Top Producer. He has persevered to top these achievements by leading the Ellis-Nabors Team onto receiving many top-ranking awards! This stellar performance earned them well-deserved spots on both of the Houston Business Journal's lists, Gross Dollar Volume and Number of Closed Transactions, for 2011, 2012 2013, & 2014 dedicated to Houston's "Top 25 Residential Real Estate Teams" - a crowning achievement! A Baylor University graduate with a BBA in Real Estate, Clint completed the Graduate Realtor Institute (GRI) designation program, Critical Path Sales Training course, and most recently earned the Certified Negotiation Expert (CNE) designation. He is always enhancing and developing his skills with continuing education. He is Relocation Certified and a member of the Inventory Home Market Specialist Team. During part of his real estate career, Clint worked as a sales counselor for a top new home builder in Houston and believes that experience gives him an edge in new-construction home buying and selling. "I am very familiar with the building process," he says. Clint also distinguishes himself with his comprehensive marketing strategies and negotiating skills. He is levelheaded and addresses each transaction with patience and persistence. A problem solver and educator, he uses his skills to make the transaction as smooth as possible, while keeping his clients well informed and their best interests in mind. Clint is also a person of strong Christian faith; putting God as the head of his life, family and business keeps him grounded and focused. Th e rewards of Clint's faith, experience and knowledge are reflected in his many satisfied clients. Said one: "We were very happy with Clint and his insight and caring to meet our needs. If we need to move again, we will definitely choose Clint and Heritage Texas Properties." It is through Clint's vision that the Ellis-Nabors Team has grown to the level of success that they are today. He oversees, trains, and motivates the team's 4 licensed agents, and serves as the team leader. Clint and his Realtor wife, Amy, also a Baylor graduate, teamed up with her parents, Mark and Catherine Ellis, both of whom have long and successful real estate careers, to form the Ellis-Nabors Team. All who know them agree they are a dynamic force with a multitude of talents that better serve all their clients' needs. They mutually agree, "Superior service is our focus!" and they work hard to exceed the expectations of every client. These highly motivated agents say, "We love working with people and enjoy helping them purchase their dream home." Whether working with buyers or sellers, the team puts their clients' needs fi rst, and they are diligent about maintaining good follow-up. Friendly and funny, they are a pleasure to work with, but they maintain the highest standards at all times. The team is ably assisted by team manager and licensed associate, Karen Zientek, team listing coordinator and team accountant, Clint's mother, Diann Nabors, in addition to licensed agents, Ainsley Curry and Amy's younger sister, Katie Ellis. The Ellis-Nabors Team is principally focused on Cypress and Northwest Houston but has roots in the community throughout Greater Houston. A native Houstonian, Clint knows his city and has an extensive market area including Fairfi eld, Copperfi eld, Cinco Ranch, Coles Crossing, BlackHorse Ranch, Bridgeland, and Lakes of Fairhaven. From a large extended family, Clint and Amy have a daughter and a son. Clint is an active member of his church, Harvest Bible Church, a devoted volunteer for Fairfield Sports Association, PTO volunteer for Swenke Elementary, and a member of the Baylor Alumni Association and the Alpha Kappa Psi Alumni Association.

title: Cypress, TX
description: The Grayson-Patton Team was awarded the 'Small Business of the Year' by Lone Star College System in 2008. David is a multiple time '5 Star Realtor' by Texas Monthly nominated by his peers and customers. He was recognized as a 'Top 20 Under 40 Realtor' by HAR / NGR. Summer was nominated to and then completed a year of Leadership North Houston. They have also been recognized as a Top 10 Producer for Heritage Texas Properties and multiple time 'Top Producers'. Summer and David maintain a 4.95 out of 5 customer survey rating on HAR.com.

title: Cypress, TX
description: David Patton is a second generation Realtor, a graduate of Texas A&M, and a licensed Broker - the highest level of real estate licensing with over 900 hours of education. His career began over 15 years ago when he joined his mother, Nancy Grayson, and her successful real estate business. In 2007, David became the team's CEO and was joined by his wife, Summer Patton, as the Co-Owners of the Grayson-Patton Team. He has been recognized multiple times as a 'Five Star Realtor' by Texas Monthly and previously by the Houston Association of Realtors as a 'Top 20 Realtor Under 40'. He also is a real estate photographer with the unique prospective only a Realtor can have, samples of his outstanding work are found on the gpteam.com home page. He has collected raving reviews on HAR's customer surveys and can say he has sold hundreds of homes in his career. David personally supports the American Heart Association, Cypress Creek EMS Board, Klein Volunteer Fire Department (previous firefighter for 16 years), and the Houston Livestock Show & Rodeo (Past Chairman of Equipment Acquisition) and Parade Committee Member. His clients range from investors, new construction buyers, luxury buyers and sellers, first-time home buyers, homeowners, and corporate relocation customers. David enjoys being an uncle to four nephews and a niece, a dad to two Corgis, and finds a rare opportunity to fish occasionally.

description:

title: Cypress, TX
description:
Ms. Thompson represents those searching for a new home by helping them research neighborhoods, keep abreast of new listings, scheduling inspections and preparing her clients for closings, as well as securing financing, mortgage and insurance. Her market knowledge and insight will help buyers get the deal they deserve. Above all, she is an ally and guide for all her clients and will work diligently with their best interest in mind.


Jess graduated from Texas State University with a Degree in Studio Art and a Minor in Education. She then spent 10 years teaching art, providing her with a wealth of knowledge and expertise. During her career teaching, Jess acquired so many valuable skills, such as problem solving, goal setting, and understanding the needs of others. Additionally, she has a love for Real Estate and Architecture which developed at a young age. Over time, Jess has acquired a keen eye for the aesthetics of all things Art and Architecture – which will serve her well as a real estate. Ms. Thompson understands that the real estate transaction is so much more than buying and selling houses but creating a home and is committed to her client's long term vision. Having experience with drafting programs such as AutoCad, she is truly aware of the ergonomics of a great home. Most importantly, she truly loves helping others, as seen by her past teaching career and her volunteer work with the Klein ISD youth membership program. As a real estate agent she is fully dedicated to helping her clients and will do that by providing the best customer service possible and building strong business relationships.

title: Cypress, TX
description:
I have been assisting buyers and sellers since 1998. I am a Relocation Specialist, using the same expertise I use for relocation for ALL my buyers and sellers! I listen closely to my clients needs, requirements and goals, and use my knowledge and expertise to meet them. After all, their goals are my goals! I feel communication with my clients is key to a successful, fun transition, whether buying or selling. Working with my clients is an enjoyable experience allowing me to meet many buyers and sellers that later become friends!
I also have a CHMS (Certified Home Marketing Specialist) designation, integrating staging and pricing concepts and a demonstration of strategic marketing skills into my plans that can result in reduced market time.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
As someone deeply passionate about both real estate and interior design, I offer a pretty special package of services for my clients. My aim goes beyond just finding you that dream property – I want to make it uniquely yours, reflecting your vibe and personality perfectly. If you're interested in turning your vision into a reality, let's connect and work together to create a masterpiece that you'll love coming home to.


My credentials include being a Military Relocation Professional (MRP), Accredited Buyer’s Representative (ABR), Certified Negotiation Skills Course, and Certified Interior Designer. Honesty, integrity, determination, and dedication are values that I prioritize in all aspects of my life.


In my free time, I enjoy traveling, sightseeing, and trying new food with my husband and daughter. I am also fluent in Vietnamese and aspire to do charity work in Vietnam and give back to my community in the United States.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Helping families navigate through the buying and selling process is and has been my most fulfilling aspect of becoming a Realtor.
After graduating with a BS in Business Administration from the University of Southern Mississippi, I started my career with USAA Insurance which provided me with the background in customer service and has ultimately become my way of conducting business. My goal is to make the whole process as stress free as possible while keeping my clients informed every step of the way.
Since my father was in the Army and my husband was in the Marines, their experiences have helped serve me as I have interacted with many military families. This comes in handy since they are not always able to view homes in person.
After marrying my husband, starting a family and being blessed with two beautiful children, my personal relocation experience began. My husband’s success in his field would result in five (5) corporate relocations in the last 20 years. Having lived through every aspect of those major life changing events, I know how stressful this can be on a family. Not only did we have to keep our current house “show ready” but we had to find the perfect house which had to be in close proximity to an ice rink since both of our children loved to skate (resulting in a competitive figure skater as well as an elite hockey player). These experiences made me truly appreciate having a great Realtor who understood that it was not always just about buying or selling the house!
On our fourth relocation, which sent us to Houston, Texas, I made the decision to become a Realtor with the hope to take my experiences and knowledge and use it to help others. Our last relocation was to the Northern Virginia area and am very pleased to call this our final home.
My experience includes formal appraisal training and I strive to take continuing education classes whenever possible so I’m up to date on any new policies or trends in the market. I have extensive personal knowledge in the building process as well since we have designed and built homes ranging from $125K to $1M+ across multiple states. I have been fortunate to be ranked as a Residential Top Producer in NOVA multiple years and will work hard to continue to do so.

Being an empty nester now, I enjoy exploring everything this region has to offer. This includes, but is not limited to, hiking, working out, visiting all the great wineries and of course eating at all the fantastic restaurants in the area. I look forward to assisting you in either finding your new perfect place to call home or selling your current home in a profitable and timely manner!

Exceptional customer service is of paramount importance, so Victoria treats every client with the highest level of respect, integrity, and commitment whether she is finding the ideal home for a new buyer or helping a seller achieve their goals in record time. Having recently joined the Cypress office of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Gary Greene, Victoria offers a patient and knowledgeable buying and selling experience and enjoys giving her clients an insider’s view of local neighborhoods to help them make well-informed decisions.
Clients receive Victoria’s full dedication to meeting the challenges of her responsibilities, from inception of a ﬁrst meeting to closing the transaction. The same quality of attention never waivers. It is given to ﬁrst-time home buyers, “moving up” buyers, buyers for new and period homes, as well as new and seasoned investors.
With her down-to-earth attitude and straight-forward style of doing business, Victoria’s ongoing goals are to connect the right sellers and buyers to maximize the experience for whichever party she is representing. Selling or buying a home can be stressful, but Victoria wants to make your real estate experience an exciting and joyous one with superior customer service.
Contact Victoria for friendly and informed representation of the purchase and/or sale of your home.

title: Cypress, TX
description: I have lived overseas so I understand "big moves". I can empathize with buyer's and seller's in regards to moving to the "unknown". I will try to make it an adventure for you and lessen the stress!

title: Cypress, TX
description:
I am a retired military professional that has served over 25 years in the United States Army. During my military career, I have traveled to numerous countries around the world, experienced different cultures, and had the pleasure of working with some of the most amazing people imaginable.
Although I am no longer in uniform, I have been presented the golden opportunity to serve the public in a different capacity as a licensed Realtor. What I bring from the military to the real estate industry is honesty, trust, professionalism, knowledge and unparalleled selfless service. Regardless if you are buying, selling or leasing, I am dedicated to providing you with the highest level of service to meet your specific real estate needs.

title: Cypress, TX
description: I served our Country for 20 Years and transitioned to Corporate America where I served the employees of Corporate America for 16 years in the HR field. When I retired in 2016 I received my Real Estate license and did marketing for my wife who already had her license and also works for Better Homes and gardens Real Estate. I now have the privilege of helping everyone who wants to experience home owner.

title: Cypress, TX
description:
I am excited to announce to my clients, friends and neighbors that I have joined BHGRE Gary Greene. As the previous Broker/Owner of BAY TREE REALTY, LLC, my goal will continue to be providing exemplary service while guiding you through the real estate process, whether you are buying or selling your home.
My background includes significant contract negotiations in the technology industry. This has given me a solid understanding of negotiation strategies - something very useful in real estate.
I have a Bachelor's degree from the University of Houston and am fluent in Spanish. I have helped many clients who prefer a Spanish-speaking agent.
Houston has been my home for 30 years, during which time I have lived and traveled extensively in Latin America, Europe and Australia. My family is very active in civic and church activities because it’s our way of strengthening our community and helping others.
Selling and buying a home can be an emotional and stressful time so establishing trust is critical. Ensuring open communication and consistent follow-up will help my clients understand the process and guarantee satisfaction in the property buying or selling experience. Member HAR, TAR and NAR, and past member of the International Real Estate Federation (FIABCI-USA).

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
I am a full-service real estate consultant specializing in helping people buy and sell homes in North Texas since 2005 with unparalleled service and cutting-edge technology to provide the best possible experience for my clients. I know you are not choosing an agent based solely on their analysis of comps, but also wanting someone who provides the benefit of my extensive experience. This includes a complete plan to sell your home with best-in-class advice to get you the most amount of money in the least amount of time. And for those looking to purchase a home, providing data and guidance so you make a smart decision on the right home. I also believe it’s important to give back to the local communities after each closing and support the following organizations:


Community Storehouse
Meals on Wheels
North Texas Food Bank
Rebuilding Together

title: Cypress, TX
description:
I enjoy helping people get from point A to point B. Based on experience, I like helping who are new to an area get settled, find doctors and where they will shop. I understand that schools are important and the things that parents care about in an area.


I am a native Texan and has been in Houston since graduating from Texas A&M University with a Bachelor’s degree in Psychology. My background prior to real estate was in the Customer Service industry for over 15 years, where I was a Buyer for local based Stage Stores Inc. department stores. I am a proud mother of 3 children. My oldest son Chase, a lovely daughter that she holds in her heart forever, Jordan and the youngest daughter named Hope. I am very active in the community where I am the co-founder and president of the MBJ (My Baby Jordan) Foundation for SIDS a Cypress based 501c3 non-profit organization focusing on creating awareness and research for sudden infant death syndrome. Jaime stays busy with her kids, participating in her son’s ball games and is a proud Hous

description:
With over a decade of experience, my main goal is to be focused on YOUR needs. Buying and selling Real Estate is one of the largest transactions you will make. You will need someone in your corner to help navigate through the intricate process for a smooth and pleasant experience.

Client Reviews:
Paul was great to work with. He was available when I called and never left me feeling like I was bothering him. He was patient and always answered my questions....even if I asked them multiple times. He quickly honed in on what I was looking for in a home and did all he could do to make it happen!! - Beth D.
Paul did an awesome job helping us find the perfect home for our family. He is very patient , dependable, kind, & knowledgeable! Paul made our home buying process enjoyable & less stressful! It was a pleasure having him as a realtor. Thanks for all of your hard work ! - Laticia S

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Robb is a dedicated family man and leading real estate professional. He displays his strong personal values every day. When it comes to the things that are most important to his clients when buying or selling a home, he applies every ounce of dedication, expertise, and attention to detail to create the best possible results. He takes the time to understand your needs and focuses his efforts on achieving your family's real estate goals. Robb's job description is: "To live in the service of others." Robb's approach to real estate is providing every client with VIP treatment. So whether you are purchasing your "success home" or your very first "starter home", the service Robb provides will always include personal touches, win-win deals and positive results.
Client Testimonials:
- I had the absolute pleasure to have worked with Robb, and could not be happier. As a first time buyer he was incredibly patient, and did a fantastic job of informing me of everything I needed to know and look out for when looking at a home. He truly went above and beyond in all aspects, and I couldn't thank him enough for that. If the opportunity were to arise again I would most certainly choose to work with him again.
- Robb was an amazing Realtor! He was so patient with me. He was always available and worked tirelessly to help us. Robb has a tremendous amount of finesse with negotiating and he was able to get us everything we wanted. Robb made the home buying experience stress free. He is calm, funny and a pleasure to work with. His attention to detail and knowledge of homes is beyond impressive. I would highly highly recommend him to anyone. We really appreciate his efforts in finding us a home.
Learn more about Robb , and see what more clients have to say about working with him.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Everyone needs a roof over their head! Allow me the pleasure of helping you find your roof. Going above and beyond is the norm for this agent of real estate. Having moved many times while growing up in a military family arena, attended twelve schools, and saw many sights around the world as a young girl. The Dallas Fort Worth area has been home for over thirty years. Texas is a big state with much to offer. Enjoy working with first time buyers, move-up buyers, down-sizing sellers, relocations, investment searchers, lake & golf communities...many scenarios out there...the final goal is finding the perfect property for the client.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I’m your National Relocation Specialist, focused on the dynamic Texas-Dallas-Fort Worth region. Recognized in the July 2023 Top Producer issue for dedication, performance, and client care across all life stages. With a passion for creative marketing and a commitment to seamless transitions, I ensure every client's relocation journey is smooth and stress-free. With proactive communication and a focus on your needs, I'm here every step of the way. Join me as we navigate your move and embrace the excitement of your next chapter together!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Christie Malone Realtor Better Homes and Gardens Winans Dream Team DFW

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Glenda Moore is a distinguished real estate professional representing clients throughout the Dallas / Fort Worth Metropolitan area. Recognized for her exceptional customer service skills, Glenda's commitment to meeting her client's real estate needs, coupled with her unwavering knowledge of the real estate industry and unparalleled contract negotiation skills have earned her a reputation as being one of Texas' most premier real estate agents. She promotes her passion and love for the real estate industry by providing a "white glove" level of service to her clients making every transaction - Listing or Purchase as "smooth" and "stress - free" as possible.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Buying my first house was a transformative moment in my life, leading me to clearly understand the meaning of home and family. I actively embrace these qualities in my real estate practice.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am a native of Fort Worth and bring two decades of experience to my clients. I specialize in corporate and military relocation, and my goal is to make your move a positive and enjoyable experience. Whether the transaction is an executive estate, equine facility or a starter home I value your emotional and monetary investment. I will listen to what you want and put your needs first. When it is time to sell I will utilize my marketing plan and Better Homes & Gardens powerhouse of resources to promote your property. My clients sell their homes quickly and often for more than the list price. As you look to make a move I will be there to help you through every step of the transaction!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am here to give you the benefit of my knowledge and experience so you avoid pitfalls and maximize your money. I enjoy tending to all the details so that you get to enjoy a smooth & stress free transaction. I am always just a call, text, or email away, and I will keep you informed and discuss every option with you. Clients Testimonials: Deborah was extremely helpful and patient, and did a great job of taking care of us through the entire process. -David D. rated Deborah 10/10! Deborah was so incredibly helpful with the potentially stressful process of selling a home. She alleviated every bit of stress, and had all the technical answers to the realty rules and laws. We could not be happier with her fantastic attitude and her highly professional service. We recommend her service to anyone looking to buy or sell and want a smooth and easy experience with outstanding advice as well. -Michelle K. rated Deborah 5/5 Deborah was very professional and patient in all aspects of finding homes as well as answering our questions in a manner that could be well understood. We felt very comfortable and in good hands that she would find us exactly what we were looking for. We were very pleased with her pleasant and bubbly personality and her knowledge. -Michael D. rated Deborah 5/5 Certifications & Specialties: Certified Negotiations Expert Luxury Homes Military Relocation Investment Purchases

title: Key Largo, FL
description:
About me, I have been dedicated to a Florida Keys real estate career since 2005 and I love it! I have a passion for making dreams come true and for helping people achieve their real estate goals in the Florida Keys! As a broker I am delighted to teach others how to do the same.
I have served on the Florida Keys Board of REALTORS® for five years as director and eventually President. I found it very rewarding to be such an integral part of my industry. I earned REALTOR® Rookie of The Year award in 2007 for my service in the association as well as in the community. In 2017 I was elected to serve as the District IV Vice President for Florida REALTORS® representing over 45,000 agents at the state and national level. I am ready to put my professionalism, expertise and diligence to work for you.
With a positive attitude in a market full of opportunities, I will continuously offer fresh ideas, new & savvy tools, cutting edge technology and old school charm that can help you reach your real estate needs for many years to come. I take my business very seriously and always strive to obtain your desired results!

title: Key Largo, FL
description:

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Meet Jana Pratt, your trusted Florida Keys Realtor, passionate about helping you find your dream tropical oasis in paradise. After working in the Veterinary/Husbandry field for 20 plus years, Jana decided to change careers by adding realtor to her belt. Jana's nurturing personality is why she strives to provide exceptional service and personalized attention to every client she serves.
Jana's love affair with the Florida Keys began long before she became a real estate professional. As a native of the area, she has an intimate understanding of the unique charm, breathtaking landscapes, and vibrant communities that make the Florida Keys a coveted destination for homeowners and investors alike. Her deep-rooted connection to the region enables her to offer invaluable insights and guidance throughout your real estate journey.
With Jana, you can expect a seamless and enjoyable experience, whether you are buying, selling, or investing in properties throughout the Florida Keys. She possesses an unwavering commitment to ensuring her clients' needs and goals are met, and she goes above and beyond to exceed expectations at every turn.
Whether it be enjoying a paddle through the local mangrove trails, fishing the backcountry, battling the pelagic fish, soaking at the sandbar or simply strolling/biking through some of the Florida Keys State Parks. Exploring nature with family and/or friends is where you will find Jana on her off time.
If you're ready to embark on a remarkable real estate journey in the Florida Keys, Jana Pratt is the Realtor you can rely on. Contact her today to discover the endless possibilities and make your dreams of owning a slice of paradise a reality. Let the Ocean Breezes and Captivating Sunrises/Sunsets become part of your daily rituals!

title: Overland Park, KS
description:
Whether you're buying or selling a home, you can count on me to deliver a better real estate experience.

Searching through thousands of listings for a home that fits your lifestyle can be quite a task. With my help and by using our exclusive home search tools, you can narrow down your choices to homes you want to see in person. Once you find the home that's right for you, I'll help you navigate the buying process from contract to closing to keys in your hand.

Need to sell your home? You'll breathe a lot easier knowing you’ve got a professional REALTOR® at your side to provide expert advice. I'll work closely with you to sell your home for the most amount of money in the least amount of time.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I'm proud to serve the Fort Lauderdale area as a member of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Florida 1st. As part of the Better Homes and Gardens® Real Estate brand I will provide you with an excellent experience before, during and after your home buying and selling journey. With innovative technology, a unique set of tools and a household brand tied to my name, I am uniquely equipped to serve you with what you need most. And, by combining a "client first" philosophy, great listening skills, deep local knowledge, marketing savvy and business professionalism I can help you sell your home or find a new home that perfectly matches your lifestyle

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
South Florida is a great place to live and work, which is why I chose to call it home. Originally from Brazil, I have been a resident of South Florida for over 17 years & I’m so excited to be turning that community focus toward real estate.
With an understanding of the market dynamics, social media, and latest marketing trends, combined with my charismatic and energetic personality, truly set me apart.
Whether you’re buying your primary home, a second home, an investment property or selling real estate, I am dedicated to your satisfaction. I am committed to provide the best real estate experience from beginning to end & build long relationship with all of my clients.
In my free time I like to spend time with my family and we enjoy the outdoors that South Florida provides, I love the beaches & weather. I also volunteer as a PTA to my children’s schools. I live in Broward with my husband, 3 sons & 2 rescue dogs. I am fluent in Portuguese & Spanish and also a certified Notary Public. I look forward to helping you with all your real estate needs.
“When I make my clients smile that’s real success”.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Sierra is a true South Florida native with intimate knowledge of the region’s vibrant neighborhoods and communities. As a lifetime resident, Sierra offers a unique perspective on the area’s real estate, combining both her expertise and experience to help clients make informed decisions. Real estate isn't just a career for her; it's woven into her DNA.

Born and raised in the city of Fort Lauderdale, Sierra comes from a long line of real estate enthusiasts. Her family's deep-rooted involvement in the industry, spanning generations, has instilled in her a genuine passion for all things real estate. From investments, to skillful sales and strategic acquisitions, real estate is not merely a profession, but a passion for Sierra.

Drawing inspiration from her parents, who are avid property owners, Sierra's journey extends beyond buying and selling alone. With hands-on experience in property management, she has honed her expertise in ensuring that properties are not just assets, but well-maintained and profitable investments. Sierra’s commitment to her clients, combined with her deep-rooted knowledge of Florida's diverse real estate market, sets her apart from others.

When Sierra is not selling real estate, you can find her playing beach volleyball or spending time with her dog, Chowder. Sierra is currently furthering her education at FAU for her Bachelors of Business Administration with a Minor in Real Estate.

title: Associate Real Estate Broker
description:
Dennis is a licensed real estate agent with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Florida 1st, working out of the Coral Ridge office in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.


A real estate industry veteran for over 20 years, Dennis is respected in the real estate community for his attention to detail, professionalism and commitment to client services. Dennis represents both buyers and sellers throughout Greater Fort Lauderdale.
When you need a trusted real estate professional, contact Dennis at 954-629-2120. No one will work harder and smarter for you.


Someone You Can Trust


The most important thing when choosing a real estate professional is to find someone you can trust. I have a history of success and integrity in real estate that you can depend on. I am an experienced negotiator with expert knowledge of the local market. You can count on me to always work with your interests in mind, and to represent you and your wishes to the best of my ability.


My Commitment To You


In the least amount of time possible, I will get you the best price on a home that is perfectly suited to your needs and lifestyle, not just today, but for years to come.


Customers For Life


Every one of my clients is unique, and that is exactly how I treat him or her. I'm proud to say that a high percentage of my business comes from past clients-from people who choose my services time and again. I don't measure my success by sales, but by the relationships I build along the way.


"Good communication is the cornerstone of any successful relationship. You can count on me to provide you with the information you need on a schedule and in a manner that suits you best..."

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Anne Marie Sharkey-Yibirin was born & raised in Glasgow, Scotland. Before coming to live in South Florida, she spent a couple of years in Marbella, Spain selling properties, & over 5 years traveling the world while managing & supervising health & beauty salons, for a British concession on board several cruise ships. She has been selling Real-Estate Full time in South Florida since 2000
Having travelled the world and working with all nationalities, and now living n a multi-cultural paradise that attracts people from all corners of the world, she is familiar with the challenges & concerns that foreign buyers may encounter.
She has a clear understanding of people and the meaning of good customer service. She prides herself as tireless worker with a strong work ethic to complete tasks. Working long hours, being creative & consistent are the tools she has taken with her & applied to her business today. She covers all aspects from preparing to list your home for sale or finding you a home! Marketing, negotiating, inspections, appraisal, financing and attention to detail is key to a successful transaction. Allow Debbie and I to be your Realtor’s.

description: Erik Shumway has decided to bring his entrepreneurial and business acumen to world of real estate in the flourishing South Florida market! After corporate America, small business, and entrepreneurship, real estate felt like the next big step in his career. title: New Smyrna Beach, FL
description:
Originally from England, where I ran a Mechanical Engineering Company, as a local for the past 18 years to New Smyrna Beach and Port Orange, my knowledge is extensive and informed.
I owned a Bicycle Shop in New Smyrna Beach for many years and was President of the downtown Merchants Association for 3 years, prior to owning and operating a Motorcycle and ATV Dealership on State Rd 44, until selling the Businesses.

title: New Smyrna Beach, FL
description: Courtney Peel has lived in Florida for most of her life, and she is thrilled to show her clients everything the state has to offer. She grew up vacationing at New Smyrna Beach, and the wonderful memories of sand, sun, and frozen treats inspired Courtney to move to her childhood beach town at the age of 19. She made a splash as a hairdresser, quickly building strong ties in her new community. Used to making people feel beautiful, Courtney naturally developed an interest in making homes beautiful. Her joint passions for New Smyrna Beach, design, and serving others combine to make her a stellar agent. Courtney knows how to roll with the punches while still achieving her clients' goals. She effortlessly adapts to any situation with drive and dedication, and she always keeps her customers' best interests at the forefront. Courtney had to completely renovate and redesign her own house, which had been previously owned by hoarders, so she truly knows what makes a dream home — and she makes sure that her clients find theirs. Courtney is genuinely passionate about the Florida lifestyle. When she's not working, she can be found enjoying all of New Smyrna Beach's natural beauty, from kayaking and paddle boarding to fishing and just relaxing on the beach. Courtney is also a foodie; she enjoys exploring the local restaurant scene and experimenting with new dishes in the kitchen.

title: New Smyrna Beach, FL
description: Griselle began her real estate career Real Estate Agent in Puerto Rico in 1995 where she specialized in a new construction with Mora Development Corp. in Paseo Del Mar Sierra Del Sol and Sierra Del Río.In addition to her experience as Realtor she has experience the banking world in the real estate closing department of a large lending institution. Griselle moved to Florida in 2016 and worked as an active real estate professional for La Rosa Realty in Orlando before joining Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Synergy's New Smyrna Beach office. She is a member of the National Association of Realtors Florida Realtors and the New Smyrna Beach Board of Realtors. Griselle is fluent in both English and Spanish.

title: Jupiter, FL
description:
Specialties: Buyer's Agent, Listing Agent, Luxury Properties, Golf Communities

Experience
As an agent who's an expert in this local area, I bring a wealth of knowledge and expertise about buying and selling real estate here. It's not the same everywhere, so you need someone you can trust for up-to-date information. I am eager to serve you. Here are some of the things I can do for you:

Find Your Next Home
You need someone who knows this area inside and out! I can work with you to find the right home at the right price for you, including all the neighborhood amenities that matter - not to mention the essential criteria you have for your ideal home

Sell a Home
When it's time to move, you need someone who will advertise your home, show to prospective buyers, negotiate the purchase contract, arrange financing, oversee the inspections, handle all necessary paperwork and supervise the closing. I can take care of everything you need, from start to close.

Consult on Home Selling Tactics

Oftentimes buyers don't visualize living in your home the way you do. I can make your home attractive to its ideal audience - which can help you get top dollar. Things like staging the home, making repairs or minor improvements, or even simply painting the walls can be the difference between a home resting on the market and one that's sold fast.

title: New Smyrna Beach, FL
description: Being a native of Alabama (ROLL TIDE) I always looked forward to our annual vacation to the Florida Panhandle Beaches. After attending the University of Alabama, Huntsville Campus, I joined The Residence Inn Hotel Group in Huntsville. A couple of years into my hospitality career, I was offered a transfer to Altamonte Springs, Florida, which I quickly accepted. Shortly after my relocation to North Orlando/Altamonte Springs, Marriott Hotels purchased the Residence Inn brand. I remained with Marriott International for my entire career. Upon completing a successful career with Marriott International in the hotel division and the vacation ownership division, I decided to use my skill set and wealth of customer service experience to launch my Real Estate Career. My time in both divisions afforded me experience in areas associated with real estate. On the hotel side, I dealt with many families either relocating to or from the areas of the hotel markets that I worked in. Whether selling and moving to another area or buying and moving into a new city, there was always a lot of emotion for them. In the vacation ownership division, our guests were making purchasing decisions to become owners. So often the owners were experiencing excitement coupled with a sense of fear. These years of guest and owner opportunities prepared me for the next phase of my life-a career in Real Estate! Having discovered New Smyrna Beach in 2000, I knew I wanted to call this quaint Florida city home one day. The community has maintained the wholesome beach feeling that I cherish! In November 2016, I moved to New Smyrna Beach with my partner in crime, Brady (a Welsh Corgi) and embarked on my Realtor journey! If you are looking to enjoy all that Southeast Volusia offers, either as a full-time resident, a part-time resident, or as an investor, it would be my pleasure to assist you in finding you the perfect home or condo!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Lisa moved to Jupiter from her hometown of Weston, Massachusetts in May 1993. She studied at Stonehill College and graduated in 1989 with a BS in Health Care Administration. After working for several years within the health care industry in Boston, Lisa married her college sweetheart and moved to Jupiter where they still reside. Lisa and Brian have three children, a cat Charlie, and their sons beautiful chocolate lab Remi. Lisa enjoyed being the Director of Catering at the Radisson Suites Hotel, currently the Embassy Suites Hotel in Palm Beach Gardens, for many years before becoming a full time Mom. In 2012 Lisa decided to pursue a career in Real Estate as her passion is working with people and helping them fulfill their dreams of being happy homeowners. Lisa and Brian are enjoying their time as empty nesters and recently visited Ireland where their daughter is studying abroad. They enjoy watching their youngest son play lacrosse at the University of Maryland, Baltimore County, and pray for safe travels as their eldest son is a Merchant Marine. Lisa is easy to talk to and to work with. She is detailed oriented, patient, caring and enjoys working for you.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
As a Prescott resident for 40 years, I absolutely love our hometown and have served the youth in our community for over 20 years as a public school educator and athletic coach in the Chino Valley & Prescott Unified School Districts. I am a graduate of ASU and have a Master’s degree in Secondary Education and History. Along with my husband, Mark, raising our two children, Taylor & Ali, and investing in the lives of youth in our community are my greatest joys.
After eight years working in the insurance industry and twenty-seven years in the public school system, I received my Real Estate License in 2013. Since retiring from public education in 2016, I have been a full-time Realtor with The Norkus Group and absolutely love continuing to serve our beloved community.
One of my greatest assets is the knowledge of the history and rich traditions of Prescott. I bring a friendly, vibrant energy to my work and am conscientious, patient, and a person of integrity. I am committed to care for my clients, and as I represent buyers and sellers I will go beyond a professional relationship.
I am truly blessed to have such strong roots in Prescott, and will continue to diligently serve the newcomers and families of my hometown for years to come.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Over 15 Years Experience Gwen Brindley has been a Licensed Real Estate Agent for 15 years. Beginning her real estate career in March 2005, she quickly made an impact on the real estate market. Over the last 5 years, Gwen has averaged over 25 closed transactions per year. Equally significant, the Prescott Area Association of REALTORS recognized Gwen as a Top 20% producing agent for the last 10 years. Since 2008, Gwen has excelled in the specialization of Short Sale transactions with a successful closing rate of 95%. In addition, she holds the prestigious designation of MCNE Master Certified Negotiation Expert. This achievement requires extensive education in the negotiation process. This training is vital to bring all parties to an agreement for a successful real estate transaction closing. Gwen’s ABR Accredited Buyers Representation designation is key to a successful transaction.
It is through excessive education, experience, and dedication to her client’s needs that Gwen is able to assist clients to achieve a successful sale of their home and a Buyer's dream of homeownership. Gwen is continuously remaining educated with real estate trends, serving as the Chair to the Prescott Area Association Education Committee in 2013 and 2014. She was given the President's Award for Outstanding Service to the Association in November 2014. She continues to work hard at gaining your business and is looking forward to meeting you!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Jerry Butterbrodt, Associate Broker

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
I really have real estate in my heart and soul. I have been in the business for 30+ years. Starting out as a young girl working in my families real estate brokerage. As a young adult, I have worked in the title and escrow fields before obtaining my Real Estate License. I not only have knowledge and experience of selling you your dream home or knowing the market to list your existing property, I can also make sure the transaction will run smoothly all the way to closing. My greatest accomplishment in my career has been making sure my clients move forward with their dreams and new adventures. There is no greater joy in this profession than helping a homeowner sell their property so that they can go forward with their new beginnings, or helping a buyer find the perfect home and community for their family to start their new memories. I work hard to negotiate the best deal for your circumstances. I understand that every real estate deal is unique and it takes knowledge, care, and persistence to get the job done. But oh boy is it worth the smiles and satisfaction at the completion! I can't wait to help you, your friends and family too!
New Beginnings~New Home~New Memories

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Josh, Realtor, is originally from Pennsylvania and has lived in a number of other beautiful places. He’s made Prescott his home coming most recently from Los Angeles, CA. Before becoming a Realtor, Josh was a bartender at The Roosevelt Hotel - a famous historical high-end hotel in the heart of Hollywood. What he loved most about bartending was working with people and building relationships which has helped make for an easy transition into Real Estate. After spending a few years in the hustle and bustle of a big city Josh missed the warmth and sense of community a smaller town has to offer. He couldn’t help but fall in love with Prescott's charm after visiting friends that live here. Since making Prescott his home he is really enjoying the people, scenery, hiking trails, camping, as well as the wonderful eateries, shops and events in town. He looks forward to being your Realtor and assisting you with all your home purchasing needs. Josh has a lot of knowledge to share through his personal experience of relocating to Prescott and taking in all it has to offer!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
My name is Theresa deSoto and I have lived in Arizona since 2003 and the Prescott area since 2006. I am enthusiastic about the Quad-City area and have a passion for getting to know people and connecting with them on a personal level. I am high energy, friendly and driven. Prior to selling real estate, I ran my own house cleaning business. I have a Master of Arts in Theology and a Bachelor of Christian Education. I have also been involved in my community through volunteering at a local college in administration, teaching and public speaking.
Whether you are looking for your dream home or selling your current home, I am the perfect choice in a real estate professional. My company, Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate (BHGRE), is a name that is not only known globally but that you can trust with your real estate needs. I have been a part of some of the top producing teams in the nation. In 2019, I stepped out on my own and formed a husband-and-wife team. In 2018 and again in 2019, I received the Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Silver Award; in 2020, I received the Gold Award with my company for being a top-producing agent nationally. I have earned my designation for being a Certified Negation Expert (CNE), and my expertise will benefit you greatly.
When listing your home, I not only bring my own expertise to the table, but I also have a team of highly-trained marketing personnel that lead and guide me in marketing your home with state-of-the-art tools. My marketing plan may include a combination of the following:
CMA (Comparable Market Analysis) – An examination of the prices at which similar properties in the same area recently sold to help you obtain the highest possible price for your home. Yard sign – Attracts drive-by traffic as well as assists in locating the property. Professional Photos – Enhancing the best features of the home inside and out. Virtual Tours - Up to date technology for show casing your house. Flyers/QR Code – Property details by paper and smart phone technology. Open House – A designated time for the home to be open for viewing by potential buyers. Enhanced Listing – Advertising on MLS, Realtor.com, Zillow and Trulia for listing details, photos/virtual tour. Syndication – Listing will be shared with over 700 real estate websites internationally. “Just Listed” Postcards – Announcing your new listing. Market Meeting Tour – Invitation to fellow agents to share your listing. Negotiating on your behalf for the best offer. If you are looking to buy a home, I not only negotiate on your behalf for the best deal, but I also walk you through the process of buying your home from start to finish. As a Real Estate Professional, I am dedicated to providing caring and professional assistance to each client. I really enjoy and excel at helping people with their real estate goals, whether selling your current property or finding your dream home…... Or both! These qualities help make me a great choice as your Real Estate Agent.
Making dreams come true…..one home at a time!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I have been married for 11 years and have 3 kids. I have my own interior design business called Harbour Interiors and a local staging company called Southern House. I have a passion for real estate and all my businesses revolve around “all things home”

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Karyn Finnell grew up by the ocean, so she thought she needed to live near water to be happy – but Arizona’s natural beauty proved her wrong. She now proudly calls the Grand Canyon State home, and makes it possible for others to do the same.

Born and raised in Redondo Beach, California, Karyn lived in Massachusetts for 10 years before deciding to swap snow for sunshine. 17 years ago, Karyn and her husband moved to Prescott. This is a decision they’ve never regretted.

“It’s a quaint, beautiful little town surrounded by mountains. It’s so picturesque, no matter where you look.” Her love for the area is one of many reasons why she’s an outstanding real estate agent.

“I love what I do. I have so many friends who started out as clients. I enjoy finding interesting ways to connect with my buyers and sellers. Making those connections is really amazing.”

“There’s so much to do in Prescott, especially if you like being outside. We also have a lot of great restaurants and craft cocktail bars,” says Karyn. She loves the opportunity to introduce new people to all of the wonderful things that Prescott has to offer.

Karyn’s long list of happy clients will testify that she goes above and beyond for them, tapping into their needs and doing everything she can to help them achieve their real estate goals.

“I’m great at communication and follow-up, and I’m happy to help people navigate the process of buying or selling real estate. I share everything I know and I make sure they feel comfortable throughout every step of the process.”

Those aren’t empty words. Karyn truly commits herself to helping her buyers and sellers, even if it means staying up late to put their minds at ease.

“I don’t care if I’m sitting at my computer at 10 o’clock at night. I’m going to make sure my clients have what they need and know what the next steps in the process are.”

Karyn recalls one of her most memorable real estate transactions, when she helped a family find a home after other agents let them down.

“They had been living in a travel trailer for several months and had called other agents who didn’t really help them.” After getting Karyn’s information from a family member who was a past client, they called her. She was happy to help and jumped in feet first. Karyn managed to help them find them a great little home.

“They were so excited to purchase a home, and I was honored to play a role in that. Those opportunities make it all worthwhile!”

Life should be celebrated like a wonderful party. Let me help you celebrate one of life's major milestones by allowing me to help you buy or sell a home. Let's celebrate together!

If you’re looking to buy or sell a home in Prescott or surrounding areas, contact Karyn via email or give her a call at 928-499-2827. You can also follow her on Facebook!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Fun fact: I am a servant leader! That’s why I’ve always been so passionate about helping people fulfill their true potential.




When you’re ready to chat, you can reach out to me directly or just to save all of the back and forth, schedule a home showing on my website.


️WHAT I DO
It's been my ongoing mission to encourage the building of generational wealth through real estate. I began working for a real estate agent where clients experienced high-level real estate services and have been selling real estate since 2015.


️WHO I WORK WITH
I specialize in working with people who are looking to: Upgrade to a larger home Sell a home, townhouse or multifamily property Relocate to South Carolina Buy a luxury home and have a concierge experience.
️WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT

To bring a modern, fresh approach to real estate where our team strives to eliminate the friction, overwhelm, stress, smoke and mirrors of real estate. I am committed to delivering a concierge level service to my clients and my marketing is never “hey, here’s my new listing” — it’s designed to give you a private club experience.


️WHY IT WORKS
Statistically speaking, 96% of home buyers start their home searches online so by using advanced marketing and laser targeting strategies online, we can attract buyers to my listings BEFORE they sucked into the black hole of Zillow, Redfin and other sites where your property will get lost amongst thousands of others.


️WHAT MY CLIENTS SAY
SaDarriel worked tirelessly to find us a home during a competitive market. We live out of town, so she did the running for us to find the right home for our daughter. -Barbara F., Client


️ HOW IT WORKS
Every single person has a fine distinction that makes each situation unique. That’s exactly why it all starts with a phone call where I can learn more about your goals and to get an idea of how I can serve you.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Keri Johnson works hard for her clients. The home buying process for Keri focuses on the person. The client’s needs and desires are Keri’s priority. It is more than a transaction, it is a relationship.
Keri’s background in banking and investments is a natural complement to a successful career in real estate. Beginning as real estate agent over three years ago, Keri has been with BloomTree for the full three years.
We Love Prescott Keri’s life as a military wife, multiple moves, and living all around the country, even in Guam, give Keri an appreciation for the moving and home buying process. Keri is done moving, and is now planted firmly in Prescott and enjoys the beauty of the town, calling Prescott her home. Six years ago her husband retired from the military and accepted a position at the VA hospital in Prescott. They have declined many promotions that would take them away from Prescott. As a family they know that Prescott now home. “We love Prescott!”
As recent empty nesters, with three kids in college, Keri has enjoyed the added time to dedicate to her real estate career. Her natural administrative talents make the real estate transaction efficient. Let Keri make your home buying and selling process an enjoyable experience.
Keri Johnson, REALTOR® (928) 642-3823

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
You will quickly identify my passion for real estate. I became a real estate professional and I have been a top producing agent in Northern Arizona. My abundant energy, creativity, dedication and Real Estate wisdom drive my passion to fulfill the needs and goals of my clients. My know-how brings peace of mind to my clients. In my practice of Real Estate he is known for outstanding client service, consistent communication and strong attention to detail. I initiate communication in every aspect of the transaction from the first phone call, all the way to the completion of the transaction; I strives to take the pressure off of you; teach and guide you so you can make clear and concise choices throughout the process. I loves to meet people where they are; with their absolutely unique situation and help guide them through their choices and help them get to where they want to be! I hand over the keys to a dream come true! I love it! I offer seamless assistance to you for every aspect of your Real Estate Transaction. Leveraging my experience as a successful business professional with personal touches and blended with high tech marketing techniques. I am a skilled negotiator with my client’s best interest in the forefront. I use my experience and foresight to proactively address details before they become an unwanted issue. I have worked with clients as far ranging as his next door neighbor to world renown scientists. I am trusted on all levels. This has translated to a strong loyal repeat clientele and is the driving reason why I finds success so easily.
It’s about the people, not the agent. I have refined listening skills so that I can hear what is important to my clients. Also, equally important at times, I can identify and address what isn’t being said.
I enjoys the people, seasons, culture and the many outdoor activities available to him in his community. I love to read a wide and varied selection of literature, cook & eat, exercise, seek adventure in the outdoors, skiing, camping, fishing, horses and dogs.
I am a firm believer in giving back. I give to various charities from the Salvation Army to Big Brothers Big Sisters. I stepped away from Real Estate for a few years to lend assistance to his elderly mother when she was in need. While doing that, I met man who was destitute. I befriended him and I was able to get him medical assistance that he needed at that time. He was evaluated by medical professionals who found that he suffered from organic cognitive brain disorder. I was then able to guide him through the complicated process of filing for Social Security Disability process. The man was declared legally disabled. He now receives social security benefits and he enjoys a stable living environment, money to buy food, medical coverage and peace of mind.
By making an industry leap to real estate from a position with an auditing firm and holding the position of Senior Field Auditor, I quickly found professional success in Resort Sales on the East Coast and then merged all of those skills into a successful Real Estate career working with buyers and sellers of single family homes, condominiums, ranches and land sales in Northern Arizona. I recognize that each property is unique, therefore each marketing proposal must be specifically tailored to the property. I offer advanced marketing strategies joined with uncompromising integrity and savvy negotiating skills are the hallmarks of my service.
Please call me anytime without obligation. I am ready to go to work for you today! I am your Go To Agent!
Tenaciously protecting my client’s interests!
Prior to earning licensure for selling Real Estate and after attending Rutgers University and graduating from Montclair State University of the Greater New York area with a degree in Business Administration with a concentration in Finance, I was a Senior Field Auditor.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: As a Real Estate professional in the Prescott Arizona and Quad City area I strive to meet the needs of each client I serve with integrity and excellence. My experience includes owning vacation rentals and remodeling numerous projects as well as selling Real property. My professional and personal experience in Real Estate transactions equips me to offer you a white glove experience that you would expect from the very best. I promise to give you the attention you deserve and trust you would expect when listing your property or helping you find that perfect place to call home.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Lifelong resident of Florence, SC and a graduate of Coastal Carolina University with a bachelors degree in Business and Marketing. I work alongside my father in developing residential neighborhoods in the city of Florence and surrounding areas. This experience led me to pursue a career in Real Estate. Partnering with builders to list and sell Residential homes on the newly developed lots has become my expertise. I thoroughly enjoy working with buyers to find their next home, whether that be new construction or a fixer upper. My experiences range from listing and marketing residential lots, vacant land, farms, commercial land, New construction houses, existing homes, investment properties, and many more. I consider myself an outgoing people person that loves the outdoors and spending time with family and friends. This is one of the main reasons I enjoy real estate and working with buyers and sellers, because I become friends with most of my clients. I'm always looking forward to helping anyone with their future Real Estate needs.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I have called Prescott home for nearly 12 years, during which time I have grown quite fond of this great city. The small town environment has been a wonderful place for my three children, who are involved in many extracurricular activities. I have participated in community service in various arenas, including my children's schools and activities. Therefore, I am well connected and knowledgeable with regard to all that Prescott has to offer, and I share this information with clients relocating to the area. Working as a real estate professional is a great fit for me, since I enjoy all aspects of working in the real estate market, and I truly relish assisting people through every step of the home buying or selling process. I am a hard worker who is dedicated to serving my clients. I am a graduate of the University of California, Irvine and have a doctoral degree from the California School of Professional Psychology. I am a veteran of the United States Navy, having worked as a clinical psychologist stationed in Virginia and Yokosuka, Japan. My background as a psychologist serves me well in the real estate business. It has taught me to be a good listener and has prepared me to handle various situations in a compassionate, effective, and professional manner. Given my military background, I know the challenges of moving and settling into a new area, and I look forward to assisting your family.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Wayne is a lifelong Midwest resident and grew up in a small town in northwest Indiana. After college he moved to St Louis and spent over 40 years in the banking, real estate, and credit industries. Wayne’s extensive real estate and business expertise has taught him to anticipate unforeseen obstacles and to prepare sound solutions to quickly and creatively overcome them to help simplify your selling/buying experience. Wayne considers a positive outcome his most important goal and he has the experience to make sure your needs are met.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Chris and Zena are with Better Homes and Garden Real Estate BloomTree Realty, Commercial and Residential. They are here to help you with any Commercial Real Estate sales, leasing, business brokering and residential buyer and seller representation.
Together, they have 10 years of experience as Realtors in the Prescott area. Along with their experience, they have owned small businesses. Chris has been in the area since 2002. He obtained a Bachelor of Science degree in Exercise Science from ASU in 1999. He spent time in Law Enforcement for 8.5 years in the Prescott area. His is a chairperson for VAREP (Veteran’s Association of Real Estate Professionals). Zena has lived in the Prescott area since 1996. She graduated from NAU with a Bachelor of Science in Dental Hygiene. She is the President of VAREP (Veteran’s Association or Real Estate Professionals).
Chris and Zena are real estate warriors and will put their education and experience to work for you.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
My Name is Andrés deSoto, but most folks call me Andy. I moved to Arizona from California in the early 2000s. and my wife, Theresa, and I fell in love with Arizona early on. The flora and fauna, the unique blue skies and clouds are truly breathtaking.
I grew up in Southern California and the High Desert area. My family was in the restaurant business my whole life. Our family business, Casa de Soto Mexican Restaurant was a Garden Grove icon for 43 years. In addition, I managed restaurants for corporations including Carrow’s, Coco’s and Chili’s. It was Chili’s that brought me to Arizona. I landed in Flagstaff and managed the unit there for a few years before the company located me to Prescott Valley in 2006. I have since moved on from the food and beverage industry and have been working at Bucky’s and Yavapai Casinos as a Shift Manager since 2013. Whatever profession I am in, it seems to revolve around people and taking care of their wants and needs. Therefore, it was a natural progression to join Theresa in real estate. With some down time during the unique year we had in 2020, I studied and received my real estate license and we became The deSoto Team. Theresa has a wealth of experience and time as a seasoned agent, and together we are able to help clients achieve their goals.
When listing your home, I not only bring my own skills to the table, but I also have and a team of highly trained marketing personnel that lead and guide me in marketing your home with state-of-the-art tools. My marketing plan may include a combination of the following:
CMA (Comparable Market Analysis) Yard sign – Attracts drive-by traffic as well as assists in locating the property. Professional Photos – Enhancing the best features of the home inside and out. Virtual Tours - Up to date technology for show casing your house. Flyers/QR Code – Property details by paper and smart phone technology. Open House – A scheduled period of time is designated for the home to be open for viewing by potential buyers. Enhanced Listing – Advertising on MLS, Realtor.com, Zillow and Trulia for listing details, photos/virtual tour. Syndication – Listing will be shared with over 700 real estate websites internationally. “Just Listed” Postcards – Announcing your new listing. Market Meeting Tour – Invitation to fellow agents to share your listing. Negotiating on your behalf for the best offer. If you are looking to buy a home, I not only negotiate on your behalf for the best deal, but I also walk you through the process of buying your home from start to finish. As a Real Estate Professional, I am dedicated to providing caring and professional assistance to each client, whether selling your current property or finding your dream home…... Or both! These qualities help make me a great choice as your Real Estate Agent.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I was born and raised in South Carolina. I received my Bachelors Degree in Biology from Francis Marion University. I am a mother to 2 amazing children and enjoy spending quality time with family. My interest for real estate began during the process of purchasing my own home and i decided to make it my career a few years later. I have a passion for helping other people and love to see others Achieve their dreams. My goal as a Realtor is to deliver a professional and seamless experience to all my clients while sharing my passion for real estate.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Jennifer Perry
I am a Real Estate agent at BHGRE BloomTree Realty. Originally from New York City, I am known for my unique and insightful approach to Real Estate in the Scottsdale and Prescott, Arizona greater areas. I combine my extensive background in Business Communications and Hotel/Restaurant Management with a rich tapestry of life experiences, including my time at Yelp and various entrepreneurial endeavors. This diverse journey has equipped me with a deep understanding of the market and an exceptional ability to connect with clients on a personal level. My approach to Real Estate is characterized by a dedication to understanding and fulfilling clients' unique needs, ensuring that each property transaction is not just a business deal, but a meaningful journey towards finding a perfect home.
Living in Scottsdale and Prescott for over 25 years, my approach to Real Estate is deeply influenced by my holistic and wellness lifestyle. This lifestyle affords me a heightened sense of self awareness and an ability to connect with others, fostering an environment of intentional collaboration. My focus extends beyond the physical aspects of a property. I engage with clients to understand their energy and needs, aiming to facilitate a process that achieves the highest and best outcome for everyone involved in the journey of buying a home. My goal is to be a trusted partner in all aspects of selling and buying and to create a joyful process!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: My family has been in the Prescott area for four generations. In the 1950s, my grandfather purchased land East of Prescott in the pines of Groom Creek and built a home. My parents met while attending Northern Arizona University (NAU) and I was born. In the 1970s, my grandfather again purchased land in Prescott Valley and started a business “Burt’s Nursery. I worked there during the summers building greenhouses and learning about native plant species while watering plants, pulling weeds and piling rocks. I met my wife while attending NAU and started our family. In the 1990s, my parents retired from careers in education and moved to Groom Creek and built a home next to the family homestead. Both my sons met their wives while they attended NAU and then moved to Prescott. My eldest works at the hospital and recently opened a business in Prescott, “Tri-City Aesthetics & Wellness.” We are a family of hardworking, honest entrepreneurs who love each other and serve others. I earned a degree in Mechanical Engineering and a Master of Divinity. I have owned several businesses, including a contracting company, a home inspection business, a home remodel and a repair company (Handy Randy), and now I am a REALTOR with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate (BHGRE) – Bloomtree Realty. With a background of gardening and home improvement, Better Homes and Gardens has been a staple in my family's homes for over 70 years. I am a member of the National Association of Realtors (NAR) and from them have earned the Graduate REALTOR Institute (GRI), Senior Real Estate Specialist (SRES), Real Estate Negotiations Expert (RENE) designations and am currently working to complete the Accredited Buyer Representative (ABR) and Pricing Strategies Advisor (PSA) designations. Please allow me to use my expertise to serve your real estate needs in all of Yavapai County. Sincerely, Randy Schafer LLC, GRI, SRES, RENE

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Having lived and worked in the Prescott area since 2006 I am very familiar with the market and trends in both sales and purchases of properties in all of the Quad Cities area, with a special focus on Prescott. I will be readily available for comments, questions or concerns via email, text or phone call and I pledge to respond within 24 hours. A little personal information about me: I am a former 911 ambulance Paramedic, have a past career in Technology working with lawyers and was a Food and Beverage Manager for several years on a resort property in Redondo Beach, CA. How my past experience translates is that I am used to handling multiple deadlines at once, I know how to handle different personalities and I never panic under pressure. You can be assured that my negotiating skills will get you the best deal possible. I moved here from Covina, CA in 2006 and have loved every minute of living in our beautiful mile high city. I worked as a volunteer Park Ranger for Prescott for several years and thoroughly enjoyed learning about all of the outdoor activities available year around in this area. Entertaining, reading, hiking, bicycling, kayaking, and gardening are some of my particular areas of interest. Above all, helping people is what I enjoy the most. It is my goal to make sure you are taken care of in every area. To do this, I'm a part of a team of Realtors. With our business structure, we pool our expertise to make sure someone is always available for your needs. So please allow me to assist you in your search for the perfect home in the beautiful Quad City area or let me help alleviate the stress and pressure of selling the one you already own.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Worked at the University of South Carolina for nearly a decade before starting real estate career. Was named the first female Assistant Gamecock Club Director in school history. Started my real estate career in 2017. Married to Brandon (2018), daughter McClaine (4), son Gunnar (3), husky Grey (10). Brandon coaches baseball and football at Hammond School. We purchased a custom framing shop in December 2022.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:

title: Real Estate Salesperson

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am part of a mother/daughter team who have lived in the Pensacola area for over 25 years. We love Escambia and Santa Rosa counties and all it holds dear: the beaches, Blackwater River area, downtown Seville and surrounding areas and all the nooks and crannies in between(anyone up for a garage sale or flea market?). Look at Kristy Hintz's site for more info on the Hintz Team.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am a full time realtor since 2005 in the beautiful state of Florida, motivating the masses that they too can buy a home, sell their home, or become an investor in real estate properties. Helping buyers and sellers with their dreams in buying and selling property. Specializing in First time homebuyers. Very knowledgeable of various type of loans and programs to assist with down payment and closing cost. Covering Pensacola, Pace, Milton, Gulf Breeze, Navarre, and Fort Walton Beach. title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Hi, how are you doing? To start off, I'd like to thank you for dropping by. With a background in customer service, I strive to help others achieve their goals. In doing so, I work to build relationships that last. I'm privileged to take that journey with you when you're ready. As we build trust, it's my pleasure to share the knowledge and education needed to achieve your goals and building you and your family's legacy and finding your first or second home, that next investment property you've been dreaming about, or selling your home to start your next adventure in life.
