Relationships

Education
Achievements
Legacy
Keeping it REAL and making dreams an Legacy!

title: Sales Associate
description: Bringing your real estate dreams into a reality is my passion. I believe in exceptional service and making the most of your time, because your time is valuable! I've been in the NW Florida area for over 35 years and am very familiar with the area, schools, local resources, and more. If you are looking for an expert in the area, look no further. I can help you sell your home, find a new home, or help you locate investment opportunities. The market is great right now and I am excited to show you all it has to offer.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Integrity-Knowledge-Dedication Allison moved to Prescott Everybody’s Hometown AZ with her family in 1995.
She grew up in Hilo Hawaii, where she became part of her family’s roofing and flooring business. It was this early exposure to the home building industry that led her to real estate sales. Allison got her real estate license in 2015 and signed on with a local new home builder for 6 years where she enjoyed helping her customers achieve their dream of finding the right new home for them.
Allison became a part of the BloomTree Realty after years in New Home Sales sector. With Allison’s expertise she will work with you to secure your dream of finding your new home. Please reach out to her for all your real estate needs.
License number: SA657755000

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
A lifelong resident of Hampton Roads, I enthusiastically started my Real Estate career in 2004 and I have SOLD several million dollars in real estate a year.


My extensive knowledge of the area and my finely tuned skills of the ever so changing real estate market, as well as my passion, tenacious personality, and enthusiasm for the real estate industry make me the Realtor to choose!


If you are relocating from across the country or across town, you will find that I share your same goals!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Hi!
I’m Lauren – mom, wife, U.S. Navy Veteran, lover of the outdoors, and Realtor®️ with Better Homes and Gardens Native American Group out of Virginia Beach, Virginia. I’m passionate about my clients— I pride myself in clear, concise communication and unparalleled dedication to help you Buy, Sell, or Invest in your next home!

After serving seven years as a Communications Officer in the United States Navy, I am proud to give back to the community as a certified Military Relocation Professional (MRP) to aid Service Member Buyers who are often buying their home sight-unseen and under a tight timeline.

Whatever your background, I look forward to getting to know you and ensure the process of buying or selling is enjoyable and you can enjoy your investment for years to come!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: ¡Pertenezco a Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate (la misma con los lindos cojines y velas en Walmart :), es una marca muy reconocida impulsada por la pasión, la autenticidad, la inclusión, el crecimiento y la excelencia! Como agente bilingüe, que se ha mudado de otro pais, puedo conectarme y comunicarme con personas de diferentes nacionalidades y comprender de primera lo emocionante pero tambien estresante que puede ser mudarse. Me aseguraré de escuchar con atención sus necesidades y prioridades. Y Luego, usare todas las herramientas que nos da Better Homes & Gardens, los recursos en línea, mi experiencia profesional y conexiones para lograr sus objetivos y superar sus expectativas. Espero poder ayudarlo pronto!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Hello! I am Celeste Davis, I have been a Realtor since November of 2002. Right as the Real Estate market started to escalate. I thoroughly enjoy my job and want to work for you. I give personal attention to you, in what you need and what you want. Let me be your Realtor.

title: Associate Real Estate Broker
description:
Philene is an Associate Broker with 20 years as a full-time real estate professional in the Hampton Roads area who offers honesty and integrity, along with determination and dedication. These are the core philosophies that she strives for in all aspects of life. Applying these principles in business has contributed to her being a top-producing real estate agent. Market knowledge, perseverance, and customer service skills will make your next real estate transaction a successful one.

Originally from the Bronx, New York, and has traveled to many places in and out of the United States as a military spouse. She values her experiences which further drives her commitment to service.
Visit my website at www.philenejames.com

title: Real Estate Broker
description:
Originally from San Diego, Cyndi moved to Hampton Roads in the late 1990's. While she considers herself very lucky for growing up in sunny Southern California, she absolutely loves Virginia and is happy to call it home. She lives at the beach with her husband and 3 children. They all love to surf, paddle board, swim & anything having to do with the water.


Cyndi has been a licensed Virginia Real Estate agent since 2006 & she has definitely realized her passion. Helping clients buy & sell their personal & investment homes is something Cyndi really enjoys. Cyndi has helped thousands of clients over the years, ranking in the top of agents in her area year after year.


Cyndi just recently made her way over to Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate- Native American Group after 13 years of owning her own boutique real estate brokerage. She says that there are a lot of factors that played into the decision to partner with BHGRE, but some of the main reasons are the amazing culture, the beauty of the brand, and opportunities offered from aligning with an international brand.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I hope to be Your Friend in Real Estate! As a 21 Year Veteran of the industry, I would be honored to serve you. When hiring an agent, you want to focus on the 3 "E's". These are as follows: Experience, Exceptional Marketing, & an Engaging personality. I'd like to review these three qualities with you now. Firstly, Experience: For the last 6 years, I have sold at least 150 homes a year in Hampton Roads. Typically more than this! My team was recently ranked 2nd in the world for Better Homes and Gardens. I'm mentioning these awards here in my bio because performance matters when working with a home sale. This is likely the largest sale of your life and you owe it to yourself to find someone that has the marketing prowess to set your home apart and the experience to make the process more enjoyable. Secondly, Exceptional Marketing: We currently use the most advanced and comprehensive real estate marketing company in the country to market our listings. I could go on and on here but you will be blown away with how we put your home in front of thousands of home buyers daily. I would be excited to review this in person. Lastly, Engaging Personality: My wife of 15 years still laughs at my jokes but more importantly I consider you to be my supervisor. While I am the leading expert in our area in real estate, I consider you to be my commanding officer. This is your home and I will treat it with the respect it deserves. I very much look forward to speaking to you soon!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
CEO and Co-Founder of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Native American Group. Susan Jenkins has managed and marketed over 5900 asset bank-owned properties and relocation transactions valuing over 1 Billion in total volume/sales.
I have excellent knowledge and past performance with Commercial Real Estate Properties marketing, selling, and leasing.

She is a descendant of Chief Journeycake from the Lenape Delaware Tribe. Hence, she chose the name, 'Native American Group' to give honor and respect to her family heritage. In 2009 she was selected as a listing broker for HUD and Freddie Mac Homesteps. She now continues to manage and market HUD-Raine, Freddie Mac/Homegenius, VRM- Secretary of Veteran Affairs and Shellpoint, Truman, Selene Finance, Fay Servicing, AMIP Management, and Dakota. In 2016 her firm was selected as a Cartus Relocation Broker and Navy Federal Credit Union Select Broker. Since then, she has been awarded the prestigious Champions Cup Realogy, Platinum Broker, Master’s Cup Finalist, NFCU Spirit Award, and NFCU Pinnacle Award. Susan Jenkins is proficient in perfecting the as-is values, repair values, and construction bids, gaining her a preferred Broker in the Greater Tidewater Hampton Road area. Commitment to supporting and enhancing the communities in which the #tribe operates. Her passion is to journey with others in collaboration, technology, emerging models, systems, and innovative structures to help better the lives of others and their communities. She's successfully guided the company to win the following awards and designations: Inc. 5000, Cartus Master’s Cup, Navy Federal Credit Union Spirit and Pinnacle Award, NFTS Cutlass Award, Real Trends Game Changer (Only Woman Owned firm awarded 2021), Cartus Platinum, #1 Team Real Trends VA, #1 Team Better Homes, and Gardens Real Estate International, Top 20 Brokers Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate, Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate International Diversity Award and Community Involvement Award, VRM Gold Premier and Mega Diamond Team HRRA.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
My goal as an agent is to make your experience unique to you and your family and to ensure all my clients feel like they are my top priority. MY FOCUS IS ON YOU!!
I am a New England native who in 2014, relocated to Hampton Roads for my husband's job. We left our life and family behind and moved to Williamsburg with our 2 school age children and our beloved rescue dog, a retired ex-racer named Gronk.
While living in New England, I worked as a Realtor for 10 years having held my license in Massachusetts and New Hampshire. After moving to Virginia I got my Virginia Real Estate License and worked in Real Estate for about a year, before putting my license on hold to become better acquainted with Virginia and the Williamsburg Community.
During my period away from Real Estate, I started teaching Group Fitness classes at a local gym, where I can still be found when I'm not helping people buy or sell their homes. I also worked as a Mortgage Loan Officer at Navy Federal Credit Union. While at Navy Federal I became very knowledgeable in the Mortgage side of Real Estate transactions having handled VA, Conventional and New Construction Loans. This experience has given me a unique perspective on Real Estate having seen it from multiple different perspectives.
I have seen all this area has to offer. With my experience in Mortgages, representing both buyers and sellers and personal experience in relocating to a new area with CARTUS, I am confident I can help you find your HOME here in the Hampton Roads Area.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
I am dedicated to providing exceptional real estate service to my clients. I value the relationships that are built and always work relentlessly on my client's behalf to help them achieve their real estate goals.
I provide clients with trusted resources to help them navigate the Buying and Selling process and personally guide them step by step. A Realtor for over 25 plus years and local resident of Hampton Roads, I am pleased to be your trusted real estate advisor. I provide great care to our Military Service Members, Corporate Relocations, First Time Home Buyers, Seasoned Buyers/Sellers, and those seeking a newly constructed home.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: As a lifelong resident of the Hampton Roads area, I am deeply committed to our community. With a background in government contracting, I have supported the region’s robust military presence, cultivating a profound respect for those who serve. This admiration, combined with my passion for Coastal Virginia's real estate, inspired me to pursue a career in the industry, culminating in obtaining my Virginia real estate license. At Better Homes and Gardens, I embraced the "Going Vertical" mindset, which emphasizes growth and impact. My philosophy is simple: it’s not about rising or falling, but about making a difference in the lives of others. Outside of my professional endeavors, I have cultivated discipline through martial arts, earning two black belts over a dedicated 15-year journey. Additionally, my experience as a 6’7” athlete in basketball has instilled in me the values of teamwork and perseverance

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
My purpose as your real estate agent is to help build and increase your wealth whether buying or selling. I want to increase your knowledge now and help guide you into the future with your real estate endeavors. Experience matters, I have been licensed since January 2004, that's over 19 years of experience working for you. I have built a reputation with Real Estate Companies and Realtors worldwide who recommend me to their clients relocating to the South Hampton Roads area. I close an average of 60 homes a year, selling 20 million plus a year. I am rated in the top 1% of Agents locally and in the Top 50 Women in Business locally. I am locally born and raised. I know the market, the neighborhoods, the cities, the schools. I keep excellent relationships with local builders and Realtors. Building relationships and communication is key in my success as a realtor. I am a Diamond award-winning Realtor through the Hampton Roads Realtor Association.
In today's changing market you need someone you can trust that will negotiate and (respectfully) close the deal. Whether you're a first-time home buyer or a seasoned investor, you owe it to yourself to meet with me and discuss how we can work together to achieve your upmost success in selling your home!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Michael worked in the corporate world for twenty years and law enforcement and as a firefighter/paramedic for ten. He has been a Pastor and working in ministry since 2015. Licensed in 2018, has built a strong reputation for integrity and honesty and excellent service. Michael knows the Hampton Roads area well and will take good care of you.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
About Kevin Monette!
Kevin Monette epitomizes integrity, energy, hard work and creative service in every detail of your Real Estate transaction. Kevin has been in sales for the past 18 years and has been in Real Estate for the past 10 years. Prior to Real Estate, Kevin was a small business owner in the Life Insurance industry and traveled the US to hire, train, motivate and monitor sale's agents, while also negotiating leases for new agencies. Kevin also served 12 years in the US Army and was medically discharged. This service to the Armed Services offered Kevin the personal knowledge of what it is like to move as a military member with his family.
Why is Kevin Monette different?
By leveraging his experience as a small business owner and military service, Kevin is known for his outstanding client service, 24/7 availability, high tech marketing techniques, personal touches, leadership and his skills as a negotiator with his client's best interest at heart. Kevin believes that it is not only his duty to represent his clients to the best of his ability, but to also educate them throughout every step of the process, armed with top notch information and market insights, so that his clients make the best decision possible. Kevin is honest, sometimes telling his clients things they might not want to hear. Kevin however is extremely knowledgeable about the local Real Estate market in the Hampton Roads. Area's Kevin specializes in are Virginia Beach, Chesapeake, Norfolk, Suffolk, Portsmouth, New Port News and Hampton.
Kevin believes in giving back!
Kevin is a firm believer in giving back. He is an active member in his church and serves as the Captain for the evening service hospitality team. Kevin also is involved with different ministries the church conducts such as: serve the city, divorce care ministry, and small group discussions.
Kevin's Free Time?
Kevin is a family man with a devotion to God, his beautiful wife, children and grandchildren. Kevin enjoys anything to do with the water such as: swimming, kayaking, boating, fishing and camping by the water to name a few. Kevin and his wife love to be in the woods hiking through mountains and exploring the wildlife. It is such a joy to them both. Kevin also enjoys traveling, meeting new people and seeing new things. Kevin has traveled a lot of the world but continues to have a bucket list of new places he plans to visit.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Tyler has lived in the Hampton Roads area for 30 years and specializes in helping people relocate. He takes pride is customer service and transparency within the process. He enjoys real estate and it shows with his work ethic and attitude. Tyler is a manager of the Friends In Realty Team with Better Homes and Gardens.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Meet Tony Periman, a Virginia Beach local with a passion for real estate and the great outdoors. After over a decade in the banking world, where he honed his skills in management and mortgage, Tony transitioned into the exciting realm of real estate. With a solid background in finance and a knack for putting people at ease, he’s your go-to guy for all things home-related.
Tony’s not just about transactions; he’s about building relationships. As an Army Cavalry Scout veteran, he knows the value of commitment and integrity. Now, with his wife, a dedicated public school teacher, Tony is raising two awesome kids while navigating the real estate scene.
When he’s not closing deals or helping folks find their dream homes, you’ll likely find Tony and his family exploring the wonders of national, state, or city parks. Running, biking, hiking – you name it, they’re up for the adventure. With Tony, it’s not just about buying or selling; it’s about finding a home that fits your lifestyle.
Hardworking, reliable, and trusted, Tony Periman is your friendly neighborhood realtor, making waves in Virginia Beach and beyond. So, if you’re on the lookout for a professional with a personal touch, Tony’s your man.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Realtor for 13 years in the Hampton Roads Area, Class A Contractor/Builder for 5 years, Avid music and animal lover, people person, friendly, hardworking, and focused on client needs. Love to share my experience and listen to others, humble, honest, down to earth, able to assist in a variety of real estate needs.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am a full time realtor since 2005 in the beautiful state of Florida, motivating the masses that they too can buy a home, sell their home, or become an investor in real estate properties. Helping buyers and sellers with their dreams in buying and selling property. Specializing in First time homebuyers. Very knowledgeable of various type of loans and programs to assist with down payment and closing cost. Covering Pensacola, Pace, Milton, Gulf Breeze, Navarre, and Fort Walton Beach. My goal is to serve each client by providing 100% customer service and to far exceed each client's expectations.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Hi, how are you doing? To start off, I'd like to thank you for dropping by. With a background in customer service, I strive to help others achieve their goals. In doing so, I work to build relationships that last. I'm privileged to take that journey with you when you're ready. As we build trust, it's my pleasure to share the knowledge and education needed to achieve your goals and building you and your family's legacy and finding your first or second home, that next investment property you've been dreaming about, or selling your home to start your next adventure in life. Keeping it REAL and making dreams a Reality is my goal.
Mission Statement

To serve by building relationships that educate others to achieve a Legacy.

Relationships

Education
Achievements
Legacy
Keeping it REAL and making dreams an Legacy!

Call or Email me if you have any questions in your buying or selling journey!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
I am a Hampton Roads resident of more than 20 years, and have lived in Virginia Beach, Norfolk, and Chesapeake. Originally from Moncks Corner, South Carolina, I lived in 9 different states and have both personal and professional experience and knowledge of the many challenges of relocation and real estate transactions. Throughout my life, multiple moves to different areas of the country taught me the importance of agents helping clients find the perfect home of their own. I partner creatively with my clients to assess and understand their needs and represent their best interests. Creatively exceeding your expectations is my goal.
Before becoming a real estate agent, I specialized in human resources management, specifically staffing, safety, and training and development, in a variety of organizations. I successfully homeschooled 2 daughters and taught a variety of homeschool classes at a local co-op for 8 years. I was a member of the Coast Guard Auxiliary in Norfolk for 5 years, and served as personnel officer, boating safety instructor, and vessel examiner. I enjoy reading and fishing – both fresh and saltwater. My husband Chris and I are both graduates of the University of South Carolina. We have been blessed with 2 daughters, one son-in-law, and one grand-dog.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
As a military spouse for the past 27 years, Jess obtained a wealth of experience in Accounting, Business & Office Management, Banking, Sales & Customer Service, Food Service, Patient Access and Child and Youth Programs. With her background, she is excited to announce that she is carrying over these same skills, qualities and principles with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Main Street Properties.
With loyalty, integrity and professionalism, she is devoted to:

* Taking the time to listen and learn about client needs, wants and desires
* Studying the market to help clients when buying and selling
* Using very innovative marketing plans and buying/selling techniques.
Whether you are looking to buy and/or sell a home, acreage or an investment property, Jess will take the time necessary to "HELP YOU ACHIEVE YOUR GOALS".

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am part of a mother/daughter team who have lived in the Pensacola area for over 25 years. We love Escambia and Santa Rosa counties and all it holds dear: the beaches, Blackwater River area, downtown Seville and surrounding areas and all the nooks and crannies in between(anyone up for a garage sale or flea market?). I have been in real estate for almost 20 years and Kristy for four. We both love working with people and helping them find their dream home or selling their home to move on to their next dream. Look at Kristy Hintz's site for more info on the Hintz Team.

title: Sales Associate
description: Bringing your real estate dreams into a reality is my passion. I believe in exceptional service and making the most of your time, because your time is valuable! I've been in the NW Florida area for over 35 years and am very familiar with the area, schools, local resources, and more. If you are looking for an expert in the area, look no further. I can help you sell your home, find a new home, or help you locate investment opportunities. The market is great right now and I am excited to show you all it has to offer.

title: Centerville, OH
description: My goal as a Realtor is to make home finding and selling for my clients as easy and stress free as possible. I feel my clients need to be updated throughout the entire home buying and selling process. I answer all questions thoroughly and as timely as possible. I also feel the follow up after each transaction is very important to make sure each client is fully satisfied with the service provided.

title: Delaware, OH
description: Because Experience Does Matter... I have 20+ years of experience as a full-time Realtor® and 5 previous years as an Office Manager of a successful Real Estate Team. This experience has provided me with extensive knowledge of all avenues of real estate transactions; from creative financing to investment strategies. I feel blessed to say, that I love my job and helping each person, family, investor, or organization fulfill their real estate dreams. I've been a resident in Delaware County for the 35 years and think that central Ohio is one of the very best places to live. Living and loving the area affords me first hand knowledge of the vast growth we continue to experience daily here in Central Ohio and I want to share it with you. My Realtor, My Friend..... Real Estate is a unique business. I have the opportunity to meet and help all types of people through what can be a very exciting, yet stressful time. Nothing gives me greater joy than assisting my clients in achieving their goals by selling their home or helping them find a new home. No two sales are alike, some easier than others, and I've had some deals that we didn't think would close. The challenges that can arise are exhilarating, and I find it extremely rewarding to make something happen for my clients that they thought could not be accomplished. Regardless of the ease or complexity of your situation, you can rely on me to give 110%. Most of my business is built upon referrals of past clients. Therefore, I take pride in exceeding my client's expectations, as my goal is to become your "Realtor for Life."

title: Delaware, OH
description: I believe that each client should be treated with honesty, integrity and respect and that each transaction should be win-win to be successful. While you are looking for your new home, or thinking of selling your current home there are a variety of options that are available to you in this current market. Finding the right person to guide you through that process is crucial to success.

title: Clayton, OH
description: CONGRATULATIONS JOHN ! RECIPIANT OF THE 2009-2010 100% CUSTOMER SATISFACTION SURVEY AWARD ! We have 9 offices in Ohio and Indiana. I can meet at any office thats convenient for you. Skilled negotiations and ability to gain proper insight into your particular situation can mean thousands of dollars in your life when all is said and done. You have nothing to loose buy requesting an interview. You do have lots to gain. I'll tell you frankly if I don't think I can help you. Our time is valuable. THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN SUCCESS AND FAILURE MAY BE THE BROKER REPRESENTING YOU!

title: Centerville, OH
description: My name is Todd Grandin. I am a full time buyer & listing specialist with The Jon Murray Group of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate. I have over 20 years experience in real estate, construction and remodeling. Let me put that experience to work for you. It is my honor to help the military find a new home or assist with the successful marketing of your existing home. The Jon Murray Group sells a house every business day. If you are buying or selling now or in the next 5 years let me put my skills to work for you. Thanks, Todd

title: Eaton, OH
description: Devan Hafle of Better Homes and Gardens Big Hill Realty. Devan Hafle was born and raised in Preble County. He Graduated from Eaton High School in 2011 and obtained his Ohio Real Estate Sales license in the summer of 2012. He is currently a second year student at Sinclair Community College in Dayton Ohio working on his associate's degree in Real Estate and Property Management. Devan will graduate in the Summer of 2013 with his associate's degree. From there he plans to move on to his Bachelor's degree in Business. Devan has been a member of Sinclair's Deans list since He stated College in the fall of 2011, maintaining a 3.5 GPA and higher. Devan, partnered with his Father Steve Hafle, can help to accommodate any of your real estate needs.

title: Centerville, OH
description: I work with buyers and sellers in the counties of Montgomery, Warren, Greene, Butler, Clark, and Miami, primarily. I work with both seller and buyers. I work with residential and investment properties. I list bank REO's and have done this for nine years. I work with investors who are looking for distressed properties. I am available seven (7) days a week. You deal directly with me and not an assistant. If you need a free market analysis on your property contact me. I give you the service you deserve. I will be with my client all the way through the closing. After the closing I am available for service and consultation. I am a certified short sales Realtor.

title: Centerville, OH
description: I have lived in the Miami Valley my entire life. I now reside in Miami Township with my wife and daughter. I am a full time Realtor having always been associated with Better Homes and Gardens/Big Hill. Some of the areas I service are Kettering, Centerville, Oakwood, Bellbrook, Troy, Xenia, Huber Heights, West Carrollton, Miamisburg, Dayton, Wilmington, Springboro, Tipp City, Eaton and others. Through the years I have earned numerous awards for maintaining the highest level of excellence and I promise to deliver that same amount of professionalism to you.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Multi million dollar producer

Silver, emerald, platinum award winner

title: Centerville, OH
description: As a child, Jon was raised on a small farm in Lewisburg where he learned the value of hard work. Jon learned discipline and how to overcome adversity while he was a standout athlete at Tri-County North High School. While Jon was in high school, he worked in residential construction, building and remodeling houses. Helping to advise buyers and sellers on updating and remodeling projects turned out to be the perfect catalyst for Jon's real estate career. After high school, Jon attended Ohio Northern University where he earned a Bachelor of Science degree in Exercise Physiology. While at Ohio Northern, Jon was on the varsity football team as well the indoor and outdoor track teams. In addition, while at Ohio Northern, Jon was one of the top ranked power lifters in the world. After college, he worked in his field for a year and received several high paying job offers in New York. Jon loves the Miami Valley and just could not imagine moving away. So to have a stable income, Jon went back to building and remodeling houses where he became the foreman for AK Construction. While working in the construction field, Jon enjoyed the daily interaction with people who were considering building houses. When his boss started buying properties and fixing them up and selling them or renting them, Jon became motivated to purchase his own fixer upper house to renovate on the side. He enjoyed this type of work tremendously. Jon realized that if he got his real estate license, he could have better access to find the deals for himself and his boss. Jon went back to school and obtained his real estate license with the intention of just representing himself and family and friends. While renovating a house one weekend, Jon seriously injured his back on the job site. Since Jon could not physically work on houses anymore, he was forced to make the decision to work as a Realtor full time. Within a short period of time, Jon was so busy helping others buy and sell real estate that he never went back to work building houses. Within a year or so, Jon was representing so many buyers, sellers, and other investors that he stopped working on houses all together. Getting into real estate was a great decision for Jon because he has been one of the top agents in the area for several years and he and his partner were the top two agents in the entire company in 2009. Jon's honesty and unparalleled work ethic have made his past clients loyal supporters who tell everyone that they have to use Jon because he is the best Realtor they've ever worked with. Jon now lives in Kettering with his wife Jena who was his high school sweet heart. Living with them is their wild daughter Paige along with their first two furry kids, Max & Lily. (Fawn & Black Pugs.)

title: Eaton, OH
description: I have worked in the Real Estate Industry for the past 16 years. I have worked with all types of buyers and sellers. I have many repeat customers that are looking to downsize or move up. I have lived in Preble County all my life and am very familiar with Eaton and surrounding areas. I have worked two jobs for the past 25 years . I strive very hard to keep my Real Estate Clients number one. I do not work from 9 to 5. I try very hard to work with your schedule. So if you need a hard working realtor don't hesitate to call me.

title: Associate Real Estate Broker
description: Carl and Kathi Petelle, long time Miami Valley residents, have recently relocated to BETTER HOMES and GARDENS Real Estate Big Hill. Carl and Kathi spent many years operating their Dayton area lawn and landscape business. They began their careers in real estate in 2007 so that they could continue to use their customer service skills. They live in West Alexandria on their mini-farm. It was the excellent reputation and devotion to customers that prompted their recent move to Better homes and Gardens. Carl and Kathi are members of the Dayton and Cincinnati Boards of Real Estate, Richmond Indian Board of Realtors, as well as the National and Ohio Association of Realtors.

title: Centerville, OH
description: Guy M. Roth is a Broker/ Owner of Better Homes and Garden Real Estate Big Hill. Guy has a degree in Real Estate and Urban Analysis from The Ohio State University. He specializes in Residential and Commercial Real Estate sales. Guy has been selling Real Estate in the Greater Dayton area for over 30 years. He has and is serving on the local board of Realtors (DABR) as a Director, and as a Trustee at the State of Ohio board of Realtors (OAR). Guy has a clear and comprehensive knowledge of the local, state and national markets and further educates himself everyday. He is well known in his market for his experience, trustworthiness and attention to detail. Guy is a sales leader in his company and Board of Realtors, and receives annual awards for his production volume. He was selected as the DABR Broker/Owner of the year in 2000, and serves the public on the DABR Professional Standards and Grievance Committees. Guy comes from a Real Estate family, with his father having been a builder and Realtor, two brothers whom are partners with him in Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Big Hill and his wife Susan, who is a mortgage loan officer. Guy plans his market strategy with client needs being his number one priority.

title: Centerville, OH
description: As the lead agent of Better Homes and Gardens John Murray Group, and a lifetime resident of the Dayton area, James is an expert in all areas related to the purchase and sale of your home. Through experience in all areas of the Miami Valley, whether you buy or sell, you can rest easy with James as your agent. Your family needs special attention and the time devoted to those special needs. James, along with the Jon Murray Group, is the right choice.
