GARDEN MORTGAGE, LLC and PERFORMANCE TITLE, LLC along with BETTER HOMES and GARDENS REAL ESTATE BIG HILL will make your real estate transaction a pleasant experience by offering everything needed to complete a successful transaction. Please Support our Troops and God Bless America.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Adele Sylvia was born and raised in central Louisiana. Alexandria is her hometown and she graduated from LSU with a degree in Business Administration. She had a successful career in the healthcare industry but in 2008 decided to pursue her passion for real estate. She’s been a real estate agent for 12 years. Adele learned the golden rule early in life to treat people the way they want to be treated. She takes the time to listen to her client’s needs. She’s committed to providing exceptional service and sound real estate advice while pairing clients with their dream homes. Whether you are buying or selling, she’s committed to helping you achieve your goals. She joined the Rhodes team in late 2019 and she’s excited about this opportunity. After 12 years, she still wakes up excited to go to work and help clients find the home of their dreams. Her drive to provide clients with excellent service is one reason her clients keep coming back.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Angela Chestovich graduated from Louisiana College with a Bachelor Degree in Elementary Education and Special Education. She continued her education studies and received a Masters Degree in School Guidance from Northwestern State University. She taught Special Education in Rapides Parish for 25 years before retiring. In 2021 she became a realtor and joined Rhodes Realty in August of 2022. She has been married to her husband Mike for over 30 years. Together they have three children and three precious grandsons. Her hobbies include hunting, fishing, reading and spending time with family. Angela looks forward to helping clients open doors to their future.

title: Real Estate Broker
description: Any golfer will tell you that on the course, it's essential to know your surroundings. Possessing a familiarity with how the prevailing wind affects a hole or how a putt will break on a green can make the difference between birdie and bogey. Scott Lincicome couldn't agree more. As a former professional golfer who competed on the mini tours and served as a club professional, Scott possesses an intimate familiarity with many of the country clubs, golf courses and communities throughout the Southern Pines region. It's this in-depth local knowledge and connection with influential people that makes Scott such a valued resource in Southern Pines and Pinehurst real estate. But that's not all that makes Scott a good guy to know. Scott's home course is the Country Club of North Carolina, where his grandfather was a founding member of the club. Scott was raised in Atlanta but spent a lot of time with his grandparents in Pinehurst, learning not only the finer points of golf, but life lessons in general. When he was four years old, he recalls his father and grandfather presenting him with "an old sawed-off club," and Scott quickly fell in love with the game. Buying or selling a home in Pinehurst or Southern Pines isn't something to be taken lightly. You need a local expert on your side, and no one fits that description better than Scott Lincicome.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Helen is currently a resident of Alexandria, LA. Having lived in Alexandria for the duration of her life, she is very familiar with the various neighborhoods. Helen has a degree in Communications and has worked in diverse fields without ever actually having to use said degree. After obtaining her real estate license in 2020, she has relished working with clients to fit each and every individual need. Helen is delighted to be a member of the Rhodes Realty team!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Growing up in Rural Evangeline Parish, Louisiana, I am the youngest of four siblings. I grew up playing basketball and baseball, all the way through High School. After finishing High School in 2004, I moved to Natchitoches, LA, which is the hometown of my wife, Casie. I spent over 15 years there and consider it my second home. We said our vows on May 1, 2006, and have reached so many life milestones during the last 18 years. We purchased our first home in 2006, and our first son, Ashton, was born in 2008. Our second son, River, came in 2015. We moved back to Evangeline Parish in 2020 and have spent that time establishing our businesses in a new area. Casie is a professional Photographer and started her business in 2012. She specializes in personal sales of her work. My work background covers a broad area of construction and electrical work. From residential homes to industrial workplaces, to management in Third Party services for on land Oil and Gas sites, I continue to use the knowledge and experience that I have gained to assist clients in my Real Estate career. I attended Northwestern State University in Natchitoches for a short time. During my enrollment there, I started out in the Nursing program to pursue an associate degree in nursing for an RN. After deciding to pursue my Real Estate License in 2017, I decided to change my major to Business, and studied in Multiple Business courses and Computer Science courses. I elected to work full time in Real Estate before attaining a degree, and I truly do not regret it. I love working with my clients and have gained the trust and appreciation of so many wonderful people since 2018.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Candy Ross is a dedicated real estate agent with a passion for helping individuals and families find their dream homes. With nearly two years of experience in the real estate industry, Candy has honed her skills in navigating the housing market and providing exceptional service to her clients. When she's not busy with real estate, she enjoys spending quality time with her daughter, engaging in various family activities, and creating cherished memories together. Her commitment to her family life reflects her dedication to creating warm, inviting spaces for her clients to call home. Candy’s love for helping people shines through in her work, as she goes above and beyond to understand her clients' unique needs and preferences. She takes great pride in guiding them through the process of buying or selling a home, ensuring a smooth and rewarding experience every step of the way.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I grew up in Marksville, La and I have been a resident of Pineville, La for almost 30 yrs. I am a mother first of 3 beautiful daughters. I graduated from Marksville High School in 1993. I studied Broadcast Journalism at Southern University in Baton Rouge and attended LSUA for Business. My work experience includes Waitressing, Management, Consulting, Residential Specialist, and I am currently also an Insurance Producer. My personal Goal in life is to always to be the best role model I can be for my daughters and to show them that anything is possible. My professional goals are always to make a difference in the lives of the people I service. I Value family because they always motivate me to be a better version of myself. My vision is to Inspire and Motivate my clients to accomplish their goals of successful homeownership and Real Estate. It’s my job to make the process as smooth as possible and give outstanding customer service. In my spare time, I have movie nights with the family. Sometimes we travel out of town on the weekend to shop and eat at our favorite restaurants. Last but not least I am a coffee lover!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: My name is Tina L. Williams, I'm currently employed with Rapides Parish School Board for 21 years. I'm married to my wonderful husband, Raymond Williams, he worked for Dresser Industries and is now retired after 44 years of service. Together we have seven adult children. We are proud members of the Buffalo Soldiers Motorcycle Club where I serve as chapter Treasurer. I'm a lifelong resident of Rapides Parish. I enjoy traveling, fishing, and meeting new people. I'm passionate about the goals that I set and my strategies to achieve them. I look forward to working together with individuals, families, and businesses to get the " Results That'll Move You"!! I pride myself on being the best that I can be for my clients, searching available resources to find what they want, and navigating the process as smoothly as possible.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Anita Dubois recently added the title of licensed real estate agent to her credentials and is excited about becoming a part of the Rhodes’ Team. She is currently Supervisor of Child Welfare and Attendance for the Natchitoches Parish School Board. A position she has held for the past 15 years. A lifelong educator, she has a passion for working with children, families and the community in general. Ms. Dubois earned her undergraduate and graduate degrees from Northwestern State University. She loves Natchitoches and living on the River. She has served and continues to serve on local Boards including CASA, FINS, Children and Youth Planning Board and the Planning and Zoning Commission. She is a member of Kiwanis and is on the Juvenile Court Teams. An avid real estate investor in her own right, she enjoys helping families and individuals in the community with their housing needs. She is passionate about family, friends, children and families. It is her pleasure to have the opportunity to serve you with your real estate needs.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I joined Rhodes Realty after a successful 21-year career in the Air Force. My military service did more than teach me about leadership. After living in 12 homes in 7 different states, I know houses well. I understands what to look for and what is the right fit for each situation. I'm skilled in leading large and small teams and managing multi-billion dollar projects and budgets. You can trust me with your housing and relocation needs. I will work tirelessly on your behalf.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Dane Terrell is a Natchitoches native. He bought his first property at the age of eighteen, around the same time he began working at Ivan Smith Furniture. Over the last 25 years, he has bought, sold, or managed millions of dollars in properties and is currently the manager at Ivan Smith Furniture in Natchitoches. After his family recently sold the majority of their real estate holdings, he decided to become a Realtor so that he could put his years of experience to work for others.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Haley Blount, Ed.D., is currently an Assistant Professor of Health & Human Performance at Northwestern State University, with a vast background of experience working in the higher education setting. She is also a realtor with our Natchitoches office, licensed since the Fall of 2021. Dr. Blount just completed her first full year as a real estate agent, closing nearly $4 million in sales, earning her first Top Producer award, and assisting 12 families in buying and/or selling their homes. She has an extensive array of experience in relationship building, marketing, sales, and sport management. Her 20+ years as a resident of Natchitoches have served her well as a real estate agent. Dr. Blount earned her B.S. in Health & Exercise Science from Northwestern State in 2006, her M.S. in Sports Administration in 2007, and her Ed.D. in Educational Leadership with a concentration in Higher Education Administration from Louisiana Tech in 2016. Prior to transitioning to being a full-time professor, Dr. Blount served as the Deputy Athletic Director and executive director of the Demons Unlimited Foundation until September 2021. In both roles, she solicited funds for the Alumni Association and Demons Unlimited Foundation, managed corporate partnerships, planned and coordinated alumni & athletic events, and oversaw all external areas of influence including marketing, tickets, social media pages, media relations, development, and facilities. Dr. Blount was a four-year competitor and former school record holder as a pole vaulter for the Lady Demons. She did an internship with USA Track & Field in 2007, serving as assistant producer of the AT&T USA Outdoor Championships in Indianapolis, and she also assisted with operations at the 2008 USA Olympic Trials in Eugene, Oregon. Dr. Blount is actively engaged in community service, having served as a board member for the Natchitoches Area Chamber of Commerce and co-chair of the A+ Coalition. She is a member of the Natchitoches Young Professionals (past president), as well as the past president of the Kiwanis Club of Natchitoches and past president of Les Amies Service Organization. She's also a member of the National Association of Kinesiology in Higher Education, and a recent graduate of the Leadership Natchitoches program. She is passionate about her family, her friends, her fur babies, her students, her clients, and helping others achieve their goals and dreams.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I'm India Rhodes, a passionate real estate agent dedicated to helping individuals find their perfect homes in Central Louisiana. Originally from Meraux, La, I made the move to Natchitoches in August of 2019, bringing my passion for helping people to the Rhodes Properties and Development team. In February 2020, I obtained my real estate license and joined Rhodes Realty, where I began to assist clients in navigating the exciting world of real estate. With my creative approach, extensive knowledge, and friendly demeanor, I strive to make every client's experience enjoyable and stress-free. Whether you're a first-time buyer or looking to sell your property, I'm here to help you achieve your real estate goals. Let's embark on this exciting journey together!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Hi, my name is Jamie Zimmerman. I was raised in the small town of Ragley, LA, just North of Lake Charles. After graduating from McNeese State University with a bachelor’s in education, I taught in DeQuincy for 4 years. After meeting my husband and getting married, I moved to Winnfield. While still teaching, I obtained my real estate license in March 2020. In my free time, I enjoy spending time with my family, shopping at flea markets, and crafting. I am excited about joining the Rhodes Realty family and serving my community and surrounding areas. After years of dealing with different real estate ventures, I am thrilled to be able to share my passion for real estate with others. Buying or selling a home is a huge life event and I look forward to helping others navigate this time.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I have over 15 years experience in the real estate industry. I started as an investor and added selling to my profile in 2016. I take pride in being efficient and readily available to my clients (sellers or buyers). My experience as an investor gives me a unique understanding of my clients needs to get the best price possible and "close the deal" as soon as possible. Also, I was the 1st realtor to join Rhodes Realty.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: As a lifelong resident of Avoyelles Parish, Justin is excited to serve the residents of CenLa for all their real estate needs. Justin’s professional background is in the highway and civil construction industry. Since graduating from University of Louisiana at Lafayette in 2008, he has been part of various construction and development projects throughout the state. Using the same high quality of service and professionalism Justin has developed over the last decade he is sure to meet and exceed the expectations of his clients. Justin, his wife Kristie, and their two sons reside in Hessmer, La where they enjoy being involved in the local community and serving its people. In their spare time, they enjoy camping, soccer, baseball, and doing anything that involves their kids.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Carley is a native from Cottonport, La in Avoyelles Parish. She graduated from LSUA in 2015 with a Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration. Carley spent 3 years working as a paralegal from Brian Caubarreaux and Associates. Her time at the law firm taught her excellent customer service, and a commitment to work hard, listen, and follow through. In 2018, Carley and her family dove into the home flipping market where they transformed multiple homes in Cenla. She decided to grow her real estate career by acquiring her real estate license. In her first year of real estate she received the Million Dollar Producer award and Top List Volume award by company. Carley is dedicated to listening to her clients’ needs and wants, making sure every client receives the finest customer service and honesty. She connects her local and global networks while utilizing keen and effective marketing strategies. Her enthusiasm and commitment to real estate and familiarity with the area will be assets to both buyers and sellers. “The entire aspect of real estate is truly my passion from buying to remodeling to selling”.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: My name is Justin Krouse and I would love to be a part of your real estate journey. I am a proud alumnus of Northwestern State University and a local business owner and I bring a deep understanding of the region's market. My real estate journey is more than a profession; it's a commitment to enhancing our community and helping people find their forever home, business or property. I've dedicated my time to revitalizing and transforming local historic buildings, blending passion with expertise in every project. Each of my business adventures has helped grow my passion for real estate and the unique experiences I've had makes me the ideal real estate partner for your next venture. This profession has helped me achieve goals for me and my family so that I’m able to help you reach yours. Whether you're a first-time home buyer, a seasoned investor, or seeking to revive a piece of history, you can count on my local insight and dedication to make your goals become a reality.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Hi! My name is Lakin Miller, I’m 30 Years old and I grew up in Alexandria, La! I moved to Natchitoches when I was 16. I spent one year going to NSU, then worked on the pipeline for 10+ years. As of today, I am the owner of Bayou Barbie Brows, where I do microblading and lip blushing and I am also a real estate agent. I look forward to dedicating myself to make my clients happy in helping them find their dream homes and properties!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: A native of Natchitoches Parish, Regina has been married for over 30 years with two beautiful children. She has been a successful business owner, serving the Natchitoches community and surrounding areas for over 10 years. Regina has had her Real Estate license since 2011 and is just as excited as we are to be a part of the Rhodes community! Regina loves to travel and spend time with family and friends. As a long-time member of the community, Regina takes pride in helping others and understands their needs to best assist them. If you need it, Regina can get IT!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: As your local Real Estate Specialist, I promise to be your trusted resource for answers about the process of buying or selling. I will provide expertise about the local market and will target your home search based on your individual needs and wants. I consider myself an expert in the local market and am a Natchitoches native. My custom innovative marketing strategies along with my strong negotiation skills are the keys to your successful transaction.I am looking forward to assisting you with your real estate needs. I have 20 1/2 years of experience in real estate sales and an additional 15 years of experience in flipping houses. I look forward to putting that expertise to use to help you find your new home or sell your current home.

title: Natchitoches, LA
description: Rodrick McIntosh has had his Real Estate License since he was 18 years old. He was born and raised in Natchitoches, LA, and attended LSU in Baton Rouge for 2 years and transferred back to Northwestern State University where he graduated with a double degree in Business Administration and Computer Information Systems. Rodrick went full time into Real Estate upon graduating from NSU to pursue his passion for helping families become homeowners. Rodrick is hands down one of the most experienced agents in not only Natchitoches but Louisiana. He has been handling listing foreclosures, relocations, first time home buyers, move up buyers, multimillion-dollar listings, and commercial listings for the past 12 years! He has been the Number 1 Selling Agent in Natchitoches Parish in number of residential properties sold from 2014 to the current year. Rodrick considers himself a people person and attributes his success in Real Estate by taking a hands on approach with each client and making them feel like family. Trust is everything and Rodrick gains his clients' trust by negotiating the best deal possible and getting them through the closing process by representing each client to the best of his ability!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Janie has been a licensed agent for 45 years. During that time, she served as a sales associate, a Broker/Owner of her own company, Executive Director of the Louisiana Real Estate Commission, Executive Director of various Home Builder Associations, VP of Sales and Marketing for a Building Firm and as a property manager in the French Quarter of New Orleans. Janie graduated from LA Tech University and stayed in Ruston for 17 years. After being gone for 24 years Janie returned to Ruston 7 years ago and quickly jumped back. "I am a hard worker but I also know in today's competitive market, you have to do more than work hard. You have to provide quality service and that's what I am all about!"

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: A native of Sabine Parish living in Natchitoches for over 20 years. Tony is a seasoned real estate professional with dozens of sold homes to his credit. He recognizes and values the trust his clients place in him and he strives every day to exceed their expectations. Tony has assisted dozens of families find thier dream home. He is a member of the Greater Central Louisiana Association of Realtors, Louisiana Association of Realtors and National Association of Realtors.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Born and raised in the West Bank of New Orleans. A young, dynamic, and energetic individual with excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to successfully interact with a diverse group of individuals; strong focus on teamwork; flexible and adaptable to new situations. I truly enjoy assisting others to succeed, and what better way than helping them find a home?

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: A Baton Rouge native and graduate of Southeastern Louisiana University in Hammond, Wendy holds a double degree in Marketing and Management and has over a decade of management experience in the B2B and B2C industries. She was instrumental in growing the Louisiana market share for two of the largest beverage distribution companies in the US, even achieving the prestigious and hard earned title of Certified Specialist of Wine (CSW) and French Wine Scholar (FWS) to enhance wine distribution efforts and restaurateur education programs in the regions she served. She was a featured columnist in Delta Style magazine, where she shared information on wine varietals and changes within the wine industry in the US market. In 2006 she married Jamie Freeman and called Monroe home. Over the past several years she has provided marketing support for two new family-owned businesses; Freeman Insulation and Freeman Builders. Fascinated by the entire construction industry she began to explore avenues to further grow the businesses. Real Estate seemed a natural fit. She obtained her Real Estate license and officially became an Agent in 2018, joining Coldwell Banker and selling the homes her husband and brother-in-law built. She then joined Rhodes Realty to help facilitate their expansion into the Monroe area. Today, Wendy continues her career in the wine industry while expanding her Real Estate business. She is excited to help her clients find the “perfect pairing” of family and a forever home!

title: Real Estate Broker
description:
Debra is your community resource for all things real estate from the back roads to the business district. She is the owner and broker of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Lindsey Realty. She knows Northwest Louisiana and goes beyond the MLS to meet your needs.
Whether you are a newcomer to the area or just relocating to a new subdivision, it helps to have a community expert on your team who understands making a smart real estate investment requires more than just a comparative marketing analysis and a property tour. With Debra you get a "welcome wagon" experience chock-full of stories of yesteryears to up-to-the-minute local economic news.
Debra is well networked and goes the distance to identify residential investments that measure up to your lifestyle as well as commercial investments that meet your business expectations. She is a trusted advisor that is well educated and prepared to remove the complexities of selling and buying residential, land and commercial properties.
While her work and community service over the past 25 years have resulted in many achievements and accolades, it is her drive, compassion, authenticity, and integrity that makes her the right choice for her clients. Debra works smarter to be the better REALTOR® for you!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Lionel Dawson Jr. was born and raised in Natchitoches, Louisiana. His #1 core value is; Regardless of the changes and difficulties that life brings, always put God first and remain faithful to Him in everything that you do. Lionel has been in real estate property management and supervision for over 15 years, having experience in operations management, complex management, maintenance direction, fair housing law, and USDA compliance. He has extensive training in housing law, fair renting practices, low income housing, tenant and landlord rights, and HUD. Lionel has presented over 100 cases in Justice of the Peace court and city court in more than 15 cities and towns in Louisiana. He also has experience in the hotel industry over a 15-year period, with extensive training in customer relations, customer service, hospitality, and auditing. Lionel wanted to expand his knowledge and growth in real estate while helping his community, so after seeing the needs of problem and troubled youth in Natchitoches and the surrounding areas, he started a recreation officials' training and mentorship program. The program started as a youth basketball league for ages up to 17 years, to help decrease crime, increase employment, and to give youth and young adults a positive place to go while being trained and mentored. Through a partnership with the Natchitoches Recreation and Parks Department, the numbers of youth began to grow and request of mentorship increased. Thus, leading Lionel to establish League O.W.E., LLC., through which he became the Officials Director for baseball, softball, basketball, and volleyball with the City of Natchitoches Recreation and Parks Department. Lionel Jr. has been blessed to have been able to hire and employ over 150 managers throughout Louisiana and youth in the city of Natchitoches. Through the mentorship, teachings, and guidance of his father and mother, Lionel Dawson Sr. and the late Dorothy Dawson, he established Dawson Consultants, LLC., a family owned consulting firm. Lionel boasts that the milestone of his career is becoming a licensed Realtor. He takes a hands on approach when handling business and representing clients. Lionel is an honest and dependable person that does what it takes to be successful.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Gwendolyn Tennell, REALTOR® recently returned to the real estate industry after taking a brief sabbatical to resume college and earn a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science. Gwendolyn has been a licensed real estate professional since 2006. She has a heart for education and believes knowledge is paramount when it comes to achieving life goals. She is passionate about helping others achieve the American dream. Gwendolyn is a residential specialist with refined skills in sales and marketing technologies. While she is high-tech, her clients don’t need to be. She is compassionate and goes beyond to remove the complexities of buying and selling homes for her clients. Whether you are a first-time home buyer or seasoned investor, you can count on “Gwendolyn Tennell to seal the deal.”

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Golden A. Ellis is one of North Louisiana's most trusted Real Estate professionals. To Golden, real estate is more than a profession; it’s a dream fulfilled both for her and her clients. Purchasing a home is a major decision, and Golden feels fortunate to have embarked on a career that brings the American dream of owning a home, quite literally, to her clients’ front door. In this highly competitive real estate market, it’s important to Golden that her clients feel confident knowing they’re working with someone who will always act in their best interest. Prior to real estate, Golden spent over a decade working in the banking and finance industry. Golden resides in Shreveport with her husband, Larry, daughters, Tiara and Ja'Lysa and her Yorkie, Fendi. She enjoys working with community outreach programs specializing in credit builders, financial literacy and giving back to communities through her Nonprofit Golden Angels.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Karen Monsour Jordan was born and raised in Natchitoches Louisiana, where she graduated from St. Mary’s School and went on to attend Northwestern State University. Karen and her husband of 19 years, Richard Jordan, reside in Robeline, Louisiana with their three amazing children. She wore many different hats while working in the public school system for the last nine years before deciding to follow her dreams with a career in real estate. Karen enjoys a good cup of coffee, spending time with her family, and online shopping. She takes pride in her ability to take care of others and is excited to team up with Rhodes Realty to take care of all your buying and selling needs.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Edna Mathews is a high quality producing realtor whose vision and ingenuity keep her on the cutting edge of the residential and commercial real estate market. She is committed to represent and to advocate for you. Edna effectively uses her Doctorate Degree as a Christian Counselor and Master Degree as a Life Coach to provide passionate, stellar customer care along with her marketing experience, and technology to support her strategic customer care concepts; and she integrates these services into all of her clients endeavors. She expertly navigates home buyers and home sellers through every step of the real estate process and has an impeccable reputation for proven results. My fundamental purpose is, “Changing lives for the better”. That’s why I am dedicated to providing exceptional, personalized service for all of my clients. I take great pride in the relationships I build and always work relentlessly on my client’s behalf to help them achieve their real estate goals. My principle is simple: “Client come first”. I pledge to be in constant communication with my clients, to keep them fully informed throughout the entire buying or selling process. Her overall stellar background in human relations and communications allows her to be a “Make It Happen” real estate professional, when it comes to selling your property, negotiating the terms of a sales contract and overall providing a concierge real estate experience by connecting her clients with the right individuals, products and/or services to make their real estate experience top-notch.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Since moving to Ruston to attend LA Tech in 2013 Jonathan has rooted himself in the community and has enjoyed making it home with his wife, Lauren. They are currently expecting their first child in July. Jonathan graduated from Louisiana Tech University in 2017 with a Bachelor of Science in Management and in 2018 with a Master of Business Administration. He is currently back enrolled at LA Tech getting his Doctorate in Marketing. He was a four-year letterman and all conference player for the Louisiana Tech football team. While there, he set multiple Conference USA and LA Tech records and ranks in the top ten in scoring in NCAA history. He currently enjoys spending time with family and friends, traveling, officiating soccer games, and playing golf. Jonathan has been a real estate agent in our growing community for the past 3 years. The same drive, hard work, and passion that Jonathan put into action to excel in the classroom and football field is what he also brings in helping with all your real estate needs.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Kelae Gatlin is a native of Tennessee. She graduated from the University of Memphis earning a baccalaureate degree with a major in Management Information System and Decision Sciences and minor in Healthcare Administration. She also has an earned a Master of Arts degree with a concentration in Computer Resource & Information Management.Kelae has worked for major corporations to include FedEx, Caterpillar, Brother, Morgan Keegan, and Servicemaster. Kelae is an entrepreneur and owner of a beauty product distribution company, transportation business, and home care agency. She is passionate about community first, giving back, and paying it forward. She is committed to being a trailblazer in the realm of real estate education and home ownership as well as building her portfolio of real estate investment properties. Whether you are buying or selling your home, she will work to ensure your home buying process is a smooth transition. Aside her faith, family is most important in her life as she is the mother to two amazing young men! She feels home ownership allows a family to make memories to treasure for a lifetime. Home is where the heart is! Let her help you find your home today!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Makenzie has been an active member of her community for all 23 years of her life and is now so excited to be turning her community focus towards Real Estate. With a passion for service in the Shreveport/Bossier area, Makenzie is ready to help with all of your home buying and selling needs. As a proud member of the Rhodes Realty family, Makenzie carries the values of hard-work, integrity, and outstanding client service into everything she does. When Makenzie isn’t making homeownership dreams come true for her clients, she enjoys spending quality time with her friends and family, as well as her dogs, Sunni & Beaux. Makenzie lives in the historical Highland District and can often be spotted walking the neighborhood with her furry friends. You can learn more about Makenzie and what she does by stopping by her Facebook

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
A love for rehabbing distressed properties led Leah to start investing in real estate. Over the years she developed a knack for researching and finding ideal properties to unleash her creative talents. Her success in this area evolved into a career as a licensed REALTOR. While she is relatively new to the industry, she has fast become an invaluable asset to others wanting to buy and flip properties for resale or rental income. Whether you're looking to take on your first renovation project or wanting to expand your investment portfolio, call Leah. She knows this journey well and can help you navigate a smarter move for a better return on your investment.
Leah also has a love for racehorses. She and her husband operate a training center in Bossier Parish. With her expertise in this arena and impressive knowledge of the equestrian lifestyle, you will want her by your side when looking to buy or sell horse farms, training centers, and boarding properties.

From urban investments to rural homesteads, Leah Cangemi welcomes the opportunity to be your go to, can do, boots on the ground REALTOR.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Sara Dews is a former educator and long time Shreveport-Bossier resident. As a real estate professional, she has proven to be a helpful resource for clients relocating to the area, especially families with school-age children. Whether a novice or seasoned real estate investor, Sara is a valued partner to have by your side. Sara is an excellent listener who takes careful note of all the little details that are important to her clients. You can count on her to represent you with integrity and to be diligent in meeting your real estate expectations as a buyer or a seller. Historical homes with inviting porches make Sara smile as does her community service as an animal rescuer. Sara is passionate about finding the right home for her clients and her furry friends. When you need a smart and caring REALTOR®, “Choose Dews.”

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Whether you are new to the community or have lived here all of your life it is important to work with a seasoned real estate expert when it comes to making a move. I am your hometown REALTOR with 25 years of experience in selling and marketing real estate in Northwest Louisiana. I am also a longtime property manager and continue to be a helpful resource to investors rehabbing and maintaining rental income properties in the Shreveport-Bossier area. Let me make the difference you need in negotiating terms that support your budget and lifestyle.
I'm here to help you throughout your entire home buying and selling process. Trying to do it all on your own can be burdensome. I'll locate homes within your price range, help you find buyers, assist you with paperwork, and more.


My dedication to exceptional client service does not cease with the completion of the sale. I pride myself on providing continued client satisfaction long after the initial transaction as I continue to serve your best interest. In an ever-changing market, I know that it is imperative that both buyers and sellers are consistently provided the most up-to-date information necessary to make the most accurate of decisions.

I look forward to working with you!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Samantha is originally from Natchitoches, Louisiana, and relocated to the Shreveport/Bossier area. As a mother of four, she spends a lot of time with her children and loves to travel. She started her career in the Mortgage industry in 2006 as a Mortgage Processor and quickly elevated from there. Over the years she has completed vigorous retail sales training and marketing programs and is now the owner and CEO of a Tax Prep Firm as well as Co-Owner of a Credit Guidance Company. She holds licensed/management positions in both companies. Samantha decided to venture into real estate in May of 2022 because it goes hand in hand with her career path. By adding her real estate license to her expertise in credit and mortgages, she is now able to help prospective buyers and sellers with all aspects of the entire process. Her goal has always been to see families realize the dream of home ownership. She especially has a passion to assist individuals in underserved communities in becoming first-time home owners. Samantha is ecstatic about helping clients through their real estate journey while providing honesty, integrity, and devotion, along with a seamless experience.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Rudy will be servicing the #Shreveport and #Natchitoches areas full time during the summer while school is out and part time when she goes back to school as a teacher at Caddo Middle Career Technology School teaching 6-8th Business Education! Rudy Forest is a native of Natchez, LA. She is a 2005 graduate of Natchitoches Central High School. She earned a Bachelor’s Degree in Psychology, from Northwestern State University in Natchitoches, LA along with achieving a degree in Business Administration. Then she received her Master’s Degree in Sports Administration. Later she achieved a Master of Arts in Teaching (MAT) Degree from Louisiana, College in Pineville, LA. While attending Northwestern State University, she participated in many activities, including being a successful high performing athlete for the Lady Demon Track and Field Team. Rudy Forest believes in excelling in excellence. With that being said, she has taken her expectations and passion to the classroom and lanes of track and field. She has taught and coached at her Alma Mater of Natchitoches Central High School and Natchitoches Junior High. Now she is continuing her success molding the minds of our students in Caddo Parish. Staying motivated, being creative and fair while being a dedicated hard worker is embedded in her lifestyle. Not to mention her personality and smile that lights up the room. When she is not working, she loves to spend time with her family and friends, especially her grandmother and mother, where she is the baby girl of four daughters. She has helped with the betterment of the community in many ways, from summer long track and field programs to the collaboration community service involvement with her sorority sisters of Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, Incorporated. Rudy looks forward to helping buyers and sellers in the Caddo and Natchitoches Parish areas! If you are looking to buy or sell Call Rudy today!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Shelia has been helping clients buy, sell, lease and invest in real estate for over 19 years. She goes the distance no matter what parish to help her clients achieve their goals. Newcomers love her because she knows the community and all the hot spots for shopping, dining and just having a down right good time. When you need an invaluable resource in residential matters, call Shelia, your guiding light in real estate.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Hi! My name is Tiera Rayson. I am a 24-year-old believer, wife, and boy mom. As of 2022 I added the title of “Realtor” to my list of hats. I am a proud Shreveport, La native. With a deep-rooted connection to Shreveport, I bring locals insight & understanding to the real estate market. Real estate has quickly become my passion as I have the need to help my community in an impactful way. I prioritize creating homes that reflect not just spaces, but places where families can thrive. My commitment to community service extends beyond transactions, embodying a genuine desire to enhance the neighborhoods we call home. Allow me to be your partner in navigating the exciting world of real estate, where dreams meet addresses.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Tamye Pratt, REALTOR®. Tamye is veteran of the real estate industry, serving more than 20 years helping clients realize their real estate dreams. She is a native of south Shreveport who is intimately acquainted with the region. From land to luxury, Tamye takes pride in identifying properties that best match your real estate goals. Aside from real estate, Tamye is a music enthusiast and enjoys the rich musical heritage of the community. She can easily point newcomers in the right direction when it comes to the local arts and entertainment offerings. Tamye also enjoys being outdoors, especially poolside or at the lake. From waterfront properties to recreational estates, Tamye will help you navigate the area to ensure you find your sportsman’s paradise. Remember, no matter what you’re looking for, “Tamye Pratt knows where it’s at.”

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Thelma is a graduate of Louisiana State University in Shreveport, LA where she earned a bachelor's degree in Business Management and Administration and she’s currently in Grad school at LSUS working towards her MBA with a completion date of Jan. 2023. She’s also a proud member of Delta Sigma Theta, Inc. Her skills in Business and Marketing give her a unique insight into how to bargain, protect clients, find the best deals, and market properties for her buyers and sellers. She purchased her first home in 2019 which helped ignite her passion for real estate. As a full-time Realtor, Thelma is ready to help clients negotiate the best terms at the best price, point out improvements that will maximize resale in the future, and provide exceptional customer service. Thelma entered Real Estate to be her own boss, provide better for her family, meet new people, and most importantly help people accomplish their goal of homeownership. Serving is what she does best.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Heather Brinkley is a dedicated military spouse, caring mother to a seven-year-old and four-year-old twins. Heather grew up in Northwest Louisiana with an extensive knowledge of the area which makes the perfect matchmaker. She has a passion for real estate, and helping clients achieve their real estate goals. She has been a licensed Realtor for over 2 years and a top-performing agent at her brokerage. Heather has dedicated her time to helping clients buy and sell property with over 6 million in closed volume in 2021. Heather prides herself on her communication skills and working under intense pressure. Her attention to detail ensures her clients have a stress-free transaction. Heather guides you through every step of the process and keeps you up to date on each milestone. Heather wants to help match you with the place your family will call home, and a home that you will create a lifetime of memories.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Wayne is a lifelong Midwest resident and grew up in a small town in northwest Indiana. After college he moved to St Louis and spent over 40 years in the banking, real estate, and credit industries. Wayne’s extensive real estate and business expertise has taught him to anticipate unforeseen obstacles and to prepare sound solutions to quickly and creatively overcome them to help simplify your selling/buying experience. Wayne considers a positive outcome his most important goal and he has the experience to make sure your needs are met.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Integrity-Knowledge-Dedication Allison moved to Prescott Everybody’s Hometown AZ with her family in 1995.
She grew up in Hilo Hawaii, where she became part of her family’s roofing and flooring business. It was this early exposure to the home building industry that led her to real estate sales. Allison got her real estate license in 2015 and signed on with a local new home builder for 6 years where she enjoyed helping her customers achieve their dream of finding the right new home for them.
Allison became a part of the BloomTree Realty after years in New Home Sales sector. With Allison’s expertise she will work with you to secure your dream of finding your new home. Please reach out to her for all your real estate needs.
License number: SA657755000

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Chris and Zena are with Better Homes and Garden Real Estate BloomTree Realty, Commercial and Residential. They are here to help you with any Commercial Real Estate sales, leasing, business brokering and residential buyer and seller representation.
Together, they have 10 years of experience as Realtors in the Prescott area. Along with their experience, they have owned small businesses. Chris has been in the area since 2002. He obtained a Bachelor of Science degree in Exercise Science from ASU in 1999. He spent time in Law Enforcement for 8.5 years in the Prescott area. His is a chairperson for VAREP (Veteran’s Association of Real Estate Professionals). Zena has lived in the Prescott area since 1996. She graduated from NAU with a Bachelor of Science in Dental Hygiene. She is the President of VAREP (Veteran’s Association or Real Estate Professionals).
Chris and Zena are real estate warriors and will put their education and experience to work for you.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: As a Real Estate professional in the Prescott Arizona and Quad City area I strive to meet the needs of each client I serve with integrity and excellence. My experience includes owning vacation rentals and remodeling numerous projects as well as selling Real property. My professional and personal experience in Real Estate transactions equips me to offer you a white glove experience that you would expect from the very best. I promise to give you the attention you deserve and trust you would expect when listing your property or helping you find that perfect place to call home.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
My Name is Andrés deSoto, but most folks call me Andy. I moved to Arizona from California in the early 2000s. and my wife, Theresa, and I fell in love with Arizona early on. The flora and fauna, the unique blue skies and clouds are truly breathtaking.
I grew up in Southern California and the High Desert area. My family was in the restaurant business my whole life. Our family business, Casa de Soto Mexican Restaurant was a Garden Grove icon for 43 years. In addition, I managed restaurants for corporations including Carrow’s, Coco’s and Chili’s. It was Chili’s that brought me to Arizona. I landed in Flagstaff and managed the unit there for a few years before the company located me to Prescott Valley in 2006. I have since moved on from the food and beverage industry and have been working at Bucky’s and Yavapai Casinos as a Shift Manager since 2013. Whatever profession I am in, it seems to revolve around people and taking care of their wants and needs. Therefore, it was a natural progression to join Theresa in real estate. With some down time during the unique year we had in 2020, I studied and received my real estate license and we became The deSoto Team. Theresa has a wealth of experience and time as a seasoned agent, and together we are able to help clients achieve their goals.
When listing your home, I not only bring my own skills to the table, but I also have and a team of highly trained marketing personnel that lead and guide me in marketing your home with state-of-the-art tools. My marketing plan may include a combination of the following:
CMA (Comparable Market Analysis) Yard sign – Attracts drive-by traffic as well as assists in locating the property. Professional Photos – Enhancing the best features of the home inside and out. Virtual Tours - Up to date technology for show casing your house. Flyers/QR Code – Property details by paper and smart phone technology. Open House – A scheduled period of time is designated for the home to be open for viewing by potential buyers. Enhanced Listing – Advertising on MLS, Realtor.com, Zillow and Trulia for listing details, photos/virtual tour. Syndication – Listing will be shared with over 700 real estate websites internationally. “Just Listed” Postcards – Announcing your new listing. Market Meeting Tour – Invitation to fellow agents to share your listing. Negotiating on your behalf for the best offer. If you are looking to buy a home, I not only negotiate on your behalf for the best deal, but I also walk you through the process of buying your home from start to finish. As a Real Estate Professional, I am dedicated to providing caring and professional assistance to each client, whether selling your current property or finding your dream home…... Or both! These qualities help make me a great choice as your Real Estate Agent.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Jerry Butterbrodt, Associate Broker

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Over 15 Years Experience Gwen Brindley has been a Licensed Real Estate Agent for 15 years. Beginning her real estate career in March 2005, she quickly made an impact on the real estate market. Over the last 5 years, Gwen has averaged over 25 closed transactions per year. Equally significant, the Prescott Area Association of REALTORS recognized Gwen as a Top 20% producing agent for the last 10 years. Since 2008, Gwen has excelled in the specialization of Short Sale transactions with a successful closing rate of 95%. In addition, she holds the prestigious designation of MCNE Master Certified Negotiation Expert. This achievement requires extensive education in the negotiation process. This training is vital to bring all parties to an agreement for a successful real estate transaction closing. Gwen’s ABR Accredited Buyers Representation designation is key to a successful transaction.
It is through excessive education, experience, and dedication to her client’s needs that Gwen is able to assist clients to achieve a successful sale of their home and a Buyer's dream of homeownership. Gwen is continuously remaining educated with real estate trends, serving as the Chair to the Prescott Area Association Education Committee in 2013 and 2014. She was given the President's Award for Outstanding Service to the Association in November 2014. She continues to work hard at gaining your business and is looking forward to meeting you!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Jennifer Perry
I am a Real Estate agent at BHGRE BloomTree Realty. Originally from New York City, I am known for my unique and insightful approach to Real Estate in the Scottsdale and Prescott, Arizona greater areas. I combine my extensive background in Business Communications and Hotel/Restaurant Management with a rich tapestry of life experiences, including my time at Yelp and various entrepreneurial endeavors. This diverse journey has equipped me with a deep understanding of the market and an exceptional ability to connect with clients on a personal level. My approach to Real Estate is characterized by a dedication to understanding and fulfilling clients' unique needs, ensuring that each property transaction is not just a business deal, but a meaningful journey towards finding a perfect home.
Living in Scottsdale and Prescott for over 25 years, my approach to Real Estate is deeply influenced by my holistic and wellness lifestyle. This lifestyle affords me a heightened sense of self awareness and an ability to connect with others, fostering an environment of intentional collaboration. My focus extends beyond the physical aspects of a property. I engage with clients to understand their energy and needs, aiming to facilitate a process that achieves the highest and best outcome for everyone involved in the journey of buying a home. My goal is to be a trusted partner in all aspects of selling and buying and to create a joyful process!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Karyn Finnell grew up by the ocean, so she thought she needed to live near water to be happy – but Arizona’s natural beauty proved her wrong. She now proudly calls the Grand Canyon State home, and makes it possible for others to do the same.

Born and raised in Redondo Beach, California, Karyn lived in Massachusetts for 10 years before deciding to swap snow for sunshine. 17 years ago, Karyn and her husband moved to Prescott. This is a decision they’ve never regretted.

“It’s a quaint, beautiful little town surrounded by mountains. It’s so picturesque, no matter where you look.” Her love for the area is one of many reasons why she’s an outstanding real estate agent.

“I love what I do. I have so many friends who started out as clients. I enjoy finding interesting ways to connect with my buyers and sellers. Making those connections is really amazing.”

“There’s so much to do in Prescott, especially if you like being outside. We also have a lot of great restaurants and craft cocktail bars,” says Karyn. She loves the opportunity to introduce new people to all of the wonderful things that Prescott has to offer.

Karyn’s long list of happy clients will testify that she goes above and beyond for them, tapping into their needs and doing everything she can to help them achieve their real estate goals.

“I’m great at communication and follow-up, and I’m happy to help people navigate the process of buying or selling real estate. I share everything I know and I make sure they feel comfortable throughout every step of the process.”

Those aren’t empty words. Karyn truly commits herself to helping her buyers and sellers, even if it means staying up late to put their minds at ease.

“I don’t care if I’m sitting at my computer at 10 o’clock at night. I’m going to make sure my clients have what they need and know what the next steps in the process are.”

Karyn recalls one of her most memorable real estate transactions, when she helped a family find a home after other agents let them down.

“They had been living in a travel trailer for several months and had called other agents who didn’t really help them.” After getting Karyn’s information from a family member who was a past client, they called her. She was happy to help and jumped in feet first. Karyn managed to help them find them a great little home.

“They were so excited to purchase a home, and I was honored to play a role in that. Those opportunities make it all worthwhile!”

Life should be celebrated like a wonderful party. Let me help you celebrate one of life's major milestones by allowing me to help you buy or sell a home. Let's celebrate together!

If you’re looking to buy or sell a home in Prescott or surrounding areas, contact Karyn via email or give her a call at 928-499-2827. You can also follow her on Facebook!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
You will quickly identify my passion for real estate. I became a real estate professional and I have been a top producing agent in Northern Arizona. My abundant energy, creativity, dedication and Real Estate wisdom drive my passion to fulfill the needs and goals of my clients. My know-how brings peace of mind to my clients. In my practice of Real Estate he is known for outstanding client service, consistent communication and strong attention to detail. I initiate communication in every aspect of the transaction from the first phone call, all the way to the completion of the transaction; I strives to take the pressure off of you; teach and guide you so you can make clear and concise choices throughout the process. I loves to meet people where they are; with their absolutely unique situation and help guide them through their choices and help them get to where they want to be! I hand over the keys to a dream come true! I love it! I offer seamless assistance to you for every aspect of your Real Estate Transaction. Leveraging my experience as a successful business professional with personal touches and blended with high tech marketing techniques. I am a skilled negotiator with my client’s best interest in the forefront. I use my experience and foresight to proactively address details before they become an unwanted issue. I have worked with clients as far ranging as his next door neighbor to world renown scientists. I am trusted on all levels. This has translated to a strong loyal repeat clientele and is the driving reason why I finds success so easily.
It’s about the people, not the agent. I have refined listening skills so that I can hear what is important to my clients. Also, equally important at times, I can identify and address what isn’t being said.
I enjoys the people, seasons, culture and the many outdoor activities available to him in his community. I love to read a wide and varied selection of literature, cook & eat, exercise, seek adventure in the outdoors, skiing, camping, fishing, horses and dogs.
I am a firm believer in giving back. I give to various charities from the Salvation Army to Big Brothers Big Sisters. I stepped away from Real Estate for a few years to lend assistance to his elderly mother when she was in need. While doing that, I met man who was destitute. I befriended him and I was able to get him medical assistance that he needed at that time. He was evaluated by medical professionals who found that he suffered from organic cognitive brain disorder. I was then able to guide him through the complicated process of filing for Social Security Disability process. The man was declared legally disabled. He now receives social security benefits and he enjoys a stable living environment, money to buy food, medical coverage and peace of mind.
By making an industry leap to real estate from a position with an auditing firm and holding the position of Senior Field Auditor, I quickly found professional success in Resort Sales on the East Coast and then merged all of those skills into a successful Real Estate career working with buyers and sellers of single family homes, condominiums, ranches and land sales in Northern Arizona. I recognize that each property is unique, therefore each marketing proposal must be specifically tailored to the property. I offer advanced marketing strategies joined with uncompromising integrity and savvy negotiating skills are the hallmarks of my service.
Please call me anytime without obligation. I am ready to go to work for you today! I am your Go To Agent!
Tenaciously protecting my client’s interests!
Prior to earning licensure for selling Real Estate and after attending Rutgers University and graduating from Montclair State University of the Greater New York area with a degree in Business Administration with a concentration in Finance, I was a Senior Field Auditor.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I have called Prescott home for nearly 12 years, during which time I have grown quite fond of this great city. The small town environment has been a wonderful place for my three children, who are involved in many extracurricular activities. I have participated in community service in various arenas, including my children's schools and activities. Therefore, I am well connected and knowledgeable with regard to all that Prescott has to offer, and I share this information with clients relocating to the area. Working as a real estate professional is a great fit for me, since I enjoy all aspects of working in the real estate market, and I truly relish assisting people through every step of the home buying or selling process. I am a hard worker who is dedicated to serving my clients. I am a graduate of the University of California, Irvine and have a doctoral degree from the California School of Professional Psychology. I am a veteran of the United States Navy, having worked as a clinical psychologist stationed in Virginia and Yokosuka, Japan. My background as a psychologist serves me well in the real estate business. It has taught me to be a good listener and has prepared me to handle various situations in a compassionate, effective, and professional manner. Given my military background, I know the challenges of moving and settling into a new area, and I look forward to assisting your family.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Having lived and worked in the Prescott area since 2006 I am very familiar with the market and trends in both sales and purchases of properties in all of the Quad Cities area, with a special focus on Prescott. I will be readily available for comments, questions or concerns via email, text or phone call and I pledge to respond within 24 hours. A little personal information about me: I am a former 911 ambulance Paramedic, have a past career in Technology working with lawyers and was a Food and Beverage Manager for several years on a resort property in Redondo Beach, CA. How my past experience translates is that I am used to handling multiple deadlines at once, I know how to handle different personalities and I never panic under pressure. You can be assured that my negotiating skills will get you the best deal possible. I moved here from Covina, CA in 2006 and have loved every minute of living in our beautiful mile high city. I worked as a volunteer Park Ranger for Prescott for several years and thoroughly enjoyed learning about all of the outdoor activities available year around in this area. Entertaining, reading, hiking, bicycling, kayaking, and gardening are some of my particular areas of interest. Above all, helping people is what I enjoy the most. It is my goal to make sure you are taken care of in every area. To do this, I'm a part of a team of Realtors. With our business structure, we pool our expertise to make sure someone is always available for your needs. So please allow me to assist you in your search for the perfect home in the beautiful Quad City area or let me help alleviate the stress and pressure of selling the one you already own.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: My family has been in the Prescott area for four generations. In the 1950s, my grandfather purchased land East of Prescott in the pines of Groom Creek and built a home. My parents met while attending Northern Arizona University (NAU) and I was born. In the 1970s, my grandfather again purchased land in Prescott Valley and started a business “Burt’s Nursery. I worked there during the summers building greenhouses and learning about native plant species while watering plants, pulling weeds and piling rocks. I met my wife while attending NAU and started our family. In the 1990s, my parents retired from careers in education and moved to Groom Creek and built a home next to the family homestead. Both my sons met their wives while they attended NAU and then moved to Prescott. My eldest works at the hospital and recently opened a business in Prescott, “Tri-City Aesthetics & Wellness.” We are a family of hardworking, honest entrepreneurs who love each other and serve others. I earned a degree in Mechanical Engineering and a Master of Divinity. I have owned several businesses, including a contracting company, a home inspection business, a home remodel and a repair company (Handy Randy), and now I am a REALTOR with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate (BHGRE) – Bloomtree Realty. With a background of gardening and home improvement, Better Homes and Gardens has been a staple in my family's homes for over 70 years. I am a member of the National Association of Realtors (NAR) and from them have earned the Graduate REALTOR Institute (GRI), Senior Real Estate Specialist (SRES), Real Estate Negotiations Expert (RENE) designations and am currently working to complete the Accredited Buyer Representative (ABR) and Pricing Strategies Advisor (PSA) designations. Please allow me to use my expertise to serve your real estate needs in all of Yavapai County. Sincerely, Randy Schafer LLC, GRI, SRES, RENE

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
As a Prescott resident for 40 years, I absolutely love our hometown and have served the youth in our community for over 20 years as a public school educator and athletic coach in the Chino Valley & Prescott Unified School Districts. I am a graduate of ASU and have a Master’s degree in Secondary Education and History. Along with my husband, Mark, raising our two children, Taylor & Ali, and investing in the lives of youth in our community are my greatest joys.
After eight years working in the insurance industry and twenty-seven years in the public school system, I received my Real Estate License in 2013. Since retiring from public education in 2016, I have been a full-time Realtor with The Norkus Group and absolutely love continuing to serve our beloved community.
One of my greatest assets is the knowledge of the history and rich traditions of Prescott. I bring a friendly, vibrant energy to my work and am conscientious, patient, and a person of integrity. I am committed to care for my clients, and as I represent buyers and sellers I will go beyond a professional relationship.
I am truly blessed to have such strong roots in Prescott, and will continue to diligently serve the newcomers and families of my hometown for years to come.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
My name is Theresa deSoto and I have lived in Arizona since 2003 and the Prescott area since 2006. I am enthusiastic about the Quad-City area and have a passion for getting to know people and connecting with them on a personal level. I am high energy, friendly and driven. Prior to selling real estate, I ran my own house cleaning business. I have a Master of Arts in Theology and a Bachelor of Christian Education. I have also been involved in my community through volunteering at a local college in administration, teaching and public speaking.
Whether you are looking for your dream home or selling your current home, I am the perfect choice in a real estate professional. My company, Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate (BHGRE), is a name that is not only known globally but that you can trust with your real estate needs. I have been a part of some of the top producing teams in the nation. In 2019, I stepped out on my own and formed a husband-and-wife team. In 2018 and again in 2019, I received the Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Silver Award; in 2020, I received the Gold Award with my company for being a top-producing agent nationally. I have earned my designation for being a Certified Negation Expert (CNE), and my expertise will benefit you greatly.
When listing your home, I not only bring my own expertise to the table, but I also have a team of highly-trained marketing personnel that lead and guide me in marketing your home with state-of-the-art tools. My marketing plan may include a combination of the following:
CMA (Comparable Market Analysis) – An examination of the prices at which similar properties in the same area recently sold to help you obtain the highest possible price for your home. Yard sign – Attracts drive-by traffic as well as assists in locating the property. Professional Photos – Enhancing the best features of the home inside and out. Virtual Tours - Up to date technology for show casing your house. Flyers/QR Code – Property details by paper and smart phone technology. Open House – A designated time for the home to be open for viewing by potential buyers. Enhanced Listing – Advertising on MLS, Realtor.com, Zillow and Trulia for listing details, photos/virtual tour. Syndication – Listing will be shared with over 700 real estate websites internationally. “Just Listed” Postcards – Announcing your new listing. Market Meeting Tour – Invitation to fellow agents to share your listing. Negotiating on your behalf for the best offer. If you are looking to buy a home, I not only negotiate on your behalf for the best deal, but I also walk you through the process of buying your home from start to finish. As a Real Estate Professional, I am dedicated to providing caring and professional assistance to each client. I really enjoy and excel at helping people with their real estate goals, whether selling your current property or finding your dream home…... Or both! These qualities help make me a great choice as your Real Estate Agent.
Making dreams come true…..one home at a time!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Being a native Arizonan and married to a 5th generation Arizonan, our roots go deep and we love it here. I hope you will too!
Commitment! My passion is the homebuilding industry and real estate market. As your personal real estate agent, I am committed to working hard to find your new home or sell your current home as quickly and as smoothly as possible. During this process, I hope to become the trusted friend you will refer to others and call me again the next time you need my services. Using a common sense approach along with integrity, honesty and a willingness to listen to your needs will enable me to produce the best results for you.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Keri Johnson works hard for her clients. The home buying process for Keri focuses on the person. The client’s needs and desires are Keri’s priority. It is more than a transaction, it is a relationship.
Keri’s background in banking and investments is a natural complement to a successful career in real estate. Beginning as real estate agent over three years ago, Keri has been with BloomTree for the full three years.
We Love Prescott Keri’s life as a military wife, multiple moves, and living all around the country, even in Guam, give Keri an appreciation for the moving and home buying process. Keri is done moving, and is now planted firmly in Prescott and enjoys the beauty of the town, calling Prescott her home. Six years ago her husband retired from the military and accepted a position at the VA hospital in Prescott. They have declined many promotions that would take them away from Prescott. As a family they know that Prescott now home. “We love Prescott!”
As recent empty nesters, with three kids in college, Keri has enjoyed the added time to dedicate to her real estate career. Her natural administrative talents make the real estate transaction efficient. Let Keri make your home buying and selling process an enjoyable experience.
Keri Johnson, REALTOR® (928) 642-3823

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Anita's dedication and high level of personal service sets her apart! Her enthusiasm and knowledge of the Kansas City Metro Market will make your real estate experience a wonderful one to remember. Anita is a Certified and Experienced agent when it comes to working with our country's military personnel. She especially enjoys working with VETERANS, both ACTIVE DUTY and RETIRED as well as First Time Home Buyers. Anita believes in the power of listening, which allows her to understand her client's needs and guides them through the process. A Real Estate Veteran of 13 years, Anita provides extraordinary service in every price range.

title: Associate Real Estate Broker
description:
Searching through thousands of home that fit your lifestyle can be quite a task. With my help and by using our exclusive home search tools, you can narrow down your choices to homes you want to see in person.
