I particularly like helping senior adults, first time buyers, and families who are relocating to the area. So many of my clients become friends after the sale because we share the same interests! People like to do business with those they like and trust, so let's meet and get to know one another first. If we click and move into a business relationship, I'll exceed your expectations for service and follow up. I am always honest with customers. Visit my personal website or read one of my blogs to get to know me better!

title: Prairie Village, KS
description: I have been a licensed Broker-Associate in both Missouri & Kansas for over 20 years and specialize in Brookside, The Plaza & the State Line Corridor where I have lived for over 30 years. I have listed and sold hundreds of homes and have a deep historical knowledge of our local market. If you are a Buyer . . . I know that you are not just looking for a Home but for a Community that fits your Lifestyle. I'd love to help explore this part of our wonderful city and find just the right niche for you. We have much to offer and there are many choices. If you are selling . . . I will help you reach those Buyers who will best appreciate the true Value of your home and your community. In either case, I commit to EDUCATE you to to make INFORMED DECISIONSONS, to represent only YOUR best interests, and EXCEED your expectations. Check out my website at www.SusanEubanks.KansasCityHomes.com & Let's Get Together!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Fun, honest, and professional, my goal is to make buying and selling real estate as stress-free and enjoyable as possible while walking you through the entire process with the utmost transparency and integrity. As someone who values education, I've logged over 200 credit hours of real estate courses honing my skills so that I can serve you best. I'm also fluent in Mandarin Chinese -- 我会讲中文!

title: Prairie Village, KS
description: As a native Kansas Citian whose homes have been mainly along the Ward Parkway corridor, Mission Hills and Prairie Village (for the second time), I have followed the market for housing in my "hood" for years even before becoming licensed as a Realtor in 1994 and Broker shortly thereafter. I along with many others believe that Kansas City is a well kept secret when it comes to housing and amenities of all sorts. For 19 years now, I have enjoyed representing long time and new found friends in their pursuit of the right property as buyers or making disposition of real estate when the time has come for relocation. As the managing broker and director of sales for the Sulgrave Regency condominiums from 2001 to 2006, I have broadened my client list to include many buyers and sellers of condominium properties as well. I would welcome the opportunity to visit with you about how I might assist you as either a buyer or seller or simply answer a question about the residential real estate market in my home town. visit my website: tomthornhill.kansascityhomes.com

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: It is especially important to me that all my clients feel comfortable and assured about all the important decisions that are to be made in the home buying and selling processes. As intimidating as these choices may be, I am here to guide my clients through every transaction to a successful conclusion. My biggest goal is to build relationships with others and share a level of trust and comfort. As a Topeka native, I am very dedicated to having my clients enjoy the same amazing experience here as I have. Since graduating from Hayden High School, it has been a top priority of mine to be inviting and knowledgeable in everything I do. If you are unsure where to start, please allow me to guide you every step of the way. Every one of my clients deserves a positive, memorable experience.

title: Real Estate Broker
description: Abbey has called Topeka home for over 25 years, and loves living, playing and working in this community! Abbey moved around growing up, and 25+ years ago, she met her husband and business partner Wade. They didn’t expect to stay in Topeka, but both love Topeka and wouldn't want to be anywhere else. Abbey is the proud mother of two children. Reghan, is a KU School of Nursing Graduate. Reghan is currently employed at KU Med on the Neuro ICU Unit, and going back to school to earn her Nurse Practitioner license. Rayce graduated from Washburn Rural High School, and recently passed his real estate exam, and will be working in the family business. A lover of all animals, the Wostal family has 3 dogs and 2 kitties. In 2005, Wade began his career as a Realtor®, in 2015 Abbey joined Wade, and became a Realtor®– creating “Team Wostal.” We grew a small team of fantastic agents, and Jan of 2018 had the opportunity to partner with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Wostal Realty, and open our own real estate office. Over the years, we have presented various assets to our clients. We have remodeled several homes, sold some of those, and still own quite a few. Our tenants are the best! What we have worked to keep consistent in our business of working with people is the relationship. We understand first-hand how real estate can help grow your retirement and personal wealth. Previous to joining Wade in Real Estate, Abbey had over seven years’ experience in mortgage lending and banking. Abbey started by overseeing the mortgage departments, then moved into commercial lending. After some time there, she was then hired to help train and mentor fellow staff on the subject of how to be an effective salesperson. Abbey is a “Leadership Greater Topeka” graduate, and was a part of the best class ever, 2010. Abbey loves to dive into spreadsheets and analyze data. She is a Right Track Leader Graduate, class of 2022. She has served on the Sunflower Association of Realtors® Board of Directors since 2019, and was President in 2022. Abbey believes and carries out the mindset of, “the best salespeople don’t really sell”. In turn, the best salespeople meet and exceed customers’ expectations. She believes in the importance of educating yourself daily, and working to continually grow within your career and industry. Wade and Abbey love working with people, and being a part of their exciting new journey! Together, they consistently offer their clients the highest quality service, and the best home purchasing and/or selling experience available. With their combined experiences, and vast knowledge, they give their clients the best information available, which they utilize in their purchase or sale of a home . Our true definition of success is seeing how our clients love their time and experience with us. We would love the opportunity to help you, your friends, or family with their real estate needs. Please feel free to contact us anytime, for a free consultation.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
With a wealth of experience in both real estate and lending, Amanda Danielson brings a unique perspective to the home buying and selling process. Amanda is known for her effective communication, strategic marketing techniques, and profound market knowledge.
Amanda’s commitment to her clients goes beyond the transaction; she believes in building lasting relationships based on trust and integrity. Whether you're buying your dream home or selling a property, she ensures that you are never left in the dark. Her proactive approach means she goes above and beyond to guarantee the best possible experience for her clients.
Amanda takes great pride in her work and understands that listening is the key to exceeding her clients' expectations. By understanding your needs and preferences, she tailors her strategies to ensure a seamless and successful real estate journey.
When you choose Amanda Danielson as your real estate agent, you can rest assured knowing that you have a dedicated professional who is passionate about achieving your real estate goals. Experience the difference with Amanda and discover what it means to have a true advocate by your side.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: As your professional real estate advisor, I focus on client satisfaction. My business is about service and I am not happy until you are happy. My years in the business have provided me the experience to assist you with nearly every real estate need. Whether it's finding you a home, finding the best loan, or helping you getting the most out of selling your home I am here to guide you. If there is anything you need, please let me know.

title: Real Estate Broker
description: Licensed since 1970 Many years of experience specializing in residential properties and farms in Topeka Topeka Area Association of REALTORS® Salesperson of the Year in 1991 RE/MAX International Platinum Club Award Topeka Area Association of REALTORS® Masters Club member 1995 Andy Anderson Award winner 2000 RE/MAX Hall of Fame RE/MAX Top Producer, Single Agent 1989-2007 Caring and professional service, always!

I am a real estate professional that provides services from the hunt, to the purchase and years

Whether you are a first-time home buyer or moving to your dream home, I will be with you every step of the way to provide coaching, education and friendship.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Three words people use to best describe Chris are creative, trustworthy and reliable. But, with Chris she lightens the load, helping clients understand and prepare you in all the steps and stages. No job is to big or to small for Chris.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Meet Dr. Cody Whitney, the friendly realtor with a passion for helping people find their dream homes in Topeka, Kansas. With his extensive experience and dedication to customer satisfaction, Cody is committed to making the home-buying journey a smooth and enjoyable experience for his clients.

Cody’s career started in education , he made the exciting decision to join forces with his wife, Morgan Whitney, in the real estate industry. Together, they make an unbeatable team, combining their knowledge, expertise, and love for their community to provide exceptional service to their clients.

Beyond his professional achievements, Cody is a dedicated family man and an active member of the Topeka community. When he's not assisting clients, you can find him spending quality time with his wife and three children, or coaching CrossFit! 

If you're looking for a realtor who is not only knowledgeable, but also genuinely cares about your needs and desires, look no further than Cody and Morgan Whitney.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:

She comes to Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Wostal Realty with a vast knowledge of the city and over twenty years combined in customer service and accounting experience. Francine prides herself on the ability to navigate the real estate market while ensuring each buyer/seller has an incredible individual experience.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Trust and integrity are essential qualities of a real estate professional. I recognize the decisions my clients are making may result in the largest investment of their lifetimes and I greatly value the trust they place in me. I will handle all of your needs with expertise and you will be well represented with me in your corner. As a Topeka native and a member of the Dream Home Professionals real estate team, I have access to a multitude of resources, networks, and specialized knowledge. I’m confident that together, we will find your dream home!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
I am Jordan Lawson , a dedicated and passionate real estate professional committed to providing exceptional service to my clients. With a background in customer service, management and investing in real estate , I bring a unique blend of expertise to the real estate industry. My unwavering dedication, market knowledge, and commitment to client satisfaction set s me apart in this competitive field.
As a r ecently licensed agent , I have successfully facilitated transactions across various property types including residential and investment properties. My experience has equipped me with a deep understanding of market trends, negotiation strategies, and the intricacies of real estate transactions, allowing me to guide my clients through every step of the buying and selling process with confidence and ease.
I prioritize building strong, long-lasting relationships with my clients based on trust, integrity, and transparency. I recognize that each client's needs and goals are unique, and I am dedicated to providing personalized solutions tailored to their specific requirements. Whether you are a first-time homebuyer, seasoned investor, or looking to sell your property, I am committed to exceeding your expectations and delivering results that align with your objectives .
As a resident of Kansas, I possess an intimate knowledge of the local market dynamics, neighborhoods, and amenities. Whether you are looking to buy or sell in Topeka or surrounding areas , I can provide valuable insights and guidance to help you make informed decisions and achieve your real estate goals.
I am deeply committed to excellence in everything I do, and I continually strive to stay ahead of the curve by staying updated on the latest market trends, industry regulations, and emerging technologies. My proactive approach, attention to detail, and dedication to continuous learning ensure that my clients receive the highest level of service and support throughout their real estate journey.
Whether you are buying, selling, or investing in real estate, I am here to help you navigate the process with confidence and peace of mind. Contact me today to schedule a consultation and take the first step towards achieving your real estate goals.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Hi, I'm Heidi Petesch and I'm looking forward to meeting you! Twelve years ago, I was just finishing my MBA at Friends University and had no idea that the road would lead me here to Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate. My career started in marketing at Blue Cross Blue Shield of Kansas, but the corporate world was not for me once I became a mom. My calling was at home on our family farm, raising our son, and two years later, our daughter. In between baseball games, dance recitals, and checking cows, I somehow found the time to nurture my love for real estate. My husband and I have spent the last few years purchasing and renovating homes for rental properties in and around Meriden, Kansas. With each family we moved into a property, it became more evident that this is what I want to be doing. I love being a realtor and I want to be yours. My buyers and sellers become my family. I will do everything I can to take the confusion out of the process by walking alongside you and being a trusted place to turn. I am excited for the opportunity to work with you. Let me take you from here to home!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am a dedicated family man who emphasizes honesty, integrity, and positivity both personally and professionally. I’m patriot and an avid lover of nature that invites adventure. I have nine years of professional real estate sales experience and over 20 years of business ownership and operation.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Kelly Meerpohl, a real estate agent with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Wostal Realty, assists clients in buying and selling their homes in NE Kansas and Topeka area. Leveraging his expertise and market knowledge, Kelly helps clients find properties that align with their needs and goals, ensuring a smooth and successful real estate experience.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Whether you are looking to sell your home or beginning the home buying process, there are many things that can be stressful and maybe even a bit intimidating. But you don't have to tackle it alone. I have been in the same position that you may be in right now! Unsure about what the next step is and looking for professional guidance. That's why I chose to become a real estate agent. Every client deserves to have a positive home buying or selling experience and I want to help you with that! With over 10 years of customer service experience, I can help guide you through the entire process, all the way until closing day! I will keep you informed every step of the way. Providing you with a personal and enjoyable experience is top priority to me. Here is just a little bit about me. I grew up in Overbrook, Kansas and spent my childhood involved in our local 4-H club. I then attended Washburn University and received a business degree from their accredited School Of Business. Now, my life consists of spending time with my husband, family, friends, and of course, our many dogs! I also love experiencing new places and cultures and try to travel somewhere new each year. So as you begin this journey, please consider letting me be the professional guidance that you have been looking for. Call me today to get started!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
With a passion for real estate and a commitment to exceptional service, I am Katie Salts, your trusted realtor serving the Greater Topeka and Lawerence areas. With 4 years of experience in the industry, I specialize in helping buyers and sellers achieve their real estate goals through expert guidance and personalized support.

My background equips me with the skills to navigate the complexities of the real estate market effectively. Whether you’re looking to buy your first home, sell a property, or invest in real estate, I am dedicated to providing honest advice and a tailored approach to meet your unique needs.

When I’m not assisting clients, you can find me spending time with my Husband Ryan, son Jaxon and daughter Jostyn. I am committed to not just meeting but exceeding your expectations and look forward to helping you with your real estate journey.

Katie’s goal is to consistently exceed expectations and continue to grow new relationships.

Feel free to reach out via call/text at 785.817.4468 or email Katie@saltsrealestategroup.com

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am a dedicated real estate professional with a passion for helping clients achieve their home ownership dreams. My husband and I work as a team to raise our two boys and accommodate the needs of our clients so you will always receive first rate service. I take pride in building long-lasting relationships with my clients and helping them find the perfect place to call home. Let's work together to turn your real estate dreams into reality!

Tenga confianza en poder comprar y vender en su idioma, sin necesitar un interprete. Llameme a mi celular (785) 220-9079. title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: It is my goal to help assist, educate, and guide my clients through a successful buying and selling process. I offer a high-level of work performance with great communication, organization, and results that speak for themselves. Call or text anytime for a free, zero-obligation home value report or to talk about the steps it will take to purchase your next property. Licensed REALTOR® Specializing in first-time buyers, professional staging properties, listing agent, both commercial and residential buying agent, VA, Marketing. Lives in Topeka, KS 10 years. title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Looking for a realtor who brings unparalleled expertise to the table? With 19 years of experience as an attorney, I have honed exceptional negotiation skills, a keen eye for detail, and a deep understanding of contracts and legal intricacies. As a dedicated real estate professional, I leverage this background to guide my clients through every step of the buying or selling process with precision and confidence. My extensive experience in negotiation, combined with top-notch communication skills, ensures that your interests are always front and center. I pride myself on delivering outstanding customer service, listening carefully to your needs, and providing personalized solutions tailored to your unique situation. Whether you're looking to buy your dream home, sell your property for top dollar, or invest in real estate, I am committed to making your real estate journey as smooth and successful as possible. Let my background as a seasoned attorney and my passion for real estate work for you—contact me today to get started!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I have spent my life in Kansas. I love the beauty of this state and the people who reside here. Throughout my career, I have always been focused on serving the needs of others, and delivering top-notch customer service. As an owner of two of the most prolific restaurants and bars in the Topeka market, it was always my pleasure to take care of everyone who entered my establishments and build life-long relationships. I am excited to have the opportunity to continue with my passion for helping people and building lifelong relationships. As a Realtor® with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Wostal Realty, I will have the opportunity to help my fellow friends fulfill the American Dream. Whether you are purchasing a home, land, investment property, or considering selling your real estate investment; you will need a professional who can work alongside you and obtain the results you are looking for. We will work together to obtain the best financing solutions, negotiate the best-buying terms, and the inspection process. When you are selling I will make sure you have accurate timely information on the value of your real estate, consistent reliable communication, and a marketing plan that will ensure we get the most attention brought to your home. I look forward to all of our future dealings and the opportunity to help you with all of your real estate dreams.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Wade and Abbey have called Topeka home for nearly 20 years, and love living, playing and working in this community! We were both raised in different places, and 20 years ago, we didn’t expect to still be here, but we have grown to love Topeka and don’t want to be anywhere else. Our two children make us very proud- Reghan, a sophomore at KU, and Rayce an sophomore at WRHS. And we can’t forget our “four-legged” friends; we have four dogs, and two kitties.
In 2005, Wade began his career as a Realtor®, in 2015 Abbey joined Wade, and became a Realtor®– creating “Team Wostal.” We grew a small team of fantastic agents, and Jan of 2018 had the opportunity to partner with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Wostal Realty, and open our own real estate office. Over the years, we have presented various assets to our clients. We have remodeled several homes, sold some of those, and still own quite a few. Our tenants are the best! What we have worked to keep consistent in our business of working with people is the relationship. We understand first-hand how real estate can help grow your retirement, and personal wealth. Wade has been active in the Topeka 20/30 club, and loved volunteering for many school functions.
Previous to joining Wade in Real Estate, Abbey had over seven years’ experience in mortgage lending and banking. Abbey started by overseeing the mortgage departments, then moved into commercial lending. After some time there, she was then hired to help train and mentor fellow staff on the subject of how to be an effective salesperson. Abbey is a “Leadership Greater Topeka” graduate, and was a part of the best class ever, 2010.
We believe and carry out the mindset of, “the best salespeople don’t really sell”. In turn, the best salespeople meet and exceed customers’ expectations. We believe in the importance of educating yourself daily, and working to continually grow within your career and industry. Wade and Abbey love working with people, and being a part of their exciting new journey! Together, we consistently offer our clients the highest quality service, and the best home purchasing and/or selling experience available. With our combined experiences, and vast knowledge, we give our clients the best information available, which they utilize in their purchase or sale of a home. Our true definition of success is seeing how our clients love their time and experience with us.
We would love the opportunity to help you, your friends, or family with their real estate needs. Please feel free to contact us anytime, for a free consultation.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I love my Real Estate job and what I do for my clients. I will never trade for anything else. I have the privilege of serving Topeka and its surrounding areas for over 16 years. I have a bachelors in Business Administration and have lived in Topeka for over 22 years. My goal is to help you from getting connected with a lender, showing you the home that you will love, negotiating the offer price for your home, ordering inspections, walking you through the closing process and handing over the keys for your dream home.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Hi, I’m Dawson Steeby. With a strong foundation in sales that spans four years and nearly two years dedicated to real estate, I bring a comprehensive skill set to assist you with all your property needs. My career began in sales, where I developed a keen ability to connect with clients, understand their needs, and deliver effective solutions. Transitioning into real estate, I discovered a true passion for helping individuals and families find their ideal homes, land, and investment properties. My approach is grounded in clear communication, deep market knowledge, and a commitment to achieving the best outcomes for my clients. Outside of work, I’m an avid outdoorsman who relishes time spent hunting, fishing, and golfing. Whether I’m exploring new trails, casting a line, or perfecting my swing, I find these activities rejuvenating and fulfilling. Above all, I cherish the moments spent with my family, enjoying quality time and creating lasting memories together. Balancing my professional life with these outdoor pursuits keeps me grounded and ready to tackle new challenges with enthusiasm.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Growing up in the quiet small town of Auburn, KS and now residing in Circleville, KS; Wendie knows NE Kansas very well. Growing up in a small town taught her to recognize and value the trust in every type of relationship, professional and personal. Wendie takes pride in knowing she strives to exceed her clients expectations everyday. Outside of real estate, Wendie is a devoted wife and mother of 4. She enjoys spending time with her family, hunting, fishing and riding ATV's. She takes pride in giving back to the community and helping others at every opportunity. Real Estate is a no brainer for Wendie, coming from generations of contractors; she understands the ins and outs of the whole home process. As an experienced Realtor, Wendie will make your home buying or selling process a breeze. Whether you are looking for your forever home, just a stepping stone or even an investment property; let me help guide you through the whole process.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am passionate about helping my clients achieve their home ownership dreams. As a homeowner, I understand that every family needs a comfortable space to call their own where they can make lasting memories. I seek to shoulder the burden and make the real estate buying and selling process stress-free, rewarding, and financially satisfying. Growing up around home construction, I pride myself on my knowledge in all aspects of construction to complete home remodeling. I understand what it takes to turn ideas into reality, which gives me the advantage of helping my clients know the best things to fix before selling or what to watch out for when buying. As a member of the National Association of Realtors, Kansas Association of Realtors, and Sunflower Association of Realtors, I emerge as a valuable resource for clients seeking reliable, accurate, and up-to-date information about this competitive market. When you work with me, you will receive a dedicated advocate protecting your best interests, a committed ally to negotiate on your behalf, and the systems in place to streamline the buying/ selling of your home. I will go above and beyond to ensure you obtain value from either process. I cherish and embrace inclusivity and diversity and work well with all customers. As a proud wife and mother, I know that having work/life balance is imperative. I work hard but also enjoy spending time outdoors with my family, camping, kayaking, hiking, and doing home remodeling projects. Whether you are looking to buy or sell in real estate, I am your go-to agent. Contact me today for outstanding customer service.

title: Associate Real Estate Broker
description:
I am very passionate about redefining real estate by offering a superior level of client service, innovative marketing and a highly personalized strategies to get you into your dream home. I have a very trusted list of vendors at your disposal ready to make your transaction smooth and painless. It is important to me that my clients feel safe and confident about their purchase. One of their biggest investments ever! With my achievements in the community and my profession I am certain I am the right agent for you. 
Beyond my real estate career, I am a mother of 3 young children and live a life by design all for them. They are my shooting stars. Outside of spending time with them and selling homes I enjoy doing home improvement projects, volunteering in the community and serving on various committees in my association and a position on the SAR board. 
I am a Topeka native but also understand a large distant move. I lived in different cities throughout the east coast when I was younger but always made my way back to my home town. I love this city and it's surrounding areas. If you need a strong, understanding , experienced agent in your corner please give me a call today!

title: Associate Real Estate Broker
description:
I’m Morgan Whitney and becoming your REALTOR Resource and successfully assisting you in finding, buying, selling and/or building your dream home or investment properties is my business!

I have over 35 years experience learning the real estate industry from the ground up. I was born into a real estate dynasty and am a third generation REALTOR.

My Grandmother was one of the very first female real estate professionals in the industry, entering it at a time primarily dominated by men in the 1960s. She grew up on a farm in a small Midwest town and as a child loved showing anyone and everyone all around town. My Grandmother became the top Realtor not only in her city and state, but also top in the nation! She always believed in taking GREAT care of people in any way, shape or form that she could, knowing that becoming their best resource and navigator would make whatever transaction and transition a lot easier on them.

I inherited these same beliefs and am blessed by having many of my Grandmother’s traits. I share her commitment to serving others and have likewise built my reputation and business on taking GREAT care of my clients and customers!

It’s not only my grandparents, parents and uncle’s real estate careers that taught me all the ins & outs of the real estate business...I’ve literally been showing homes, sitting open houses, working Parade of Homes, attending closings, picking up title work, creating and filling brochure boxes, assisting in the development of new home subdivisions and interacting with construction subcontractors, builders and developers my whole life!

I’m married to the most wonderful man in the world and I am the Mother to three incredible children.

I look forward to becoming YOUR REALTOR Resource and putting my knowledge of the area and real estate experience to work for you!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: .Alena Sellers has been a realtor since 2017. She specializes in the Wichita and surrounding areas.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: • Licensed Realtor in the State of Kansas since 2006

title: Associate Real Estate Broker
description: I have been helping Military personnel with their real estate needs since 1998. My father served our country and I honor his memory by offering the best of me (my knowledge, my representation, my experience and my honesty) to my servicemember clients. I moved to Derby, Kansas in 2006 from Detroit, Michigan. I know what it’s like to move across the country to a place you have never been! My experience makes me uniquely qualified to help military and relocation clients. I have a whole list of things I wish someone would have shared with me and questions that I wish I would have known to asked prior to moving here. Now that I am here, I love it! It is a wonderful community and a stable economy, and I love sharing everything I know about the area and with my clients. I am in the top 3% of agents in our Better Homes and Garden Real Estate Franchise world-wide and I am a full-time real estate professional. I am not a “salesperson”. I am a Consultant, I am an Advisor. My greatest joy treating my service member clients so well that in the end, they want to hug me (if they are “huggers” like me) and tell all of their friends about me. I have built my business on the “hugs” and my clients believing in me enough to tell others about me. It means everything to me. I believe deeply in the Real Estate industry. So much so, that I have served on the Board of Directors of our Realtor Association for 6 years, I teach other agents continuing education classes and Code of Ethics training locally and throughout the state, I teach the public how to get their real estate license and write instructional training for current real estate professionals. I want to be your agent. We are in this together. Give me a call today and let me help you make your move. Brenda 316-871-4586

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I have the best job in the world! I have been a REALTOR® since 2005, and was Rookie of the Year with RE/MAX in 2005. In 2016, I upgraded companies to Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Alliance, which provided me with even more tools and resources to deliver the highest level of service to each and every one of my clients. I love being a part of such a fun new chapter in life for each of my clients. Just a few of the types of clients I have helped are first-time home buyers; newlyweds joining families; growing families; those moving closer to Mom, Dad, or Grandparents; or those growing their investment business. Being a source of help and relief during such a busy time is a comfort to my clients, and I take the responsibility very seriously. I have built my business by referral; in other words, taking great care of each of my clients and building relationships one home at a time!!! I would love to help you sell your home to the perfect buyers or purchase the home of your dreams. Contact me today!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Elita is a licensed REALTOR with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Alliance working in the greater Wichita, Ks area. A real estate industry veteran for over 13 years, and is well-regarded in the industry for her attention to detail, professionalism and commitment to personal service. She has represented both buyers and sellers in all parts of Sedgwick and Butler counties, and specializes in first-time and move up home buyers, residential listings and investment properties.

title: Real Estate Broker
description: Moving can be overwhelming…. But it doesn’t have to be! I have been helping families move in Kansas for 30 years. I am absolutely committed to this business and industry. In the last 20 years, I have served on our esteemed Board of Directors for the Wichita Area for 11 of those years. I am committed to the education and professional development for 2,000 Realtors in our area… I teach licensing and continuing education for these agents, along w/assisting my clients find their dream home. I adhere to a strong Code of Ethics and it is one of my favorite things to teach. Keeping myself always up to date with buying/selling trends, market value, negotiation techniques and simply being available for my clients. I raised two kids as a full time Realtor. I am now an “empty nester” and my work is also my hobby! I worked as a Managing Broker for a large real estate firm in town, and a few years ago I decided to focus more on my clients, giving the benefit of all of my experience directly my clients. My past clients referrals and “repeat clients” are my top source of business. Wichita and the surrounding area’s are one of the best places to live… we have a lot to offer families moving into this area! When you call me, we create a Team… and I will be there with you every step of the way, to make this as smooth of transaction as we can! Let’s get started!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Realtor of South Central Kansas

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am a Licensed Realtor with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Alliance, working out of Wichita, and serving most of South Central Kansas. A Real Estate veteran since 2001, I am recognized in the Industry for my passion, experience and quality of service for my Clients. I pride myself on taking care of my Clients' needs, whether it's selling or buying a home. My core belief is in QUALITY of service, not Quantity. Regardless of the value, I will work hard for you and earn your referral business. My dedication and passion for the Industry is shown through my involvement with the local Association. Voted on by my peers, I serve on the Board of Directors for the Realtors of South Central Kansas, which allows me to keep a pulse on recent trends and how the Industry is performing. I also serves as the Committee Chair for the local MLS and am an Instructor with the Association to help educate Realtors in the area. With my involvement with the Real Estate Industry, the passion to help my Clients achieve their goals, and my strong ethical approach to the business, I am a great choice for your Real Estate needs.

title: Real Estate Broker
description: My family dates back to the establishment of Andover Kansas (a suburb of Wichita). Being raised in Wichita, and raising my 5 children in Wichita, I have seen the immense growth, the challenges, the ever changing landscape, and the insurmountable pride of Wichitans. My grandfather, father, son and grandson are military which has allowed me to experience the challenges and rewards of military life. I pride myself on the focus I give to every client and their unique circumstances. I will treat you with respect and diplomacy while expertly guiding you through your real estate transaction. I feel it is an honor and privilege to assist in your real estate needs. Please feel free to use me as your resource. My motto is a quote from Douglas Adams: “To give real service you must add something which cannot be bought or measured with money, and that is sincerity and integrity”.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: The world of real estate is extremely exciting and diversified. Every client presents the opportunity to learn something new. Matching families and individuals with their first home, dream home or investment property is one of the most rewarding careers! My clients allow me to assist them in a multitude of tasks from finding the financing best suited to their needs, through home search, contract negotiations, appraisal, inspections and finally closing day! Every step of the way I am by their side providing valuable information to make purchasing a home a pleasant experience.Knowing how to listen to my client's needs is a critical part of this process!I take pride in my business and the opportunity to continually educate myself on the ever changing world of real estate. Education is a critical component of a great agent in this business. I have served two terms on our local Professional Standards Committee. I believe it is important to be involved with our local board and to serve, upholding the ethical standards of our industry are crucial.Giving back to my community is also an important aspect of who I am as a person. I volunteer with my churches prayer ministry and benevolence committee and our clothes closet. I also serve meals at Rescue Mission, donate to our local food bank, and work in The Tree House, a ministry to teen mothers that educates them on the art of being a mother and caring for a child..Being a part of your next home buying or selling experience would be a great honor! Call or email anytime!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I'm an expert real estate agent with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Alliance in WICHITA, KS and the nearby area, providing home-buyers and sellers with professional, responsive and attentive real estate services. Want an agent who'll really listen to what you want in a home? Need an agent who knows how to effectively market your home so it sells? Give me a call! I'm eager to help and would love to talk to you.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am Nichole La Fond, proudly serving Wichita and the surrounding area with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Alliance. I am here to assist you in your home-buying and selling needs, with a focus on providing you personalized service and the benefit of my local expertise in Wichita. Please feel free to call or text me at 316-617-6321 to begin this exciting process!

title: Real Estate Broker
description: Putting myself in your shoes is what I do best - your goals, wants, needs and desires is my honor to achieve. Over 30 years of finding the best property based on your goals for your primary residence, business site or cash flow real estate investments for the best price. Everyone wants a good deal, and my negotiating skills, and attention to detail in pricing analysis helps sell properties for the most they will bring, and get you that perfect home for the bottom dollar. Another 10 years in the middle were spent as a lender, so I keep up with all the financial product options to make those important choices to save you time & money. Put my experience in your tool box when buying or selling - A Better Agent makes all the difference in the World...

title: Kansas City, MO
description:
“I thoroughly enjoy working with home buyers, sellers, and investors. My goal is to create a unique experience throughout the transaction that emphasizes a client-centric focus and a high level of communication. My clients matter to me, because I really do put my heart into what I do. Real Estate is not just a job to me: It’s my passion.

If I can help you buy or sell a home, or if you’re an investor looking for an agent with whom to partner, I’d be honored to talk with you more about what I can offer your situation.


Your home is one of your greatest assets. Shouldn’t your real estate agent be too?”

title: Kansas City, MO
description: Buying or selling a home can be a complex process. Whether you need expert advice, market information, or assistance to find the home of your dreams, I am here to help you with all of your real estate needs. With kansascityhomes.com, you can view virtually every available home in the Kansas City Metro area. When you find a home that meets your qualifications, please let me know. I can arrange a showing or answer questions about any property you see. Simply click on my e-mail address to send me a message or give me a call. I'm looking forward to serving you!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am a licensed REALTOR© with Better Home and Gardens Real Estate Alliance working out of Wichita Kansas, and servicing much of South Central Kansas. I am honored to have been recognized in the top 300 Realtors in our local area in 2020-2022. I have achieved the President’s Club Award numerous years through our local Real Estate Association as well as reaching the Master's Level since 2018. I was honored to be a Gold Award winner in 2019/20 and reached Platinum through Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate recognition. My awards are a tribute to the amazing families I have been honored to help over the past nine years. I have a Passion for working with first time home buyer and military families. My father and uncles were all in the Air Force or Army, and my brother served in the US Navy. My dedication to top notch customer service extends back over 20 years through positions in sales and customer service positions. My passion is to help my clients achieve their Real Estate goals whether buying or selling with the utmost loyalty, honesty, and integrity. The awards and recognition are humbly appreciated. My true reward though?? It is seeing a young family achieve their dreams of first time home ownership. It is seeing a growing family move up into a home that meets the needs for their growing family. It is helping a couple downsize now that they are empty nesters to a home that they aren't swallowed up in. And, there are times when I am asked to assist for the not so happy times. Parents pass away and the children sell their parent's home , and unfortunately divorces happen, but I strive to make those tough sales as easy as I can for the parties involved. A home purchase or sale is a huge decision. I am honored to help make that huge step as profitable for a seller as I can, or help a buyer get the best deal that we can.

title: Kansas City, MO
description: As a licensed real estate agent my focus is on providing excellent customer service, consistent communication and strong attention to detail, ensuring a positive experience for you, my client. Working with me is about finding just the right home for you and your family to build memories in. I am a lifelong Kansas City resident and it's where I chose to raise my family. My knowledge and love of our city shows in my work. I enjoy helping people with their selling and buying needs and want you to know that when you choose me as your agent your complete satisfaction is my priority.

title: Kansas City, MO
description: As a team, Don and Joy's passion is their mission: Honor God by creating value and serving the Kansas City community with excellence, care, and integrity, in all of their real estate needs. Don and Joy's heart is to teach their clients about the process of buying or selling their home. They strive to go above and beyond what is required in the purchase or sale of your home, and they ultimately aim to serve the best interest of their clients. Don and Joy love having the privilege to help people through one of the most difficult and stressful transactions of their lives, and they works to make the process as painless and fun as possible! Don and Joy take pleasure in the relationships made through working with their clients far beyond 'closing day'. They will work with you to find your real estate goals and create an action plan to help you reach them as quickly and effectively as possible.

title: Kansas City, MO
description: Chuck Etem is focused on meeting and exceeding client expectations. Whether Selling or Buying a home, condo, loft or town home, Chuck Etem has the experience to assist you in reaching your goals and dreams. Chuck has extensive experience in the Selling & Buying of single family homes, condos, town homes, new construction and farm property. Buying your first home is easier when you have the assistance of an experienced professional who considers your wants and needs paramount. The difference between good and excellent is preparation and with Chuck Etem you will find the excellence you deserve. Your experience will be the best with an experienced real estate professional who is a Certified Negotiation Expert, Certified Residential Specialist, Graduate of the Realtor Institute, Accredited Buyers Representative. A very satisfied client said it best - "We love Chuck"

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Jon is a Senior Sales Associate with Better Homes and Garden Real Estate Kansas City Homes in the Platte County Office. Jon began his career in real estate in 2003 after 25 years in corporate America. He has worked with first time buyers and sellers through-out the metro area as well as four different new home subdivisions and high end properties. As a lifetime resident of the Kansas City area he has earned a reputation as an agent that knows and understands the local Kansas City market. His commitment to understanding his clients needs and always doing whats best for the client has earned him a loyal referral business from past clients to their friends and family. Jon's motto, "Focused on Your Real Estate Needs", is more than a slogan. It is a promise to always work to educate his clients and to keep them informed during the entire real estate transaction and to make it an enjoyable process for everyone involved.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I specialize in and have experience assisting: First Time Home Buyers, Military Family Real Estate Needs, Active Duty Military, Retired Military, VA Loan process experience . I am a Kansas City native with a passion for helping our clients learn to love the area as much as I do! Finding the right home in the right location of the city is just part of creating the lifestyle experience. Since 1994, my husband and I have been a real estate team working together to meet the needs of our clients in a timely manner to create a smooth real estate transaction. Our years of experience have made us experts in new construction, corporate relocation, investment properties, and general residential resale. Being full time REALTORs for all these years we have seen it all and can help you achieve your real estate needs! Experience, integrity and hard work is what you expect and we provide!

title: Kansas City, MO
description: I began my work in the field of housing over 15 years ago as a social worker managing HUD funded housing programs for those who are HIV infected, disabled, low income, and many times homeless. I quickly learned the value of safe, affordable housing for those clients I served. I quickly learned the Kansas City housing market, its neighborhoods and their amenities, which has all been a great background for the work I've begun in residential sales. No matter what life circumstances a person faces, we are all grounded in the common need for something safe, affordable and pleasing as a place to live and raise families. The willingness of my clients to trust me in the process of finding and buying a home inspires me to listen well, be persistent and go the extra mile on their behalf. It is a joy to help a client find that perfect "fit" in a home and guide them through the home buying process and the many decisions they need to make as they find their next dream home.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: As a team, Don and Joy's passion is their mission: Honor God by creating value and serving the Kansas City community with excellence, care, and integrity, in all of their real estate needs. Don and Joy's heart is to teach their clients about the process of buying or selling their home. They strive to go above and beyond what is required in the purchase or sale of your home, and they ultimately aim to serve the best interest of their clients. Don and Joy love having the privilege to help people through one of the most difficult and stressful transactions of their lives, and they work to make the process as painless and fun as possible! Don and Joy take pleasure in the relationships made through working with their clients far beyond 'closing day'. They will work with you to find your real estate goals and create an action plan to help you reach them as quickly and effectively as possible. When Don and Joy aren't working with clients, they are most likely spending time with their family, serving in their church, or hanging out with friends. They have also enjoyed coordinating Dave Ramsey's Financial Peace University classes. Before Joy's career in Real Estate began, she worked in the Healthcare IT industry and also worked with ELL students in Liberty Public Schools. Joy earned a Bachelor's degree from William Jewell College and additionally received formal interpreting training in Spanish through a local community college. Outside of working with clients and helping them through the purchase or sale of their home, Joy is passionate about helping people, traveling and getting together with friends and family.

title: Kansas City, MO
description:
An experienced and professional real estate agent, Katy Graber Lee confidently assists her clients in every aspect of their home purchases and sales. Her extensive knowledge of the Northland, and lifetime in Liberty, MO, helps her advise customers with the areas of Kansas City that will best meet their needs.

She understands the lifestyle aspect a home search embodies and prides herself on actively listening to her customers and meeting those requirements. Katy and her husband are also raising a family in the Liberty area, which puts her in tune with the importance of community and school districts.

Katy is always one to find solutions by looking at things from a perspective of what’s going to be best for not only her clients, but everyone involved. Her solid work ethic makes her a favorite among cooperating agents and her animated personality makes house hunting a truly enjoyable experience.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Whether you're buying or selling a home, you can count on me to deliver a better real estate experience.

Searching through thousands of listings for a home that fits your lifestyle can be quite a task. With my help and by using our exclusive home search tools, you can narrow down your choices to homes you want to see in person. Once you find the home that's right for you, I'll help you navigate the buying process from contract to closing to keys in your hand. Knowledge is power, and I will help you understand every step of the home buying process to help ensure you have a seamless real estate experience.

Need to sell your home? You'll breathe a lot easier knowing you’ve got a professional REALTOR® at your side to provide expert advice. I have vendors for just about every area from major home remodeling to handyman advice for small jobs, anything that needs to be done to prepare your home to list. My aggressive marketing strategy will help you sell your home for the most amount of money in the least amount of time.

No matter your real estate goals, when you're ready to make a move, contact me for a better experience.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Thanks for stopping by my website. I am excited to help you with any of your housing needs. Over 17 years of experience in new home, and residential real estate. Experienced relocation agent helping find you that perfect home for your family. Licensed in Missouri and Kansas, specializing in North of the River and the Liberty Mo. area. Top producer and full time agent. Working to serve your needs. Customer Service is my top priority. Larry

title: Kansas City, MO
description: Mary is a licensed Realtor in both Missouri and Kansas. Coming from a background of sales for IBM and 3M, providing excellent customer service is her primary focus. "Mary went beyond what I would expect from my Realtor before, during and after the purchase" She has acted as licensed a Real Estate consultant for over 15 years as a Buys and Sellers Agent. Mary has renovated several homes herself; she has experience in all areas of residential real estate including renovations and investment. She is one of the few Realtors in Kansas City that is a Certified Negotiation Expert.Mary is in the top 1% of Realtors in the Kansas City area

title: Kansas City, MO
description: Mike Seymour doesn't know a stranger. Since 1993, he's been making friends by helping people purchase and sell their homes in and around the Kansas City area. His professionalism and honesty has earned him a reputation in the industry as one of the top in his league. A recipient of a lifetime achievement award and a member of the ReMax Hall Of Fame (where Mike spent part of his career), his successes are numerous. He thrives in Kansas City, where he loves the big-city amenities with small-town character. His clients always feel at home throughout the entire process because of his ability to truly listen to their wants and needs. When Mike isn't working, you might catch this family man golfing, boating, or spending quality time with his kids and grandkids.

title: Kansas City, MO
description:
2020 NEWCOMER OF THE YEAR
Home is where you can truly be yourself. My passion is being able to help people find their happy space, I love making your goals and dreams a reality! I provide focused one-on-one customer service to my clients, responding to troubles along the way with knowledge, innovation and compassion. By getting to the heart of your needs and wants I implement competitive digital marketing tools to bring the daunting home process together with ease!
Born and raised KC gal, I spent my earliest years in the suburbs before moving to 15 beautiful acres in the country.
With interests wide ranging and unique I can connect with just about anyone. In my free time you can find me volunteering at Friends of Parkville Animal Shelter, out hiking or biking, or spending time with my family.

title: Liberty, MO
description:
Better Management = Better Success
I've had the pleasure of being in the real estate world in Kansas City since 2000. As an area native, I'm proud to be the one standing shoulder to shoulder with our new and seasoned real estate agents while we serve the communities I've loved my whole life. My promise to our consumers is that you'll have a knowledgeable professional on your side throughout the transaction. And, when anyone gets stumped with an issue, I'm always right there to help. My promise to my agents is to be accessible, open and authentic. Every teaching moment gets taught and every victory gets celebrated in our Liberty office. We have a culture of lifting each other up and leaning on one another like family. With a per person production rate double most offices in the city, everyone can rest assured we have the transactional experience to back up our claim of being BETTER.


A company with our reputation relies on partnering with the right people to represent us.
If you've ever been interested in a real estate career, reach out anytime, I'm happy to meet with you.


Our WHY: To inspire our community to be better
My motto: #loveyourpeople

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Whether you're buying or selling a home, you can count on me to deliver a better real estate experience.

Searching through thousands of listings for a home that fits your lifestyle can be quite a task. With my help and by using our exclusive home search tools, you can narrow down your choices to homes you want to see in person. Once you find the home that's right for you, I'll help you navigate the buying process from contract to closing to keys in your hand.

Need to sell your home? You'll breathe a lot easier knowing you’ve got a professional REALTOR® at your side to provide expert advice. I'll work closely with you to sell your home for the most amount of money in the least amount of time.

No matter your real estate goals, when you’re ready to make a move, contact me for a better experience.

title: Keene, NH
description: Ara moved from the UK and planted roots in the Upper Valley over twenty years ago. With fifteen years of Real Estate experience, a background in mastering ceramics, and a history in building and construction, Ara has the knowledge and expertise to help you find the perfect home that meets both your style and needs.

title: Keene, NH
description: Buying or selling a home can be a very overwhelming process, but having a caring and honest professional on your side can make all the difference. Having the opportunity to work with clients to achieve their goals is why I am so passionate about the Real Estate business. As a long-time resident of Swanzey, I have had the privilege of experiencing New Hampshire’s beauty first hand. I will be your advocate from start to finish and will ensure your experience is as fun, and stress-free as possible.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
In October of 2012, Tiffany joined Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Kansas City Homes. She brings with her a great love for Kansas City and the surrounding area. Having lived in the city since childhood, she is a great resource of knowledge about the many different neighborhoods, school districts and local entertainment areas.
Tiffany loves meeting and working with new people. One of her top qualities is listening and relating to her clients, she does her very best to accommodate their needs. Tiffany’s clients have become long lasting friends, she understands that the home buying or selling process can be stressful and does her best to make the process smooth and comfortable with a little bit of fun!

title: Keene, NH
description: With over 35 years of calling Southwest New Hampshire my home, my journey began in Connecticut, but it was the allure of the Monadnock Region that captured my heart and led to a life-changing decision to relocate with my family. Now residing in the charming town of West Chesterfield, I still find myself marveling at the rolling hills, spectacular forests, and quaint small towns that define this region. My career spans over three decades in marketing, where I've honed my skills in working with people and finding creative solutions to problems. Now, as a Realtor, I bring this wealth of experience and passion to every transaction. My commitment to excellence, meticulous attention to detail, and unwavering focus on customer satisfaction are the cornerstones of my approach. I welcome the opportunity to help you navigate the real estate landscape of Southwest New Hampshire. With my deep-rooted love for this region and my dedication to delivering exceptional service, I strive to make your real estate endeavors not only successful but also memorable. Whether you're buying, selling, or investing, let me be your trusted partner in realizing your housing dreams in this picturesque corner of New England.

title: Kansas City, MO
description: I have been a licensed real estate agent since 2000 and I love my profession. My satisfaction in this business rests with being accessible to clients, responding to their requests and concerns promptly, and treating all buyers and sellers the same -regardless of the price of their home. I wake up everyday to be the best agent I can be for my clients. I realize that purchasing a home is a monumental accomplishment and investment. I am grateful to be an agent who is available and willing to help others succeed in their goals. I find the professional relationships with my clients to be the best reward and I continually search for ways to make their experience enjoyable. I love meeting new people, learning their stories, and sharing in the excitement of first time homeownership.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am a lifelong resident of the Monadnock Region, very active in the community, a trusted leader and hard worker. I have 20+ years in several aspects of the real estate industry in addition to personal experience buying and selling properties. I understand the stresses that can occur on both sides of the transaction and I will work to make your sale and/or purchase smooth and easy. My commitment to you and the community goes beyond buying and selling real estate. Giving back to my community is at the forefront of everything I do. I donate a portion of the proceeds from my closings to a charity in the Monadnock Region. Ask me more about my socially responsible endeavors. I'd love to help you and, in turn, be able to give back to our community. Thank you for considering working with me.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Pam has been a full-time REALTOR® since 2001. She has also been one of the top selling agents in the St. Joseph Regional Board of REALTORS® for the past ten years.

Pam has consistently set the standard as a results-oriented REALTOR® with respect from her customers as well as her colleagues. From the very first meeting, you’ll find Pam to be warmhearted and intuitive to your needs.

Pam knows that Buying or Selling a house is one of the most important financial/emotional decisions you’ll make in your life; which is exactly why Pam has developed strong local ties and a vast professional network to assist you.

Team effort: Pam understands how stressful the whole process of buying and selling can be. She makes a promise to her clients to try to keep the humor, even when things get sticky, yet be serious about the task at hand. Pam’s philosophy is People First.

She can help you get your home ready to sell by offering her keen eye for color, furniture arrangement, updating, downsizing and staging advice. She also will use her ambitious spirit to Market and Sell your home or hunt down the perfect new home for you

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I grew up just over the border in Brattleboro Vermont and have been a Keene, NH resident since 1986. My educational background is in finance where I hold a degree in Accounting. I have many years of sales experience going back 35 years, starting in retail sales. I have over the years owned a number of retail stores. I have been with Masiello since 1999, being involved in rentals, commercial sales and residential sales. If you have a business or home to sell, I will give you 100% of my time and effort to get the job done for you. My approach to real estate is much as it is to life, treat others the way you would like to be treated in a fair and honest way. I approach every transaction with my clients interest and welfare as my number one priority. In my spare time I enjoy working out, hiking the trails with my dog Titan and spending time with my best friend and girlfriend, Heidi.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I have been licensed since 1984. My background includes construction, surverying, restaurant management and retail sales. I also own a veriety of apartment buildings. My background with the constuction and the apartment buildings means I have first hand experience to share with you. My restaurant training has included extensive people skills. This is a great asset when tring to bring buyers and sellers to a successful closing. The best way to reach me is via cell phone 603-209-2904.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Raised in NY and CT, I moved to Cheshire County in 198, and have enjoyed all the region has to offer ever since. A homeowner since 1989, I've enjoyed taking on extensive renovations and restoration projects in the homes I've owned, as well as the excitement of raising two daughters. In addition to my other activities, I've enjoyed serving my community through venues such as the Economic Development Committee, Budget Committee, and the School Board. A sales professional for more than twenty years, I have extensive connections in Cheshire County that enable me to better serve my customers, often thinking outside the box for innovative solutions. I've achieved awards on both local and national levels, and look forward to helping others fulfill their goals when buying and selling real estate in New Hampshire.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Your home should be a sanctuary of harmony and health that meets the unique needs of your family. Greening your existing or next home may be easier than you think, as any home can be made better, sometimes with simple, inexpensive updates. GREEN realtors put an emphasis on helping customers who want to market or purchase healthy, energy efficient homes. An in-depth knowledge of issues and concerns, from radon to replacement windows, relationships with local providers of solar, wind, geo-thermal, air quality and energy evaluation systems puts me at the leading edge of the green housing movement in the Monadnock Region.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Meet Gerry, your go-to guide for a seamless and satisfying real estate journey! With a background in steering large manufacturing firms, Gerry has mastered the art of customer-centric management, overseeing everything from finances to operations and quality assurance. His unwavering focus on customer needs and a commitment to high-quality performance have been the driving force behind his success.
Having lived in various parts of the country due to career growth, Gerry understands the ins and outs of buying and selling homes, making him your ideal partner in the real estate market. His exceptional people and customer skills effortlessly transition into delivering an exceptional experience for both home buyers and sellers.
Currently residing in the picturesque Keene, NH area with his family, Gerry is fully immersed in the charm of New Hampshire's outdoor activities. Leveraging his expertise, he is licensed to facilitate real estate transactions in both Massachusetts and New Hampshire. Trust Gerry to turn your real estate dreams into a reality, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable process every step of the way.

title: Keene, NH
description:
I have been involved in many aspects of real estate over the years—as a homeowner, a buyer, a seller, a landlord, a manager of multi-family properties, a property rehabber, a renovator, a consultant in the development of a 27 home co-housing community, and as an advocate for affordable housing.
Let me put my expertise to work for you! I have lived in the Monadnock Region for nearly 20 years and am well versed in the area’s real estate market. In addition, I am a board member of the Monadnock chapter of Habitat For Humanity.
It would be an honor to assist you in the exciting and challenging process of buying or selling a home. I bring honesty, integrity, hard work, persistence, professionalism and enthusiasm to every interaction. I look forward to working with you!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Choose a REALTOR® who knows the market, has a strong online presence, communicates effectively, and meticulously attends to every detail to maximize your success in buying or selling a home. Home buying or selling is one of life’s most significant decisions. You deserve a REALTOR® who is deeply knowledgeable about local communities, up-to-date on market conditions, and passionate about guiding you through the real estate process. I'm a full-time real estate agent serving the Monadnock Region in New Hampshire and Southern Vermont. I specialize in helping buyers and sellers achieve their real estate goals, whether residential or commercial, from First-Time Home Buyers to Luxury Listings. As a local and a homeowner, I understand that a home is more than just a place to live—its where cherished memories are made. My deep love for the community, coupled with my enthusiastic, can-do attitude, makes me the ideal partner in your real estate journey. I know that buying or selling a home can be very challenging and often stressful - it's one of the biggest transactions of your life. Thats why it's so important to have a trusted real estate professional and friend by your side. I strive to make all of my clients’ real estate experiences seamless, successful, and, hopefully, even fun. I'm committed to listening to your needs, leveraging my extensive expertise, and utilizing my sharp negotiating skills to ensure a successful transaction. I'm driven by passion, integrity, and excellence - I love real estate but most importantly I love helping people. I'm dedicated to providing exceptional service in all your real estate endeavors. New England will always be my home & I am beyond excited to share it with you.
Credentials: Member of the Monadnock Board of REALTORS® Member of the New Hampshire Association of REALTORS® Member of the National Association of REALTORS® Vice President of the Cheshire Children’s Museum Board Accredited Buyes Agent - ABR® C2EX Endorsed REALTORS® Commitment to Excellence Luxury Home Specialist

title: Associate Real Estate Broker
description: Positive. Energetic. Creative. Dedicated - That’s me!I was born and raised in Swanzey, NH and am pleased to have always called Cheshire County my home. Prior to becoming a Realtor, I worked for BH&G The Masiello Group - the area's leading local real estate company - in their marketing department for nearly 8 years. This experience gave me an abundance of knowledge about advertising and marketing all types of real estate; Single family homes, commercial properties, new home communities, waterfront properties, etc. The best results come from working with those you enjoy and I trust that you will be pleased with my services. But don’t just take my word for it - hear what my clients are saying about working with me: “Jill was a pleasure to work with. She is very organized and replied promptly to any questions I had. Every step of the process was explained well. I trusted Jill completely and was very comfortable with the sale. The pictures she took made my house look amazing. Overall a great experience and would work with her again without a second thought.” - Steve H. We the Quinones Family deeply appreciate your patience, attention and help given to us through the process of buying our new home in Keene. Keep working hard and being helpful to your clients, just for that in our eyes you stand out over the crowd. In any opportunity that we would have to recommend a REALTOR, we will not hesitate to recommend Jillian Exel! Thank you for a job well done. - Eliel & Josephina Q. The Monadnock Region has always been my home and I’d love to share it with you. I am certain that I can help you accomplish your real estate goals and look forward to hearing from you about working together on all your real estate buying and selling needs.

title: Keene, NH
description: When I made the transition into real estate in 2005 after a successful 30+ year foodservice career, times were trying in the industry. The Great Recession began two years into my career just when I should have been ramping up by making contacts and establishing a customer base in a solid region. It turned out to be a time to hone my skill in communication, ( as social media as we know it today was exploding on the scene ), and develop a thorough understanding of all aspects of the business. It was a time when many new and seasoned agents were dropping out of real estate. By staying the course, I maintained Top Producer status in my office of 13 agents of The Masiello Group from 2008 to the present. The Great Recession also gave me the opportunity to get more involved in my community and local and state boards. I joined the Contoocook Valley Board of Realtors, served actively on several committees and served as its President 3 times, in 2009, 2010, and 2016. I still remain active on that board. I also became a 6 year member of the Board of Directors for Monadnock Family Services in Keene and served 6 years on the Board of The Greater Peterborough Chamber of Commerce. My volunteering services earned me the Realtor Honor Society recognition from The Contoocook Valley Board for 14 years. I was also recognized as the Contoocook Valley Board Realtor of the Year in 2009 and 2016. Since 2017, I am the National Association of Realtors Federal Political Coordinator to Congresswoman Annie Kuster. This non partisan position has me in direct contact with our representative in Congress , relaying to her the real estate needs and concerns of the buying and selling public and for Realtors in the 2nd Congressional District in NH. Every member of Congress and every Senator nationwide has a Realtor assigned to them, and I am proud to fill this position in NH. Most importantly, my 15 years as a full time Realtor has taught me about how being proactive and communicating to the hilt makes for smooth and successful transactions, helping prole find their new of first home and helping others sell during a life transition or other reason. And equally important, my personal move to Keene is a positive change for me. Since Keene is my hometown, I hope to renew old contacts and create lots of new ones. This is a great region of New Hampshire and I know it well, and look forward to growing my business here and remain successful by creating a memorable home buying or selling experience with you.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am a self-motivated and self-sufficient Sales and Marketing Professional with a deep and advanced knowledge of the Real Estate industry. I am able to turn a stranger into a loyal customer for life. I am well known throughout the region as an enthusiastic professional. I excel at providing guidance and assisting sellers and buyers in marketing and purchasing property forthe right price under the best terms. I promote sales through advertisements, open houses andlisting services.I remain knowledgeable about the real estate market and best practices. Boards:Commercial Investment Board of Realtors,National Association of RealtorsSouthern Vermont Board of Realtors, Monadnock Board of Realtor Residential & Commercial Realtor Licensed in 4 states: NH # 071402 VT # 082.0122703 MA # 9553596 ME #BA925150

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: As a lifelong resident of Swanzey, involved in several community activities, along with over 40 years of real estate sales and management experience, I provide both commitment to my customers as well as organizational and directional skills honed from successfully owning and operating The Holbrook Home for Senior Citizens, The Coffee House Restaurant and B.G. Curry Real Estate.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Kirsten Perkins brings nine years of real estate expertise to Cheshire County as a dedicated Realtor. A lifelong resident of this vibrant community, Kirsten is now raising her own family here, deeply rooted in its culture and lifestyle. She finds immense joy in guiding new buyers through the home buying journey, offering invaluable insights and education along the way. Kirsten's passion extends to assisting sellers with every facet of the selling process, providing comprehensive support from inception to closure. Outside of her professional pursuits, Kirsten treasures moments spent with her family, whether traveling to new destinations, enjoying beach outings, or indulging in creative crafting endeavors.

title: Keene, NH
description: Welcome to my website. My name is Elaine Hall. I am a Realtor, Associate Broker, and a graduate of the Real Estate Institute. I have lived in this area my entire life and am eager and well qualified to introduce this unique region we call Monadnock to prospective buyers. The Keene area has an abundance of history, education, arts, food, and outdoor challenges. It is the perfect place to raise a family or to come home to! I am associated with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate The Masiello Group because the agency represents Quality. I am able to offer the latest and best services to my clients and I like to think I do it in a personal way. My clients receive individual service: for as long as needed, to find the right place to call home. I am also experienced in representing sellers, I have enjoyed success in marketing property and even offering advice for the big move. My business is truly All about people!
