I am privileged to be associated with The Masiello Group, not only because we are an industry leader through-out New Hampshire, Maine, Vermont and Massachusetts, but because we are a team. When I am not showing off diverse neighborhoods and small towns, I stay connected to the Monadnock Board of Realtors and am proud to be a former president and member of the board. Outside the office I am on the Advisory Board for Cedarcrest Center for Children and their Ad Hoc Committee for Development. To help stay connected to my community I volunteer for the American Red Cross.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Licensed in New Hampshire, Laurie was born and raised on a mini farm in the Monadnock region with deep roots in the Walpole and Alstead area. She is passionate about preserving community, New England lifestyle and supporting small businesses. She has a background of more than 15 years in website design, digital marketing and branding. She has been very active in the community volunteering for Joy's Network, The Greater Keene Chamber of Commerce, Hannah Grimes Center for Entrepreneurship, and the Monadnock Humane Society. She intends to provide her clients with innovative methods from her marketing experience and life in New Hampshire to support all their real estate needs.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
I have lived in the Monadnock Region for the past 40+ years. I was educated in Worcester as a Registered Nurse and later a Childbirth Educator, in this region. Real Estate was my second career and I have taken extensive educational courses. I have chaired the Educational Committee and Co-chaired the REALTORS Fix-A-Home Project. I have worked full time in Real Estate for over 20 years and I am an Accredited Buyer Representative. I am dedicated to my job as a REALTOR and proud to give excellent customer service. I am thorough and detail oriented. I always try to listen to what my clients say, and try to make buying or selling property a pleasant experience, even in this challenging environment. I would love to go to work for you. It is wonderful to assist people in their very special Real Estate purchase, whether a first purchase or after multiple purchases.
I was honored by my fellow REALTORS as REALTOR of the Year in 2007. I was humbled by this award.
In early 2008, we were blessed with a beautiful first grandchild, a boy, named Henry David, born January 26, 2008 in Keene. Since that time I have 2 additional Grandchildren living in Keene with Henry now 9, Seth 6 and Emma 3. My son David and wife Jen, reside in Keene where he runs Wichland Woods as a Carpenter and Mushroom farmer Jen a teacher at Surry Charter School. My son, Tim is in Spokane WA., A yoga Instructor and teacher. My daughter, Katja is married living in Telluride, Co. and is a Realtor, and owns a Home Management Business and Animal Rescue.
I have been active in my community as a member of RISE for baby and family, Monadnock United Way, Juvenile Diversion, I have been active in the Keene Serenity Center for Substance Abuse Recovery and am a Recovery Coach in our area.
My husband, David, is a retail downtown merchant proprietor at Miller Bros. Newton, a family owned business for Men's Clothing
JUST CALL; I'LL BE THERE FOR YOU. Consultation and guidance will be on their way.
We also have a great Referral Network to help you or acquaintances to assist in your Real Estate needs in other towns or cities.
KATHY

title: Keene, NH
description: I have lived in the beautiful Monadnock Region most of my life. I have owned and operated my reputable home building and construction business since 1993. I am dynamic, detailed, driven, friendly, authentic, great listener and a people person. My work ethic, integrity, competence and experience has been evidenced throughout my building career. Not only have we bought and sold numerous properties, we understand the building process and have built quality residential homes, multi-family, condos and light commercial from the ground up for the past twenty four years. In addition, I have volunteered with our local Habitat For Humanity, building of the Rindge Recreation Center, The Hill Family Home, my church and many other community service projects in and around our area. I would love to have the opportunity to bring my expertise from the building industry to my clients. I look forward to helping you and your family reach your individual real estate dreams and goals. Outside of business, I am an avid outdoorsmen with a special interest in hiking, biking and coaching youth sports. In 2013, I had the great opportunity to pedal a bicycle across America. I completed the journey in 17 days and it was the most amazing experience. I value quality time spent together with my wife and four sons. We enjoy traveling extensively throughout America. How can I help you? Call 603-491-7533. Thanks, Jeremiah

title: Associate Broker
description: Buying or selling a home can be a wonderful experience, but it can also be a challenging time. Let me walk you through the process, making this transition as smooth as possible for you. I have been a resident of the Monadnock Region for more than 30 years. I have grown to appreciate this area and all it has to offer. My love of working with people is evidenced by my previous careers of running a child care center and a successful massage practice. Both of these professions involve working with and helping others. I always enjoy meeting new people and providing them with professional service in a friendly atmosphere. This life experience has enhanced and developed the skills I need to help you with the real estate process. Whether you are buying or selling a home, it’s not only about the house. It is really about you and your family, your needs and goals. I will listen to your needs and concerns, as well as your hopes and dreams. My goal is to provide you with superior service so you will have the best possible real estate experience. There will be no doubt that your best interests are my top priority. Staying in touch and keeping you informed throughout the process is also so important to me. You will find me to be warm, attentive to details, a good listener, honest, organized and even fun to be around! I believe that life progresses as a series of unending possibilities. I look forward to the opportunity to meet you and discover what those possibilities might be for you in the world of real estate! Member of the Monadnock Board of REALTORS® and 2019 President Member of New Hampshire Association of REALTORS® Member of the National Association of REALTORS®

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Buying and Selling a home is a major event and my expertise and track record help clients achieve their goals. Making sure the process is smooth and seamless is the cornerstone of my success. I strive to maintain long-term relationships with clients and help them make wise financial decisions with their real estate transactions. My ultimate goal is always to exceed expectations.

title: Associate Broker
description: I have been a top realtor at Masiello and Cheshire County for over 35 years specializing in residential real estate, relocation and lake homes. Having raised 3 sons in the area, I can provide valuable information on schools and activities for children. I have great communication skills and will go above and beyond to provide you with top notch service. I look forward to helping you with all your real estate needs.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Buying or selling a home can be an overwhelming process, but having a caring and honest professional on your side can make all the difference. Trust that I will be with you every step of the way with your best interest in mind. I work diligently with compassion, patience and willing to go the extra mile to help ensure a positive experience. If you're selling your home, my aggressive marketing plan combined with proven techniques and high quality photography assures that your property will stand out and receive the highest exposure near and far. I have a strong love for learning and I'm constantly growing with an open mind to strategies, diversity and technologies in our ever changing industry. As a Realtor, my top priority is client satisfaction. It's my goal to help make the process of buying and selling Real Estate not only pleasurable, but I hope to change the lives of those I work with for the better. I am honored to represent you. My Background: After working in the Insurance and Customer Service Industry for several years, at the age of 21 I became involved in Real estate by investing in Rental Properties. At the age of 25, I founded and managed my own Medical Transportation business for the past 13 years. During this time, also managing and growing my Real Estate Portfolio. In addition to Real Estate, Interests Include: Beekeeping, Gardening, Camping, Hiking and Photography. I currently reside in an Off Grid home that my husband and I personally built from the ground up. I am married to a licensed Home Inspector, we have two children, two dogs, 12 chickens and a Honeybee Apiary. :)

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am a licensed Professional New Hampshire Real Estate Agent since 2003 and my successes have currently ranked me in the top 2% of all agents in Northern New England. My specialties include all types of residential real estate and land primarily in Cheshire County. By my nature, I am known for my energy, attention to detail and integrity and consistently receive motivating positive feedback from my clients, both Buyers and Sellers. My strong background in sales and marketing from my prior 20-year career in publishing has provide me with the kind of experience necessary to completely and resourcefully assist you in the sale of your current home or the purchase of your next home. I have deep roots in Cheshire County which covers six generations which brought me back to the area after college. My husband and I live in Keene with our two Golden Retrievers and consider this area to be the best in the County for job opportunities and family life style. Outside of real estate and time spent with family and friends, I particularly enjoy outdoor activities such as downhill and cross-country skiing as well as snow shoeing, kayaking, sailing, swimming, gardening, traveling and going for walks with my husband and Goldens. I strongly believe in giving back to my community and have proudly served on both state and local real estate boards as well as the State Board of Directors for Multiple Sclerosis. I have volunteered for many United Way campaigns and served on their Allocations Committee. I served on the Board of Trustees of Hillside Village Keene, a continuing care retirement community, for 15 years. For the past 30 years during the winter months I have enjoyed working with the Special Olympic downhill skiers as well as being the coordinator, in Masiello’s Keene office, for a project which provides Christmas gifts to put smiles on the faces of the less fortunate children in our community. I am a member of the Keene Elm City Rotary beginning in 2012 and have served on the team that produces the Clarence DeMar Marathon as well as the Follow “Me” (Move Everyday) sneaker project team that provides new sneakers to every second grader in Cheshire County. I start each day with a smile and look forward to my responsibilities as a Professional Real Estate Agent which is a calling that brings both challenges and rewards. Working with my clients and providing them with my experience, dedication and high ethical standards gives me the opportunity to continue the outstanding service that I am known for. I am more than an agent; I am someone you will remember which is my commitment to you as my client. I look forward to assisting you with your real estate needs. Member, National Association of REALTORS since 2003 Member New Hampshire Association of REALTORS since 2003 Member, Monadnock Region Board of REALTORS since 2003

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Real estate is one of the most valuable assets you own or will purchase and choosing a realtor with experience and who you can trust to help protect your interest is an important decision. I am a Certified Relocation Specialist with over36 years of experience and concentrate in waterfront properties, real estate sales, and buyer brokerage. I have achieved the company’s highest awards as a top producer in sales volume in Cheshire County, Awarded Best of the Best from the company franchise, and rated high for Customer Satisfaction and company’s highest award, Legend Society. A key to my success as a realtor comes from my personal qualities of honesty, enthusiasm and integrity, where much of my business is a result of many personal referrals, and repeat business. As past chairperson of the Education for the Monadnock Board of Realtors, I believe "Knowledge is Power" and feel continued education is an important factor in keeping up with the ever-changing real estate industry. I have been a long time resident of the Monadnock Region for over 4 Decades, and live in Chesterfield, NH. I enjoy each day with a new challenge and look forward to the opportunity to offer you my services.

title: Keene, NH
description: Love working with families to find a home to fit their needs. Sometimes it takes a while but it is worth it in the end. I have my MA and NH license so that it gives a good area to reach your goal. With over 20 years experience, give me a call and I would love to chat with you for your needs.I work in a office in Nashua near the MA border. We have two full time associates to answer the phone for showings and office help.

title: Associate Real Estate Broker
description: As an experienced, Full time REALTOR/Associate Broker for 25 years in New Hampshire & Florida and a consistent top producing agent, I will administer the comprehensive representation you need for a successful and efficient real estate transaction. For me each day is embraced with enthusiasm and passion, incorporating positive energy into my work is second nature. I am grateful & blessed for each of my clients, for they are the reason for my success. Hard work, dedication and a can do attitude has led me to be a top producing agent in Cheshire County. Striving to always be a better version of myself for you, my client. Enrolling in education classes, and most recently Tony Robbins UPW in Miami, Florida helps me to keep my skills sharp and on top of the real estate industry standards. I am also active in the local community & charities. I am proud to be the mother of two wonderful daughters and three precious grand daughters & one beautiful Grandson. I have a strong sales background & outstanding customer service skills. You can count on an enjoyable & positive experience with me serving as your real estate agent in New Hampshire or the sunny Gulf coast of Florida! REFERENCES PROVIDED UPON YOUR REQUEST.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am a Keene State College alumna, a wife and mother to Judd and Jessica, my best friends. I have been a resident of Keene for over 51 years. My 1st career as a Special Education Teacher allowed me to open the first Resource Room in Walpole, NH. My career as a Realtor has been devoted to making the transition of my customers to their homes and community a welcoming experience. As an agent representing the seller, my primary goal is to provide my best personal service to enhance the sale of their home. As a homeowner, I understand the emotional attachment and intrinsic value that most people place on their home. As a buyer's agent I have been extremely successful in creating a comfortable and trustworthy relationship allowing us to work together to achieve the desired result. With this in mind, I have utilized my experience as a Realtor to help over 3,600 individuals and families purchase and sell their homes. During my 37 years as a Realtor I have received numerous awards honoring my achievements as one of the top producers at Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate The Masiello Group. I have been recognized into a distinguished and exclusive group of elite performers within the Better Homes & Gardens Real Estate Network. I have received the designation in the Cartus Broker Network as a Cartus Network Referral Specialist and serve as an active participant in the USAA Movers Advantage Network Relocation Service for their military members. Through most of my professional career I have consistently been a member of the MultiMillion Dollar Club. I am a knowledgeable and successful agent who will serve you well. My priority is You, my service is Personal and my goal is Success.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Not a lot of homes, just nice homes. I have worked as a marketing agent for firms in the Tri-state Region for the past 35 years, earned a bachelor degree in Public Affairs/Journalism from Keene State College, have training as a paralegal and is a justice of the peace. I am a second-term Keene city councilor representing Ward 3, where I serves on the Finance Committee and Energy and Climate Committee. I am also the Treasurer for Cheshire County. I am a singer/songwriter with an interest in local history. I resides in Keene with my wife, Dr. Skye Stephenson, and have four grown children and a grandson. I am a 58 year resident of Keene, Swanzey, Gilsum and Alstead.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Hello, Thank you for taking your time to learn more about me. After having lived and worked in Massachusetts, Idaho, Maine and New Mexico, I have a greater appreciation for architecture, varying landscapes, regional “customs“ and a better understanding of lifestyles. Having taught Kindergarten and Elementary aged children, I have become a more capable listener and problem solver. I have also been employed by the Keene Public Library working in the Youth Department. I continue to keep in touch with local school and children's events. Currently I am a member of the Cheshire Medical Center's Healthy Monadnock Board and a member of the Board of Directors for Linda's Closet. Recently, I have been asked to lead the Sales and Marketing Team as part of a wonderful Career Day being held at Keene High School in April 2009. At least 200 adult volunters will represent different their careers to all of the high school students. I am learning more about the jobs of others in our community while making some new acquaintances. This new information is always helpful in my relationship with buyers and sellers. I’m sure you will enjoy the Keene area as much as I do and will feel fortunate to be surrounded by a quality of life that surpasses most other areas. My clients will tell you that I keep in touch and go the extra mile to make real estate transactions a positive experience. I specialize in making sure that both male and female buyers and sellers understand the home buying process. I will guide you through banking, inspection and closing processes. I have received the Northeast Region finalist award for customer satisfaction. I have been one of the leading sales associates in our local office and in our area, averaging about 45 sales a year. I truly appreciate the opportunity to learn about your real estate needs and questions. I can assist people in our area and those who are relocating or selling outside of New Hampshire. Many THANKS to those who have REFERRED friends to me and who have made my job interesting and fulfilling!!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Practically a native of Keene, I enjoy the Monadnock Region and all that New Hampshire has to offer. Through personal experience I can attest to the fact that this is an excellent location in which to live and raise a family. I completed my education entirely in the Keene School System, received my mechanical design engineering degree from Keene State College and worked 25 years as a Sales Engineer for Kingsbury Corporation before starting my real estate sales career. It is this sales and engineering driven attention to detail and my personal philosophy of “treating others as you would like to be treated” that I believe produces a successful and less stressful real estate buying and selling experience for my clients. I also enjoy the inner personal satisfaction derived from helping people find their new home and/or sell their existing home. I would appreciate the opportunity to demonstrate my real estate knowledge and years of sales experience for you in your next real estate transaction.

title: Meredith, NH
description: Jennifer Forest: Your Lakes Region, New Hampshire Real Estate Agent I am a customer-service-oriented real estate agent who helps buyers and sellers in and around the Lakes Region of New Hampshire. I'm also a former educator, and have been since 1993. So if you're looking for an agent who is equally competent, compassionate, and patient, look no further. You've found her. My love for real estate began when I was a little girl. I recall flipping through interior design catalogs, looking for ideas and imagining what I could do in my own home someday. In 1996, I married my husband Shane a custom home builder and that passion and enthusiasm for detail, design and construction grew, further advancing my passion and love for real estate. Today, I'm a licensed real estate agent in New Hampshire. I guess it was always meant to be. I took a roundabout path into the real estate industry. I've been a certified educator in the state of NH since 1993. I'm no longer teaching, but I value the experience gained in the classroom and in working with families, colleagues and administrators. Learning to be flexible, anticipate needs, negotiate alternatives and set high standards are lessons that serve me well in the real estate profession as well. What does this have to do with real estate, you might be wondering? For one thing, it says something about me, as a person. I pursued education because I am a caring, compassionate person that wanted to make a difference. These traits also serve me well as a real estate agent. Some agents view real estate from an asset perspective, focusing solely on bricks and mortar, dollars and cents. I have a different view. I see real estate as a people business, first and foremost. It's more than just dollars and cents. It's about people, and their hopes and dreams. When I'm not helping my clients, I enjoy reading, skiing, exploring and taking in an amazing sunset over a beautiful lake. My true passions in life are my husband Shane, and our children Hailee, Kaylyn and Benjamin. I also currently serve on the Board of Directors for the Suncook Lakes Association. If you have any questions about my real estate services, or what I can do to help you, please don't hesitate to ask. I look forward to hearing from you!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I have lived in the Franklin area for the last twenty-seven years. I am married and have a little girl that is 16. I worked as a Real Estate Agent for Century 21 for a number of years and then found my home with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate The Masiello Group. This organization is the most professional and up to date technology wise that I have found in the industry. My goal is to provide individual specialized service to all that wish to buy or sell a home. If you are ready to sell your home or buy a home, call me and I will guide the way.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Prior to becoming a Licensed Real Estate Agent with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate The Masiello Group, I was the Facilities Manager for an organization called Granite Pathways. This position was property management with a direct trajectory towards Real Estate Sales/Buying/Leasing. I am incredibly grateful to be part of the Masiello Team back in the area in which I grew up. I can promise that I will go the extra distance in our professional relationship together, and will always put YOUR needs before my own interest. I look forward to helping you on your journey, and please contact me at your convenience. Onward and Upward!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Patrick is a consummate real estate professionaland businessman with over two decades in the industry for which he remains passionate. His business was built on the foundation of strong business ethics, honesty, communication and commitment to clients while delivering a high standard of service excellence. His dedication to his clients is paramount and over the many years in real estate, he has worked with buyers, sellers and investors. He enjoys listening to his clients to determine the best options to provide them with choices to make the best decision for themselves. He considers himself a client advocate.

title: Meredith, NH
description: MY MISSION STATEMENT: To be the best full service agent, exceeding my client's expectations in every way. Maintain high standards by utilizing the most up to date marketing resources. Foster strong ties in the community so that we can move forward together, towards a prosperous future. I am a New Hampshire native who has lived, worked and played in this beautiful state. After selling fine jewelry for over 25 years, I am now looking forward to helping people fulfill their dream of home ownership. I don't think there is a better feeling than being able to tell a client Welcome to your new home.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Wendy is a Licensed Sales Associate, Realtor, member of the National Association of Realtors (NAR), New Hampshire Association of Realtors (NHAR), and the Lakes Region Board of Realtors (LRBR). She is a certified Real Estate Agent assisting military families relocating to the area with their real estate needs. Wendy is married, has four children and several grandchildren. Her professional background includes many years working as an Administrative Assistant, a Benefits Administrator, and owning and operating local businesses with her husband. Each of these positions taught her the value and importance of good customer service. She enjoys assisting families and guiding them through the process of purchasing a home or selling a home while providing the best customer service possible, along with a positive real estate experience. Please contact Wendy if you have questions or wish to buy or sell a home - she will be happy to assist you with your real estate needs!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Welcome and thank you for visiting my Website.

Having been born and raised in Vermont, I enjoy the beauty of Vermont and can appreciate why so many wish to live in this beautiful state enjoying its beauty and the opportunities available.
I have enjoyed a varied career path from co-owner of a family owned construction business to banking and many years as the Executive Vice President of the Springfield Chamber of Commerce as well as interim EXP’s for other Chambers of Commerce’s. During these years I served on numerous Boards, including the Vermont State Chamber of Commerce, Springfield Hospital, Springfield Regional Development, Springfield Rotary Club, Springfield Housing Authority to name a few. Throughout my professional career I have enjoyed working on a personal level with, clients, customers and board affiliates.
In 1983 I received my Vermont Real Estate license and worked with a local agency for a period of time, well before MLS came into existence. I spent time with other career choices and made a move to spend time with family in Lexington, Kentucky, storing my Vermont license during that time. While in Kentucky I received my Kentucky Real Estate license. After returning from Kentucky in 2004, I renewed my Vermont Real Estate license and have been actively working with Buyers and Sellers since then to fulfill their dreams.
With over 20 years, actively working with Buyers and Sellers, I enjoy serving others and have a commitment to provide exceptional service to my clients.

I would love to help you either, in the purchasing of a new home, or the selling of your current homestead.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Location, Location, Location - Residential or Commercial - I know just how critical these words are to a buyer and the importance of understanding the full potential of a seller's property. By viewing a listing from a buyer's perspective, I can target and capture the best-suited market for the seller's property. Listening to a buyer's requirements, I can pinpoint the properties that best fulfill their needs. Combining these qualities ensures a symbiotic match for buyer and seller.Got Pets? Whether you ha ve one pet or a barnyard full of critters, my wealth of knowledge pertaining to small and large animals is an asset to animal lovers searching for a pet-friendly property that fulfills their dreams and provides a safe haven for their pets.Music Minded? L ooking for a rehearsal space for your band, a studio-conversion project, or a rural setting to "turn it up"? Let me help you find the property that will meet your needs in the Connecticut River Valley.Selling your home, buying a new home or searching for the right parcel of land, my goal is to guide you through the transaction with a positive attitude, a helping hand and a smile.I am a REALTOR®, an e-PRO and licensed in Vermont and New Hampshire.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I moved to Southern Vermont in 1987. We purchased a 100 year old farmhouse where we homesteaded and raised animals. Later Newfane, VT was my home for 20 years. Recently I downsized and moved to Brattleboro, all while managing property in Cambridge, MA, Southeast Texas and New York City. Community has always been important to me and so I have been involved with the Meals on Wheels program and Brattleboro Area Hospice. I feel customer service is essential during the process of buying and selling a property and it would be a pleasure to assist you.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
SALLY HAS OVER 20 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE IN REAL ESTATE AND PROPERTY MANAGEMENT. HER MAJOR SALES INCLUDE THE WINCHESTER STABLES AND THE MAPLE VALLEY SKI AREA. SHE IS LICENSED IN VERMONT AND NEW HAMPSHIRE.

PRIOR TO HER CAREER IN REAL ESTATE, SALLY WAS CO-OWNER OF TOM & SALLY'S HANDMADE CHOCOLATES IN BRATTLEBORO, VICE PRESIDENT OF THE BANK OF NEW YORK IN NYC AND COO AT OMEGA OPTICAL IN BRATTLEBORO.

SALLY'S VARIED EXPERIENCE SPEAKS TO HER VERSATILITY & FLEXIBILITY TO FIND THE BEST OUTCOME FOR HER CLIENTS.

"I TAKE GOOD CARE OF MY CLIENTS."

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
With over 30 years of full-time real estate experience in both VT and NH, Chris has built a reputation of true professionalism and diligent representation to his Seller and Buyer clients over the years. His knowledge of all aspects of real estate is second to none.

Consistently one of the top 20 agents in sales company wide including over 50 offices and 775 agents in VT, NH and Maine. Although he specializes in all types of Real Estate, he excels at properties with acreage such as large timber tracts, farms and recreational parcels. He also is one of the area's premier commercial agents. A large percentage of his business is based on repeat clients and referrals from those clients. Most importantly,

he genuinely loves what he does and takes pride in making sure his client's best interests are the priority.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Hello! I am a dedicated agent with Better Homes and Gardens Massiello Group, proudly licensed in New Hampshire, Maine, and Massachusetts. My goal is to serve my clients with the highest level of expertise and commitment. To ensure I provide the best possible service, I hold the prestigious designations of a Certified Pricing Specialist® and an Accredited Buyer Representative through the National Association of Realtors.
I believe that honest communication is key to success in life. Understanding the unique and personal nature of each client's needs is the way to most effectively reach the desired outcome. This is why I love real estate, specifically residential.
In my free time, I enjoy teaming up with my loved ones and friends to pursue common interests such as crafting, DIY projects, car clubs, and motorcycling. I also love spending time with my Pomsky, Duke, and volunteering and attending church events.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: With 20 years of experience, Monica Sumner has developed a wealth of knowledge about the ins and outs of real estate in Southern Vermont. She was born in Western Massachusettsand moved to Halifax, Vt as a young adult where she raised four daughters with her husband on their organic dairy farm. With all daughters now married, she is grammy to 8 wonderful grandchildren. Over the years, certain traitshave frequently surfaced in feedback from Monica's customers and clients: she is reliable, incredibly easy to talk to and relate to, an excellent listener, and extremely attentive to detail. She always gives her full commitment to helping her clients and is sensitive to all situations that may lead to her clients real estate journey. When asked what she loves about her career in real estate, Monica answered, I consider it a privilege to help clients market and sell their homes that they have cherishedover the years. I don't just sell real estate; I sell a lifestyle , and I'm committed to helping my clients realize their dreams in Southern Vermont. She has a deep love for Vermont, from the sound of spring peepers in the night after a long winter, to campfires and starry skies on a warm summer evening. Monica loves gardening, traveling to warm destinations in the winter, entertaining family and friends over home-cooked dinners, and looking after her dog Bonnie and tiger cat Tobey.

title: Real Estate Broker
description: Steve is a long time resident of Walpole NH where he lives with his partner Vanessa and her 2 boys Xavier and Brendon. His oldest child, Ryan, is currently living in CA and works for Meta/Facebook doing computer programing. His daughter Chloe lives in NH and works with local museums putting her photography degree to good use. Steve manages the Brattleboro office for the company and strives to provide the best possible level of service for its buying and selling clients and customers. As a licensed broker in both VT and NH, Steve's real estate practice covers residential, raw land, multi-family and commercial properties located in Windham, Windsor, Cheshire and Sullivan counties. Working both with Sellers and Buyers, Steve offers robust "hassle-free" service to his clients to provide enjoyable, stress-free transactions.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
I grew up in Saxtons River, VT. For the past 30 years I have been a resident of Westminster, where I live with my husband. We share our home with cats, a dog and a rabbit. A hobby of mine has always been auto racing. In the summer months you can find me at the local race tract. I proudly own my own race car and although I don't drive it, I enjoy all the other aspects that come with owing one.
I pride myself in communications, follow through, being very organized and detail oriented. I've spent 15 years working in the non-profit field as an office manager. This is where I learned how important communication and organization was to our clients. Currently, I'm working as a part time marketing director and feel with this background, now as a real estate agent it will help my clients achieve their real estate goals. Whether you ae trying to purchase your first dream home or to sell your outgrown family home, it would be my pleasure to share in your experience and guide you through the process.
I am licensed in both VT and NH

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: A Middlebury native, Brendan has a marketing degree from St. Joseph's University in Philadelphia and has been working in sales and marketing for a number of years. He is an active member of the Middlebury Volunteer Fire Department for over 25 years, serving as an EMT as well.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I'm proud to serve the Middlebury area as a member of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Bannon & Hebert. As part of the Better Homes and Gardens® Real Estate brand I will provide you with an excellent experience before, during and after your home buying and selling journey. With innovative technology, a unique set of tools and a household brand tied to my name, I am uniquely equipped to serve you with what you need most. And, by combining a "client first" philosophy, great listening skills, deep local knowledge, marketing savvy and business professionalism I can help you sell your home or find a new home that perfectly matches your lifestyle.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Karen is a seasoned professional specializing in residential sales. Her prior experience working on Wall Street, in marketing and high-end retail sales gives her the tools to meet the needs of all levels of client. Whether the client is a seller looking to downsize, the first time home owner, the experienced or second home purchaser, Karen's goal is the same. She works to serve each client selling or buying with honesty and integrity, making each closing a success for all. Karen earned Bannon & Hebert Properties Top producer Award in 2009. In furthering her real estate education, Karen has earned her GRI, from the Connecticut Association of Realtors and the At Home with Diversity, designation from the National Association of Realtors. A graduate of St. Margaret's-McTernan and Skidmore College, Karen believes giving service to ones community is part of service to your clients. She is a member of The Exchange Club, Waterbury Symphony Orchestra League, The Junior League of New York City, Mattatuck Museum Corporate Campaign Committee and past board member of the CT Chorale Society.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Ellie Gollenberg because the choice matters...MISSIONEllie recognized the extraordinary responsibility of working with clients who are making one of the most important purchases of their lives. Helping her clients understand current market trends and t he process of buying and/or selling residential real estate is integral to achieving a successful outcome.QUALITIESDiscretion, professionalism, integrity and confidentiality, are all qualities Ellie brings with her from many years of experience in a co rporate environment as an executive assistant. SKILLSWith her attention to detail and organizational skills, Ellie's clients can depend on her to help them navigate through the myriad of choices and options and they can count on her for the guidance ne cessary to reach informed decisions. COMMITMENTEllie will cheerfully and thoughtfully listen to your concerns, answer your questions and work diligently to develop a plan to help you achieve your real estate goals.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Originally from Long Island, NY, Joe Conforti has called CT home since 1993 where he and his wife Sara have raised four daughters. After a long career as a State of CT employee, and with both the Air Force and Army National Guards, Joe has now been enjoying spending time as a new grandparent. He is happy to devote his time and attention to his clients as a full-time agent and loves helping them fulfill their real estate goals.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: EXPERIENCE Years of experience have made Lori into a seasoned professional who can handle the most complicated transactions. Lori's experience, combined with her knowledge of the Greater Waterbury community and a strong sense of integrity, make her the right agent to put together smooth, complication-free transactions for both buyers and sellers. COMMITMENT To stay abreast of changing laws and trends in real estate for her clients and to achieve success in a very competitive field, Lori continues to hone her skills by attending real estate seminars and classes. Lori has attained the designations of Graduate Realtor Institute (GRI), Realtor, Accredited Buyers Representative (ABR) and Short Sale & Foreclosure Resource (SFR). HARDWORK Lori is dedicated, working full-time (and then some) at her profession. Clients can always reach her easily and can be assured of a quick, helpful response. ENTHUSIASM You'd be hard-pressed to find a REALTOR with a more enthusiastic or positive attitude. Lori loves selling Real Estate and it shows! INTEGRITY Clients trust Lori with their single largest asset. It's a responsibility she takes very seriously. Lori gives 110% because she knows that to be successful in Real Estate, her clients'must come first. RESULTS Lori is often a Top Producer at Better Homes & Gardens Real Estate Bannon & Hebert. Lori is recognized in Connecticut Magazine as a "5 Star REALTOR" She will work with you to help you list your home and/or help you find the home of your dreams. PERSONAL Lori is a "foodie" she loves cooking and spending time with her friends and family , Husband, 2 Daughters and 5 grandchildren and dog Samantha. She also loves hiking, watercolor painting, traveling and visiting a variety restaurants statewide.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
I am Jessie Kianka, a determined and passionate real estate agent ready to make my mark in the industry. I have a deep love for helping people and that includes finding their perfect home or enthusiastically marketing their property for sale. I am committed to providing exceptional service and ensuring a seamless experience for my clients.
As a new agent, I bring a fresh perspective and a strong determination to succeed. I understand that buying or selling a property is a significant decision, and I am dedicated to guiding my clients through every step of the process with professionalism and integrity.

With a background in customer service, I possess excellent communication and interpersonal skills, allowing me to build strong relationships with my clients. I take the time to truly understand their needs and preferences, ensuring that I can find the ideal property that meets their criteria.

My passion for real estate is matched by my eagerness to learn and grow in the industry. I actively seek out opportunities to expand my knowledge and stay up-to-date with the latest market trends and industry developments. By attending seminars and workshops, I ensure that I can provide the best advice and guidance to my clients.

In addition to my dedication to client satisfaction, I am tech-savvy and utilize cutting-edge marketing strategies to effectively promote my listings and reach a wider audience. I understand the importance of a strong online presence and leverage social media platforms and digital marketing tools to showcase my properties and attract potential buyers.

Outside of work, I am deeply connected to my community and believe in giving back. I actively volunteer my time and resources to local charities and organizations, aiming to make a positive impact on the lives of others.

If you are looking for a determined and passionate real estate agent who will go above and beyond to help you achieve your real estate goals, I am here to assist you. Contact me today to begin your real estate journey with a trusted and enthusiastic professional by your side.

title: Real Estate Broker
description:
Mary Ann (Bastin) Hebert has spent her entire adult life in Real Estate. She opened Bannon & Hebert Properties with partner Donna Bannon in 1996 and in 2015 the firm affiliated with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate. The collaboration allowed the company to offer the best of all worlds to our clients. Personal and caring service along with the reach and tools of a national brand.




Mary Ann has always believed in giving back. On a professional level, Mary Ann served as a founding director and former President of the CT Statewide MLS. She has served on various boards, committees, and elected positions in the National, State, and Local Boards of Realtors including 2013 President of CT Realtors and 2012 State Realtor of the Year. On a personal level, she has served on the CT Coalition to End Homelessness advisory board and the Waterbury Salvation Army where she currently serves as Advisory Board Chair.


Buying or selling a home is a big deal and whether she is representing a first-time homebuyer or a large developer, Mary Ann treats all clients with the same care and respect. She has enjoyed helping hundreds of families, friends, and clients with their real estate needs. The team at BHGRE Bannon & Hebert believe in making houses into homes and clients into friends.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am proud to have joined the team of BHGRE - Bannon and Hebert. My wide range of experience and education expands over 30 years in Business and Higher Education graduating with a BS from UCONN and a MS degree from CCSU. My professionalism, commitment to personal service and attention to detail has been my cornerstone as a licensed Realtor and a member of the National Association of Realtors. I am a lifelong resident of Connecticut and excited to be part of an energetic team working diligently to help you showcase your home as well as locate your next dream home.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:

With a passion for service in the Waterbury area, Ryan is ready to help you with your home buying and selling needs. As a proud member of BHGRE Bannon and Hebert family, Ryan carries the values of hard work, integrity, and outstanding client service into everything he does.
Ryan grew up in Southbury CT and attended college at Post University in Waterbury on a baseball scholarship. Ryan is a Past Exalted Ruler of the Waterbury Elks Lodge #265 where he still donates countless hours volunteering for veterans and the youth of the community.

When Ryan is not making homeownership dreams come true for his clients he enjoys playing golf and spending time with his family. He currently resides in Litchfield with his wife Danielle.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:

I am passionate about helping others and ensure excellence in customer experiences. I am committed to helping you realize your real estate goals.
I grew up in Watertown, CT and I know many communities in Litchfield and New Haven counties quite well since I have lived in Middlebury, Litchfield, Morris, Woodbury, Southbury, and Waterbury. I enjoy life to its fullest, am I am enthusiastic about the opportunity to partner with you in marketing the sale of your home, or to find that perfect home for you to purchase.

Please feel free to reach out to me via cell at any time. (203) 518-3394, or send an email to RaeLynn.Homes@gmail.com

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Hello, I’m Alfonzo Reid Jr. I work with residential buyers, sellers, and investors in Fairfield and New Haven Counties.
I’m from Bridgeport, CT and I enjoy helping members of my community reach their goals whether you’re looking to buy your 1st home, dream home, or an income producing property. It’s great being able to deal with real estate in the same areas I grew up in.
I’m accountable for win-win situations and that comes through great service!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Bilingual (Spanish/English) full time Real Estate Professional Licensed in Connecticut since 2001 and Florida since 2016. First time buyer specialist. Preferred listing agent. My license is in Active status and in good standing. Never had any disciplinary action against me. Most of my business comes from referrals, which says a lot about my work ethic and professional reputation in the industry. Below you will see some of my past sales in Connecticut. Please note that I work with all price ranges. No deal is too small for me. I treat everyone equally. I cover both Fairfield and New Haven counties. Not many agents give clients the personalized service that I give. Feel free to contact me anytime for a FREE consultation. I would love to be your personal agent and guide you every step of the way!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
My name is Caroline Sanchez I have been a Real Estate Agent since 2021. I am a mother of three and a grandma to a Yorkie Poo named Rue. As a parent and homeowner myself, I understand that your home is more than just a place to live — it’s where you make long-lasting memories.
When I bought my first home I was a bit scared because I didn't know the process. I also didn't know then the benefits of owning a home, and after owning my home a few years now, I wish I had purchased sooner. My first clients gave me the opportunity to sell their first home of thirty years and find them their dream retirement residence, and just as the Realtor that helped me with the purchase of my first home. I helped my clients navigate through the home buying and selling process, with the end result only being a wonderful experience.
What I love about this business is not only the feeling of helping people, but genuinely getting to know them while being open and honest and transparent through the process. I am passionate about what I do and I'm honored that many of my clients have now become my friends.
Interested in finding the home you want? Let me help you and your family make the next move.

title: Real Estate Salesperson

both buyers and sellers. Living in both New Haven and Fairfield County, has given me the

my own home combined with owning my own business for over 15 years, has taught me to
listen to the needs of my clients and work diligently to achieve their desired results.
When you work with me, you can expect a strong work ethic and commitment to you like no
other. I take extreme pride in my work and know my passion for real estate will make a positive
difference and allows me the honor of being part of a new chapter in people's lives. I am 100 %
dedicated to helping you with all of your Real Estate needs.

description:

My main focus is to provide clients with step-by-stop support through the process of buying, selling or renting. I strive to build a relationship in which clients stay in touch long after they find a place to call home.
I have lived in Shelton for the past 26 years with my husband Bob, our two, now grown, children and a beautiful 2 year old granddaughter, who is the light of my life.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Jonna Dibble arrived at Bannon & Hebert Properties with a great deal of real estate knowledge and experience because she had previously worked in a large development firm where she dealt with all aspects of land development from designing, planning, construction and management. That in combination with her experience as a teacher gives her a great background for Real Estate Sales. She is a great organizer and disseminator of information. A Middlebury native, Jonna earned a Bachelor's o f Science degree from the University of Connecticut and a Master's degree in Elementary education from Sacred Heart University in Fairfield, Connecticut. Jonna was an elementary school teacher in Naugatuck, Connecticut for ten years prior to moving to Los Angeles with her husband. After living on the west coast for several years, Jonna returned to Connecticut in order to raise her family in the community where she grew up. An active member of the community, Jonna loves spending time with her family and all things sports, especially baseball.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: With many years of award winning sales experience under my belt, I have developed a passion for helping others achieve their dreams! I thoroughly enjoy working with people and find it extremely rewarding to be able to help them reach their goals. Having purchased my first home at the age of 21, plus selling and purchasing since, I’ve learned the importance of homeownership, and what it takes to make moves happen as easily and effortlessly as possible. Earning Rookie of The Year, my first year with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate, plus continuing to be a Top Producer is a testament to my hard work and attention to detail. If you, or someone you know, is looking to buy or sell their home, I’d love to assist. I will try my best to make your experience enjoyable, and help you get one step closer to your dreams!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Hello, I am Debra Schmidt but please call me Debbie. I moved from New York City to Connecticut 17 years ago. We wanted to give our young daughters fresh air with plenty of room to grow, and Fairfield County was the perfect place to put down roots. I love to cook big Italian dinners for my family and friends. I enjoy working out but enjoy it more once done. I volunteered for 15 years, attending community meetings, leading school activities and chaired PTA Membership for many of those years. 2020 has been an unusual year but it has given me the opportunity to become a licensed Real Estate Agent, something I have been talking about for many years. I am a people person and yes, a cliché, but nevertheless true. In only my second week as a Real Estate Agent, I got my first offer. I was very honored to learn that my new client, of only one week, was speaking highly of me to a colleague. I will ensure that all my clients are happy with the services I provide and the meaningful relationship I will build. If you're looking for an energetic Real Estate Agent who is easy to work with and diligent to find your next home or the perfect buyer for the home you have loved, then give me a call!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Erin Loucks originally moved to Newtown in 1991. She has been a licensed Realtor since 2019, when she moved back to town to raise her family.
Before real estate, Erin spent many years working professionally in musical theater and dance on both coasts. When she is not selling houses, Erin and her husband Ryan are the proud owners of Newtown Stage Company. She loves being a part of the Newtown community, alongside her husband, her two children and their dog. Outside of the theater company and real estate, Erin is the PTA President at her daughter’s school. You may find Erin and her husband playing around Newtown with their band, rae.
Her favorite thing about real estate is guiding people through the important (and often intimidating) decision and process of homebuying and getting to know her clients!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Jaime is a licensed Realtor ® in Connecticut, and is excited to be a part of the Better Homes & Gardens - Gaetano Marra Homes team to serve you in all your buying and selling needs.

Jaime holds a Bachelor of Architecture with 15 years of experience as an Architectural Designer and is currently a Project Manager for a local Construction Company.
She has worked with clients to design their dream home from the ground up or to recreate their existing home to better suit their needs. Jaime has a trained eye for spaces and is excited to work with clients whose needs might include a fixer upper, seeing the potential in a home that might not shine at first glance, or utilizing creative design to best showcase your home for sale. It gives Jaime great joy to see her clients love the space they call home. When not helping people make their real estate dreams come true, Jaime can be found outdoors, playing soccer with her son, waterskiing or doing yard work. Jaime resides in Monroe with her husband, 2 boys, and their overzealous dog.
Whether a first time home buyer, seasoned buyer, or an investor, Jaime would be happy to help you buy or sell your home!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Hi, I’m Jessica! I am a Licensed Real Estate Agent working with families in Fairfield county. Whether you are just entering a new phase of life or looking to purchase a vacation home, I am committed to listening to your needs & utilizing my keen negotiating skills to make this process as smooth and stress-free as possible.

I want to help each client enter the next chapter of their lives and that begins with a home, whether this is a starter home, investment property, downsizing, or your forever home. It’s what makes me jump out of bed each morning!

Jessica L. Alvarado
Realtorjessicalynn@gmail.com

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Hi my name is Jeffrey Fulchino and I'm a top selling Realtor with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate. title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
A full-time agent with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate in Monroe, Jim Brown is a born-and-raised Connecticut resident, and has been a master carpenter and owner/operator of Restoration by Design for more than 30 years. He is also a member of the Greater Bridgeport Board of Realtor, the Multiple Listing Service of CT, and the National Association of Realtors.
Jim tailors strategies with his clients that highlight what they love best about their homes and helps others to see that value. He offers a no-cost "current market analysis" for any homeowner who might be planning on selling their home.
Along the way, Jim has led a dual career in the film industry as a trusted "key construction grip"on big-budget productions such as Boardwalk Empire, The Knick, and Blindspot, among others.
Both the film and contracting industries have provided Jim with a strong foundation and unique perspective for his career in real estate -- in all of his experiences, he is inspired by how all the elements of a project come together to create a compelling story. For Jim, one of the most rewarding parts of being an agent is helping people find the place where their stories begin-- a house that becomes a home.
Jim is dedicated to providing superior service to every client and specializes in representing sellers, buyers, investors, developers, builders, and flippers in both residential & commercial real estate.
A trumbull local and family man, Jim lives in the historic 1778 home that he and his wife Maurya lovingly restored to its original grandeur. They have three grown children: Spencer, Tess, and Jenna. During rare downtime, Jim enjoys tending to his bees, a good read, and tries not to ruin a good walk while playing golf.

In my free time, I love to read mostly romance novels and I enjoy watching sports. My favorite sports to watch are football, soccer, basketball or baseball. I raised three boys by myself and love getting to spend time with them, they are now ages 34, 30 and 17.
I am a proud owner of 2 restaurants in the city of Bridgeport, where I reside. I look forward to a future of success in my new endeavor as a Real Estate Agent to help my friends, family, and clients! I will work hard for you to help you achieve your dreams and goals in Real Estate.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Hi, I’m Stephanie Koutikas, an agent with Better Homes & Gardens Real Estate. I use my real estate background plus 20 years of marketing, branding, business and sales experience to help buyers, sellers and investors realize their dreams and property’s potential.


Committed to Exceeding Expectations
With a passion for the coastal living market and beyond, I’m committed to helping those along Connecticut’s seaboard fulfill all their real estate sales, purchase and rental needs. As a real estate agent with a Master’s in Marketing and Management and decades of promotional experience under my belt, I provide my clients with the customized strategies and edge they need to be successful in today’s competitive market. My goal is simple: to make your home buying or home selling dreams come true by effectively guiding you through the journey.


Locally Known, Globally Connected.
Born in Montreuil, France of Portuguese parents, I emigrated to the United States in 1987 with my family and settled in Connecticut, where I have remained rooted ever since. I was raised in Fairfield County and have lived in Milford for the last 12 years, which has afforded me extensive knowledge of what it’s like to live in the area. As a result of my diverse background, I’m trilingual in Portuguese, French and English, as well as proficient in Spanish. Being fluent in so many languages has enabled me to build strong social and business connections locally and around the world.


As the daughter of a builder, I’ve been involved in real estate since a young age. But before I embarked on a career in the field, I spent two decades leading the branding and marketing initiatives of a global 95-year-old beauty industry company. As a high-level executive, I oversaw the development and implementation of new product lines, as well as managed the company’s online presence, public relations, influencer/artist relations, trade shows, special events, education and creative development. Leveraging the power of digital and social media, I developed strategies that successfully rebranded the company and garnered recognition for our initiatives. I use this vast digital experience to creatively leverage social media and other marketing channels to my client’s advantage when selling their homes and negotiating offers.


Strong Ties to the Community
I feel truly blessed to live in the Milford area. With my husband, I’m the proud owner of one of Milford’s landmark destinations: The Greek Spot Cafe. Our cafe is situated in the heart of the residential neighborhood in which we live with access to Connecticut’s beautiful and exclusive destinations of Silver Sands Beach and Charles Island. And being the mother of three young sons, who are very involved in local sports and other activities, my feelings about this community have only grown stronger. I’m so grateful for how the cafe and our family activities have enabled us to build strong connections with both locals and vacationers alike with whom I share my passion for living near the water.


As a true beach lover, when I’m not helping my clients or watching my sons do their thing, you’re likely to find me paddle boarding along the Connecticut shoreline or relaxing in the sand with family and friends – I love to cook and entertain – or perhaps engrossed in my other loves of interior design and international travel!


If you’d like to learn more about how we can work together, please call or text me at 203-520-2305.

title: Real Estate Salesperson

Although Michael’s real estate experience has been limited to 2 years, his 17-year corporate background in Project Management and Technology has led him to become a great negotiator, communicator and leader as an agent. He is self-driven and passionate about helping clients accomplish their real estate goals and helping to make Connecticut a more vibrant place to live.

Michael is active in the community. He has been a board member and mentor to youth at a local inner-city high school in Hartford for 12 years and is very active in his church in Trumbull.

In his free time, Michael enjoys family time with his wife Jackie and their 2 children, playing basketball & golf, reading, and traveling.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Corey grew up in South Brunswick and has lived there for the majority of her life. Not straying too far from home, after graduating from South Brunswick High School, Corey obtained an associates degree in science from Middlesex Community College in 2011. She then graduated from Rutgers University in 2013 with a bachelors degree in cell biology and neuroscience with a minor in public health. Since graduating, Corey has worked as a research scientist in the biotechnology field. Corey has a deep connection with her community having worked at multiple local businesses since she joined the workforce at age 16.Having achieved many of her education and scientific goals, Corey then sought out a long-time dream of hers to dive into the real estate business. Upon completing her real estate licensure, Corey joined Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate M3 Realty. Having lived in central New Jersey for all of her life, Corey is thrilled to be able to fulfill her real estate dream in her own backyard and beyond. She strives to bring her detail-oriented and analytical scientific background to the business in order to best deliver to her clients exactly what they need. Corey is no stranger to hard work and is committed to serve her clients and community with the utmost diligence, respect, and dedication they deserve. Corey treasures New Jersey and her hometown, and is excited to share that with the people she works with.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I'm Vivek Patel, a dedicated and passionate real estate agent committed to helping you achieve your real estate dreams in New Jersey. With a deep understanding of the local market and a client-first approach, I am here to guide you every step of the way, whether you're buying your first home, selling a property, or seeking an investment opportunity. Having lived and worked in New Jersey my entire life, I possess an intimate knowledge of the neighborhoods, schools, and amenities that matter most to you. Your goals are my priority; I listen carefully to your needs and work tirelessly to ensure that your real estate journey is smooth and successful. With a keen eye for detail and a strategic mindset, I strive to get you the best deal possible, whether you're buying or selling. From market analysis and property searches to negotiations and closing, I provide end-to-end services to make your real estate experience seamless. My background in Finance has equipped me with the skills and knowledge to navigate the ever-changing real estate landscape effectively. I am always here to answer your questions and provide the support you need in your real estate journey. Feel free to reach out to me at 848-213-5816 or through Zillow to get started. I look forward to working with you and turning your real estate dreams into reality!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Being born and raised in New Jersey is something that I tend to let everyone know about me. I have been lucky enough to call my second home Long Beach Island. Growing up on LBI, I learned a new definition to quiet winters and busy summers. I bought my first home at 24 years old, and have continued to visit Open Houses since then always itching to move, renovate and redecorate a "new to me home." My current home was built in 1942, so I just cannot seem to let the old school charm go, although a dream of mine has to always design and build my own home. I spend my summers in LBI (and any other time I get the chance to be there). During Covid, I went through The Ocean County Fire Academy and have been a top 10 call runner for Beach Haven Volunteer Fire Company. I enjoy spending time at the beach but also in the city. I'm all ears when it comes to finding your perfect home, whether buying or renting. Let me help you find your dream home! As challenging as it may be selling your current home, let me make it easy for you. Call me today ! #GoToGab

title: Lyndhurst, NJ
description:
I am Eniko Balogh, a Sales Associate with Better Homes and Gardens Coccia Realty in Lyndhurst serving Northern New Jersey.

Helping a family to find a home is a powerful thing, because that is the place, the family’s home base, its center of the universe where children are raised, and where all the memories are made.

I always feel genuinely honored in being able to guide my clients through this complex, yet exciting journey. I provide my clients personal guidance and advice to local resources, i.e. to mortgage professionals and loan officers, appraisers, insurance brokers and title companies, inspectors, contractors, if needed lead and mold remediation specialists, home stagers and designers. I also have access to building biologists that can advise my clients.

I am by nature a warm and caring person, therefore my clients can expect a working relationship that is easy going, respectful and based both on loyalty and integrity.

My enthusiasm towards real estate is based on a strong belief that people’s health and well being originates in their home environment, therefore no wishes and requests will be overlooked regardless of how
seemingly eccentric they might be.

I am a native of Hungary, but lived years in both Austria and Switzerland, before moving to the United States.
I call Lyndhurst my home since 1994.

When I am not advising clients in the office, I am busy designing interiors and creating home decorations. I am also active with local cat rescue groups when I am not with my own furry babies.

I am a member in good standing:
New Jersey Multiple Listing Service (NJMLS)
National Associates of Realtors (NAR)
New Jersey Association of Realtors (NJAR)

Greater Bergen Association of Realtors (GBAR)

title: Lyndhurst, NJ
description:
Joselin Rodriguez is a Realtor with Better Homes and Coccia Realty and serves the Greater North Jersey area. Real Estate was a career choice for Joselin because simply put, she loves helping people and supporting them every step of the way in selling, buying or leasing a home.
As a teacher's assistant for over 20 years Joselin worked very closely with special needs children. This taught her patience and perseverance, two important qualities she uses today in her real estate business. In addition, Joselin has extensive experience in the cosmetology industry where she developed tremendous customer service and client relation skills as a hairdresser.

Joselin is bi-lingual and speaks Spanish and English fluently. Originally from the Dominican Republic and a Bergen County resident, Joselin is a mom of 3 adult children, a proud grandmother and married for 30+ years. She loves spending time with her family, going to church, exercising and cooking.
She is a member in good standing with the Greater Bergen Board, New Jersey MLS, Garden State MLS, New Jersey Realtors and The National Associations of Realtors.
Joselin is alway available to assist and can be reached at 973-634-0596 or realtordjr@gmail.com

title: Lyndhurst, NJ
description:
Jenny is a licensed real estate sales associate with Better Homes & Gardens Coccia, Lyndhurst.
She has the knowledge and background experience to assist you whether you are selling your home, buying your home or relocating.

Jenny has over 30 years of experience in construction, property management and multi-family property ownership.

Jenny is one of 8 children from a large, traditional Irish family. Growing up in with seven siblings has taught her tolerance, patience, respect for others, responsibility and good work ethics. She is originally from Hudson County, but relocated to Bergen County. Married with one son, two stepsons and 4 grandchildren, family means everything to Jenny. She is also a supporter of Autism Speaks, Inc.

Born and raised in South America, Milena's roots are of a Latin upbringing by her amazing parents that later in life immigrated with her family to the USA. title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I did not find myself working as a Realtor because of my passion for houses! I started out as a French Trained Pastry Chef! After the Culinary Industry took a huge hit in NYC, where I grew up and worked during 9/11, the need for adequate mental health care for First Responders inspired me to get a B.A. in Psychology. I think all Agents get a crash course in Psychology whether they intended to or not. In my experience with clients, people in the real estate market are primarily concerned with feeling secure throughout the process. I work tirelessly to provide that security. My 'niche', if you want to call it that, is effectively managing the range of emotions that are evoked during a real estate transaction. There is laughter and sometimes there are tears. No matter what twists and turns I have encountered, I have always remained focused on my clients' priorities as if they were my own, and that is the basis for all of my successes.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Amy Johnson brings joyful experience and local knowledge to serve her clients and help them to realize their real estate goals. With a passion for interior design and a husband who has been in the building trade for over 40 years, Amy’s knowledge of a home’s hidden potential gives her clients a unique perspective on properties that may have been overlooked as possibilities.
Having grown up in Middletown and Atlantic Highlands where she currently resides, Amy continues to explore the area, uncovering endless new discoveries with her husband, Robert. They also take full advantage of the ease and proximity of taking the Sea Streak Ferry into Manhattan with their daughter Kelsie and her husband Anthony. As a resident of Atlantic Highlands for over 50 years, Amy brings her knowledge and love of this area to help others discover their dream home and experience the beauty and joy of Monmouth County that she has come to know.
Prior to joining Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate, Murphy & Co., Amy enjoyed a successful 28-year career in teaching, achieving her Masters’ degree and additional certifications which she utilized as a Professional Development Trainer. She held various leadership roles in the Middletown school system where the key skills required included understanding the positions of all parties, effective negotiating, clear communication and confidentiality. All the elements that transfer seamlessly to real estate transactions.

“There is nothing like the search for the home you want, the dream you have in mind, the place you know you belong, and that feeling when you find it. I will persevere in the search for the home where you will put down your roots to grow your dreams into your reality.
--Amy Johnson

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Exceeding your Every Expectation I’ve been a licensed New Jersey Realtor since 2002. When I purchased a home in Shadow Lake Village in 2008, I decided to focus my real estate career on selling homes in Shadow Lake Village because I soon found that the Village was a fabulous place to live. Therefore, I stand behind my ‘product’ 100%. You could say I’m the Village’s #1 cheerleader! If you are a seller: As an Associate with BHGRE Murphy & Co., it is my goal to give you the best service the real estate industry has to offer. Specifically, I will provide you with a comparative market analysis, known as a CMA and do an on-site preview of homes for sale in the Village so that your home is priced correctly from day one thereby capturing the largest number of prospective buyers, ensuring you get top dollar for your home. Your home will be fully photographed so that buyers can see its attributes on the Internet and in print immediately. I will be available to you, day or night. If you are a buyer: The same applies to you, the buyer. Count on inspired service at no cost to you. My knowledge of home availability in the village makes it easy for you to find the home of your dreams. My ability to visualize a home’s potential makes me a valuable resource if you are looking to get the most bang for your buck. Whether selling or buying, I will treat your transaction like it was my own. You can call or text me anytime! I am at your service.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
As a real estate professional, Joyce knows there are countless reasons for purchasing real estate,
and also countless places to look for it. Joyce makes the buying experience a pleasurable one. In
addition to her keen market knowledge, she offers her clients something unique, and that is her
analytical insight that comes from her background in accounting, from working on Wall Street,
and as a former business owner. She wants to ensure that the home you find fits all your needs.
She wants your real estate decision to be based on sound data, whether you are purchasing a
year-round home or a vacation getaway, because you will want to be able to make the most you can
when you decide to sell. And when it is time to sell she is committed to selling your house for the
most amount of money in the least amount of time.
Licensed in both Florida and New Jersey, Joyce can also help those who are looking to buy a
second home or relocate from or to the Monmouth and Ocean County areas of New Jersey and
the Southwest Florida area. A key part of the real estate transaction is to coordinate the buy and
the sell and to make as stressless a situation as possible. Joyce prides herself on her attention to
detail and excellence in communication to facilitate a seamless process.
Joyce embodies the Better Homes & Gardens mission which is to provide the greatest service the
real estate industry has to offer.

title: Red Bank, NJ
description:

Kevin is the Broker and Owner of Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Murphy & Co., with 5 offices in Rumson, Red Bank, Long Beach Island, Manahawkin, and Forked River. Kevin has been awarded Circle of Excellence salesperson, manager, coach, and mentor throughout his career. His passion for the business has never waivered, and his commitment to excellence has withstood the test of time. Kevin is thankful for his career in real estate, which has allowed him to be the family man he is today. In his spare time, you can find Kevin out fishing, playing men's-league hockey, golf, guitar, or corn-hole with friends and family.
