Erins transition to real estate was seamless, by utilizing her strong communication skills to pursue her long-time interest in the Real Estate Industry. Erin is a member in good standing with the National Association of Realtors, The NJ Association of Realtors, The RealSource Association of Realtors, the New Jersey Multiple Listing Service and the Garden State Multiple Listing Service. She is also a consistent "Top Producer" and "Agent of the Month" at Coccia Realty. Born and raised in Hoboken, New Jersey, Erin is married to husband John and they have two children. Following a long and thorough home search, Erin chose and resides in Rutherford since 2000. Erin is an active parishioner of the Church of Saint Mary in Rutherford and serves as the PTO President at The Academy at Saint Mary, where her children John and Natalie are students since 1997. Erin is also actively involved in the Rutherford Community and is a certified coach for youth sports and enjoys coaching all sports including basketball, softball and baseball. Her personal interests include kickboxing, running and playing softball. Erin is highly committed to the success of her clients and customers in providing them with a "higher level" of service and finding the right home for a buyer and getting the highest possible sales price for a seller. Her warm personality, high level of energy and enthusiasm make her a pleasure to work with. For all your real estate needs, contact Erin at 201-359-7410 or email her at Erin.Petrosino@mycoccia.com

title: Rutherford, NJ
description: My name is Jessica Occhipinti and I am a Sales Associate with Better Homes and Gardens Coccia Realty serving the Northern New Jersey market. As a realtor, I understand the need for time management and planning. I work with my clients to pinpoint their exact wants and needs, and set goals within their timeframe. Time is true of the essence in a real estate transaction. My goal for a seller is to share my marketing skills in order to entice as much foot traffic as possible into their listing. With buyers, I focus on targeting preferred neighborhoods and relay the changes to the current market conditions in order to be one step ahead. I am a member in good standing with: New Jersey Multiple Listing Service (NJMLS) Garden State Multiple Listing Service (GSMLS) National Associates of Realtors (NAR) New Jersey Association of Realtors (NJAR) Greater Bergen Association of Realtors (GBAR). My previous work experience with developing product programs for Walmart, Target, and Starwood Capital has trained me in the skills of marketing, negotiating, and vision building. I am a graduate of the Fashion Institute of Technology in New York City. I enjoy reading and am currently a member of a virtual book club. You can discuss real estate with me as I work out at Studio 108 in Lyndhurst. I love to bake and read about Home Décor. I have a background in children’s apparel and luxury linens, robes, and bath accessories. I have a toddler, making me a Girl Mom, but before that, I was a Dog Mom. I have one adopted rescue Poodle mix and one Boston terrier. I love supporting local small businesses, especially the bakeries since I have a sweet tooth. Since moving to New Jersey I’ve really set roots in my community and made it my home. My goal as a realtor is to help you take the next step to do the same for you and your family.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: My name is Felicia Raymond, a Sales Associate with Better Homes and Gardens Coccia Realty of Rutherford. I am a graduate of Real Estate Express School and a member of: Greater Bergen Board of Realtors; New Jersey Multiple Listing Service and Garden State Multiple Listing Service. I have 25 years experience in Customer Relations and have interned for investors, which gave me the insight to both the buyer and seller side of the business. I have a special talent for staging and am extremely observant and knowledgeable to what sells. I am a firm believer in furthering my knowledge about the current market and the changing times. I thrive on learning new information and have a dedicated, strong work ethic and use my time aggressively to get the job done with diligence and integrity. My relationship with my clients is my number one priority. Communication is the key to any successful business. When I am not assisting my clients, I enjoy spending time with my son. We are gym buddies, and take road trips to listen to the waves of the Jersey shore. I look forward to working with you to fulfill your real estate desires.

title: Rutherford, NJ
description:
I am Lisa DeFranco, a Sales Associate with Better Homes and Gardens Coccia Realty, servicing the Northern NJ real estate market.  I am an energetic ?multitasker? with the drive to make your fairytale become a reality. 

I work with clients ethically and host the most wholesome open houses that makes everybody feel comfortable and positive of the decision that they will make with me. My goal is to treat everyone with kindness and understanding intentions.  I pay extra specific attention to my work and who I?m working with. I am laser focused at something that I want to accomplish and persistent to get that job done. I am extremely patient. Punctuality is very important to me and time management is key. 

During my years at Immaculate Conception High School in Lodi, I was the team captain of my varsity basketball team, so I possess leadership skills and will never steer anyone wrong. I?m very observant to details and listen to the client?s needs to my full ability.  I gain people?s trust very quickly when first meeting them. I listen very closely to what my clients want and I never overstep.

Lisa is an active member of: 
National Association of Realtors (NAR) |
New Jersey Association of Realtors (NJAR) |
Greater Bergen Association of Realtors  (GBAR) |
New Jersey Multiple Listing Service (NJMLS) |
Garden State Multiple Listing Service (GSMLS) |

I am a Eucharistic Minister at Felician College. I am a super Aunt to my niece and nephew. I played sports my whole life mainly basketball and tennis. I enjoy outdoor activities. I love to cook, I love music that fills my soul, and I enjoy interior design. I also love animals. I love food so I love to check out all different restaurants. 

It seems real estate has always been in my blood. My love for Real Estate started as a child admiring my friends and families homes. My grandfather had his own Real estate brokerage in Lyndhurst. My father owned real estate with my mother. I have watched my brother-in-law redo homes inside and outside and how much work and detail that goes into the process. I also helped decorate my sister?s homes with her after construction was done. I also helped my mom being a landlord with our two-family property in Nutley. As I got older, I grew fonder of different styles of architecture and in the different areas that I loved where the Real Estate was located. 
I?m excited about Real Estate because great memories were built in a lot of homes and I had such a great upbringing that I?d like to help more families find their dream home.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
My name is Monika Strak and I am a Sales Associate with Better Homes and Gardens Coccia Realty serving the Northern and Central New Jersey Real Estate Markets. I specialize in working with sellers, buyers, landlords and tenants.

I feel that having the right real estate agent means having an agent who will help you navigate often-complicated real estate process and will make sure that your experience is stress-free and as successful as possible. I always try to provide my clients with the best possible service whether helping them find their dream home or getting the highest value on the market when selling their property.

I pride myself on my attention to details, my ability to negotiate and my commitment to an open and honest communication.

I am also fluent in Polish.

I am a member in good standing with:
New Jersey Multiple Listing Service (NJMLS)
National Association of Realtors (NAR)
New Jersey Association of Realtors (NJAR)
Greater Bergen Association of Realtors (GBAR)

Nothing is more exciting to me than the gratifying feeling I get from helping people meet their real estate needs. You can count on me to always do what is in your best interest. If you are looking for an honest, trustworthy and knowledgeable realtor please contact me and let me help you achieve your real estate goals. You will not be disappointed!

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
As a seasoned real estate professional with over a decade of dedicated service in the New Jersey market, I take pride in helping clients achieve their homeownership dreams. With a deep understanding of the local real estate landscape, I have successfully guided numerous buyers and sellers through the intricate process of property transactions.
My commitment to excellence and attention to detail have been honed through my prior career in a major global consumer products company, where I excelled in planning and implementing detailed-oriented tasks. This experience has greatly enriched my real estate career, allowing me to provide in-depth research and analysis of property values and market data to benefit buyers and sellers.
I am an active member of the Greater Bergen County Board of Realtors, the New Jersey, and National Association of Realtors. I am proud to belong to the New Jersey, Garden State, and Hudson County Multiple Listing Services. My specialization extends to a wide range of properties, including single-family homes, multi-family homes, condominiums, and commercial properties, covering Hudson, Bergen, Essex, and Passaic counties.
My passion lies in helping you make the right real estate decisions, whether finding your dream home or maximizing the return on your investment. With a proven track record of success and a comprehensive understanding of the local real estate market, I'm your trusted partner for all your real estate needs."

title: Rutherford, NJ
description: Sylwia Bernatowicz is a Sales Associate with Better Homes and Gardens Coccia Realty serving the Northern New Jersey real estate markets. title: Rutherford, NJ
description:
RoseMarie Olivieri-Guilloty is a licensed Realtor with Better Homes & Gardens RE Coccia Realty. RoseMarie specializes in the marketing and sale of residential real estate. She is passionate about the needs and goals of her clients. She is always willing to assist a seller, buyer, or customer in attaining their specific objectives. RoseMarie epitomizes integrity, energy, hard work, and creative service in every detail of a real estate transaction. Real estate came naturally to her as RoseMarie has bought, sold and renovated several properties in the Northern New Jersey area. "Participating in the local market myself gives me not only an intricate knowledge of the workings of a transaction but also the compassion and empathy that is truly needed when representing my clients and customers." She prides herself on giving all of her clients the most precise and up-to-date feedback on the state of the market, comparable sales and property values, giving them a realistic outlook on what they can expect to achieve in today’s market.

RoseMarie began her work career in the Banking field, and thereafter pursued interests in the state and federal judicial system. She possesses a wide range of business experience. She also holds an Associate's Degree in Applied Science as a Legal Assistant, has obtained her certifications as an Accredited Buyers Representative (ABR), and Short Sales and Foreclosure Representative (SFR). Her experience and foresight to proactively address details before they become a problem assist her with setting a course of action on all her business transactions. In her spare time, RoseMarie enjoys a good happy hour with friends, seeking adventure in the outdoors, surf fishing, and spending time with her family. Born and raised in Essex County, RoseMarie currently resides in Bergen County.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Barbara Tesa joined Green Team NJ Realty in 2017 with over 20 years of professional experience in both residential and commercial real estate management, and has a successful history as a licensed real estate agent in New Jersey since 2009. Barbara’s experience demonstrates a genuine passion for client satisfaction. Her approachable nature and avid commitment to developing positive personal and professional relationships contribute to her success. Whether her clients are looking to buy or sell a primary residence, 2nd home, vacation home or investment property, she is eager to get them to their goal. As a Realtor, and as a long-time resident at Crystal Springs Resort, Barbara is a professional with extensive knowledge about the properties at Crystal Springs and the surrounding area. She has successfully worked with many clients on both the selling and buying side and welcomes working with anyone looking to relocate TO or FROM the resort…or anywhere in the surrounding area. You will be delighted working with Barbara; she is proactive and takes a genuine interest in her clients real estate needs. Her motto is: “Your Property ~ My Priority” and she holds true to that. Barbara’s interest in residential real estate began many years ago when she and her husband, Rudi, purchased their first home in Bergen County. Since then, they have purchased and sold several houses before settling in Crystal Springs in 2001 where they have enjoyed a resort lifestyle and all the beauty that Sussex County has to offer. The ability to embrace the potential in each of their homes became second nature to Barbara, and that has given her confidence to inspire many of her clients to embrace the possibilities in properties they have purchased as well.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: With her warm disposition and friendly demeanor, Amy walks with her clients through their real estate experience. For over a decade, she has been running a successful construction company with her husband. After purchasing and renovating several investment properties, real estate was a natural progression for her. Amy brings a wealth of knowledge to the table and relates to her clients’ needs and concerns with diligence. Growing up and living in northern New Jersey her whole life, Amy enjoys all of the adventures the area has to offer, especially skiing, hiking and camping with her family. Amy is family oriented and genuinely enjoys working with her clients who are guaranteed to always be met with a familiar smile and contagious enthusiasm while on their real estate journey.

title: Associate Real Estate Broker
description: Charles Nagy resides in Crystal Springs with his wife Lynne. He enjoys playing golf and being involved in many of the other activities in the community. Through his pursuit of continuing real estate education he obtained his certification as a Short Sale and Foreclosure Resource. Charles has been involved with different aspects of the real estate business for the past 40 years, including the creation and sale of real estate tax sheltered investment offerings; real estate management of high rises and garden apartment complexes; the development of raw land for the construction of residential homes and for 18 years, as a builder of residential properties. Consequently, it is no surprise that Charles decided to involve himself in the marketing and sale of real estate to prospective homeowners. With the wealth of knowledge and experience that Charles brings with him to the team of Agents at Green Team New Jersey Realty, he is able to deal with any issues that may arise in the course of selling homes which enables him to better assist buyers with their decisions. For two years running (2014 and 2015) Charles was one of Sussex County’s Top Sales Producers, earning the “Bronze” award and expects to continue his achievements in the coming years. Charlie’s motto is “a happy customer is our best form of advertisement” .

title: Vernon, NJ
description: Thirty five years ago, I bought my first home in Sussex County. I was just starting a new family and wanted to raise my children where they could have a big backyard to play in. They are all grown now, all four of them, but I still call Sussex County my home. I have always loved working with people and decided what better place to use this gift, by becoming a real estate agent in 2018. Since then, I have helped guide many clients gently through the process by making buying or selling their home, a wonderful experience for all involved. I am hardworking, very easy to work with and go the extra mile for my clients.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Jaime Dalton eagerly joined the Green Team New Jersey, as a Licensed Real Estate Salesperson at the start of 2017. Jaime was raised in Vernon, graduating from Vernon Township High School in 1996 and even though she had at one point moved away, her love of Sussex County and her deep roots to the area brought her back. “I just can’t imagine not living here, “said Dalton. “It had the best of everything….living in the beautiful, peaceful mountains while having anything else you could want all within an hour.” Before getting into real estate, Jaime worked in the sales and customer service side of multiple industries for over 20 years. Managing a bank has enabled her to develop a strong working knowledge of the mortgage industry. Working in the restaurants around town she has developed relationships with the local people. Jaime is a social media and technology devotee, which keeps her in constant communication with the pulse of the area. Her attention to detail, persistence and consistent communication are what sets her apart. To Jaime, it doesn’t matter if you’re buying a house, selling a house, or working as a cooperating agent, you will always be treated respectfully and be her top priority. Jaime appreciates that going into Real Estate is based on trust and relationships. By building that partnership, she will help you realize your goals while meeting her own. She looks forward to helping you every step of the way and showing you around her town and county!

title: Associate Real Estate Broker
description: Heidi joins Green Team New Jersey in Vernon with great enthusiasm and energy. A long time resident of Vernon and Sussex County, she brings her love of real estate to us. As a community leader, Heidi has served as President of the Sussex County Board of Realtors, President of Branchville Rotary and a Paul Harris Fellow. She is also an active member of Sussex County Chamber of Commerce and was a Charter Member of the Friends of Library and served as its President. Heidi believes in “working with the community to make it better!” Heidi brings this to her real estate career and her clients trust her and know that she will bring her knowledge, expertise and integrity to each transaction.

title: Associate Real Estate Broker
description:
Having been licensed in both New York and New Jersey for the past 15 years, Kimberly Lasalandra has an extensive background in the real estate industry. She has her Brokers License and is the Managing Broker at Green Team New Jersey Realty in Vernon, NJ. She is a member of The Hudson Gateway Association of Realtors, The Passaic County Board of Realtors, The NJ MLS, The Sussex County Board of Realtors, The Garden State Multiple Listing Services, National Association of Realtors and a State of Florida Real Estate Sales Associate.
Prior to becoming a Real Estate Agent, Lasalandra was actively involved in running her family business for over 25 years. Her duties included but were not limited to bookkeeping, accounts payable and receivable, staff training and development, data management, inventory control and most important Customer Relations
“This has molded me into a very well rounded individual who can give you strong guidance and the confidence you deserve as you set out to make what could be the biggest investment of your life, ” said Lasalandra. “I’m dedicated to assisting you every step of the way and making your real estate needs my number one priority. I will be using proven systems to track transactions from contract to closing. I’m excited to be part of the Green Team Home Selling System in New York as well.”
Lasalandra and her husband Nick have lived in Warwick for 21 years.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Peggy Bradfield is bringing her Leadership and problem-solving skills to Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Green Team.


Peggy’s commitment to education and advancement in the corporate world is truly inspiring. After studying Business Administration in college she continued her education by becoming a Lean Six Sigma Green Belt . As a green belt, she is a skilled team player and shows an impressive level of persistence, expertise, and commitment to any projects she takes on. Upon completion, she continued to become a Change Management Leader and attended Project Management Institute Training.


All this extensive knowledge helped her excel as a Project Manager and Staff Support for Verizon for over 30 years. During her career, she led multiple large programs and earned the titles of National Training Coordinator, Sales Channel Manager, and National Communication Manager.


Peggy has purchased three homes of her own throughout the years. Her first home was purchased in 1983 when she moved to Wantage, New Jersey. She then purchased her second home in Frankford before finally moving to her forever home in Lafayette, NJ in 1997. Her children all attended the Lafayette Township school located adjacent to her home. This school was a lovely experience for her children, as students, and herself, as a parent.


Since living in Sussex County, Peggy has discovered her love for hiking the beautiful local trails and enjoying the peace that they bring. Additionally, she enjoys working out and has discovered her strong passion for yoga and creating beautiful pottery.


When Peggy left her previous job she decided it was time for a career change. While exploring potential career options she began reading about real estate. She knew her leadership and project management background in the corporate world would blend perfectly into her new found career. In addition, she loved the idea of being able to help people find their dream homes in the same area which has brought her joy since 1983. With her mind made up, she attended real estate school and obtained her license.


With her license in hand, Peggy began to search for an agency that would make her feel at home. She knew she didn't want to get lost in an agency that was just ‘too big’. When she found Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Green Team she was very impressed with the training provided. As time went on, she learned more about our culture and the tight bonds between our team members. She soon knew that this was the perfect brokerage for her to call home.


Welcome to the team, Peggy. We are so happy to be part of your story and watch your Real Estate career grow.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I am an agent whose business is built on the promise of exceptional customer service. Whether you are selling your home or searching for that special place to call your own, you deserve to work with someone you trust-who you know has your best interest.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: Ted has over 31 years of experience selling resort properties. In 1979, the amenities and beauty first attracted Ted and his wife, Rosanne, to the area. Through the years, they fell in love with the lifestyle and growth here in the Mountain Creek, Crystal Springs and Great Gorge resort area. They have enjoyed and shared their appreciation for the surrounding area with their three children, family and friends. Ted is a seasoned professional with a record of achievement and reputation for his honesty and integrity. He is enthusiastic about sharing his love of the Resort lifestyle with his clients, whether they are looking for an investment property, second home or primary residence.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
I was born and raised in NJ and moved to Sussex County in 2017. My happiness in life are my husband, 2 dogs and 2 cats. Moving to Sussex was the best move we ever made. Living in the area allows me to provide my clients with knowledge of the area. Sussex County is known for their breathtaking views and wonderful communities. I hope to find my clients similar enjoyment.
I began my career in Insurance 19 years ago and developed strong client relationships with Honesty and being Trustworthy. I understand the importance of maintaining client relationships.
My husband and I are real estate investors which ultimately led me to join the Real Estate Sales side. My passion for and diligence in finding Real Estate and Land to Develop on also led me here.
Buying your home is the most paramount purchase you will have in your life while selling your home is equally as important. As your Realty Executives Agent, my sole focus is to give you the executive treatment you deserve. From listing at the right price to making the best offer, I will be there every step of the way. I am immersed every day in all aspects of the process and I will put that expertise to work for you. I know buying or selling your home is a big decision and my job is to help make it as easy, stress-free and successful as possible.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: ABR, SRES Specialties: Buyer's Agent, Listing Agent, Relocation, Foreclosure New York Real Estate including information on local real estate market conditions and insights in representing a Buyer in there Transaction ~Staten Island, NY Real Estate Agent I have been a Realtor for many years and have had the opportunity to meet and assist families and individuals. Over 95 percent of my clients hear about me from a friend or family member. I don''t believe in a cookie cutter approach, rather I think that each transaction should be handled the way a skilled tailor would fashion a suit made to fit.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
With over 22 years as a full-time New York State Licensed Salesperson, I hold several credentials including Senior Real Estate Specialist (SRES), Certified Relocation Professional (CRP), and Accredited Buyer's Representative (ABR). My success is measured by the satisfaction of my clients, having sold millions of dollars worth of real estate by keeping them informed about constant changes in the housing market.
I listen carefully to my clients wants and needs, providing expert advice tailored to their specific situations to help them make informed decisions about their biggest investments. Assisting clients in achieving their goals gives me great pleasure in my career as a realtor.
Continuous education and training allows me to offer exceptional service in the ever-changing housing market. I guide sellers and buyers through each stage of their decision-making process with clear communication and reliable information.
As a native Staten Islander, I have extensive knowledge of the neighborhoods throughout the borough. Dedicated and reliable, you can count on me because
"My Commitment Leads You Home."

title: Real Estate Broker
description:
New York State Licensed Real Estate Broker Licensed since 1981, Licensed in New Jersey 2009 CRS, SRES, ABR, SFR, CRE, SRS2, CIPS, CBR. With over 41 years experience, Fran has assisted hundreds of families in their real estate needs. In many cases she has worked with generations of the same family improve their quality of life by assisting them in every aspect of their real estate decisions. As Broker/Owner of Safari Realty, along with her husband Frank, since 1988, Fran has also inspired generations of real estate agents to learn their trade. Over the years her involvement in the community of Staten Island has been rewarded with much recognition for her hard work and contributions. Fran has been the recipient of: Staten Island Board of Realtors Realtor of the Year Award (2020), Staten Chamber of Commerce Louis R. Miller Award, Staten Island Advance Power Couple, SIBOR Fair Housing Award, SIBOR William "Bill" Coull Realtor Service Award, Kiwanis Brittany Fellowship Award, Best for NYC Award, Better Homes and Gardens International Community Involvement, Staten Island Aids Task Force Award, Staten Island Borough President Community Service Award, Have a Heart for Kids Award, Kamp Kiwanis Fellowship Award, NYS Women Woman of Distinction Award, S.I. Museum Business Fellow Award, Thomas Powell Mason Award, Soroptimist International Citizenship Award, Alzheimer's Association Community Service Award, 2008 Staten Island Advance Women of Achievement, S.I. Zoo Business Leadership Award, S.I. Heart Society Partners in Healthcare Award, N.Y. Urban League S.I. Branch Health and Social Wellness Award, Star Network Staten Island Top Woman in Business Award, The Salvation Army Community Activist Award, The Da Vinci Society of Wagner College Recognition Award, Staten Island University Hospital Foundation Service Award. Founder of Protecting One Young Heart at a Time in memory of her son, Frank J Reali III who died from an undiagnosed heart defect. The foundation raises awareness and funds to develop a protocol to test young adults before they are given the green light to participate in high school sports. With the support of the two local Staten Island Hospitals, SIUH and RUMC, young adults from participating high schools have been receiving heart testing free of charge. Fran's goal is to change the NY State criteria for medical testing prior to entering high school for every child, while working to save every parent the grief from the loss of a child due to sudden cardiac death.
Past/Present Board/Director/Trustee/Officer/Member of: WCR Staten Island Children's Museum, Alzheimer's Foundation of Staten Island Community Health Action, Soroptomist of Staten Island Business Network International, World Of Women, S.I. Chapter Real Estate Political Action Committee, Alice Austin House Museum A Very Special Place, Staten Island Museum, American Cancer Society/Staten Island, Staten Island Children's Campaign, Good Scout Committee, Staten Island Economic Development Council, Prayer Shawl Ministry of St. Teresa's Parish, Richmond County Kiwanis, SIBC, SIUH Family Interaction Council (All with the focus of preserving the quality of life on Staten Island).
Fran's dedication to the betterment for all around her has weaved her private and public life into one gigantic quilt that insures her passion, commitment, dedication and knowledge benefits her family, friends and business relationships as well as numerous Staten Islanders. Fran is a mother of 4, a grandmother of 13, a wife and partner of One.

title: Real Estate Salesperson
description: I'm a full time NYS Licensed Real Estate Professional experienced in marketing properties, short sales, documentation, coordination of contracts, filing forms & disclosures required by NYS, confirming certificate of occupancy, providing information on neighborhood sales & comparative market analysis on home values, pre-qualifying a buyers ability, readiness and willingness, negotiating offers & counteroffers, assisting buyers in locating a mortgage lender, obtaining financing, and informing on the bank process, arranging home inspections, and maintaining the forward movement of paperwork until the contract of sale is complete. title: Real Estate Salesperson
description:
Renée Williams Is Bringing Her Expertise To Better Homes And Gardens Real Estate Green Team! Renée began her career as a political analyst in London’s Parliament. Following that she spent nearly a decade in Private Equity as a Financial Analyst. She worked in Midtown, Manhattan, at a global real estate-oriented merchant bank, asset management, and investment company. This company was the industry leader in distressed and value-focused real estate investing. This position earned her unrivaled experience across the real estate industry.
At the end of 2019, Renée relinquished her role at C-III Capital Partners to devote more time to social impact matters. Following this, she became a part of a minority-led, technology and social impact company in SoHo, New York. Providing top millennial, corporate professionals access to philanthropic, board leadership opportunities within well-known nonprofits and foundations. While a part of this company Renée led Corporate Relations, Diversity Training, and Partnership Engagement.
An Expert In Her Field Renée now works as a licensed real estate advisor. With extensive experience across mixed-use commercial and residential real estate. Additionally, she has firsthand property development and interior design experience. Thanks to her nearly 10-year career in private equity investment real estate she has lots to bring to the table as a real estate advisor.
“I enjoy all the different aspects of real estate and it doesn’t feel like work.” Say’s Renée when asked about her experience as an agent.
Additionally Renée is a Political Science Graduate of Boston University and Foreign Language Studies at London School of Economics. She is also an active member of the prestigious Alumni Society. This elite network is composed of senior-level Latinx leaders who graduated from the country’s top universities.
Making A House Into A Home Four years ago Renée and her husband made the decision to leave Brooklyn and to relocate to the Hudson Valley. While house hunting in Greenwood Lake, they found a hidden gem in the form of a small lakefront bungalow. This home had recently gone into foreclosure and was in desperate need of some TLC. Thankfully Renée and her husband had a vision and were ready to make it a reality. After some hard work, they had completely transformed this property. They were now proud owners of an idyllic, three-story, contemporary-modern, designer lakefront home.
Renée’s Dedication To Her Community Now Renée is a proud member of the Warwick Valley Rotary Club and recent graduate of Leadership Orange Class of 2022. She is happy to go above and beyond for her community and serves monthly at the Greenwood Lake Food Pantry. Furthermore, she is honored to sit as the Chairwoman of the Rumshock Veterans Foundation.
As a former nationally ranked Rhythmic Gymnast and New England Patriots Cheerleader, Renée enjoys an active life. She can often be found on new adventures and traveling with her husband and two young children.
A New Team To Call Her Own When it came time for Renée to leave her previous brokerage she wanted to find a group that would help her achieve her goals. When she met with us at Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Green Team she could tell she found her new “home”. With our entire team ready to support her every step of the way she was ready to begin her newest adventure.
When asked why she picked Green Team she said: ” I chose to make a move because I feel that at BHGRE Green Team I would receive support. I also knew that they would truly focus on my success and help me to achieve my goals. That kind of support and personal touch is difficult to find in this industry.”.”

description: Hi, I'm Stacey! I am a licensed Florida Realtor who services in Pensacola, Pace, Milton, and surrounding areas. I graduated from California Baptist University in 1993 and taught P.E. in California before moving across country to Pensacola where we bought our first home. As a former middle school math teacher, the transition to real estate seemed like a big leap. In 2008, my husband and I lost our home, having to rebuild. This made me realize that I could help others navigate this realm of home-buying. After experiencing the homebuying process myself, I realized that what was missing in the field was a sense of family. I do genuinely love people, and vow to treat my clients as family. Let me be your Realtor! We will journey together to find you your perfect home and, in the end, we will be family. WELCOME HOME!

office_name: Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Journey
title: Sales Associate
description: Hi! Im Kellie Thompson, real estate agent and a long time resident of Bentonville, Arkansas. I moved to Northwest Arkansas when I was in the 5th grade, back when I complained about there being only one restaurant in town and having to drive to Tulsa or Joplin for shopping. Ive enjoyed watching my hometown blossom into a beautiful and vibrant city that attracts people from all over the country. I've been married for 17 years to my high school sweetheart. We have three children (ages 14, 12, and 6) that keep us very busy with all of their sports and passions. We are lucky enough to have our entire family still residing in Bentonville and enjoy spending time with them regularly. Before I decided to get into real estate, I was a nurse at Mercy Hospital, Women's and Childrens, for 10 years. After retiring from nursing, I began working with my husband at our home construction company. My experience in construction and nursing prepared me well for a career in real estate. My clients appreciate my compassionate nature, extensive knowledge of the area and experience in home-planning and design. During my free time, I enjoy attending Cross Church Pinnacle Hills, reading, spending time on Beaver Lake and bike riding the local trails with family and friends.

We enjoy checking out new restaurants, museums, and countless other activities Northwest Arkansas has to offer. description: Manuale Watkins, commonly known as Manny, is an ambitious REALTOR with a strong commitment to community. A graduate from Fayetteville High School and a University of Arkansas alum, Manny is well known in the community for his infectious smile, warm personality and natural talent for success. He sported #21 on the Arkansas Razorbacks basketball team and became a natural leader by being a dedicated team player. After graduation, Manny continued his involvement with fundraising, event planning and community activities. His role with the Arkansas Razorback Foundation and as an Associate Buyer for Walmart gave him insight on navigating relationships. He thrives as a catalyst between decision makers and doers as he is invested in understanding the unique characteristics and interests of each party. Manny is the same person inside and outside of the office. When hes not at the closing table, you will find him spending time with family or playing sports and video games.

Bentonville is a vibrant city known for its stunning bike trails including the scenic Coler Creek trails, where I love to walk and immerse myself in nature. These beautiful trails not only offer a perfect escape but also showcase the communitys commitment to outdoor living With a celebrated art museum and a flourishing economy, Bentonville provides a welcoming hometown atmosphere that youre sure to enjoy. When Im not finding the perfect home for my clients, you can usually find me in my garden or in the kitchen where I love to cook and create delicious meals. Im a proud parent of two adult children and a grandparent to one wonderful granddaughter, with another grandchild on the way! My three fur babies complete my family and bring so much joy to my life. Lets work together to find your perfect home before its gone! Reach out today and lets make your real estate dreams a reality.

Opportunities are knocking on every door and now is the time to buy. Please allow me the pleasure of touring the area and showing you all the different neighborhoods that NWA has to offer.

office_name: Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Journey
title: Sales Associate
description: Hello, my name is Priscilla Willis and I am a real estate agent with Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Journey. Whether youre buying your first home, upsizing, downsizing, investing or taking the leap and moving to Northwest Arkansas, Im here to help. I grew up in the LBGTQ-friendly artists haven of Eureka Springs and returned to the area after 30+ years in Southern California. Yes, I gave up urban living in a beach paradise to return to my roots, build an incredible MCM-inspired home, and live a less stressful life surrounded by nature. And I have no regrets! Talk to me  I would love to show you some of the incredible benefits of living in Northwest Arkansas. After a business career which culminated in co-founding a B2B internet software company in Newport Beach, CA, I followed my passion for food and cooking and started ShesCookin.com which focuses on heart healthy recipes and culinary travel. Now, Im using my over-20 years of personal experience in buying, selling, investing, remodeling, and building to assist you in your real estate journey. I thrive on diversity and enjoy meeting and getting to know people from all over the world. My clients can expect diligence, professionalism, honesty, and joie de vivre from me. I frequent the gym, walk, hike, kayak, and practice yoga to burn those calories I gain from eating and drinking joyfully. Southern hospitality and community involvement are foremost here. I urge newcomers to check out area Meet-up groups. I belong to NWA Hiking, NWA Cycling, and NWA Explorers and volunteer with the American Heart Association. Lets set up a time to talk and find out what it is that you are looking for in life! With Bentonville and Bella Vista in the north to Fayetteville in the south, Northwest Arkansas has something for everyone37.6 miles of Razorback Greenway and countless other hiking and mountain biking trails, kayaking and waterfall chasing, a dynamic restaurant culture, thriving craft beer scene, world class art at Crystal Bridges, live music at venues from Georges Majestic Lounge to The Amp and Walton Art Center, Razorbacks college sports, and so much more. Plus, I know you want to hone those mad cooking skills you acquired during COVID, lets find a home where you can do it!

description: Im Mason Dooly, a dedicated real estate agent with a passion for helping people find their perfect home. Whether you're buying, selling, or investing, I'm here to guide you every step of the way. With working in real-estate Ive had the privilege of working with diverse clients and navigating a variety of market conditions. My journey began when at a young age when I realized how much I like helping out others and setting a standard for customer service. I specialize in many fields such as residential real estate, commercial properties. My approach is centered on helping home buyers have the best experience possible while buying a home. I pride myself on my ability to make sure all my clients get the best customer service possible while doing my best to find them there dream home. What sets me apart is my drive and willingness to work hard to make sure the home buying experience is as easy possible I believe that buying or selling a home is more than just a transaction; its a significant life event. Thats why Im dedicated to making the process as smooth and stress-free as possible for you. Im here to answer your questions, provide guidance, and help you achieve your real estate goals. Whether youre looking to buy your first home, sell a property, or explore investment opportunities, Im here to assist. Feel free to reach out to me at anytime Id love to chat about how I can help with your real estate needs. Looking forward to working with you! Best regards, Mason Dooly

description: Meet Cole and Tori Newland, real estate agents with the Hagan Group powered by Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Journey. Tori Newland relocated to Fayetteville for college and now they raise their two beautiful boys in NWA. Cole and Tori share a passion for helping people with the purchase or sale of their home. With their background in customer service, its easy to see why their clients love them. In their free time youll probably find the couple at the park with their boys or trying out some new restaurant in NWA. Let us go to work for you! Give us a call now!

description: Amanda Ables is a Texarkana native who is passionate about her community. As an experienced REALTOR, she strives to work in the best interests of her clients, while building relationships that last. She is dedicated to the performing arts, loves her family, and specializes in helping first time home buyers find ease of transaction. In 2021 she was named in the Top 40 Under 40 for Texarkana Professionals in Four States Living Magazine, has been named a SOAR Trainer for the Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate brand, and is the acting Transaction Coordinator and Office Manager for the Texarkana office. Amanda is dedicated to giving excellent service through committed professional relationships.
